story:
中文介紹網頁    Facebook    Youtube  

What Is A Semi-permanent Adapter? 

 

    There are many smartphone adapters for microscopes and telescopes and all of them share the same problem: they occupy the eyepieces while performing "phoneography." When multiple consecutive observations are needed, the users have to mount and dismount the adapters repeatedly. Some adapters have fast release mechanisms to address this problem but such mechanisms would also compromise the stability more or less.  A semi-permanent adapter is composed of an adapter ring clamp to fit eyepieces with diameters within certain ranges, and a phone shuttle which is a special designed universal phone holder that can move the phone back and forth.

What Are Other Features of Reductive Swift Adapter?

  • Interchangeable eyepiece clamps:

3 sizes available for different ranges: 

eyepiece outer diameter
Small : 27 - 36 mm 
Medium : 36 - 45 mm
Large : (50*)51 - 65 mm

* increase the thickness of the lining material inside the eyepiece clamp 

  • Stepless, independent adjustment of phone position on all directions (the "x, y and z axes"):

    It is important to have an adjustable "z distance" (the distance between the phone's camera and the eyepiece) because the size of the image circle projected on the sensor changes with the distance. There is an optimal distance for each combination of specific smartphones and optical instruments. The image circle should not be too small because most of the sensor's pixels will be wasted. It should not be too large either since much of the field of the instrument will be cropped. This feature also makes it easy to eliminate vignetting around the image circle. Vignetting is caused by a mismatch of exit pupil of the microscope/telescope eyepiece and entrance pupil of the smartphone's camera module. It can be a result of poor alignment or inappropriate z distance. 

 

  • Compensating screw for minor tilt:  

    Sometimes minor tilt of the device could not be avoided, especially when the eyepiece is pointing at a steep angle (near vertical). A tilt-compensating screw is used to maintain perfect alignment.

  • Soft lens shade : 

    The z distances required are a few millimeters at least, so a lens shade is needed to block unwanted light from entering the gap, and to prevent lens flares, ghost images, decreased contrast or other effects that would decrease image quality.

  • Rooms for modifications :

    This adapter is designed to be universal. However there are so many optical instruments and smartphones with a wide variety of dimensions and specifications. To increase the adaptability, we added screw holes for M3 bolts on the clamp of the phone holder. 3D printed add-on plates can be screwed on it to change the area in contact with the smartphone (as the picture below shows). We will also provide the CAD files of the eyepiece ring clamps and we welcome our users to share their own designs. There is also a 1/4" tripod screw hole on the back of the adapter. Users can put on an external support structure (e.g. flexible mini tripods) with it.

Video: Features & Instructions

中文使用說明請點我

Examples of Use

Telescope

Video Example

望遠鏡：中文影片請點我

Microscope

Video Examples 

顯微鏡：中文影片點我

顯微鏡2：中文影片點我

 

Timeline

Why We Need Your Help

     The plastic parts will be made by injection molding to ensure reliability and precision. The cost of tooling will be great since there are many (moving) parts in this adapter. We need your help to bring this adapter into production.

    We will make minor adjustments to the product according to the feedback from beta testers, if necessary (see below).

Beta Test Programs

Beta stage 1 (Completed)

    We have been sending out 3D-printed prototypes to our friends worldwide for more test results from various applications and long-term use. Follow us on social media to find out the results!

Beta stage 2 (Application ended)

    We invited a limited number of testers to try on the adapters before it goes mass production. Participants are our backers and they have received 3D-printed samples (see update#1  & update#2). If this campaign is successfully funded, the participants will get their perks as other backers will do.  

Beta stage 3

    This stage will start after this campaign ends. If you missed previous stage, follow us on facebook for more information.

Q & A

Q : Dose it support all the smartphones on the market?
A: The range of its universal phone holder is 56~99mm, so any phone with its width in this range is supported. If the camera module is near the side of the phone, the horizontal position of the phone holder should be adjusted to put the camera in the center of the eyepiece. 

Q: Does it support phones with dual camera?
A: This adapter can be used with a dual camera phone. But only one of the camera modules would be working since only one would be precisely aligned with the eyepiece. (see this video for a test on iPhone X and Sony XZ1)
 

Q : 任何手機都可以使用嗎?  
A : 通用手機夾具的夾持範圍為56~99mm，任何寬度在此範圍的手機都可以安裝。不論相機模組位在中線或偏旁都可以適用。 (利用手機水平位置調整機制)  

Q: 雙鏡頭手機可以使用嗎?
A: 雙鏡頭手機可以使用，但同時只有一個相機模組對齊目鏡的光軸，故使用時只能利用到其中一個相機模組。(參見這個影片中iPhoneX及Sony XZ1的使用情形)

story:
The iPhone accessories market has boomed recently thereby enhancing the functionality and convenience of using your iPhone. However, these accessories are hampered by the iPhone's limitation of only having one lightning port to connect, which typically is used for charging. Imagine if you had another port on your iPhone, to connect to iPhone accessories while leaving your lightning port free.

What would you do with 2X the functionality?

Meet Xl.i.CON, the iPhone and PC accessories line that was awarded the 2016 CES Innovation award. 


Xl.i.CON is our brand new line of accessories that connect via X Link technology. X Link, our patented technology, is a unique way to connect your iPhone or PC to a diverse line of accessories. Connecting through neodynium magnets,there are no cables. No cables to fray, go missing or get tangled. Use the Xl Case to connect to your iPhone or Xl HUB to connect to your PC. 

The number of potential Xl devices that can be connected through X link technology are endless. See some of our currently developed  Xl-devices below. Many more Xl-devices are currently in development and through Xl.i.CON we hope to revolutionize the accessories market.





Awarded as a 2016 CES Honoree, one Xl Flash Memory expands your iPhone’s storage by up to 64G and allows for simple and intuitive transfer of data from your iPhone to your PC and vice versa. This tiny USB flash memory connects seamlessly to your iPhone and PC making the transfer and streaming of files much simpler between the two.

About the size of a button, Xl Flash Memory doesn't jut out awkwardly from the bottom of your phone and instead clicks directly into the X Link on your Xl Case. As soon as you snap Xl Flash Memory to the back of your iPhone, you can access your data via an application. 



By utilizing multiple Xl Flash Memory drives, you can increase your iPhone's storage by as much as you desire and Xl Flash Memory supports all file types including  pictures, movies, and music. With all that storage space imagine the possibilities:

  • Store and stream your entire music library
  • Store and play a library of HD movies
  • Shoot long-duration HD videos using your iPhone camera

Xl Flash Memory allows you to take all of your data on-the-go all in a small portable USB drive while also allowing for seamless transfer of files from your iPhone to PC. This is the potential of X link technology.



Xl Earbuds are truly digital headphones that deliver much higher fidelity music than earphones that connect via the earphone jack.  Xl Earbuds have an imbedded USB Digital-to-Analog Converter (DAC) and amplifier, allowing you to bypass your iPhone's clunkier system and receive pure digital audio data. Unlike other digital headphones, Xl Earbuds connect via X Link technology allowing for simultaneous charging via lightning port and phone call compatibility.




Xl Dock is the first dock that allows for simultaneous sync and 2X charging. The dock also can be used as a portable battery so you can wirelessly charge at 2X speeds on-the-go. Equipped with Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), Xl Dock is compatible with the Xl.i.CON application.


Through the Xl.i.CON application you can manage battery life for both your iPhone and Xl Dock. Unlike other docks, which display remaining battery life via a series of coloured lights,the Xl.i.CON App displays it down to an exact percentage. 

The Xl.i.CON app also allows you to toggle between two charging modes: Speed mode and Eco mode. Speed mode charges your iPhone at 2X speed. In Eco mode, choose efficiency over speed. Many chargers on the market are highly inefficient and leak energy uselessly.  Eco mode, charges at 95% efficiency making it both eco-friendly and a relief to the user’s energy bills.

The Xl.i.CON app also contains an anti-loss function. When your iPhone is separated a set distance from your Xl Power Dock, you will receive an alert saying "Oops! Leave me now?"


Xl Case is equipped with our trademarked X link technology so you can connect your iPhone to our line of Xl-Devices. With Xl Case you have the option to switch your lightning port to a more universal Micro 5 pin port. Additionally, the speaker enclosure around Xl case was built to audibly increase the natural sound output of your iPhone.  All future Xl devices will also be capable of connecting to your iPhone via Xl Case.


Xl HUB allows you to connect X link devices to your PC. With 2 USB A type ports, 2 USB C type ports and 3X link ports, the connectivity options to your computer are enhanced to greater heights. All future Xl devices will also be capable of connecting to your computer via Xl HUB. 



Founded in 2012, BenchSoft is dedicated to studying and developing smartphone related accessories that enhance the smartphone user’s experience. We have a distaste for imitation, and were the first developer of the 2X smartphone charging cable in the world. Our team consists of specialized engineers in the fields of Audio DSP, 2.4 GHz wireless technology, mobile application, and battery operation alongside young marketing experts. We have been hard at work on Xl.i.CON now for several years, and hope that the Xl.i.CON line of accessories completely changes the way people think of iPhone accessories.

Core Business Areas:

Nearfield Wireless Communication (Bluetooth Speaker, Headset, ETC.) Audio DSP related Business (Audio and Sound Signal Processing) Recharging Smart Phone Battery and Management Technology Mobile App Production (Photo Editing/ Control 3rd Party Accessories)

From a developer and creator's perspective, I would like to say that there are no risks with my product. However, I've never attempted mass production of Xl.i.Con and unexpected issues may arise once we are able to start. Tech products especially with their number of intricate parts may run into hurdles in mass production. Especially given the number of devices that we have planned in the Xl.i.CON line, we have our work cut out for us to develop and test everything. However, given what we have seen with our working prototypes we feel confident that we can deliver based on our planned schedule. All of your funds will be placed into making the current Xl.i.CON accessories line and we hope that we get funded enough to continue working on even more Xl Devices.

story:
Introduction

We present you an app to save money on your mobile internet bill and to surf the Web safely.
With the app WebGuard for Android devices, you’ll forget all about advertisements.

With WebGuard you can block all those intrusive ads without touching your wallet!
You will be able to watch movies and listen to your favorite music without interruptions and offline, saving money on internet traffic!

WebGuard is also useful to those who are concerned about the security of their data. You can now connect to a public WiFi network without worrying about some hacker stealing your information.
WebGuard also effectively compresses the data received from the network, minimizing your mobile internet usage!

Blocking in-game advertisement will allow you to game without annoying interruptions.

We are hopping to raise enough money to delete advertisements from our daily life!

 

How to save money on streaming subscriptions

The biggest video hosting platform in the world is YouTube. In order to push their subscription-based model, Google keeps filling YouTube with longer, more aggressive and more invasive advertisements, forcing you to pay if you don’t want a poor experience in their platform. And Google is not the only perpetrator.

Let’s look at the example of YouTube a bit more in-depth. How much per year a user will have to spend on a subscription to watch videos and listen to music without ads?
YouTube offers 6 subscription options with a 1 month free trial.

  Normal Family Student
YouTube Premium $11.99 / month
$143.88 / year		 $17.99 / month
$215.88 / year		 $6.99 / month
$83.88 / year
YouTube Music Premium $9.99 / month
$119.88 / year		 $14.99 / month
$179.88 / year		 $4.99 / month
$59.88 / year

 

Thus, the cheapest subscription is $143.88 per year, or $83.88 if you are a student. Music lovers can save by paying only Music Premium subscription without access to YouTube itself for $119.88 per year or $59.88 if you are a student.

This is quite costly, and for only one service!

With WebGuard, you won’t need all those subscriptions. You will be able to watch videos and listen to music without ads on YouTube, YouTube Music, Amazon Prime Video, ESPN+, HBO GO, Disney+ and Hulu.

With WebGuard, you save not only on subscriptions, but also on traffic. After listening to music or watching a clip once in YouTube or YouTube Music, you can play it again offline wherever you are. WebGuard allows you to configure the permissible amount of memory for the cache with music and video, which is automatically freed up when there is not enough space, removing the least requested content from the cache.

 

Surf safely the Internet

Everyone knows the dangers of the Internet. An army of numerous scammers who are finding more and more new ways of stealing from people and large advertising companies that collect all the information about us, even the one we don’t know about. Everything we do online is recorded and sold to companies recollecting data. Furthermore, going to a public WiFi hotspot is equal to opening the doors to your personal data to unwanted visitors. WebGuard can encrypt all the data you send so that you can navigate safely on public networks.

WebGuard also allows to spoof your IP address to one of the following countries: Germany, France, USA, Canada and Russia. This allows you enjoy location-locked content and reduced price in some content.

WebGuard also blocks ads and tracking on popular social networks like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, Flickr, Last.fm, LiveJournal, Tumblr, VKontakte and Odnoklassniki.

A unique ad blocker with personal data protection and entry-level anonymity, this is what we offer you!

 

Save on your mobile Internet

J.D. Power reports the average monthly bill will cost you $157. After your monthly housing, grocery and utility costs, it might just be the most expensive thing in your entire budget.

Today, a smart phone sucks so much money out of you for traffic that any company will envy your mobile operator. Various games, e-mail, messaging applications, social networks, other utilities and incomprehensible background services force you to buy expensive service packages from your mobile operator just to keep up.

Using the built-in WebGuard firewall, you can reliably restrict Internet access to certain applications. In addition, applying unique compression methods for the data received from the Internet can reduce mobile Internet costs up to 50%!

 

Entertainment

There are many ways of entertainment. Some might to prefer doing some kind of sport to wear out the stress, while others might do a mobile gaming session. For the later group, WebGuard will remove all those annoying ads that pop up while gaming and worse your mood. However, if you want to view some ads in order to obtain some perk, WebGuard gives the option to whitelist selected apps.

 

Supported devices

  • Devices with Android version 5 to 11
  • Optimized on Xiaomi devices with MIUI version 10 or 11
  • Amazon tablets with Fire OS version 5 to 7

 

Campaign Terms

  • All participants will receive a lifetime license for WebGuard v2.0 for up to one device.

 

Who are we

We are a small team of professionals specialized in the development of mobile applications for Android and iOS, as well as websites and CRM. Our experts have created more than 20 unique projects for well-known companies.

About us: https://movisol.es
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WebGuard-100102092175812
WebGuard homepage: https://webguard.app

 

Why Crowdfunding

We want to target the right audience without wasting resources on unnecessary marketing. We want to create a community of people able to think freely, able to make a conscious decision and who want a better Internet. We want a product for the people and not to try to sell something they don’t need. Indiegogo is the perfect platform for our project because it’s community is full of open-minded and innovative people, willing to challenge the conventions and adopt the new concept, with which they are determined to engage until it becomes a reality.

 

Why WebGuard blocks ads better than any other application

Popular services such as YouTube, Facebook, Twitter and many others are increasingly starting to use special encryption certificates inside their applications. These certificates securely encrypt all transmitted traffic along the way, including ads. Conventional ad blockers can no longer cope because they use simple mechanisms for filtering traffic by DNS / HTTP and embedding a root certificate to filter HTTPS traffic. This is clearly becoming insufficient! The most popular and interesting services continue to show you ads even with an adblock!

Our team has long nurtured the idea of ​​creating a reliable ad blocker that perfectly copes with any kind of encrypted traffic.

And that day has come. We are ready to release such an application!

 

Plans

  • Support for Android TV
  • Parental control
  • Integration with the TOR project, I2P (invisible internet project), geolocation spoofing
  • Protection against spam
  • Windows / Mac OS

 

 

You can download the current version of WebGuard from Google Play.

 

WebGuard is a unique solution for your device protection!

$6.99 / month$83.88 / year


YouTube Music Premium
$9.99 / month$119.88 / year
$14.99 / month$179.88 / year
$4.99 / month$59.88 / year

 Thus, the cheapest subscription is $143.88 per year, or $83.88 if you are a student. Music lovers can save by paying only Music Premium subscription without access to YouTube itself for $119.88 per year or $59.88 if you are a student.This is quite costly, and for only one service!With WebGuard, you won’t need all those subscriptions. You will be able to watch videos and listen to music without ads on YouTube, YouTube Music, Amazon Prime Video, ESPN+, HBO GO, Disney+ and Hulu.With WebGuard, you save not only on subscriptions, but also on traffic. After listening to music or watching a clip once in YouTube or YouTube Music, you can play it again offline wherever you are. WebGuard allows you to configure the permissible amount of memory for the cache with music and video, which is automatically freed up when there is not enough space, removing the least requested content from the cache. Surf safely the InternetEveryone knows the dangers of the Internet. An army of numerous scammers who are finding more and more new ways of stealing from people and large advertising companies that collect all the information about us, even the one we don’t know about. Everything we do online is recorded and sold to companies recollecting data. Furthermore, going to a public WiFi hotspot is equal to opening the doors to your personal data to unwanted visitors. WebGuard can encrypt all the data you send so that you can navigate safely on public networks.WebGuard also allows to spoof your IP address to one of the following countries: Germany, France, USA, Canada and Russia. This allows you enjoy location-locked content and reduced price in some content.WebGuard also blocks ads and tracking on popular social networks like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, Flickr, Last.fm, LiveJournal, Tumblr, VKontakte and Odnoklassniki.A unique ad blocker with personal data protection and entry-level anonymity, this is what we offer you! Save on your mobile InternetJ.D. Power reports the average monthly bill will cost you $157. After your monthly housing, grocery and utility costs, it might just be the most expensive thing in your entire budget.Today, a smart phone sucks so much money out of you for traffic that any company will envy your mobile operator. Various games, e-mail, messaging applications, social networks, other utilities and incomprehensible background services force you to buy expensive service packages from your mobile operator just to keep up.Using the built-in WebGuard firewall, you can reliably restrict Internet access to certain applications. In addition, applying unique compression methods for the data received from the Internet can reduce mobile Internet costs up to 50%! EntertainmentThere are many ways of entertainment. Some might to prefer doing some kind of sport to wear out the stress, while others might do a mobile gaming session. For the later group, WebGuard will remove all those annoying ads that pop up while gaming and worse your mood. However, if you want to view some ads in order to obtain some perk, WebGuard gives the option to whitelist selected apps. Supported devices
Devices with Android version 5 to 11
Optimized on Xiaomi devices with MIUI version 10 or 11
Amazon tablets with Fire OS version 5 to 7
 Campaign TermsAll participants will receive a lifetime license for WebGuard v2.0 for up to one device. Who are weWe are a small team of professionals specialized in the development of mobile applications for Android and iOS, as well as websites and CRM. Our experts have created more than 20 unique projects for well-known companies.About us: https://movisol.esFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/WebGuard-100102092175812WebGuard homepage: https://webguard.app Why CrowdfundingWe want to target the right audience without wasting resources on unnecessary marketing. We want to create a community of people able to think freely, able to make a conscious decision and who want a better Internet. We want a product for the people and not to try to sell something they don’t need. Indiegogo is the perfect platform for our project because it’s community is full of open-minded and innovative people, willing to challenge the conventions and adopt the new concept, with which they are determined to engage until it becomes a reality. Why WebGuard blocks ads better than any other applicationPopular services such as YouTube, Facebook, Twitter and many others are increasingly starting to use special encryption certificates inside their applications. These certificates securely encrypt all transmitted traffic along the way, including ads. Conventional ad blockers can no longer cope because they use simple mechanisms for filtering traffic by DNS / HTTP and embedding a root certificate to filter HTTPS traffic. This is clearly becoming insufficient! The most popular and interesting services continue to show you ads even with an adblock!Our team has long nurtured the idea of ​​creating a reliable ad blocker that perfectly copes with any kind of encrypted traffic.And that day has come. We are ready to release such an application! Plans
Support for Android TV
Parental control
Integration with the TOR project, I2P (invisible internet project), geolocation spoofing
Protection against spam
Windows / Mac OS
  You can download the current version of WebGuard from Google Play. WebGuard is a unique solution for your device protection!

story:
VERSIONE ITALIANA >>>
_________________________________________________________________________


IMAGINE MAKING HISTORY. Imagine being able to tell your kids that you were amongst the founding members of MY GLOBAL WELCOME. 



What is My Global Welcome about?

You want to travel for business or a holiday, or to move to another country, but there’s something holding you back…  that scared and anxious feeling in your stomach.  

Well, you’re not alone. Even if  I’m well prepared, there are still many worries and doubts. Will I deal with the foreign language? Will I miss my home? Will I feel homesick? Who can I turn to in case of need? And so on and so on. 

Traveling and moving abroad are amazing experiences but this is why many people end up doing nothing and never leave the places they are comfortable with. 

So how can this problem be solved? How can we stay calm abroad? 

The answer is simple: If we know BEFORE travelling that we’ll receive a warm welcome and a helping hand from people who speak our own language and who are already living in the country we’re travelling to.

And this is what My Global Welcome is about.

It is the WORLD’S FIRST SOCIAL NETWORK that eliminates the language problem before and while we’re moving in the world because it connects us with our fellow countrymen abroad who can help us with whatever problem we’ll have.

The New York Journal calls My Global Welcome the TRAVEL REVOLUTION. For sure it is, even if we are still completely overwhelmed by the massive media coverage we already received before the launch of our campaign. 

We are thrilled, but hey guys, this time it’s not anxiety, but this pure rush of adrenalin because we begin to realize that with your help, something ground-breaking starts right here and right now. 

If you, too, like the idea of feeling at home wherever you go and if you believe that this can make our life easier, then please show your support for My Global Welcome. Don't miss out this once in a lifetime opportunity to make part of something truly great. And most importantly, please contact me at info@myglobalwelcome.com to provide ideas and feedback. Love, Michaela (CEO & Founder of My Global Welcome)

Which of your problems does My Global Welcome solve?


How does My Global Welcome work?


(first page of My Global Welcome)

It’s easy and fun to use. In my case, I’m German and if I need information from other fellow German countrymen in Udine, Italy, for example, I simply first select the nationality of my fellow countrymen (in my case Germans), then the country (in my case Italy), and then the city (in my case Udine). 

Then you choose why you would like to contact your fellow countrymen abroad. Is it for reliable, firsthand information before you start travelling or before you move? Do you want to meet or chat online? Do you need language assistance when you get in a foreign country? Do you need to move with your kids? Would you like for somebody to send you an item from abroad? Do you need a ride or accommodation in a foreign country? Would you like to eat at home with some company? Are you looking for a city or outdoor guide or would you like that somebody organizes an event for you in the country you're travelling to? 

Then you click on "search compatrios" and it will take you to the second page.

(second page of My Global Welcome)

Since My Global Welcome uses geolocation, it will immediately come up with a couple of fellow countrymen that match your selection, here, for example, Germans that live in Udine and that are available to meet and chat or for language assistance. You choose the person you'd like to get to know, then click on the "contact" button which takes you to the third page.

(third page of My Global Welcome)

Here you'll receive information on your fellow countrymen, where they are from, when and why they moved, their occupation, their hobbies and interests and what they like most about their new life. Only if you choose to contact them, will you be asked to log in at this point. Want to see other fellow countrymen first? No problem. They are shown underneath. After logging in, you will be able to contact your compatriots personally, and get assistance worldwide for whatever problem you might have.

What about My Global Welcome on mobile devices?

If you are moving around the world, you will most definitely need access to My Global Welcome on a mobile device. This is how they will look like:




                                  



How much will My Global Welcome cost, and why do we need your help?

For the creation of My Global Welcome and My Global Welcome for mobile devices (e.g. smartphone and tablet) we need $ 20.000.

Additional expenses include: administrative, consumption, financial, management and particularly marketing and PR costs for year 1. 

This is how the costs break down:


              


This is why your help is absolutely fundamental. The more money we raise, the more we can invest in marketing and PR worldwide, and My Global Welcome will be available to use sooner, wherever you go. 

Please note that contributions are possible both via paypal OR CREDIT CARD. To contribute via direct credit card, just click on the "BACK IT" button on the top-right of this page or, better yet, click on a perk :-) On the second page, insert your details and click on "CONTINUE TO PAYPAL".  On the third page, it says "Login to your Paypal account" OR "Pay with a credit or debit card". It's really easy!

At this point, we would like to especially thank Hans Stadtmüller, Fritz Kustatscher and Michael Schlemm, our early investors, who were convinced that My Global Welcome will genuinely alter your life for the better.

What will you get in return?

We have carefully selected many unique and catchy rewards and we're sure that there is something for you, whether you prefer the world to say hello to you in your own home or if you like to travel around the world, whether you are a backer or a sponsor. 

What about our PERSONALIZED Munich Oktoberfest postcard that brings the world’s biggest festival right back into your home? Well, here you are with our “Oktoberfest” reward - but hurry up, our EARLY BIRD PRICE is limited to 30 postcards! 

Do you want to know how to travel on a budget? We know it and with our “Snoopy Traveler” packet we share our knowledge with you. Again, this is a LIMITED EARLY BIRD PRICE. So what are you waiting for? 

Still not enough? Then what about our “How to travel on a budget with kids” guide? Or a customized itinerary in Europe? The USA? The world is just enough? Include your budget? No problem - here you are! For all of these services you would usually spend hundreds of dollars. Yes, we knew that would knock you off your feet! A PERSONALIZED postcard from a city of your choice? Is this possible? Well, of course usually it isn’t, but we make it possible for you. 

Or choose amongst our exclusive tangible rewards such as our My Global Welcome t-shirts, My Global Welcome smartphone covers, My Global Welcome stickers and My Global Welcome buttons. 

(designs subject to change)

Our higher value rewards include our “Don’t Worry” and “High Five” membership for frequent and business travelers with even more services around the world and our unique, personalized, NUMBERED My Global Welcome Founder Membership Card. This edition is strictly limited and will show off your Founding Member status. Gain entry to future My Global Welcome meetups and events as our VIP guest and guest of honor. The first backer receives Card No. 1, and so on!


                                          


(design subject to change)

Or do you rather look for “money can’t buy experiences”? A personalized language course according to your needs? A call from our CEO? A dinner with our CEO for an exclusive, behind the scene glimpse of My Global Welcome? Or discover the hotspots of Friuli Venezia Giulia, Italy’s hidden gem, with its lovely wine regions as featured in the Lonely Planet travel guide 2016?  

Whatever you choose, keep in mind that the cherry on the cake will be the World's First Social Network that connects you with your fellow countrymen worldwide, and offers you assistance and support in your own language wherever you go. And you’re a part of it!

Who is the team behind My Global Welcome?

The most brilliant idea isn't worth a thing if you don't have a great team behind you that helps you to turn it into innovative reality. Perhaps this is the hardest part, but now, we are here together.

Let me proudly introduce my awesome team of handpicked professionals:                        

                     

                   

Beyond money - we need your help spreading the word!

    • Spread the word about My Global Welcome on Facebook or Twitter
    • Like, post and share updates and comments on Facebook orTwitter
    • Stay connected and follow My Global Welcome on Facebook and on Twitter to stay up-to-date. 
    • Become a My Global Welcome local ambassador and tell your friends, family, co-workers and anyone you think might be interested about this innovative social network. 
You can use Indiegogo's sharing tools: 

(you can find them at the top of this campaign page, right above the perks)

         You can find us on Facebook & Twitter


Frequently Asked Questions:

1. When will my Global Welcome launch? 
We're aiming to release a beta version in November 2016 and the complete social network by January 2017.
2. Is this an international campaign? 
Yes, of course. 
3. Can I donate from all over the world? 
Yes, you can. We accept PayPal and credit card payments. 
4. What payment methods do you accept? 
You can pay with all major credit and debit cards, or PayPal.
5. Is international shipping included? 
Yes, it is, unless indicated differently. 
6. I have more questions. Who do I ask? 
Please mail us at info@myglobalwelcome.com to ask your question. We'll get back to you as soon as we can.
7. How can I make a contribution over $6,500?
If you are interested in making a contribution of over $6,500, please contact us at info@myglobalwelcome.com.

Acknowledgments:

A very special and heartfelt thanks goes to all those creative masterminds who have helped me shape My Global Welcome from a pure vision into a real start-up. I really have enjoyed that process: thank you guys, you really rocked it!

Fabio Fraboni, www.allinformatica.it

Claire Schillaci, Presenter/Producer, Novita Digital Studios

Andro Peressutti, Video Artist, www.malalinea.it

Tom Bennett, Voice Actor, www.tomsvoiceovers.co.uk

Aron, Whiteboard Artist, Fox Editing Studio

And of course to family and friends for your support and advice. 

Risks & Challenges:

There is absolutely no risk for you since this is an all-or-nothing fundraise. This means, if we are not successful of achieving our financial goal, we receive nothing and we guarantee that EVERY PENNY PLEDGED will be returned.

Your support in this campaign is fundamental since this will specifically inform the marketing and PR budget we will have at our disposal - to make you feel at home wherever you go as soon as possible. The more we collect, the better it is for you. 

And, most of all, we would like you to know that we are fully committed to bring My Global Welcome to the world. We have navigated more than just a few obstacles to get where we are, and we have every confidence that we are prepared to meet the challenges ahead. 

We also promise to keep you regularly informed of our progress.


             

                                   First My Global Welcome event at Tenuta Villanova 
                                           in Farra D'Isonzo, Friuli Venezia Giulia.



                ...Feel at Home, Wherever you Go!

     

                            

 

Currency Converter*:

$5=€4,50|$10=€9|$20=€18|€25=€22|$30=€27|$40=€36|$50=€45|$100=€90|$140=€125|$180=€160|$250=€222|$500=€444 |750$=665€|$1000=887€ |$2500=2217€|$5000=4434€

*please note: these are just estimates based on the Dollar to Euro rate of June 18th 2016.

________________________________________________________________________

VERSIONE ITALIANA


IMMAGINA DI POTER FAR PARTE DELLA STORIA. Immagina di poter dire ai tuoi figli che sei stato tra i membri fondatori di MY GLOBAL WELCOME.



Cos'è My Global Welcome?

Ciao,

il mio nome è Michaela e negli ultimi 20 anni ho lavorato nel settore lingue e comunicazione, con persone provenienti da tutto il mondo.

Dunque, io sono tedesca e mi sono trasferita in Italia diversi anni fa. Ho subito scoperto a mie spese che trasferirsi da un paese all'altro in realtà non è lo stesso che spostarsi dietro l'angolo. Se dovete avere a che fare con un nuovo paese, tutta la familiarità smette di esistere.

Prima di tutto, mi sono resa conto che il mio paese ospitante aveva totalmente diverse tradizioni e valori sociali. Per non parlare della diversa cultura!

In secondo luogo, ho dovuto affrontare gli aspetti pratici della vita di ogni giorno, come ad esempio la logistica del trasferimento, i visti, la residenza, l'alloggio, la sanità, la contabilità, l'occupazione, i trasporti e così via.

E last-but-not-least la lingua. Vi posso assicurare che è davvero difficile affrontare con successo i problemi di tutti i giorni in una lingua straniera.

Ovviamente ho anche fatto qualche errore piuttosto imbarazzante, poiché non vi è alcun manuale di istruzioni su come fare i conti con un nuovo paese.

Poi ho capito che i miei problemi erano gli stessi che avevano altre persone. Non importa se le persone viaggiano per affari o per vacanza, o se si trasferiscono in un nuovo paese, è sempre una grande sfida e, a volte, anche un incubo logistico ed emotivo affrontare un ambiente non familiare, una nuova lingua e una nuova cultura.

A questo punto, ho pensato che sarebbe stato fantastico dare alle persone qualcosa per rendere la vita più facile, qualcosa che prima non avevano e che non potevano fare.

E se potessi semplicemente entrare in contatto con i tuoi connazionali all'estero? E se i concittadini che sono stati nei tuoi panni potessero condividere le loro esperienze con te ed aiutarti?

Ed è così che è nato My Global Welcome.

My Global Welcome soddisfa i nostri bisogni più umani di relazione, certezza e supporto all'estero. E' il primo social network a livello internazionale che ti connette con i tuoi connazionali in tutto il mondo.

Ti fa sentire a casa e ti offre una calda accoglienza dovunque andrai, perché i connazionali all'estero non solo parlano la tua lingua, sono affidabili, una fonte di informazioni in prima persona e sul campo se hai bisogno di spostarti in giro per il mondo. Hanno le conoscenze, possono darti consigli e aiuto pratico in qualsiasi zona e situazione ti troverai.

E soprattutto ti impediscono di sentirti perso e solo all'estero.

Questo è ciò di cui tratta My Global Welcome ed il motivo per cui voglio creare questo social network ... e ho la squadra giusta per farlo.

Ma adesso abbiamo bisogno del tuo aiuto per costruire My Global Welcome, per farlo conoscere al mondo e far crescere la comunità. Lavoriamo insieme per fare diventare My Global Welcome veramente grande e, insieme, possiamo rendere questo mondo più piccolo e più accogliente.

Se anche a te piace l'idea di sentirti a casa ovunque vai e se credi che questo possa renderti la vita più facile, dunque mostra il tuo sostegno per My Global Welcome. Non perderti questa irripetibile occasione per far parte di qualcosa di veramente fantastico, e soprattutto scrivetemi a info@myglobalwelcome.com per darmi idee e riscontri di ogni genere. 

Con affetto,

Michaela (CEO & Founder di My Global Welcome) 

Quali problemi ti risolve My Global Welcome?



My Global Welcome: Sentirsi a casa ovunque andrai

Questo è Tom, Mary, e Michael.

Vogliono trasferirsi in un altro paese. Per farlo, hanno bisogno di trovare una casa e una scuola per Tom, aprire un conto in banca, ottenere un'assicurazione sanitaria, sostituire la loro patente di guida e presentare la domanda per il permesso di soggiorno.

Prima di trasferirsi inviano una email alle autorità nel nuovo paese per l'assistenza ma la comunicazione è pressoché impossibile a causa della barriera linguistica.

Quindi – a chi potrebbero rivolgersi per avere informazioni e un'assistenza funzionale?

Questo è Peter.

Spesso deve recarsi all'estero per lavoro. Prima di partire per un viaggio ha bisogno di trovare un hotel e capire come funzionano le infrastrutture di un altro paese.

Al fine di essere adeguatamente preparato, investe sempre un sacco di energia, tempo e denaro - ma non riesce a sentirsi a proprio agio dato che non conosce le differenze culturali del paese dove sta andando e, di conseguenza, gli importanti affari commerciali non vanno in porto.

Allora, a chi potrebbe rivolgersi per un consiglio?

Questa è Olivia. Lei ama viaggiare da sola in paesi stranieri ma, prima di partire, ha bisogno di sapere se la destinazione è sicura e come evitare situazioni rischiose una volta arrivata.

Per questo motivo, cerca informazioni su Internet e legge le guide turistiche ma, quando è in giro per il mondo da sola, spesso si sente persa, insicura e sola.

Allora a chi può rivolgersi per assistenza?

Non sarebbe fantastico se Mary e Michael potessero semplicemente mettersi in contatto con connazionali già presenti nel nuovo paese che potrebbero aiutarli a trasferirsi senza problemi, e a sentirsi come a casa?

E se Peter potesse semplicemente rivolgersi a concittadini all'estero che potrebbero dargli consigli su come chiudere un affare con successo?

E se Olivia potesse semplicemente fare affidamento su connazionali, in tutto il mondo, che potrebbero offrirle un caldo benvenuto e una mano in qualsiasi paese straniero si trovi?

Ecco che abbiamo fantastiche notizie per voi: My Global Welcome è il primo social network al mondo che ti fa sentire sempre a casa dovunque andrai.

Come funziona My Global Welcome?


(Prima pagina di My Global Welcome)

È facile e divertente da usare. Nel mio caso, io sono tedesca e se ho bisogno di informazioni da altri connazionali tedeschi a Udine, Italia, semplicemente seleziono prima la nazionalità dei miei connazionali (nel mio caso i tedeschi), poi il paese (nel mio caso l'Italia), e infine la città (nel mio caso Udine).

Poi potrai scegliere il motivo per cui desideri contattare i tuoi connazionali all'estero. Vuoi informazioni affidabili, da fonte diretta, prima di iniziare il viaggio o prima di partire; vuoi un incontro o chattare online; hai bisogno di assistenza linguistica quando arrivi in un paese straniero; hai bisogno di spostarti con i tuoi figli; volete che qualcuno vi spedisca un articolo dall'estero; hai bisogno di un passaggio o di un alloggio in un paese straniero; vorresti mangiare a casa con qualcuno; state cercando una guida per una gita fuori-porta o in città o ti serve che qualcuno organizzi un evento per te nel paese dove andrai?

Poi clicchi su "cerca compatrioti" e vai alla seconda pagina.

(Seconda pagina di My Global Welcome)

Dal momento che My Global Welcome utilizza la geo-localizzazione, sarai immediatamente messo in contatto con un paio di connazionali che corrispondono alla tua selezione, qui per esempio i tedeschi che vivono a Udine e che sono a disposizione per incontrare e chiacchierare o per assistenza linguistica. Scegli la persona che desideri conoscere e clicca sul pulsante "contatto", che ti porta alla terza pagina.


(Terza pagina di My Global Welcome)

Qui potrai ricevere informazioni sui tuoi connazionali, di dove sono, quando e perché si sono trasferiti, come si guadagnano da vivere, i loro hobby e interessi e quello che gli piace di più circa la loro nuova vita. Solo se sceglierai di contattarli, ti verrà chiesto di effettuare il login. Vuoi vedere prima altri connazionali? Nessun problema. Sono indicati in basso. Dopo il log-in, sarai in grado di contattare i tuoi compatrioti personalmente e ottenere assistenza in tutto il mondo per qualsiasi problema tu possa avere.

My Global Welcome è anche per dispositivi mobili?

Se sei uno che gira per il mondo, avrai sicuramente bisogno di loro. Questo è come appariranno:


                                    


Quanto costerà My Global Welcome e perché abbiamo bisogno del tuo aiuto?

Per la creazione di My Global Welcome e dei suoi dispositivi mobili (per smartphone e tablet) abbiamo bisogno di $20,000 (= costi di ammortamento). Poi avremo altre spese, come ad esempio amministrative, consumi, finanziarie, di gestione e in particolare i costi di marketing e PR.

Ecco un'analisi dei nostri costi totali per il primo anno di My Global Welcome:


Questo è il motivo per cui il vostro aiuto è assolutamente fondamentale. Più soldi raccogliamo, tanto più possiamo investire nei servizi di marketing e PR in tutto il mondo, così che My Global Welcome sarà disponibile il più rapidamente possibile per voi... ovunque andiate.

Vi ricordiamo che è possibile donare sia tramite PayPal che CARTA DI CREDITO. Vi basterà cliccare sul tasto in alto a destra "BACK IT" o, ancora meglio, direttamente sulla ricompensa. Vi si aprirà una pagina in cui inserire i vostri dati, poi cliccate su "CONTINUE TO PAYPAL". A questo punto potrete scegliere se pagare con PayPal ("Login to your Paypal account") o se pagare con CARTA DI CREDITO ("Pay with a credit or debit card"). Tranquilli, è più facile di quanto sembri!

A questo punto, vorremmo fare un ringraziamento speciale a Hans Stadtmüller, Fritz Kustatscher e Michael Schlemm, i nostri primi investitori, convinti che My Global Welcome cambierà veramente la vostra vita in meglio.

Cosa otterrete in cambio?

Abbiamo accuratamente selezionato molte incredibili ricompense e siamo sicuri che c'è qualcosa per ognuno voi, non importa se ti piace girare per il mondo o se preferisci che il mondo ti saluti mentre sei comodamente a casa tua.  

Che dire della nostra cartolina PERSONALIZZATA dell'Oktoberfest di Monaco che porta il più grande festival del mondo direttamente a casa tua? Be', ecco la nostra ricompensa "Oktoberfest" - ma sbrigati, il nostro PREZZO EARLY BIRD è limitato a 30 cartoline!

Vuoi scoprire come viaggiare con un budget limitato? Noi lo sappiamo e con il nostro pacchetto "Snoopy Traveler" condividiamo la nostra conoscenza con te. Anche in questo caso, si tratta di un numero limitato di PREZZO EARLY BIRD. Allora, cosa stai aspettando? 

Non sei ancora soddisfatto? Allora che ne dici della nostra guida "Come viaggiare low-cost con i bambini"? O un itinerario personalizzato in Europa? Gli Stati Uniti? Il mondo ti basta? Hai un budget? Nessun problema – ecco qui! Per tutti questi servizi di solito spenderesti centinaia di dollari. Sì, sapevamo che ti sarebbe piaciuto! Una cartolina PERSONALIZZATA da una città a tua scelta? È possibile? Be', naturalmente di solito non lo è, ma noi lo rendiamo possibile per te.

Sceglie tra le nostre tangibili ed esclusive ricompense, come le t-shirt My Global Welcome, le custodie per smartphone My Global Welcome, gli autoadesivi di My Global Welcome e le spille di My Global Welcome.


(Design soggetto a variazioni)


Le nostre ricompense di maggior valore includono i nostri abbonamenti "Don't Worry" e "High Five" per i viaggiatori d'affari e che si spostano spesso, con ancora più servizi in tutto il mondo e la nostra unica, personalizzata, NUMERATA tessera di fondatore My Global Welcome. Questa edizione è strettamente limitata e mostrerà il tuo status di membro fondatore. Ottieni l'accesso al futuro meetup My Global Welcome e agli eventi come nostro ospite VIP e ospite d'onore. Il primo sostenitore riceve la Card No 1, e così via!

                                   

(Design soggetto a variazioni)

O preferisci cercare "esperienze che i soldi non possono comprare"? Un corso di lingua personalizzato in base alle tue esigenze? Una chiamata dalla nostra CEO? Una cena con la nostra CEO per un'esclusiva dietro le quinte di My Global Welcome? O scoprire i luoghi più belli del Friuli Venezia Giulia, gemma nascosta d'Italia, con le sue belle regioni del vino come descritte nella guida Lonely Planet 2016?

Qualunque sia la scelta, tieni a mente che la ciliegina sulla torta sarà il World's First Social Network (il primo social network del mondo) che ti connette con i tuoi connazionali in tutto il mondo, e ti offre assistenza e supporto nella tua lingua, ovunque tu sia. E tu ne sei parte!

Qual è il team dietro a My Global Welcome?

L'idea più geniale non vale nulla se non si dispone di una grande squadra che aiuta a trasformare le idee in realtà innovative. Forse la parte più difficile, dopo tutto. Ma ora, eccoci qui.

Permettetemi con orgoglio di presentare la mia fantastica squadra di professionisti selezionati con cura:

                       


Al di là dei soldi - ci serve il vostro aiuto per spargere la voce!

  • Spargi la voce su My Global Welcome tramite Facebook o Twitter 
  • Metti “Mi piace”, pubblica un post e condividi gli aggiornamenti e i commenti su Facebook o Twitter
  • Resta in contatto e segui My Global Welcome su Facebook e su Twitter per restare aggiornato.
  • Ottieni il titolo di ambasciatore locale di My Global Welcome e dillo ai tuoi amici, familiari, colleghi e chiunque pensi possa essere interessato a questo innovativo social network.
Puoi utilizzare gli strumenti di condivisione di Indiegogo che trovi in alto a destra, sopra le ricompense.

                  Ci trovi su Facebook & Twitter


FAQs:

1. Quando è previsto il lancio ufficiale di My Global Welcome?

Puntiamo a rilasciare una versione beta nel mese di novembre 2016 e di completare il social network a gennaio 2017.

2. Si tratta di una campagna internazionale?

Sì, naturalmente.

3. Posso donare da tutto il mondo?

Si, puoi. Accettiamo pagamenti con PayPal e carte di credito.

4. Quali metodi di pagamento accettate?

Indiegogo accetta tutte le principali carte di credito e PayPal.

5. È incluso il trasporto internazionale?

Sì, lo è, se non diversamente indicato.

6. Ho altre domande. A chi posso chiedere?

Puoi inviare una mail a info@myglobalwelcome.com per qualsiasi domanda. Risponderemo al più presto possibile.

7. Come posso dare un contributo superiore a $6,500?

Se sei interessato a dare un contributo di $6,500 o più, contattaci all'indirizzo info@myglobalwelcome.com.

Riconoscimenti:

Un ringraziamento molto particolare e sentito va a tutte quelle menti creative che mi hanno aiutato a dare forma a My Global Welcome da una semplice visione in una start-up. Ho davvero apprezzato quel processo: grazie ragazzi, siete stati fantastici!

Fabio Fraboni, www.allinformatica.it

Claire Schillaci, Presentatore / Produttore, Novita Digital Studios

Andro Peressutti, video artist, www.malalinea.it

Tom Bennett, doppiatore, www.tomsvoiceovers.co.uk

Aron, Artista Whiteboard, Fox Editing Studio

E ovviamente ringrazio la mia famiglia e i miei amici per il vostro sostegno e consigli.

Rischi & Sfide:

Non c'è assolutamente alcun rischio per te poiché questa è una raccolta fondi “o tutto o niente”. Ciò significa che, se non abbiamo successo e non raggiungiamo il nostro “obiettivo finanziario”, noi non riceviamo nulla e vi garantiamo che OGNI CENTESIMO DONATO verrà rimborsato.

Il tuo sostegno in questa campagna è fondamentale poiché questo, in modo particolare, determinerà il budget, destinato al marketing e al pr, che avremo a nostra disposizione per farti sentire a casa ovunque andrai, al più presto possibile. Più fondi raccogliamo, meglio sarà per te.

E soprattutto, vorremmo rassicurarti che siamo pienamente impegnati a portare My Global Welcome nel mondo. Abbiamo superato diversi ostacoli per arrivare dove siamo, e siamo molto fiduciosi di essere preparati ad affrontare le sfide future.

Ti promettiamo inoltre di tenerti regolarmente aggiornato dei nostri progressi.

                     

                          Primo evento ufficiale My Global Welcome presso 
                   Tenuta Villanova in Farra D'Isonzo, Friuli Venezia Giulia.


              ...Sentiti a Casa, Ovunque Andrai!


                          


Convertitore di valuta*:

$5=€4,50|$10= €9|$20=€18|€25=€22|$30=€27|$40=€36|$50=€45|$100=€90|$140=€125|$180=€160|$250=€222|$500=€444|750$=665€| $1000=887€ |$2500=2217€|$5000=4434€

*Nota: queste sono solo stime basate sul cambio dollaro-euro del 18 giugno 2016.
story_txt:
VERSIONE ITALIANA >>> _________________________________________________________________________

IMAGINE MAKING HISTORY. Imagine being able to tell your kids that you were amongst the founding members of MY GLOBAL WELCOME. 












What is My Global Welcome about?


You want to travel for business or a holiday, or to move to another country, but there’s something holding you back…  that scared and anxious feeling in your stomach.  
Well, you’re not alone. Even if  I’m well prepared, there are still many worries and doubts. Will I deal with the foreign language? Will I miss my home? Will I feel homesick? Who can I turn to in case of need? And so on and so on. 

Traveling and moving abroad are amazing experiences but this is why many people end up doing nothing and never leave the places they are comfortable with. 
So how can this problem be solved? How can we stay calm abroad? 
The answer is simple: If we know BEFORE travelling that we’ll receive a warm welcome and a helping hand from people who speak our own language and who are already living in the country we’re travelling to.
And this is what My Global Welcome is about.

It is the WORLD’S FIRST SOCIAL NETWORK that eliminates the language problem before and while we’re moving in the world because it connects us with our fellow countrymen abroad who can help us with whatever problem we’ll have.


The New York Journal calls My Global Welcome the TRAVEL REVOLUTION. For sure it is, even if we are still completely overwhelmed by the massive media coverage we already received before the launch of our campaign. 


We are thrilled, but hey guys, this time it’s not anxiety, but this pure rush of adrenalin because we begin to realize that with your help, something ground-breaking starts right here and right now. 


If you, too, like the idea of feeling at home wherever you go and if you believe that this can make our life easier, then please show your support for My Global Welcome. Don't miss out this once in a lifetime opportunity to make part of something truly great. And most importantly, please contact me at info@myglobalwelcome.com to provide ideas and feedback. Love, Michaela (CEO & Founder of My Global Welcome)


Which of your problems does My Global Welcome solve?








How does My Global Welcome work?




(first page of My Global Welcome)


It’s easy and fun to use. In my case, I’m German and if I need information from other fellow German countrymen in Udine, Italy, for example, I simply first select the nationality of my fellow countrymen (in my case Germans), then the country (in my case Italy), and then the city (in my case Udine). 
Then you choose why you would like to contact your fellow countrymen abroad. Is it for reliable, firsthand information before you start travelling or before you move? Do you want to meet or chat online? Do you need language assistance when you get in a foreign country? Do you need to move with your kids? Would you like for somebody to send you an item from abroad? Do you need a ride or accommodation in a foreign country? Would you like to eat at home with some company? Are you looking for a city or outdoor guide or would you like that somebody organizes an event for you in the country you're travelling to? 
Then you click on "search compatrios" and it will take you to the second page.



(second page of My Global Welcome)



Since My Global Welcome uses geolocation, it will immediately come up with a couple of fellow countrymen that match your selection, here, for example, Germans that live in Udine and that are available to meet and chat or for language assistance. You choose the person you'd like to get to know, then click on the "contact" button which takes you to the third page.

(third page of My Global Welcome)
Here you'll receive information on your fellow countrymen, where they are from, when and why they moved, their occupation, their hobbies and interests and what they like most about their new life. Only if you choose to contact them, will you be asked to log in at this point. Want to see other fellow countrymen first? No problem. They are shown underneath. After logging in, you will be able to contact your compatriots personally, and get assistance worldwide for whatever problem you might have.


What about My Global Welcome on mobile devices?

If you are moving around the world, you will most definitely need access to My Global Welcome on a mobile device. This is how they will look like:




                                  


How much will My Global Welcome cost, and why do we need your help?


For the creation of My Global Welcome and My Global Welcome for mobile devices (e.g. smartphone and tablet) we need $ 20.000.
Additional expenses include: administrative, consumption, financial, management and particularly marketing and PR costs for year 1. 
This is how the costs break down:



              


This is why your help is absolutely fundamental. The more money we raise, the more we can invest in marketing and PR worldwide, and My Global Welcome will be available to use sooner, wherever you go. 
Please note that contributions are possible both via paypal OR CREDIT CARD. To contribute via direct credit card, just click on the "BACK IT" button on the top-right of this page or, better yet, click on a perk :-) On the second page, insert your details and click on "CONTINUE TO PAYPAL".  On the third page, it says "Login to your Paypal account" OR "Pay with a credit or debit card". It's really easy!
At this point, we would like to especially thank Hans Stadtmüller, Fritz Kustatscher and Michael Schlemm, our early investors, who were convinced that My Global Welcome will genuinely alter your life for the better.



What will you get in return?





We have carefully selected many unique and catchy rewards and we're sure that there is something for you, whether you prefer the world to say hello to you in your own home or if you like to travel around the world, whether you are a backer or a sponsor. 




What about our PERSONALIZED Munich Oktoberfest postcard that brings the world’s biggest festival right back into your home? Well, here you are with our “Oktoberfest” reward - but hurry up, our EARLY BIRD PRICE is limited to 30 postcards! 
Do you want to know how to travel on a budget? We know it and with our “Snoopy Traveler” packet we share our knowledge with you. Again, this is a LIMITED EARLY BIRD PRICE. So what are you waiting for? 
Still not enough? Then what about our “How to travel on a budget with kids” guide? Or a customized itinerary in Europe? The USA? The world is just enough? Include your budget? No problem - here you are! For all of these services you would usually spend hundreds of dollars. Yes, we knew that would knock you off your feet! A PERSONALIZED postcard from a city of your choice? Is this possible? Well, of course usually it isn’t, but we make it possible for you. 
Or choose amongst our exclusive tangible rewards such as our My Global Welcome t-shirts, My Global Welcome smartphone covers, My Global Welcome stickers and My Global Welcome buttons. 





(designs subject to change)

Our higher value rewards include our “Don’t Worry” and “High Five” membership for frequent and business travelers with even more services around the world and our unique, personalized, NUMBERED My Global Welcome Founder Membership Card. This edition is strictly limited and will show off your Founding Member status. Gain entry to future My Global Welcome meetups and events as our VIP guest and guest of honor. The first backer receives Card No. 1, and so on!


                                          
(design subject to change)



Or do you rather look for “money can’t buy experiences”? A personalized language course according to your needs? A call from our CEO? A dinner with our CEO for an exclusive, behind the scene glimpse of My Global Welcome? Or discover the hotspots of Friuli Venezia Giulia, Italy’s hidden gem, with its lovely wine regions as featured in the Lonely Planet travel guide 2016?  
Whatever you choose, keep in mind that the cherry on the cake will be the World's First Social Network that connects you with your fellow countrymen worldwide, and offers you assistance and support in your own language wherever you go. And you’re a part of it!

Who is the team behind My Global Welcome?

The
most brilliant idea isn't worth a thing if you don't have a great
team behind you that helps you to turn it into innovative reality.
Perhaps this is the hardest part, but now, we are here together.

Let me proudly introduce my awesome team of handpicked professionals:                        

                     
                   

Beyond money - we need your help spreading the word!

Spread the word about My Global Welcome on Facebook or Twitter

Like, post and share updates and comments on Facebook orTwitter

Stay connected and follow My Global Welcome on Facebook and on Twitter to stay up-to-date. 
Become a My Global Welcome local ambassador and tell your friends, family, co-workers and anyone you think might be interested about this innovative social network. 

You can use Indiegogo's sharing tools: 




(you can find them at the top of this campaign page, right above the perks)
         You can find us on Facebook & Twitter


Frequently Asked Questions:


1. When will my Global Welcome launch? 
We're aiming to release a beta version in November 2016 and the complete social network by January 2017.

2. Is this an international campaign? 
Yes, of course. 
3. Can I donate from all over the world? 
Yes, you can. We accept PayPal and credit card payments. 
4. What payment methods do you accept? 
You can pay with all major credit and debit cards, or PayPal.
5. Is international shipping included? 
Yes, it is, unless indicated differently. 
6. I have more questions. Who do I ask? 
Please mail us at info@myglobalwelcome.com to ask your question. We'll get back to you as soon as we can.
7. How can I make a contribution over $6,500?
If you are interested in making a contribution of over $6,500, please contact us at info@myglobalwelcome.com.


Acknowledgments:


A
very special and heartfelt thanks goes to all those creative
masterminds who have helped me shape My Global Welcome from a pure
vision into a real start-up. I really have enjoyed that process:
thank you guys, you really rocked it!
Fabio Fraboni, www.allinformatica.it
Claire Schillaci, Presenter/Producer, Novita Digital Studios
Andro Peressutti, Video Artist, www.malalinea.it
Tom Bennett, Voice Actor, www.tomsvoiceovers.co.uk
Aron, Whiteboard Artist, Fox Editing Studio


And
of course to family and friends for your support and advice. 

Risks & Challenges:

There is absolutely no risk for you since this is an all-or-nothing fundraise. This means, if we are not successful of achieving our financial goal, we receive nothing and we guarantee that EVERY PENNY PLEDGED will be returned.


Your
support in this campaign is fundamental since this will specifically
inform the marketing and PR budget we will have at our disposal - to
make you feel at home wherever you go as soon as possible. The more
we collect, the better it is for you. 
And, most of all, we would like you to know that we are fully committed to bring My Global Welcome to the world. We have navigated more than just a few obstacles to get where we are, and we have every confidence that we are prepared to meet the challenges ahead. 
We also promise to keep you regularly informed of our progress.


             
                                   First My Global Welcome event at Tenuta Villanova 
                                           in Farra D'Isonzo, Friuli Venezia Giulia.







            ...Feel at Home, Wherever you Go!
