VERSIONE ITALIANA


IMMAGINA DI POTER FAR PARTE DELLA STORIA. Immagina di poter dire ai tuoi figli che sei stato tra i membri fondatori di MY GLOBAL WELCOME.







Cos'è My Global Welcome?

Ciao,
il mio nome è Michaela e negli ultimi 20 anni ho lavorato nel settore lingue e comunicazione, con persone provenienti da tutto il mondo.
Dunque, io sono tedesca e mi sono trasferita in Italia diversi anni fa. Ho subito scoperto a mie spese che trasferirsi da un paese all'altro in realtà non è lo stesso che spostarsi dietro l'angolo. Se dovete avere a che fare con un nuovo paese, tutta la familiarità smette di esistere.
Prima di tutto, mi sono resa conto che il mio paese ospitante aveva totalmente diverse tradizioni e valori sociali. Per non parlare della diversa cultura!
In secondo luogo, ho dovuto affrontare gli aspetti pratici della vita di ogni giorno, come ad esempio la logistica del trasferimento, i visti, la residenza, l'alloggio, la sanità, la contabilità, l'occupazione, i trasporti e così via.
E last-but-not-least la lingua. Vi posso assicurare che è davvero difficile affrontare con successo i problemi di tutti i giorni in una lingua straniera.
Ovviamente ho anche fatto qualche errore piuttosto imbarazzante, poiché non vi è alcun manuale di istruzioni su come fare i conti con un nuovo paese.
Poi ho capito che i miei problemi erano gli stessi che avevano altre persone. Non importa se le persone viaggiano per affari o per vacanza, o se si trasferiscono in un nuovo paese, è sempre una grande sfida e, a volte, anche un incubo logistico ed emotivo affrontare un ambiente non familiare, una nuova lingua e una nuova cultura.
A questo punto, ho pensato che sarebbe stato fantastico dare alle persone qualcosa per rendere la vita più facile, qualcosa che prima non avevano e che non potevano fare.
E se potessi semplicemente entrare in contatto con i tuoi connazionali all'estero? E se i concittadini che sono stati nei tuoi panni potessero condividere le loro esperienze con te ed aiutarti?
Ed è così che è nato My Global Welcome.
My Global Welcome soddisfa i nostri bisogni più umani di relazione, certezza e supporto all'estero. E' il primo social network a livello internazionale che ti connette con i tuoi connazionali in tutto il mondo.
Ti fa sentire a casa e ti offre una calda accoglienza dovunque andrai, perché i connazionali all'estero non solo parlano la tua lingua, sono affidabili, una fonte di informazioni in prima persona e sul campo se hai bisogno di spostarti in giro per il mondo. Hanno le conoscenze, possono darti consigli e aiuto pratico in qualsiasi zona e situazione ti troverai.
E soprattutto ti impediscono di sentirti perso e solo all'estero.
Questo è ciò di cui tratta My Global Welcome ed il motivo per cui voglio creare questo social network ... e ho la squadra giusta per farlo.
Ma adesso abbiamo bisogno del tuo aiuto per costruire My Global Welcome, per farlo conoscere al mondo e far crescere la comunità. Lavoriamo insieme per fare diventare My Global Welcome veramente grande e, insieme, possiamo rendere questo mondo più piccolo e più accogliente.
Se anche a te piace l'idea di sentirti a casa ovunque vai e se credi che questo possa renderti la vita più facile, dunque mostra il tuo sostegno per My Global Welcome. Non perderti questa irripetibile occasione per far parte di qualcosa di veramente fantastico, e soprattutto scrivetemi a info@myglobalwelcome.com per darmi idee e riscontri di ogni genere. 
Con affetto,
Michaela (CEO & Founder di My Global Welcome) 


Quali problemi ti risolve My Global Welcome?






My
Global Welcome: Sentirsi a casa ovunque andrai

Questo è Tom, Mary, e Michael.

Vogliono trasferirsi in un altro paese. Per
farlo, hanno bisogno di trovare una casa e una scuola per Tom, aprire
un conto in banca, ottenere un'assicurazione sanitaria, sostituire la
loro patente di guida e presentare la domanda per il permesso di
soggiorno.

Prima di trasferirsi inviano una email alle
autorità nel nuovo paese per l'assistenza ma la comunicazione è
pressoché impossibile a causa della barriera linguistica.
Quindi
– a chi potrebbero rivolgersi per avere informazioni e
un'assistenza funzionale?

Questo è Peter.

Spesso deve recarsi all'estero per lavoro.
Prima di partire per un viaggio ha bisogno di trovare un hotel e
capire come funzionano le infrastrutture di un altro paese.
Al
fine di essere adeguatamente preparato, investe sempre un sacco di
energia, tempo e denaro - ma non riesce a sentirsi a proprio agio
dato che non conosce le differenze culturali del paese dove sta
andando e, di conseguenza, gli importanti affari commerciali non
vanno in porto.

Allora, a chi potrebbe rivolgersi per un
consiglio?

Questa è Olivia. Lei ama viaggiare da sola in
paesi stranieri ma, prima di partire, ha bisogno di sapere se la
destinazione è sicura e come evitare situazioni rischiose una volta
arrivata.

Per questo motivo, cerca informazioni su
Internet e legge le guide turistiche ma, quando  è in giro per il
mondo da sola, spesso si sente persa, insicura e sola.

Allora a chi può rivolgersi per assistenza?

Non sarebbe fantastico se Mary e Michael
potessero semplicemente mettersi in contatto con connazionali già
presenti nel nuovo paese che potrebbero aiutarli a trasferirsi senza
problemi, e a sentirsi come a casa?

E se Peter potesse semplicemente rivolgersi a
concittadini all'estero che potrebbero dargli consigli su come
chiudere un affare con successo?

E se Olivia potesse semplicemente fare
affidamento su connazionali, in tutto il mondo, che potrebbero
offrirle un caldo benvenuto e una mano in qualsiasi paese straniero
si trovi?

Ecco che abbiamo fantastiche notizie per voi:
My Global Welcome è il primo social network al mondo che ti fa
sentire sempre a casa dovunque andrai.
Come funziona My Global Welcome?



(Prima pagina di My Global Welcome)

È facile e divertente da usare. Nel mio caso,
io sono tedesca e se ho bisogno di informazioni da altri connazionali
tedeschi a Udine, Italia, semplicemente seleziono prima la
nazionalità dei miei connazionali (nel mio caso i tedeschi), poi il
paese (nel mio caso l'Italia), e infine la città (nel mio caso
Udine). 


Poi potrai scegliere il motivo per cui desideri
contattare i tuoi connazionali all'estero. Vuoi informazioni
affidabili, da fonte diretta, prima di iniziare il viaggio o prima di
partire; vuoi un incontro o chattare online; hai bisogno di
assistenza linguistica quando arrivi in un paese straniero;
hai bisogno di spostarti con i tuoi figli; volete che qualcuno vi
spedisca un articolo dall'estero; hai bisogno di un passaggio o di un
alloggio in un paese straniero; vorresti mangiare a casa con
qualcuno; state cercando una guida per una gita fuori-porta o in
città o ti serve che qualcuno organizzi un evento per te nel paese
dove andrai?

Poi clicchi su "cerca compatrioti" e
vai alla seconda pagina.



(Seconda pagina di My Global Welcome)

Dal momento che My Global Welcome utilizza la
geo-localizzazione, sarai immediatamente messo in contatto con un
paio di connazionali che corrispondono alla tua selezione, qui per
esempio i tedeschi che vivono a Udine e che sono a disposizione per
incontrare e chiacchierare o per assistenza linguistica. Scegli la
persona che desideri conoscere e clicca sul pulsante "contatto",
che ti porta alla terza pagina.




(Terza pagina di My Global Welcome)

Qui potrai ricevere informazioni sui tuoi
connazionali, di dove sono, quando e perché si sono trasferiti, come
si guadagnano da vivere, i loro hobby e interessi e quello che gli
piace di più circa la loro nuova vita. Solo se sceglierai di
contattarli, ti verrà chiesto di effettuare il login. Vuoi vedere
prima altri connazionali? Nessun problema. Sono indicati in
basso. Dopo il log-in, sarai in grado di contattare i tuoi
compatrioti personalmente e ottenere assistenza in tutto il mondo per
qualsiasi problema tu possa avere.

My Global Welcome è anche per dispositivi mobili?

Se
sei uno che gira per il mondo, avrai sicuramente bisogno di loro.
Questo è come appariranno:



                                    
Quanto costerà My Global Welcome e perché abbiamo bisogno del tuo aiuto?
Per
la creazione di My Global Welcome e dei suoi dispositivi mobili (per
smartphone e tablet) abbiamo bisogno di $20,000 (= costi di
ammortamento). Poi avremo altre spese, come ad esempio
amministrative, consumi, finanziarie, di gestione e in particolare i
costi di marketing e PR.Ecco un'analisi dei nostri costi totali per il primo anno di My Global Welcome:





Questo è il motivo per cui il vostro aiuto è
assolutamente fondamentale. Più soldi raccogliamo, tanto più
possiamo investire nei servizi di marketing e PR in tutto il mondo,
così che My Global Welcome sarà disponibile il più rapidamente
possibile per voi... ovunque andiate.


Vi ricordiamo che è possibile donare sia tramite PayPal che CARTA DI CREDITO. Vi basterà cliccare sul tasto in alto a destra "BACK IT" o, ancora meglio, direttamente sulla ricompensa. Vi si aprirà una pagina in cui inserire i vostri dati, poi cliccate su "CONTINUE TO PAYPAL". A questo punto potrete scegliere se pagare con PayPal ("Login to your Paypal account") o se pagare con CARTA DI CREDITO ("Pay with a credit or debit card"). Tranquilli, è più facile di quanto sembri!


A questo punto, vorremmo fare un ringraziamento
speciale a Hans Stadtmüller, Fritz Kustatscher e Michael Schlemm, i
nostri primi investitori, convinti che My Global Welcome cambierà
veramente la vostra vita in meglio.


Cosa otterrete in cambio?


Abbiamo accuratamente selezionato molte
incredibili ricompense e siamo sicuri che c'è qualcosa per ognuno
voi, non importa se ti piace girare per il mondo o se
preferisci che il mondo ti saluti mentre sei comodamente a casa
tua.  



Che dire della nostra cartolina PERSONALIZZATA dell'Oktoberfest di Monaco che porta il più grande festival del mondo
direttamente a casa tua? Be', ecco la nostra ricompensa "Oktoberfest"
- ma sbrigati, il nostro PREZZO EARLY BIRD è limitato a 30 cartoline!


Vuoi
scoprire come viaggiare con un budget limitato? Noi lo sappiamo e con
il nostro pacchetto "Snoopy Traveler" condividiamo la
nostra conoscenza con te. Anche in questo caso, si tratta di un
numero limitato di PREZZO EARLY BIRD. Allora, cosa stai aspettando? 





Non
sei ancora soddisfatto? Allora che
ne dici della nostra guida  "Come viaggiare low-cost con i
bambini"? O un itinerario personalizzato in Europa? Gli Stati
Uniti? Il mondo ti basta? Hai
un budget? Nessun problema – ecco
qui! Per tutti questi servizi di
solito spenderesti centinaia di dollari. Sì, sapevamo che ti sarebbe
piaciuto!
Una cartolina PERSONALIZZATA da una città a tua scelta? È
possibile? Be', naturalmente di solito non lo è, ma noi lo rendiamo
possibile per te.
Sceglie tra le nostre tangibili ed esclusive
ricompense, come le t-shirt My Global Welcome, le custodie per
smartphone My Global Welcome, gli autoadesivi di My Global Welcome e
le spille di My Global Welcome.









(Design
soggetto a variazioni)





Le nostre ricompense di
maggior valore includono i nostri abbonamenti "Don't Worry"
e  "High Five" per i viaggiatori d'affari e che si spostano
spesso, con ancora più servizi in tutto il mondo e la nostra unica,
personalizzata, NUMERATA tessera di fondatore My Global Welcome.
Questa edizione è strettamente limitata e mostrerà il tuo status di
membro fondatore. Ottieni l'accesso al futuro
meetup My Global Welcome e agli
eventi come nostro ospite VIP e ospite d'onore. Il primo sostenitore
riceve la Card No 1, e così via!

                                   
(Design
soggetto a variazioni)



O preferisci cercare "esperienze che i soldi non possono comprare"? Un corso di lingua personalizzato
in base alle tue esigenze? Una chiamata dalla nostra CEO? Una cena con la nostra CEO per un'esclusiva dietro le quinte di My Global Welcome?
O scoprire i luoghi più belli del Friuli Venezia Giulia, gemma
nascosta d'Italia, con le sue belle regioni del vino  come descritte
nella guida Lonely Planet 2016?

Qualunque sia la scelta, tieni a mente che la
ciliegina sulla torta sarà il World's First Social Network (il primo
social network del mondo) che ti connette con i tuoi connazionali in
tutto il mondo, e ti offre assistenza e supporto nella tua lingua,
ovunque tu sia. E tu ne sei parte!

Qual è il team dietro a My Global Welcome?


L'idea
più geniale non vale nulla se non si dispone di una grande squadra
che aiuta a trasformare le idee in realtà innovative. Forse la parte
più difficile, dopo tutto. Ma ora, eccoci qui.


Permettetemi
con orgoglio di presentare la mia fantastica squadra di
professionisti selezionati con cura:

                       


Al di là dei soldi - ci serve il vostro aiuto per spargere la voce!


Spargi
	la voce su My Global Welcome tramite Facebook
	o Twitter 

Metti “Mi piace”,
	pubblica un post e condividi gli aggiornamenti e i commenti su
	Facebook o Twitter

Resta in contatto e
	segui My Global Welcome su Facebook
	e su Twitter per
	restare aggiornato.

Ottieni il titolo di
	 ambasciatore locale di My Global Welcome e dillo ai tuoi amici,
	familiari, colleghi e chiunque pensi possa essere interessato a
	questo innovativo social network.

Puoi utilizzare gli strumenti di condivisione di Indiegogo che trovi in alto a destra, sopra le ricompense.


                  Ci trovi su Facebook & Twitter




FAQs:





1. Quando
è previsto il lancio ufficiale di My Global Welcome?
Puntiamo
a rilasciare una versione beta nel mese di novembre 2016 e di
completare il social network a gennaio 2017.


2. Si
tratta di una campagna internazionale?


Sì,
naturalmente.
3. Posso
donare da tutto il mondo?


Si, puoi. Accettiamo pagamenti con
PayPal e carte di credito.
4. Quali
metodi di pagamento accettate?


Indiegogo accetta tutte le principali carte di
credito e PayPal.


5. È
incluso il trasporto internazionale?

Sì,
lo è, se non diversamente indicato.
6. Ho
altre domande. A chi posso chiedere?


Puoi inviare una mail a
info@myglobalwelcome.com per qualsiasi domanda.
Risponderemo al più presto possibile.
7. Come posso
dare un contributo superiore a $6,500?

Se sei interessato a dare un contributo di $6,500 o più, contattaci
all'indirizzo info@myglobalwelcome.com.

Riconoscimenti:

Un
ringraziamento molto particolare e sentito va a tutte quelle menti
creative che mi hanno aiutato a dare forma a My
Global Welcome da una semplice visione in una start-up. Ho
davvero apprezzato quel processo: grazie ragazzi,
siete stati fantastici!
Fabio Fraboni, www.allinformatica.it
Claire
Schillaci, Presentatore / Produttore, Novita Digital Studios
Andro
Peressutti, video artist, www.malalinea.it
Tom
Bennett, doppiatore, www.tomsvoiceovers.co.uk
Aron, Artista Whiteboard, Fox
Editing Studio
E
ovviamente ringrazio la mia famiglia e i miei amici per il vostro sostegno e
consigli.
Rischi & Sfide:

Non c'è assolutamente alcun rischio per te
poiché questa è una raccolta fondi “o tutto o niente”. Ciò
significa che, se non abbiamo successo e non raggiungiamo il nostro
“obiettivo finanziario”, noi non riceviamo nulla e vi garantiamo
che OGNI CENTESIMO DONATO verrà rimborsato.

Il tuo sostegno in questa campagna è
fondamentale poiché questo, in modo particolare,  determinerà il
budget, destinato al marketing e al pr, che avremo a nostra
disposizione per farti sentire a casa ovunque andrai, al più presto
possibile. Più fondi raccogliamo, meglio sarà per te.

E soprattutto, vorremmo rassicurarti che siamo
pienamente impegnati a portare My Global Welcome nel mondo. Abbiamo
superato diversi ostacoli per arrivare dove siamo, e siamo molto
fiduciosi di essere preparati ad affrontare le sfide future.
Ti
promettiamo inoltre di tenerti regolarmente aggiornato dei nostri progressi.
                     
                          Primo evento ufficiale My Global Welcome presso 


                   Tenuta Villanova in Farra D'Isonzo, Friuli Venezia Giulia.

story:
Do you ever wish you were more decisive?

Do you feel like you are missing out on opportunities in life due to over thinking?

Are you always the one clicking "maybe" on Facebook events?

TAZ offers a simple, fun, and practical solution. TAZ is a social media platform where every feature is designed to propel you into the real world!!!

TAZ is not simply another event finding mobile app, TAZ is an experience creator. With a simple and user friendly interface TAZ allows users to create and curate fun and exciting social events and gatherings. So if you are a leader then TAZ is a great tool to build and network and become more influential. If you are looking to try new things and get out of your bubble or even out of your comfort zone then TAZ is for you.

TAZ is about going back to that childlike sense of awe and wonder, that time before we got caught up in the politics and social demands of life.

TAZ invites you to say yes to life, to start using technology as a tool to build and create life as opposed to something that we are constantly tethered to.

A TAZ is an event or a series of events setup by another TAZ user, it is displayed on the map in a similar fashion to the way cars are shown on Uber, so you would see a point on the map where a TAZ begins, click on it and see the details of the event and who's going.

Think of TAZ as a beautiful collision of Tinder and Pokemon Go, an app that gets you out of the house but to meet new people and create fun and interesting experiences.

story:
The Problem

People are social by nature.  This is a good thing, but it has its own share of problems.  Security, privacy, and confidentiality are issues that we all need to deal with when meeting others.  More often than not, this hinders our ability to connect with people that we meet face to face.


Introducing "Nice To Meet You!" - An App That Takes the Pain Out of Connecting

When you download and use "Nice To Meet You!"

  • You no longer have to share your contact information to connect and communicate...
  • You will never have to worry about giving out your phone number too soon...
  • You decide WHEN you want to share your contact details...
  • You gain access to truly private instant messaging - without irritating and bothersome ads...

"Nice To Meet You!" allows you to connect and communicate with people you meet face to face WITHOUT disclosing any contact information.

     Accept/Decline.  No contact information is given!

Only your first name, profile picture, when you met and a map of where you met are displayed to the other user.  Nothing else!

     Who, when, and where you met... it's that simple!

The app enables you to communicate via private instant messaging.  You can share your personal contact information IF and WHEN you're comfortable.

         Clean user interface and absolutely NO ads!

In addition, "Nice To Meet You!" will NEVER have any user-driven, annoying and intrusive ads.  We've gone the extra mile and taken things up a notch to reassure you that your content is TRULY PRIVATE.

You also have the option of deleting the Connection, so that the user never gets hold of you in the future, however hard they may try!


My Story

Having worked in the tech industry since 2001, I've spent the last 2 YEARS perfecting "Nice To Meet You!"  Tireless days, sleepless nights and SEVERAL HUNDRED bug fixes later, I'm pleased to announce we officially launched this app, for iOS and Android, on December 13th, 2014.


Announcing an Awesome Feature:  Temporary Messaging That is Both Instant and Private


With this feature, instant messages only last 3 days in the app.  On the current day, message looks normal.  When the message is 1 day old, it turns gray.  When the message is 2 days old, it turns black.  When the message is 3 days old, it is COMPLETELY black.  Poof!

    See how the message that is older than 3 days
               is completely BLACK!  Cool huh?

What We Need From You

Your help and support will transform our cool concept into something BIGGER!  Your support will enable us to add additional features and app enhancements.  More importantly, your support will empower us to generate awareness about the app - worldwide!  More people need to find out that there's a more private way to connect and communicate.


How Funds Will Be Used



How You Can Help

If you can contribute, any amount would greatly help our cause of bringing PRIVACY back to the world!  However, even if you can’t make a contribution, there are other ways you can help.  Please download the “Nice To Meet You!” app now.  To generate awareness, please use social media (Facebook, Twitter, etc.) and tell your family, friends, and peers about this Indiegogo campaign.  As more people are made aware of our campaign and what we're trying to accomplish, the chances of us meeting our funding goal will only get better!


Referral Program - Spread the Word & Get Rewarded

If you refer people to contribute, we will give you the perk that is worth 33% of the total referred dollars.  Let's say your referrals generate $580 worth of contributions, you will then get a T-shirt ($180 perk) as a 'Thank You' for your effort.  Make sense? 

Note:  For a contributor to count as a referrer, you must promote this campaign with Indiegogo’s share tools while logged into your Indiegogo account. This is important because otherwise, your unique ID won’t be attached to any resulting contributions or visits.


Team Members

  • CEO - Phillip



  • Project Lead - Nitin
  • Lead Android Developer - Hardik
  • Lead iOS Developer - Akshay
  • Q&A - Saleem



Media Contact

For media inquiries, please email info@nicetomeetyouapp.com.  Thanks!

story:
Sense+ 

Docking Station / Smoke - Gas Sensor and App

You are asleep, your phone is in its dock beside your bed, and deadly cool toxic smoke from a smoldering fire starts slowly filling your room. Traditional ionization ceiling mounted smoke alarms work well for fast fires but can take around 20 minutes or more to detect this cool smoke by which time you may not wake up.

This is where Sense+ technology could save you and house hold members. The Sense+ is the first ever portable smart device docking station and charger with built in Photo Electric smoke and gas detection sensors. The Sense+ also ‘talks’ to a smart App on your phone offering unique personal protection options.
 
 
‘Photo-Electric’ smoke sensors are the latest (and in most cases the best) smoke detectors available. They can detect deadly cold smoke that some traditional smoke alarms have difficulty sensing. By combining the photoelectric sensor with a carbon monoxide (the gas that makes you too sleepy to wake up) sensor you get secondary technology as a backup which may work better depending on the nature of the threat.
 

If smoke is detected, an alert will sound and the Sense+ App will start up on the iPhone. If there is no response, an alarm will sound and the app on your phone will call numbers listed in your home call group. An alert screen offering emergency services will then be displayed.

The Sense+ draws its power from the grid (mains power) or the docked smart device. If these are not available it also has a built-in battery as a backup.

Sense+ is intended as an additional level of protection to ‘in-house’ smoke alarms and is intended to help provide sufficient advance warning to allow you to react and potentially save your life and the lives of those around you. Worldwide there are over 195,000 fire related deaths1 every year and an unspecified number related to carbon monoxide poisoning plus hundreds of thousands of people injured in such events. In the U.S. alone one, person is killed in a fire every 169 minutes and someone is injured every 30 seconds (Karter 2011). 

  •  About 85% of all U.S. fire deaths in 2009 occurred in homes (Karter 2011).
  •  In 2010, fire departments responded to 384,000 home fires in the United States, which claimed the lives of 2,640 people (not including firefighters) and injured another 13,350, not including firefighters (Karter 2011). 
  • The total costs of injuries to the U.S. economy, $7.5 billion (2006) each year. 
  • Most victims of fires die from smoke or toxic gases and not from burns (Hall 2001). 
  • Over one-third (37%) home fire deaths occur in homes without smoke alarms (Ahrens 2011).

Most households have smoke alarms but many of them aren't in working order, usually due to flat batteries or batteries having been removed. A device such as Sense+ in a household may help to prevent many of these deaths. 

The team behind the Sense+ were inspired after reading several media reports of multiple tragedies and near misses in fires where no working smoke alarms were installed in the home/hotel/cabin... Smoke inhalation meant the occupants were unable to wake up and get themselves and their families to safety. By studying Smart phone owners habits the team came up with the idea of combining an everyday personal item such as a mobile phone (often placed beside the users bed) with a smart smoke and gas warning system. 

The Sense+ is designed for use with Apple’s iPhone5. However other smart devices can connect via a USB port. Future versions are planned to be native for Android and Windows phones. This is simply a matter of swapping the inner core module with one for your type of phone/device. Designed to be portable, the Sense+ is a great travel charger and smoke/gas sensor. 

 
iPad or other smartphone can be connected via USB port at back

Lengthy prototype development and testing against both photo electric and ionization smoke alarms was completed in combined with Smart App development. The results are a robust, sleek, multi-functional smart device which has the ability to be upgraded. 

'Gun Metal' finish option

Unlike traditional ionization smoke detectors the Sense+ uses no radioactive materials and is designed to be upgradable and recyclable. 

1 World Health Organization statistics

How it works overview

Beta prototype testing

We are working hard gearing up for production, here are the final housings being tested before final PCB design testing.

 
Pre-Production Prototyping printouts of final housing for test assembilies.

Prototype of 'Dock Only'

Schedule

T-shirts

 
T-shirt designs
 

Shipping product

As professional Industrial Designers with over 30 years combined experience developing products we have the necessary skill set and manufacturing partners to allow us to overcome obstacles that occur during the development of a product. With the Sense+ we have sourced and tested most components but we are still at the mercy of OEM’s like Apple and cannot predict updates/changes to their smart devices that may effects our lead-times. However we have an experienced and capable team and feel comfortable delivering on our promise.

Quality

We have produced machined and printed parts for assembly evaluation and shared these with our vendors to hone the design so that what you see in the this presentation we can deliver on. All details have now been finalized and we are ready to go to tooling. 

Our manufacturing partners are vetted by us and we have worked with them for many years and have trust in each other’s ability to produce what we design.

Our preferred manufacturing partners have all given us assurances that they can deliver in the indicated timeframe and will guarantee their work, however there may still be things do still come up that can cause delays. We have done our best to mitigate possible holdups by working with known vendors, conduct testing of all electronic components and build test models and CAD to ensure fit and finish of components.

Future proof

This unit has been designed with future expansion and possible changes taken into account. For example the ‘inner core’ can be replaced if there are changes to the connectors or we wish to produce another ‘core’ for another smart device manufacturer in the future.

There is also the possibility of future versions having more sensors and connectivity options, which would require the electronics module to be swapped out. We have designed the assembly so that the user can do this themselves following instructions from us.

PLEASE NOTE:
Ceiling mounted smoke alarms are still recognized as the preferred response alarm. As such the Sense+ is intended as an additional safety system for fixed in home ceiling mounted smoke alarms.

Sense+ adds safety for you and your family as a automated and networked, cold smoke and carbon monoxide detector system. It saves you precious time you need to get you and your family to safety and alarm emergency services.

It is a portable charging dock that can be easily used to provide added protection when you are on the road and sleeping away from home.

 

Not all smoke detectors are created equal - Video on NBCNews.com

There is also the possibility of future versions having more sensors and connectivity options, which would require the electronics module to be swapped out. We have designed the assembly so that the user can do this themselves following instructions from us.
PLEASE NOTE:Ceiling mounted smoke alarms are still recognized as the preferred response alarm. As such the Sense+ is intended as an additional safety system for fixed in home ceiling mounted smoke alarms.
Sense+ adds safety for you and your family as a automated and networked, cold smoke and carbon monoxide detector system. It saves you precious time you need to get you and your family to safety and alarm emergency services.
It is a portable charging dock that can be easily used to provide added protection when you are on the road and sleeping away from home.
 

Not all smoke detectors are created equal - Video on NBCNews.com

story:
Why we all need DeckTracker?

Have you ever had that sick feeling when something important to you goes missing at the absolute worst time?

We have.

Trey Van Cleave left his deck in a hotel room, knocking him out of a tournament. His opportunity to be a full-time magic dealer was gone in the blink of an eye when his suitcase, containing his entire collection, was stolen. 

Andrew Prell had his modern deck stolen on day two of GP Richmond just before the final round.  He had ten minutes to find or rebuild his deck; needless to say, that was stressful.

We don't want this to ever happen to you.

After researching existing Bluetooth tracking technology, we realized nothing on the market would have prevented these losses.

DeckTracker does.

How does it work?

DeckTracker is a Bluetooth Device that is designed to alert you if the device is moved more than 20 feet away from your phone.  It will set off an alarm on your phone and you can use the map software to pinpoint the location of the device. Then, when you are close enough to hear it, you can set off the alarm on the device. It's that simple!


Why choose DeckTracker?

1: The 20ft (6 meters) Virtual Leash.

Unlike other tracking devices, DeckTracker will alert you before it's too late. Other trackers help you locate things you already know are lost, or alert you when they move over 100 feet away. By then your deck is long gone. DeckTracker helps prevent loss from happening by providing a 20 foot virtual leash between the device and your phone. 

If you are in this picture, DeckTracker alerts you before it makes it to the end of the table. Other trackers won't alert you until your deck is in the parking lot.

When do you want to know?

2: The Design

The size and shape of DeckTracker have been customized for the card gaming community. For this reason, we avoided using sharp edges or bright colors.

DeckTracker is an anti-theft device, it was designed to be hidden inside a deck box or binder. We wanted DeckTracker to be discrete so we made it black. Because cards can easily be dented by sharp edges, we shaped it to minimize any potential damage to your magic cards. The final design fits perfectly inside the bottom of a standard deck box and slips easily into the page of a trade binder.

          If you dislike binder dents....                     You will hate other trackers!


3: The Device Alarm

Because the device is meant to go inside deck boxes and trade binders, we have worked with our manufacturer to make the device alarm louder than other trackers so it can be heard in the MTG tournament environment.

 

DeckTracker is flat and smaller than the bottom of any standard deck box.


FAQ's


How many DeckTrackers can 1 Smartphone find?

We recommend using no more than 10 trackers at the same time on an iPhone and 4 on an Android device.


Will DeckTracker work with my phone?:

DeckTracker works with iPhone 4s, iPhone 5, New Ipad, iPad mini, New iPod touch. It also works on Android devices supporting Bluetooth Low Energy, running Android 4.4 and newer.

Do I need a separate adapter or special case for my phone?

Nothing special is required. DeckTracker will communicate directly with your Smartphone via Bluetooth Low Energy.

What is the range of DeckTracker?

Approximately 100 feet or about 30 Meters.

How long will the battery last and are they replaceable?

The replaceable battery inside DeckTracker will last about 1 year.

How do you pair DeckTracker with your phone?

Pairing will be done from within the DeckTracker app. No need to go to the Settings or Bluetooth menu on your phone. From within the DeckTracker app, you will only be able to pair with DeckTrackers that are very close to your phone. (About 1 foot or less). This will ensure you only pair with your DeckTracker, and not your neighbor's...

Only DeckTrackers that have been paired will be visible on the DeckTracker app.


Project Timeline

We currently have fully working pre-production units / Prototypes

Our hardware and software is finalized.

Our App development is in Beta phase now.

We have identified all components to be used in mass production, and built the latest samples using those components.

September:

App Development: App Development for iOS will enter final beta phase in September. Android app is completed.


October:

Certification completed for DeckTrackers. Start Mass Production.

November:

Distribution - Backers get their DeckTrackers.

About us:

We are product developers who have created both hardware and software for companies and consumers for over twenty years.

Andy Prell is always developing. He has created combined hardware/software projects for over 20 years. Andy created the first US manufactured Virtual Reality Arcade system, 2nd in the world to Virtuality out of England back in 1990. The most notable installation was the opening of the MGM Grand on Dec 18, 1993, where Andy's AWT units were the only machines operational in the arcade. He has created technology in partnership with Bell Labs, Lucent, Avaya, Compaq, Qwest Communications and Computer Associates. He has several patents issued by the US patent office. Andy counts Nolan Bushnell, founder of Atari, as a personal friend and started playing Magic around 1994.

Trey Van Cleave is always playing and selling. He has been a professional gamer and dealer for almost 20 years. After graduating from Haverford College with a degree in Economics and French, he traveled the world both playing and dealing MTG. With over 13 years experience, he is an Ebay Power Seller with 100% positive feedback which means that he consistently sells a significant volume of items while providing a high level of service to buyers. Reputation is everything, so you will get what you are promised in a timely and professional manner. 


Back us with confidence!

This is an "ALL OR NOTHING" campaign on IndieGoGo which means if we don't reach our minimum goal 100% of your money will be refunded.


Use of Funds


To Make DeckTracker Affordable!

We have our prototypes.

We have figured out our supply chain.

We have started to sign up dealers.

We need your help to take the next step.

We are looking for funds to put DeckTracker into mass production and keep the cost affordable to the Magic community.

You are getting in early, and getting a premium product ahead of everyone else.

We’re asking you to help us make DeckTracker a reality. 


Stretch Goals

We want everyone's decks and collections to be safe. We need your help to make this happen, so we designed our Stretch Goals as a competition to see who can get the most people protected through this campaign. 

We are magic players and we know how each of us prize our unique collections. To show how serious we are about protecting everyone's collections, Trey dug into his private vault and pulled out some of his most prized, and quite possibly priceless possessions (or at the very least Mythically Rare!).

(Hint - you may be able to win something you can sacrifice for three mana of any color, and it is signed by Richard Garfield and Christopher Rush!)


We decided to offer these impossible-to-find cards in a way that everyone has a chance of getting them by helping drive our campaign. We are talking MTG creator signed Power TEN! (The Power Nine plus the Library of Alexandria, which is considered the Power TEN)

To enter: 

First, back the campaign, then use the sharing tools on the top of the Deck Tracker Indiegogo page to refer people. The Top Ten fans who have referred the most backers when the campaign ends will win the prizes we have posted for the goal we have reached!


$50,000

If we reach the $50,000 Stretch Goal the top ten will receive:

1st - 1 Sealed Booster Box of UNHINGED  (The Wackiest MTG set ever printed - Full Art Foil Lands in every box)

2nd - 1 Sealed Booster Box of Champions of Kamigawa (The O.G. Asian set jammed packed with Legendary Ninjas and Samurai)

3rd - 1 Sealed Booster Box of Betrayers of Kamigawa (Anybody want an Umezawa's Jitte or a badass Legend for your Commander deck?)

4th - 1 Sealed Booster Box of Saviors of Kamigawa (Awesome Legendary Lands galore)

5th - 1 Sealed Booster Box of Khans of Tarkir (The Brand New Asian-Themed MTG set with Morph to boot)

6th thru 10th - 1 Sealed Booster Box of Khans of Tarkir 



$100,000

If we reach the $100,000 Stretch Goal the top ten will receive:

1st - MOX EMERALD (One step closer to your own Power 9)

2nd - 1 Sealed Booster Box of Alliances (Get your playset of Force of Wills!)

3rd - 1 Sealed Booster Box of UNHINGED (The Wackiest MTG set ever printed - Full Art Foil Lands in every box)

4th - 1 Sealed Booster Box of Champions of Kamigawa (The O.G. Asian set jammed packed with Legendary Ninjas and Samurai)

5th - 1 Sealed Booster Box of Betrayers of Kamigawa (Anybody want an Umezawa's Jitte or a badass Legend for your Commander deck?)

6th - 1 Sealed Booster Box of Saviors of Kamigawa (Awesome Legendary Lands galore)

7th - 1 Sealed Booster Box of Khans of Tarkir (The Brand New Asian-Themed MTG set with Morph to boot)

8th thru 10th- 1 Sealed Booster Box of Khans of Tarkir


$250,000

If we reach the $250,000 Stretch Goal the top ten will receive:

1st - BLACK LOTUS (The end all be all of MTG cards - Need I say more?)

2nd - MOX EMERALD (More valuable than a real emerald wow)

3rd - TIMETWISTER (A lot of cards out there try and fail to be the Twista')

4th - 1 Sealed Booster Box of Alliances (Get your playset of Force of Will!)

5th - 1 Sealed Booster Box of UNHINGED (The Wackiest MTG set ever printed - Full Art Foil Lands in every box)

6th - 1 Sealed Booster Box of Champions of Kamigawa (The O.G. Asian set jammed packed with Legendary Ninjas and Samurai)

7th - 1 Sealed Booster Box of Betrayers of Kamigawa (Anybody want an Umezawa's Jitte or a badass Legend for your Commander deck?)

8th - 1 Sealed Booster Box of Saviors of Kamigawa (Awesome Legendary Lands galore)

9th - 1 Sealed Booster Box of Khans of Tarkir (The Brand New Asian-Themed MTG set with Morph to boot)

10th - 1 Sealed Booster Box of Khans of Tarkir


$500,000

If we reach the $500,000 Stretch Goal the top ten will receive:

1st - BLACK LOTUS signed by MTG creator Richard Garfield                            and artist Christopher Rush

2nd - BETA MOX SAPPHIRE signed by MTG creator Richard Garfield                  and artist Dan Frazier

3rd - ALPHA MOX RUBY signed by MTG creator Richard Garfield and artist Dan Frazier

4th - BETA TIME WALK signed by MTG creator Richard Garfield

5th - BETA MOX PEARL signed by MTG creator Richard Garfield and artist Dan Frazier

6th - ANCESTRAL RECALL signed by Mark Poole

7th - MOX JET signed by MTG creator Richard Garfield and artist Dan Frazier

8th - MOX EMERALD signed by MTG creator Richard Garfield and artist Dan Frazier

9th - TIMETWISTER signed by MTG creator Richard Garfield and artist Dan Frazier

10th - LIBRARY OF ALEXANDRIA signed by Richard Garfield


Dealers Supporting DeckTracker

  Card Titan

 Legion Brands

  Strike Zone

   Legendary Games

  Oasis Games

  Inked Playmats

  D20 Hobbies


  Pat's Games

  Heroes & Fantasies

  MTG Headquarters

 Kings Games

 Silver Creek Game Shop

  Something2Do

story:
The Inspiration:

While shooting some quick test shots a little over a year ago for a Toyota commerical that my company would be working on, we were using a standard handle on the Canon 7D while shooting some of the closer, more intimate shots. A few days later, I noticed a friend complaining about not being able to get a decent shot with his iPhone because it was too hard to hold even remotely steady.

At this point, the two didn't seem connected and I didn't have a single idea in my head about creating a product. However, again a few days later I spoke with my mother who was trying to take video with her point-and-shoot. She too was having trouble capturing decent footage so I told her to get a handle or some type of mini rig she could put her camera on if she wanted to film a family gathering or an event that a family member was invovled in. 

As most of you know, our parents generally aren't exactly in tune with the newest gadgets or technology. She asked me if I could find something for her. As it turns out, I must not be in tune with the newest gadgets or technology either. I guess I just assumed that there would be a simple, sleek and cheap product in my mother's local Best Buy store that she could conveniently carry in her pocket or purse and mount her camera on it and have a blast.

After spending a bit of time looking for the perfect product for this I just couldn't find exactly what I was looking for. I needed something affordable, something that could be purchased by someone who isn't a filmmaker. . .a product that wasn't an investment. I also felt like I needed something that has a great design. It seemed like all new cameras have nicer and nicer designs. At this point I was thinking about  my friend with the iPhone as well. I began to think of how concious consumers are of the visual appeal of their accesories. 

For some reason, I just couldn't find the right product. Sure there are affordable products out there but they are clunky and ugly. Even the one we were using at the beginning of this story was a big, strangely shaped, plain old ugly handle. It was functional, but it's not something that matches the design of modern cameras and smartphones. Needless to say it definitely doesn't fit in your pocket either. 

The next week at work I had a little down time and began sketching some ideas. This is when I began thinking about what the product that I'm desperately looking for would actually look like. What features would it have? What size would it be? What shape?

This is where the development phase began.  

The Development:

The Handle Pro was quite different when it was first being created. I began making outlines and random shapes of what the top would be like. What the general shape would be like.

This went on in my downtime for the rest of the week. Finally after thinking about all of the details overnight I sat down and completed the first full sketch of what is now called The Handle Pro.
 

Now that I had a complete sketch, as opposed to my previous random etches and drawings of nothing, I felt like it was time to move forward. So I grabbed some modeling clay to start playing with. I have to admit that I'm not the best with clay.

Regardless, this was the first clay model in brilliant orange! I thought it was great, so later that week I decided it was time to make a better clay model. Off to the store for some molding clay. . .

Round two with clay (right). Wow this is perfect. . .time to make this thing a reality. This can't get any better. This was the first time seeing and holding a solid version. It's ready to go. Next, it was time to get this bad boy modeled in 3D and then get a 3D print as a test subject. 

 


After re-working some ideas, new sketches, meetings with product designers and some waiting around we went back to 3D land. There were several rounds of completely remodeling our product in 3D from scratch.



Once we finally saw a 3D render of the new version we knew that this one had to be it - this is the point we had decided to call our product The Handle Pro. A couple of weeks later we received our first working copy of The Handle Pro. Some minor adjustments were necessary. . .more waiting.

Finally, after about another month of slight revisions. . .perfection!

 

The Final Product:

 

 

 

When Will You Receive It?

Since we already have manufacturers standing by, and everything is in place to begin production immediately, your wait time will not be very long.

The quicker we reach our funding goal, the quicker we can begin production and the quicker you receive the product. Our goal is to get the product to you within six weeks of the end of the campaign. However, if we don't reach our goal until the very end of the campaign, the wait time could be up to ten weeks after the campaign deadline.

The day that we reach our funding goal we will contact the manufacturer to begin working on the mold immediately. This will help cut down the wait time so that we can get the product in your hands as soon as possible!

Since we want to make sure all of our supporters and customers are happy, we will update you as often as possible as we move forward and will get this awesome tool in your hands as quickly as we possibly can!

More about us:

You want to know more about us? Great, we'll give you a brief little bio of who we are.

We, Brandon and David, are motion graphics producers living in Los Angeles. We met on the job in 2009, and shortly thereafter I (Brandon) decided to host an independent film festival. David quickly came on board and we hosted the LA Film + Music Weekend in Los Angeles for two consecutive years showing over 100 films total. Some of the films shown that you may know of (or should definitely check out) are Uprising: Hip Hop & the LA Riots(http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2215707/), Sam Jaeger's Take Me Home(http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1261954/), The Prospects (http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1466069/), Skyler (http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1369696/), A Lonely Place For Dying (http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1161861/) and dozens of other great films that we love and still watch from time to time!

As producers in motion graphics we work on mostly commercial, broadcast and promotional jobs. If you watch a lot of television, chances are you have seen something that one of us has produced.





**For international buyers, we are not responsible for any taxes/fees associated with importing the product into your country. Please be aware of any fees that you may be facing before making your purchase. Thank you!

As most of you know, our parents generally aren't exactly in tune with the newest gadgets or technology. She asked me if I could find something for her. As it turns out, I must not be in tune with the newest gadgets or technology either. I guess I just assumed that there would be a simple, sleek and cheap product in my mother's local Best Buy store that she could conveniently carry in her pocket or purse and mount her camera on it and have a blast.
After spending a bit of time looking for the perfect product for this I just couldn't find exactly what I was looking for. I needed something affordable, something that could be purchased by someone who isn't a filmmaker. . .a product that wasn't an investment. I also felt like I needed something that has a great design. It seemed like all new cameras have nicer and nicer designs. At this point I was thinking about  my friend with the iPhone as well. I began to think of how concious consumers are of the visual appeal of their accesories. 
For some reason, I just couldn't find the right product. Sure there are affordable products out there but they are clunky and ugly. Even the one we were using at the beginning of this story was a big, strangely shaped, plain old ugly handle. It was functional, but it's not something that matches the design of modern cameras and smartphones. Needless to say it definitely doesn't fit in your pocket either. 
The next week at work I had a little down time and began sketching some ideas. This is when I began thinking about what the product that I'm desperately looking for would actually look like. What features would it have? What size would it be? What shape?
This is where the development phase began.  
The Development:
The Handle Pro was quite different when it was first being created. I began making outlines and random shapes of what the top would be like. What the general shape would be like.
This went on in my downtime for the rest of the week. Finally after thinking about all of the details overnight I sat down and completed the first full sketch of what is now called The Handle Pro. 


Now that I had a complete sketch, as opposed to my previous random etches and drawings of nothing, I felt like it was time to move forward. So I grabbed some modeling clay to start playing with. I have to admit that I'm not the best with clay.
Regardless, this was the first clay model in brilliant orange! I thought it was great, so later that week I decided it was time to make a better clay model. Off to the store for some molding clay. . .

Round two with clay (right). Wow this is perfect. . .time to make this thing a reality. This can't get any better. This was the first time seeing and holding a solid version. It's ready to go. Next, it was time to get this bad boy modeled in 3D and then get a 3D print as a test subject. 
 

After re-working some ideas, new sketches, meetings with product designers and some waiting around we went back to 3D land. There were several rounds of completely remodeling our product in 3D from scratch.
Once we finally saw a 3D render of the new version we knew that this one had to be it - this is the point we had decided to call our product The Handle Pro. A couple of weeks later we received our first working copy of The Handle Pro. Some minor adjustments were necessary. . .more waiting.
Finally, after about another month of slight revisions. . .perfection!
 
The Final Product:

 
 
 









When Will You Receive It?
Since we already have manufacturers standing by, and everything is in place to begin production immediately, your wait time will not be very long.
The quicker we reach our funding goal, the quicker we can begin production and the quicker you receive the product. Our goal is to get the product to you within six weeks of the end of the campaign. However, if we don't reach our goal until the very end of the campaign, the wait time could be up to ten weeks after the campaign deadline.
The day that we reach our funding goal we will contact the manufacturer to begin working on the mold immediately. This will help cut down the wait time so that we can get the product in your hands as soon as possible!
Since we want to make sure all of our supporters and customers are happy, we will update you as often as possible as we move forward and will get this awesome tool in your hands as quickly as we possibly can!

More about us:

You want to know more about us? Great, we'll give you a brief little bio of who we are.
We, Brandon and David, are motion graphics producers living in Los Angeles. We met on the job in 2009, and shortly thereafter I (Brandon) decided to host an independent film festival. David quickly came on board and we hosted the LA Film + Music Weekend in Los Angeles for two consecutive years showing over 100 films total. Some of the films shown that you may know of (or should definitely check out) are Uprising: Hip Hop & the LA Riots(http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2215707/), Sam Jaeger's Take Me Home(http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1261954/), The Prospects (http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1466069/), Skyler (http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1369696/), A Lonely Place For Dying (http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1161861/) and dozens of other great films that we love and still watch from time to time!
As producers in motion graphics we work on mostly commercial, broadcast and promotional jobs. If you watch a lot of television, chances are you have seen something that one of us has produced.





**For international buyers, we are not responsible for any taxes/fees associated with importing the product into your country. Please be aware of any fees that you may be facing before making your purchase. Thank you!

story:
Short Summary

This donation site is hoping to raise 25,000 dollars for Dwayne Casey's fine caused by his "blow up" about the Officiating after the Atlanta Hawks game on January 20, 2013. Dwayne Casey is getting fined for specifically complaining about bad officiating that caused the Raptors to lose games, in which, the NBA HAS ADMITTED they screwed up!

I dont know about you, but the fact he is getting fined for getting upset about something the NBA actually officially agrees with (in prior games...and im sure this one will be admitted as well)....well...makes no sense at all.

I wanted to yell out at the media and complain about the Officiating this year many times...many, many times....however, us fans, dont really have the ability to have our voices heard by the NBA folks.

With that said, I fully appreciate that Dwayne Casey decided to blow up, and let the NBA know that "enough is enough". Apologies do not mean anything if the same mistake is made over and over again....Us, as fans, all feel this way and wish we could have spoken out about it...but unfortunately, Dwayne Casey is the only person who was able to after the Hawks game...and he got fined for it.

 

Lets Help Pay this fine ...as his rant was the right thing to do...and he doesnt deserve to be punished.

 

All we need is 25 000 Raptors Fans to donate one dollar each...more if you want...but simply 25 000 one dollar donations can pay for his fine...so lets show him we appreciate his rant, and make our voices heard and let the NBA know.

 

IF this site does not reach the 25000 dollar mark....everybody who made the dollar donation will be refunded ...our goal is to raise the 25, 000 in 30 - 60 days max.

story:
Pour la version en français, voir plus bas.

 

Do you remember?

When the only option you had for making your music portable was with those little rectangular plastic audio cassette tapes? How long it took to rewind them? That rebellious magnetic tape? How long it took to find that one track you wanted to listen to? 

You must be wondering what we are getting at…

What if we told it was possible to relive the glory days of your beloved cassette tapes even in this digital download age?

Well now you can: Introducing Ugo.

 

Our project

We have designed a rechargeable, portable docking charger with a powerful integrated high-quality speaker and wireless technology for your smartphones and other music devices. We’ve added a touch of nostalgic flair, bringing back the familiar audio cassette case we all used at one point in our lives.

 

What makes Ugo. different?

You get three devices in one compact package, combining a docking charger, wireless speaker and battery pack.

1. You get richer, deeper sound with Ugo.’s built in speaker. Bringing you a wider range of frequencies, allowing for higher-quality and more balanced sounds. This basically means that you are getting great sound in a compact format. You can also listen to your favorite music and charge your device at the same time, something other mini-speakers on the market don’t offer.

2. It’s equipped with built-in Bluetooth and Airplay technology featuring an auto-pairing and linking feature to ensure simple and fast setup. Making it a breeze to listen and control your music wirelessly.

3. A long lasting ion-lithium battery will help you get over your Dead battery anxiety providing an emergency power supply when needed. 

As an added bonus the ultra compact design makes it very pratical to carry around everywhere you go. It also makes the perfect docking station for your smartphone, be it in upright position or for watching videos in landscape mode (horizontal).

This device is designed to accomodate different connector: for iPhone 5 and previous iPhone models (with a 30 pin connector) and iPod Touch 5th generation (with a 30 pin connector). Also, Ugo. is really strong to support iPad mini and as well iPad. Ugo. will be also available for other devices equipped with a micro USB connector (Blackberry, Samsung and others recent smartphones).  You will only have to specify one of the 3 types of connector you own: lightning, 30 pin or micro USB. 

 

Who we are

This product was devised by the creative minds of the Ugo.Design team made up of 3 industrial designers and an experienced electronics expert.

Carolyne Gratton and Jonathan Villeneuve are two young dynamic industrial designers that have recently graduated from the University of Montreal’s School of Industrial Design and who are taking part in this project. Experienced product developer Steve Boa, owner of AIS Innovations, is also involved as the electronic expert and taking care of prototyping, molds and sourcing for the components.

I have a background in industrial design from the University of Montreal’s School of Industrial Design and more than 18 years of experience, I have been involved in the development of many products for different companies. Some of which even acquired patents pending. 

Our passion about design and our constant will to innovate drive us in finding new solutions for everyday products. Our Vision? Bringing to life product ideas that will transform and simplify your day-to-day life.  

-Daniel Thibault, designer and campaign leader

 

Our campaign

Our aim is to raise money to launch our initial production of a new fun type of electronic device we’ve been developing: Ugo. This campaign is our first one and we believe that crowdfunding is a great new way to reach the end users, whom we are designing the products for. As industrial designers, we care about the human factors and user needs when involved in product development.

Industrial designers are always asking themselves; How?, Where?, Who?, and especially, Why? Being an industrial designer is one of the greatest and most exciting challenges. And this is a terrific product designed to answer all the above questions. Nevertheless, keeping a small design firm alive is certainly an even bigger challenge in today’s business world.  

 

What We Need & What You Get

All we need now is your help! With your money we will be able to develop optimized injection molds, get the necessary electronic components for the first production round and get you the best looking multi-functional smartphone accessory you’ve ever laid your eyes on. Encourage us by pre-ordering your Ugo. device today, helping us to start production and launch our product on the market as soon as possible!

 

We need the money for:

1. The production of steel injection molds to manufacture our product. The cost is estimated between 10 000 and 12 000$.  

2. The purchasing of a minimum quantity of 1 000 PCB (printed circuit board), wires, high quality speakers and polymer resins. Costs are estimated at about 10 000$, depending of the number of perks claimed.

3. The labor and freight costs related to production (injection molding, parts assembly, customization process, etc). 

4. Taxes, exchange currency fees, Indiegogo commission, credit card and Paypal fees.

The total estimated is $35 000

 

What you will get: 

In return you will assuredly find a perk that suits your wants and needs perfectly, you have 9 awesome choices to choose from!

We are offering you the early adopter’s prices for the Ugo. device. The product’s suggested retail price will be 95$ for the ORIGINAL Ugo. version once this campaign has ended.

Our perks allow you to get your hands on Ugo. before everyone else, as early as July 2013. But before we can deliver Ugo. we will need between 10 to 12 weeks to produce the molds, for product testing, improvements and product assembly for perk delivery. If the campaign turns out to be a huge success before it ends we might be able to start production sooner and deliver your Ugo. device before the aforementioned dates.

We are sure you can find something to please you: choose from different colors, laser inscriptions and special finishes! Make sure to tell us if it is for Apple devices or others devices with micro USB connector.

 

The Perks 

1. For $10 you get A Virtual Cheer from the team at Ugo Design Team

2. For $55 (+shipping) you are pre-ordering 1 ORIGINAL Ugo. Earliest birds

3. For $65 (+shipping) you are pre-ordering 1 ORIGINAL Ugo. Early birds

4. For $70 (+shipping) you are pre-ordering 1 ORIGINAL Ugo.

 

5. For $85 (+shipping) you are pre-ordering 1 CUSTOM LASER engraved Ugo.

 

6. For $115 (+shipping) you are pre-ordering one LIMITED EDITION Ugo.

 

7. For $165 (+shipping) you are pre-ordering a Trio Pack of ORIGINAL Ugo.

 

8. For $550 (+shipping) you are pre-ordering a Pack of 10 ORIGINAL Ugo.

 

9. For $2350 (+shipping) you are pre-ordering a HUGE Pack of 50 ORIGINAL Ugo.

Since this campaign is a fixed one, we need to reach our goal of 35 000$ within 50 days. And since molds and electronic components are a must for this project if there is no money... there is no Ugo.!

 

IMPORTANT:

Add the shipping cost to the perk amount when filling the PayPal form. See example below. In that case we have $55 + $15 (shipping to Canada)= $70.

Thank you very much!

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You want to help us to achieve or overpass our goal?  Let your friends and relatives know about our campaign!

Just send an email, use twitter, LinkedIn or Facebook to let them know.  Or just call them! If you like our video: share it!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F68zs3rszVI

Just copy the link below to share

http://igg.me/at/Ugobymezzamorphos

We need your support to make this campaign a huge success!

Thank you!

No kittens were harmed in the making of this video. 

 

------------------------------

Version française

 

 

Rappelez vous… 

Il n'y a pas si longtemps, la musique portable se résumait à cette iconique cassette audio à bande magnétique. À ce ruban capricieux, parfois si pénible à rembobiner. Et combien de précieux temps fut perdu à essayer de trouver la chanson que nous voulions entendre?

Vous vous demandez sans doute où nous voulons en venir?

Et si nous vous annoncions qu’il est possible de revivre l’époque de vos cassettes audio adorées avec vos appareils de musique portables modernes?

Voici Ugo.

 

Notre projet                                                                       

Nous avons conçu et développé un support de recharge portable intégrant un haut-parleur de qualité avec technologie sans fil pour téléphones intelligents et appareils de musique portables tout en apportant une touche rétro, nous rappelant le fameux boîtier de cassette audio que nous avions tant l'habitude d'utiliser.

 

Qu'est-ce qui différencie Ugo.?

C'est 3 appareils en un seul qui combine un support de recharge, un haut-parleur sans fil et une batterie d'appoint.

1.  Bénéficiez d’un son remarquable dans un format compact avec le puissant haut-parleur offrant une large bande de fréquences, pour vous procurer un son riche et plus équilibré. Ugo. vous permet d'écouter votre musique préférée tout en rechargeant votre appareil, ce que les minis haut-parleurs portables ne permettent pas.

2.   Équipé de la technologie Bluetooth et Airplay vous pourrez écouter et contrôler votre musique sans fil en toute liberté sans avoir à brancher votre appareil sur le boîtier.

3.    Avec sa pile rechargeable au lithium-ion, de grande réserve, Ugo. constitue aussi une source d'appoint pour recharger votre appareil lorsqu’aucune source électrique n'est disponible.

De plus, son boîtier de format compact est très pratique à transporter, peu importe où vous allez. Vous pouvez le glisser facilement dans votre sac à main, sac à dos, valise et même tout simplement dans une pochette de chemise. Enfin, Ugo.  s'avère être un excellent support pour votre téléphone intelligent, que ce soit à la verticale ou à l'horizontale pour le visionnement de vidéos.

Cet appareil a été conçu pour recevoir différents types de connecteurs pour téléphones intelligents: iPhone 5 (lightning), les versions antérieures 4 et 3 et le iPod Touch de la cinquième génération (connecteur avec les 30 broches). Ugo. est solide au point de pouvoir accueillir autant un iPad mini qu'un iPad. Ugo. sera aussi disponible pour d’autres appareils équipés de connexions micro USB (Blackberry, Samsung et autres téléphones intelligents récents). Vous n'aurez qu'à indiquer lequel des trois types de connecteurs vous désirez commander: lightning, 30 broches ou micro USB.

 

 

Qui nous sommes                                                         

Ce produit a été imaginé et conçu par les esprits créateurs de l'équipe de Ugo. composés de 3 designers industriels et d'un développeur chevronné de produits électroniques.

Nous croyons au travail d'équipe en silos ouverts. Nous privilégions la créativité et les défis liés au lancement de nouveaux produits originaux et innovateurs. Se faisant, cette approche nous permet de joindre l'utile à l'agréable afin de donner vie à de meilleures idées!

Carolyne Gratton et Jonathan Villeneuve, deux jeunes designers industriels récemment diplômés de l'École de Design Industriel de l'Université de Montréal, ont accepté de prendre part aux défis de ce projet. Steve Boa, est impliqué à titre de développeur chevronné de produits électroniques. Il assume aussi l'approvisionnement en prototypes, moules et composantes électroniques nécessaires à ce projet.

J'ai une formation spécialisée en design industriel acquise à l'Université de Montréal. J'ai cumulé plus de 18 ans de pratique professionnelle en étant impliqué dans le développement de plusieurs produits pour différentes compagnies. Certains d'entre eux sont en instance de brevet. 

Notre passion pour le design d'objets et notre volonté persistante d'innover nous guide vers la création de solutions transcendantes pour les objets de notre quotidien.

Notre vision ? Matérialiser des idées de produits pour métamorphoser et simplifier notre quotidien.

- Daniel Thibault, designer et responsable de la campagne

 

Notre campagne

Notre objectif consiste à prendre des pré-commandes, directement depuis internet via la plateforme web Indiegogo, qui nous permettrons d'amasser les fonds nécessaires pour démarrer une pré-production de cet amusant support de recharge portable avec haut-parleur que nous avons conçu: Ugo. Nous avons besoin de votre soutien dès maintenant!

 

Nos besoins et votre contrepartie.

Avec l'argent des pré-commandes nous allons pouvoir développer des moules d'injection optimisés et acheter les composantes électroniques nécessaires à la fabrication de Ugo.

Encouragez-nous en réservant dès maintenant le boîtier Ugo. de votre choix pour que cette campagne nous permette de le lancer sur le marché le plus vite possible!  En pré-commandant vous économisez jusqu'à 35% sur le prix de vente en magasin après la fin de la campagne!

Nous comptons sur votre collaboration pour faire de cette campagne un grand succès!

 

Comment sera utilisé l'argent

1. Nous estimons le coût de la fabrication des moules d'acier pour la fabrication entre 10 000 à 12 000$.

2. L'achat des composantes électroniques (1000 circuits imprimés), filage, pile, haut-parleur de qualité et résines polymériques. Les coûts sont estimés à environ 10 000$ dépendant du nombre de pré-commandes reçues.

3. Il faut aussi calculer des coûts pour la main-d'œuvre, la fabrication, l'assemblage et pour la personnalisation des différents choix de versions du boîtier Ugo. de même que les frais de transport, et de douanes.

4. Les taxes de vente, frais de change pour les devises,  la commission Indiegogo, frais de cartes de crédit et PayPal.

Le coût total estimé du projet est de 35 000$

 

Voici ce que vous pouvez pré-commander

Vous allez certainement pouvoir dénicher le modèle de votre choix parmi notre sélection des 9 contributions offertes!

Dans le cadre de cette campagne, nous vous offrons des prix "lève-tôt" pour notre appareil Ugo. Achetez dès maintenant pour économiser gros sur le prix de détail suggéré en magasin après la campagne. Ce prix sera fixé à 95$ pour la version ORIGINAL Ugo.

Soyez les premiers à mettre la main sur un exemplaire de Ugo. en pré-commandant dès aujourd’hui. Nous sommes persuadés que vous saurez trouver le modèle qui vous satisfera: sélectionnez la couleur, l'aspect de finition et, si vous le souhaitez, la personnalisation de la gravure au laser. Enfin, vous n'aurez qu'à nous mentionner lequel des trois types de connecteurs vous désirez commander: lightning, 30 broches ou micro USB.

 

Les contreparties

1. Pour $10 vous obtenez Un remerciement virtuel de l'équipe de Ugo. 

2. Pour $55 (+frais d'envoi) vous achetez 1 Très lève-tôt ORIGINAL Ugo.

3. Pour $65 (+frais d’envoi) vous achetez 1 lève tôt ORIGINAL Ugo.

4. Pour $70 (+frais d’envoi) vous achetez 1 ORIGINAL Ugo.

 

 

 

5. Pour $85 (+frais d’envoi) vous achetez 1 CUSTOM LASER (gravure) Ugo.

 

 

6. Pour $115 (+frais d’envoi) vous achetez 1 EDITION LIMITÉE Ugo.

 

 

7. Pour $165 (+frais d’envoi) vous achetez 1 Trio de ORIGINAL Ugo.

 

 

8. Pour $550 (+frais d’envoi) vous achetez 1 Ensemble de 10 ORIGINAL Ugo.

 

 

9. Pour $2350 (+frais d’envoi) vous achetez 1 Un gros lot de 50 ORIGINAL

 

Puisqu'il s'agit d'une campagne en mode fixe, nous devons atteindre au minimum le montant de 35 000$ en 50 jours.  Cet argent sera nécessaire pour préparer les moules de la production et pour l'achats de composantes électroniques.  Pas d'argent... pas de Ugo. en juillet 2013!

 

IMPORTANT:

Lors du paiement par PayPal, veuillez additionner les frais d'expédition au montant de votre achat selon la contribution choisi. Voir l'exemple qui suit. Dans ce cas, au montant de 55$ vous additionez 15$ (frais d'expédition pour le Canada) = 70$

Merci beaucoup!



 

Autres manières de collaborer au succès

Vous souhaitez nous aider à rendre ce projet viable?  Faites-le savoir à vos proches et amis! 

Envoyez un courriel, utilisez Twitter, LinkedIn ou Facebook pour partager notre campagne! Appellez-les! Si vous aimez notre vidéo: partagez-la!

http://youtu.be/v1i0ZPkQvhk

Copiez ce lien ici bas pour partager la campagne.

http://igg.me/at/Ugobymezzamorphos

Nous avons besoin de votre soutien pour faire de ce projet un grand succès!

Merci!

 

Aucun chaton n'a été maltraité durant la réalisation de notre vidéo de campagne.
