1. The production of steel injection molds to manufacture our product. The cost is estimated between 10 000 and 12 000$.  
2. The purchasing of a minimum quantity of 1 000 PCB (printed circuit board), wires, high quality speakers and polymer resins. Costs are estimated at about 10 000$, depending of the number of perks claimed.
3. The labor and freight costs related to production (injection molding, parts assembly, customization process, etc). 
4. Taxes, exchange currency fees, Indiegogo commission, credit card and Paypal fees.
The total estimated is $35 000
 
What you will get: 
In return you will assuredly find a perk that suits your wants and needs perfectly, you have 9 awesome choices to choose from!
We are offering you the early adopter’s prices for the Ugo. device. The product’s suggested retail price will be 95$ for the ORIGINAL Ugo. version once this campaign has ended.
Our perks allow you to get your hands on Ugo. before everyone else, as early as July 2013. But before we can deliver Ugo. we will need between 10 to 12 weeks to produce the molds, for product testing, improvements and product assembly for perk delivery. If the campaign turns out to be a huge success before it ends we might be able to start production sooner and deliver your Ugo. device before the aforementioned dates.
We are sure you can find something to please you: choose from different colors, laser inscriptions and special finishes! Make sure to tell us if it is for Apple devices or others devices with micro USB connector.
 
The Perks 
1. For $10 you get A Virtual Cheer from the team at Ugo Design Team
2. For $55 (+shipping) you are pre-ordering 1 ORIGINAL Ugo. Earliest birds
3. For $65 (+shipping) you are pre-ordering 1 ORIGINAL Ugo. Early birds
4. For $70 (+shipping) you are pre-ordering 1 ORIGINAL Ugo.

 
5. For $85 (+shipping) you are pre-ordering 1 CUSTOM LASER engraved Ugo.


 
6. For $115 (+shipping) you are pre-ordering one LIMITED EDITION Ugo.

 
7. For $165 (+shipping) you are pre-ordering a Trio Pack of ORIGINAL Ugo.

 
8. For $550 (+shipping) you are pre-ordering a Pack of 10 ORIGINAL Ugo.

 
9. For $2350 (+shipping) you are pre-ordering a HUGE Pack of 50 ORIGINAL Ugo.

Since this campaign is a fixed one, we need to reach our goal of 35 000$ within 50 days. And since molds and electronic components are a must for this project if there is no money... there is no Ugo.!
 
IMPORTANT:
Add the shipping cost to the perk amount when filling the PayPal form. See example below. In that case we have $55 + $15 (shipping to Canada)= $70.
Thank you very much!
 

 
Other Ways You Can Help
You want to help us to achieve or overpass our goal?  Let your friends and relatives know about our campaign!
Just send an email, use twitter, LinkedIn or Facebook to let them know.  Or just call them! If you like our video: share it!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F68zs3rszVI
Just copy the link below to share
http://igg.me/at/Ugobymezzamorphos
We need your support to make this campaign a huge success!
Thank you!
No kittens were harmed in the making of this video. 
 
------------------------------
Version française
 

 
Rappelez vous… 
Il n'y a pas si longtemps, la musique portable se résumait à cette iconique cassette audio à bande magnétique. À ce ruban capricieux, parfois si pénible à rembobiner. Et combien de précieux temps fut perdu à essayer de trouver la chanson que nous voulions entendre?
Vous vous demandez sans doute où nous voulons en venir?
Et si nous vous annoncions qu’il est possible de revivre l’époque de vos cassettes audio adorées avec vos appareils de musique portables modernes?
Voici Ugo.
 
Notre projet                                                                        
Nous avons conçu et développé un support de recharge portable intégrant un haut-parleur de qualité avec technologie sans fil pour téléphones intelligents et appareils de musique portables tout en apportant une touche rétro, nous rappelant le fameux boîtier de cassette audio que nous avions tant l'habitude d'utiliser.
 
Qu'est-ce qui différencie Ugo.?
C'est 3 appareils en un seul qui combine un support de recharge, un haut-parleur sans fil et une batterie d'appoint.
1.  Bénéficiez d’un son remarquable dans un format compact avec le puissant haut-parleur offrant une large bande de fréquences, pour vous procurer un son riche et plus équilibré. Ugo. vous permet d'écouter votre musique préférée tout en rechargeant votre appareil, ce que les minis haut-parleurs portables ne permettent pas.
2.   Équipé de la technologie Bluetooth et Airplay vous pourrez écouter et contrôler votre musique sans fil en toute liberté sans avoir à brancher votre appareil sur le boîtier.
3.    Avec sa pile rechargeable au lithium-ion, de grande réserve, Ugo. constitue aussi une source d'appoint pour recharger votre appareil lorsqu’aucune source électrique n'est disponible.
De plus, son boîtier de format compact est très pratique à transporter, peu importe où vous allez. Vous pouvez le glisser facilement dans votre sac à main, sac à dos, valise et même tout simplement dans une pochette de chemise. Enfin, Ugo.  s'avère être un excellent support pour votre téléphone intelligent, que ce soit à la verticale ou à l'horizontale pour le visionnement de vidéos.
Cet appareil a été conçu pour recevoir différents types de connecteurs pour téléphones intelligents: iPhone 5 (lightning), les versions antérieures 4 et 3 et le iPod Touch de la cinquième génération (connecteur avec les 30 broches). Ugo. est solide au point de pouvoir accueillir autant un iPad mini qu'un iPad. Ugo. sera aussi disponible pour d’autres appareils équipés de connexions micro USB (Blackberry, Samsung et autres téléphones intelligents récents). Vous n'aurez qu'à indiquer lequel des trois types de connecteurs vous désirez commander: lightning, 30 broches ou micro USB.
 







 
Qui nous sommes                                                         
Ce produit a été imaginé et conçu par les esprits créateurs de l'équipe de Ugo. composés de 3 designers industriels et d'un développeur chevronné de produits électroniques.
Nous croyons au travail d'équipe en silos ouverts. Nous privilégions la créativité et les défis liés au lancement de nouveaux produits originaux et innovateurs. Se faisant, cette approche nous permet de joindre l'utile à l'agréable afin de donner vie à de meilleures idées!
Carolyne Gratton et Jonathan Villeneuve, deux jeunes designers industriels récemment diplômés de l'École de Design Industriel de l'Université de Montréal, ont accepté de prendre part aux défis de ce projet. Steve Boa, est impliqué à titre de développeur chevronné de produits électroniques. Il assume aussi l'approvisionnement en prototypes, moules et composantes électroniques nécessaires à ce projet.
J'ai une formation spécialisée en design industriel acquise à l'Université de Montréal. J'ai cumulé plus de 18 ans de pratique professionnelle en étant impliqué dans le développement de plusieurs produits pour différentes compagnies. Certains d'entre eux sont en instance de brevet. 
Notre passion pour le design d'objets et notre volonté persistante d'innover nous guide vers la création de solutions transcendantes pour les objets de notre quotidien.
Notre vision ? Matérialiser des idées de produits pour métamorphoser et simplifier notre quotidien.
- Daniel Thibault, designer et responsable de la campagne
 
Notre campagne
Notre objectif consiste à prendre des pré-commandes, directement depuis internet via la plateforme web Indiegogo, qui nous permettrons d'amasser les fonds nécessaires pour démarrer une pré-production de cet amusant support de recharge portable avec haut-parleur que nous avons conçu: Ugo. Nous avons besoin de votre soutien dès maintenant!
 
Nos besoins et votre contrepartie.
Avec l'argent des pré-commandes nous allons pouvoir développer des moules d'injection optimisés et acheter les composantes électroniques nécessaires à la fabrication de Ugo.
Encouragez-nous en réservant dès maintenant le boîtier Ugo. de votre choix pour que cette campagne nous permette de le lancer sur le marché le plus vite possible!  En pré-commandant vous économisez jusqu'à 35% sur le prix de vente en magasin après la fin de la campagne!
Nous comptons sur votre collaboration pour faire de cette campagne un grand succès!
 
Comment sera utilisé l'argent
1. Nous estimons le coût de la fabrication des moules d'acier pour la fabrication entre 10 000 à 12 000$.
2. L'achat des composantes électroniques (1000 circuits imprimés), filage, pile, haut-parleur de qualité et résines polymériques. Les coûts sont estimés à environ 10 000$ dépendant du nombre de pré-commandes reçues.
3. Il faut aussi calculer des coûts pour la main-d'œuvre, la fabrication, l'assemblage et pour la personnalisation des différents choix de versions du boîtier Ugo. de même que les frais de transport, et de douanes.
4. Les taxes de vente, frais de change pour les devises,  la commission Indiegogo, frais de cartes de crédit et PayPal.
Le coût total estimé du projet est de 35 000$
 
Voici ce que vous pouvez pré-commander
Vous allez certainement pouvoir dénicher le modèle de votre choix parmi notre sélection des 9 contributions offertes!
Dans le cadre de cette campagne, nous vous offrons des prix "lève-tôt" pour notre appareil Ugo. Achetez dès maintenant pour économiser gros sur le prix de détail suggéré en magasin après la campagne. Ce prix sera fixé à 95$ pour la version ORIGINAL Ugo.
Soyez les premiers à mettre la main sur un exemplaire de Ugo. en pré-commandant dès aujourd’hui. Nous sommes persuadés que vous saurez trouver le modèle qui vous satisfera: sélectionnez la couleur, l'aspect de finition et, si vous le souhaitez, la personnalisation de la gravure au laser. Enfin, vous n'aurez qu'à nous mentionner lequel des trois types de connecteurs vous désirez commander: lightning, 30 broches ou micro USB.
 
Les contreparties
1. Pour $10 vous obtenez Un remerciement virtuel de l'équipe de Ugo. 
2. Pour $55 (+frais d'envoi) vous achetez 1 Très lève-tôt ORIGINAL Ugo.
3. Pour $65 (+frais d’envoi) vous achetez 1 lève tôt ORIGINAL Ugo. 
4. Pour $70 (+frais d’envoi) vous achetez 1 ORIGINAL Ugo.
 

 
 
5. Pour $85 (+frais d’envoi) vous achetez 1 CUSTOM LASER (gravure) Ugo.


 
 
6. Pour $115 (+frais d’envoi) vous achetez 1 EDITION LIMITÉE Ugo.

 
 
7. Pour $165 (+frais d’envoi) vous achetez 1 Trio de ORIGINAL Ugo.

 
 
8. Pour $550 (+frais d’envoi) vous achetez 1 Ensemble de 10 ORIGINAL Ugo.

 
 
9. Pour $2350 (+frais d’envoi) vous achetez 1 Un gros lot de 50 ORIGINAL

 
Puisqu'il s'agit d'une campagne en mode fixe, nous devons atteindre au minimum le montant de 35 000$ en 50 jours.  Cet argent sera nécessaire pour préparer les moules de la production et pour l'achats de composantes électroniques.  Pas d'argent... pas de Ugo. en juillet 2013!
 
IMPORTANT:
Lors du paiement par PayPal, veuillez additionner les frais d'expédition au montant de votre achat selon la contribution choisi. Voir l'exemple qui suit. Dans ce cas, au montant de 55$ vous additionez 15$ (frais d'expédition pour le Canada) = 70$
Merci beaucoup!


 
Autres manières de collaborer au succès
Vous souhaitez nous aider à rendre ce projet viable?  Faites-le savoir à vos proches et amis! 
Envoyez un courriel, utilisez Twitter, LinkedIn ou Facebook pour partager notre campagne! Appellez-les! Si vous aimez notre vidéo: partagez-la!
http://youtu.be/v1i0ZPkQvhk
Copiez ce lien ici bas pour partager la campagne.
http://igg.me/at/Ugobymezzamorphos
Nous avons besoin de votre soutien pour faire de ce projet un grand succès!
Merci!
 
Aucun chaton n'a été maltraité durant la réalisation de notre vidéo de campagne.

story:
Summary

Our Unrupt prototype coded initially by Tim Panton who is showing it on his iPad in the video, demonstrates that it is possible for people in a conversation to speak thoughts at the same time and not interrupt each other or lose an idea. The image shows the Unrupt prototype running on an Android phone; more detail on our Github page.

This and the ability to maintain a continuing conversation seamlessly though intermittently, as shown in our experimental Verbol voice Studio, provide us with new freedoms and reliefs by freeing our minds of clutter and stress while improving our understanding of each other. 

Brian Reynolds is a Systems Designer who, after founding and growing a software company for 20 years, has been pioneering new technology and "living in the future" using his prototypes, leading to a series of patented inventions. Brian's son James has been involved with Brian's inventions and is now in high tech himself in San Francisco. We are offering a commercial opportunity to open source developers to distribute Apps embodying our inventions.

What We Need & What You Get 

We wish to encourage early adoption of our technology by the open source community. Open source development itself and personal use we regard as non-commercial which is free of any patent license charge, so you are welcome to start coding right away.  Our source code of the Unrupt demo is freely available and MIT licensed on public Github. Brian's IP holding company Family Systems Ltd is a member of the Linux Foundation which also supports open source.

In respect of commercial deployment of Apps you develop, our Unrupt patents have granted Family Systems an exclusive right to exclude others from using our Unrupt inventions in exchange for their publication for others to learn from. We wish to share our inventions with you now at a very reasonable cost, so that you can distribute Apps embodying our inventions commercially with no royalty obligation to us. This means your development can support itself by App sales without extra hurdles, 

Two US patents are issued and a first European patent has been granted and filed in France, Germany, and the UK. Continuations have been filed in the USA and Europe; the issued patents are listed below. We hereby promise to take no enforcement action on this family of patents against any purchaser of the Proprietor Patent License perk in this campaign from receipt of payment for the life of the patents.

US9087521  Speak while listening without missing anything

US9538129  Pause the audio from someone else while speaking

EP3017589  France, Germany and UK with claims similar to US9087521

To distribute your Apps, the Unrupt Proprietor License perk enables a sole proprietor who may be a developer, or close to someone able to make an App, an unlimited royalty-free license locked in at early bird pricing. This applies for sale of Apps in any quantity, for the remaining life of the patents approximately 15 years.   After the early bird period, we expect pricing  to increase dramatically or bear royalties.  

If you create useful code and contribute it as open source on Github and Family Systems adopts it in our distribution, then users of that distribution will also be patent protected by the licenses back from Family Systems prior patent families, and the many patents pooled by all the members of the Linux Foundation that are within the Linux System Definition.  This assembles for a Family Systems distribution of the Unrupt open source project the kind of patent protection available to Corporations.

The Linux Foundation has confirmed that our Unrupt patents fall outside of Linux and are unlikely to be included in the Linux System Definition in the foreseeable future, so our patents are not in the Linux pool. We support open source so have decided to make open source development itself free and offer this Proprietary License for distribution.

By accepting a Proprietor License now, you are helping the continuing expansion and maintenance of the Unrupt patent family from which we all benefit. The funds will go firstly to the attorneys and national patent offices in the USA, UK and Europe where we hold the five issued Unrupt Patents and are continuing to add to them. After that to enhancing our open source Unrupt demo, so it becomes the seed of a lot more helpful innovation.   

In parallel to this initiative to involve the open source community we are preparing for Corporate Licensing. We have registered the Unrupt patents on the IPwe Blockchain Patent Registry and are considering their licensing platform. It is our intention that if open source developers meet over the web and decide to form a Corporation together, then their Proprietor Licenses can be credited to a Corporate License. 

We also wish to make it possible for open source developers who work with our software to be empowered and rewarded for assisting Corporations in technology transfer of our inventions into their existing services.

The Impact

We are achieving new freedoms and benefits in human communication that have to be experienced and are truly wonderful. We have pioneered in Vv Studio seamless integration of web voicechat and telephony. Vv Studio is in client server mode with a combination of three open source servers for web, voice and chat with a lot of our code to integrate them.

With the availability now of WebRTC the same or better results can be achieved in the browser and operate peer to peer. The development opportunity is to implement the innovations pioneered in VvStudio in peer to peer mode which is more secure and scalable, starting from the Unrupt open source demo as our seed.

Brian is the inventor named in the Unrupt patents.  Brian's career includes founding and growing a software company for 20 years which has since become a billion dollar enterprise. Since then Brian has been conducting R&D with the help of consultants to develop and maintain prototypes and patent attorneys to write patent claims, all of whose creative excellence and hard work Brian acknowledges and is very thankful for, as it has empowered us along the way in our journey of discovery and invention,

These efforts achieved three families of patents which have been sold with a license back to Family Systems, our IP holding company.  Since their publication, all our earlier inventions have become widely adopted and we use them every day. For instance Google Docs for our Interactive Web Pages that we patented in 1996, WhatsApp voice messaging as a primitive form of voicechat which we patented in our Web Collaboration family in 2002 and pioneered in Vv Studio, and Chordify for play-along also patented in 2002. 

It seems that the world inevitably catches up with our inventions but after typically a 15 year wait. The results are sold by Corporations who implement their services on open source components, but the open source programmers who volunteer their effort and excellence do not always get a share of that revenue.

The Unrupt patents for enhanced conferencing are our fourth and most recent patent family, and build on the insights derived from using implementations of our earlier inventions. The Unrupt inventions are so new, fundamental, widely applicable and far-reaching that we have decided to license the patents instead of selling. This time we also want to accelerate the process of adoption of the Unrupt inventions by providing business opportunities to open source developers, and make this synergistic with the big corporations.

Our  past contributors are all remarkably gifted and are occupied in other important projects.  We hope your talents and energy will add to what we have started in the Unrupt open source project so the inventions we have pioneered can be enjoyed in innovations delivered by your Apps. We have an open source Unrupt prototype on our github repository; here is the Unrupt demo Readme page. This prototype enables us to experience talking our thoughts over each other without interrupting or losing anything; "automated politeness", in an experimental setting so the buffering is made visible. 

Risks & Challenges 

Because our inventions have never been experienced before, our challenge is to help people realise they want them. Therefore this first offering is to the open source community to create and profit from Apps embodying our inventions that can popularise the new experiences. 

This campaign is our starting point in creating awareness. We are keeping the campaign itself short in order to move to in-demand funding so that we can keep the early bird pricing going as necessary past the maximum campaign length until sufficient momentum is achieved.

Our Roadmap includes many improvements to the Unrupt demo to become more useful which can transfer into your Apps. As we create demand to draw our inventions into existing commercial services, we wish open source developers to also benefit from assisting technology transfer into Corporations.

Other Ways You Can Help 

Our Proprietor Patent License provides the opportunity for an individual to be the proprietor of an App business with our Unrupt open source webapp to seed its development. We are happy for you to copy our webapp code into your App and improve it to work better on its platform. 

Developers are thereby incentivized to earn from their efforts by selling great Apps embodying our inventions royalty free, so that the world can get to experience them for the first time in the open source domain. 

While we encourage you to sell Apps through any Appstore for platforms you are competent in, we wish to stay focussed on continuing to advance our underlying unique technology by cross-platform webapp, without the distraction of specific platform considerations. We will be delighted to cooperate with holders of the Proprietary License and anticipate we can together achieve the advances depicted in our Roadmap and enable their wide availability through your Apps and the Unrupt open source project.

If not a developer yourself you may know someone with the ability to create life improving Apps; if so please share. For instance Brian would like an Unrupt App to get over the problems we have with Mute and web notifications in our webapp on iOS, and to interoperate with the Phone App and would be happy to pay a dollar or more for each of his family's installs from an App Store:)

For instance Brian would like an Unrupt App to get over the problems we have with Mute and web notifications in our webapp on iOS, and to interoperate with the Phone App and would be happy to pay a dollar or more for each of his family's installs from an App Store:)

story:
The current way to disinfect contact lenses is to place the lens in the palm of the hand then rub and rinse. Obviously this is impractical, time consuming and risky; that’s why 93% of contact lens wearers are not doing it according to eye care company, Alcon. This is a big no-no, which could potentially lead to blindness! 



Swoosh is the first ever contact lens case that “supercharges” the contact lens solution, helping to safely clean and disinfect your contact lenses. Having cleaner contact lenses reduces the chance of getting an infection and also makes them more comfortable to wear!


With eye doctors urging lens wearers to be scrupulous about cleaning their contact lenses, especially after the recent news of a girl who lost her sight due to lack of contact lens hygiene, and with recent studies concluding newer approaches aimed at improving compliance are urgently needed, we knew something needed to be done!

As long time contact lens wearers, we thought it was time to put these problems behind us, so we created Swoosh - The Contact Lens Case That Cleans!

Simply fill up the lens baskets with your preferred contact lens solution, place lenses in and turn on. That’s it! What makes it so effective is that this innovative contact lens case has lens baskets that rapidly reciprocate, creating a powerful yet gentle agitation within the contact lens solution. This agitation is very effective at safely cleaning and disinfecting contact lenses. 

Swoosh has also been designed to allow easy, cost effective lens basket replacement. Dirty contact lens cases are another leading cause of serious eye infections resulting in the American Optometrist Association recommending lens case replacement every 3 months!

No problem! Simply remove the rubber feet, press them firmly into the lens baskets and replace the lid. Swoosh is now ready to go on the road with you. 

Swoosh has also been designed to be easily personalized and customized! Simply remove the bottom plate, slide off the clear protective layer, then decorate and make it your own!

We've spent months researching different potential ways and mechanisms that could be used as a way to disinfect contact lenses. We then spent months designing and developing the concept. After we felt the design was sound we spent thousands of our own dollars prototyping, testing and refining the concept. It wasn't easy but the result, we believe, is an amazing product that no contact lens wearer should be without!

We will then send production samples of Swoosh out for external beta testing and torture testing for strength and durability. Once we feel 100% sure we've nailed everything, mass production will begin and we expect to deliver Swoosh to you April 2015.

    Risks & Challenges

    As a former Director of Product Development for a publicly traded company, Mark knows what it takes to deliver a great product on time. Many months have been spent on designing, testing, and refining the design. The manufacturer has already been selected and the samples you see in the photos and videos work great and look fantastic, so we won't need to waste time tweaking the design.

    However, every project carries with it certain risks. The most common risks are potential delays in tooling, obtaining raw materials, packaging, and shipping. While we feel like we have reduced these variables as much as possible, they can never be completely eliminated.

    We feel our experience and familiarity with our manufacturer and the product development process gives us a unique skill set in handling unexpected problems. Most importantly, we will make sure to give frequent updates about progress so you'll always be informed about the status of the project. We think you'll find our transparency to be a breath of fresh air.

    The Team

    Mark Chepurny has numerous years of experience and success in designing and bringing to market new products.  He is an award winning designer with over 30 patents pending or issued. He has had products featured on popular TV shows, evening news and major newspapers. 

    Craig Benton has many years of marketing and social media experience coupled with graphic and website design. He also gained significant operations and manufacturing experience from his previous management roles. 

    Both are contact lens wearers and childhood friends with a passion for getting Swoosh to market.

    FAQ

    What type of contact lenses Can SWOOSH be used with?

    At this point, we have tested Swoosh to ensure it's safe for use with soft contact lenses only. If our crowdfunding campaign is successful, we will look at completing Gas Permeable testing.

    What type of battery does SWOOSH use?

    Swoosh operates on a CR123A Lithium Battery. High powered and long lasting, this battery easily out performs AA batteries in both power and number of uses before needing replaced. 

    Where can I purchase CR123 Batteries?

    CR123 batteries are a common battery that can be purchase at most big box stores like Walmart or Best Buy, however, we found purchasing from an online retailer like www.batterybuyer.com or www.batteryjunction.com to be the most cost effective.

    What material is SWOOSH made of?

    The Lens Baskets will be made from Polypropylene which is commonly used for medical plastic items and many other contact lens cases. It's also a UL listed material, so we know it’s safe. The Top and Bottom plates will be made from Chrome Plated steel which provides strength and a quality feel along with a great aesthetic. 

    Where can I find the referenced statistics?

    Please visit the News and Info section of our website at http://www.swooshlenscase.com/News-Info.html. There you will find links to all of the cited and referenced statistics and materials.

    Do I need to continue rubbing my lenses?

    If you are among the few that diligently rub their lenses and find this method works, don’t stop. Your eyes are to important. Use swoosh as a means to further reduce your chance of infection and increase comfort.  However, as a high percentage of contact lens wearers do not rub their lenses clean, we invented Swoosh. Contact lens wearers need to have available to them another method of getting their lenses clean other then the impractical, time consuming and often ignored manual rubbing method. 

    How much does shipping cost?

    Shipping costs varies depending on the perk you selected and your location.   Each perk lists the shipping cost that needs to be added to your contribution via Paypal. If you feel that you can get a better rate on shipping we are more then willing to work with you in an effort to reduce the shipping costs!

    PLEASE NOTE: Duties and taxes may be charged by customs officials in your country. As such, they are beyond our control. You are responsible for duties, taxes, and any other charges that your country chooses to impose for the import.

story:
Thanks for being an active user of Arduino Total Control App. The objective of this campaign is to raise funds to support the extensive programming needed for the following improvements (check bold comments for done items)

1) IP Camera support. Using this you will be able to set up a window in the app and rout to your IP camera of preference. DONE

2) Improve Layout building experience. Create items dynamically, rather than hiding and showing them. DONE

3) New tag "<Vibr00:1" will be supported to make the phone vibrate at Arduino's will.. DONE

4) Enable multi-connection when using WiFi/Ethernet communications. This will allow you to connect to more than one WiFi/Ethernet enabled device at a time.

5) Enable an option to hide the ATC action bar, so you can create a fully customized GUI. 

6) Detailed Video Tutorials for using each of the unique app characteristics.

  a) Turning "on" and "off" and LED

  b) Sending sensor data to app..

  c) Changing image states according to sensor data.

  d) Changing image and button states according digital output states.

  e) Using Accelerometer Data.

  f) Using Seek bar data and setting seek bar data according Arduino values.

  g) Using Touch Pad Data.

  h) Controlling DC Motors using Seek bars, Touch Pads, Accelerometer Data and Buttons.

  i) Controlling Servo motors using Seek bars, Touch Pads, Accelerometer Data and Buttons.

7) Provide in app common used image gallery (Three state pictures)

8) As a bonus for the Free version, reduce advertisement rate by 50%.

9) Spanish Translation of the App (and open to other translations)

story:
AKAREL - Android and Arduino hardware platform

AKAREL is a hardware development kit that integrates Android ARM Cortex A7 and Arduino ATmega328p on a single board with touch screen and free software.

Prototyping phase finished. 

Ready for manufacturing!

Support us by purchasing one of the first devices!

The Dream - Product for Hobbyists/Hackers

Our dream is to build a development kit that can be used by Android and Arduino hobbyists around the world to implement their ideas that require a touch screen interface.

There are tons of development kits around, but none of them is actually a complete solution which can be used in the real world. Some development kits are missing displays or touch, others use obscure software stacks. We would like to bring something to the world that has not been here yet. Imagine implementing your hack ideas within hours instead of days like you've been doing until now.

Do you want to build a fancy door locker, your own home automation or something else that requires a touch input?

We think our product AKAREL is the best fit for you. Do not hesitate and see the product specs, videos and our prototypes.


AKAREL Description

AKAREL comes in two slightly different models AKAREL7 (7 inch display) and AKAREL22 (22 inch display).

Please note that AKAREL7 features an industrial grade projected capacitive multi touch connected via I2C and AKAREL22 features a USB connected capacitive single touch.

AKAREL integrates Android OS running on ARM Cortex A7 interconnected via UART with Arduino software running on  ATmega 328p.

Integration and connection of both chips on one PCB brings you the following advantages:

  1. Best graphic and user experience of Android OS UI. 
  2. Fast application development of Android OS - use of java libraries, emulator etc. 
  3. Network connectivity problem solved - forget WiFi modules kernel hacking. Just connect AKAREL to WiFi like you are used to doing with your phone. Please note that AKAREL features also an Ethernet connector.
  4. Universe of libraries from the Arduino community that speed up your low level GPIO programming. Forget about writing a kernel module just to move one pin up. Just send the command from Android to Arduino via UART to do so.

AKAREL7 has the best class 7" multitouch touch screen. The utilized projected capacitive touch technology (PCT) allows to operate the touch screen with your fingers or even with your gloves on. More over PCT works when it is wet and can sustain scratches. We have spent quite a lot of time choosing the right touch and this is the one that is going to work all the time and is highly durable.

AKAREL Possible Uses

AKAREL is a perfect fit for the following applications:
  • Smart home/Home automation/Home security system
  • Kiosks or Payment terminals
  • Smart devices connected to the Internet - i.e. washer machine, refrigerators etc..
  • Heating systems control
  • And thousands of devices waiting for you to invent them!

Progress, Plan and Current Status

Prototyping phase finished. Ready for manufacturing!

Latest Status

  • 10.2.2014 - Indiegogo campaign start. - DONE
  • 1.9.2013 - 1.2.2014 - Prototyping, hardware and software hacking, see the photos in the gallery to veiw all our prototypes. - DONE
The Plan
  • 3.3.2014 - CE mark certification.
  • 4.3.2014 - Ordering components for April batch (Displays, Touches, CPUs etc.).
  • 1.4.2014 - PCB manufacturing for April batch start.
  • 1.4.2014 - Metal parts manufacturing for April batch start.
  • 10.4.2014 - Indiegogo campaign end
  • 11.4.2014 - Ordering components for June batch (Displays, Touches, CPUs etc.)
  • 12.4.2014 - Metal parts manufacturing for July batch start.
  • 14.4.2014 - Final assembly of April batch(frames and PCBs put together).
  • 21.4.2014 - April Batch shipping.
  • 22.4.2014 - PCB manufacturing for July batch start.
  • 15.5.2014 - Final assembly of July batch(frames and PCBs put together).
  • 10.6.2014 - July Batch shipping.

We have concluded the prototypes stage and we have got the final product. We are ready to start buying components and begin manufacturing.

Your Contribution

We are NOT looking for money to support the run of our office or pay the phones.

We NEED your contributions only for the product manufacturing expenses (manufacturing the final PCBs, purchasing displays and other components). So when you purchase a perk you will receive one of the first devices.

Our modest goal is to manufacture one batch of 200pcs of AKAREL, but of course we hope for more pieces - that depends on YOU! :)

You can also help us by spreading the word about this campaign to your friends.

And all the contributors' names will be written on the final product!


AKAREL Hardware Specification

CPU - 1GHz Allwinner A20 dual-core ARM Cortex-A7 processor.
MCU - 16 MHz ATmega 328p
RAM - 1 GB
Internal Flash - 4 GB


Peripherals and capabilities:

  • 7" or 22" LCD display (800x480 or 1680x1050) connected via LVDS
  • 7" or 22" capacitive touch (7" projected capacitive dualtouch or 22" capacitive singletouch)
  • 2xUSB 2.0 host
  • 1xUSB 2.0 micro OTG
  • 1xUART RS232-12V
  • 1xUART TTL
  • Arduino 5V compatible headers with GPIOs (A0-A5, D0-D13, etc)
  • Arduino ICSP
  • WiFi b/g/n
  • Ethernet 100Mbit
  • Built in microphone
  • Built in speaker
  • Built in 10W amplifier for external speakers.

Dimensions:

  • AKAREL7 - 175mm x 115mm x 45mm
  • AKAREL22 - 500mm x 325mm x 45mm

What else comes with the package:

  • External Power supply 12V (2A).
  • Metal box and mounting plates
  • Paper with login information to the software portal (Git,wiki, bugtracker, forum etc)


AKAREL Software Specification

With the AKAREL kit everyone gains GIT repository access to the following:

  • Uboot source code 
  • Linux kernel source (3.4.39)
  • Finetuned Android OS sources (4.2.2)
  • Arduino firmware sources 
  • Arduino tools (i.e. avrdude) compiled for android.
  • Example applications sources

More software:

  • Download access to virtual machine image with pre-installed tools enabling you to start modifying the code right away.
  • Scripts that compile entire thing (uboot, kernel, android, arduino)

Our philosophy is that everything should work out of the box and that includes the software stack.

We want you to concentrate on writing an application not on spending time to make the basic things work. We have done it for you already. And if you want to dive deeper and modify the Linux kernel or Android OS...Why not? You have all the sources available for you to change and compile.

In case you want to modify the kernel or Android OS faster we have something for you.

In order to save you from the hell of installing all the toolchain (correct version of gcc, libs, headers, automake, make, java, you name it) we have prepared a Ubuntu virtual machine for you which may be downloaded and which has all this toolchain preinstalled so that you can start recompiling your complete stack within a few minutes.


Package Contains

Photo - AKAREL7


Photo - AKAREL22





FAQ

1. How do i put my Arduino software/firmware on the chip?

There are 3 ways:

  1. You can use standard ICSP header which is present on the board using Arduino IDE.
  2. Over the micro USB cable from Arduino IDE. Just replace avrdude executable on your computer with our script (part of the software package) that facilitates adb commands.
  3. You can use our sample android application that uploads hex files  using avrdude.

2. AKAREL7's price seems to be high for me, why is that?

  • We are trying our best to push the price as low as possible. But until we have some solid volumes it is hard. 
  • Most of the development kits are cheap because they don't contain expensive stuff like displays, touchscreens, audio amplifiers
  • Also the price is partially high due to the touchscreen we use. But believe us our projected capacitive touch is very durable and it is industrial grade. We didn't want to use a cheap Chinese touch that would stop working with the first scratch. 

3. Can I completely hide the Android System and Navigation Bars?

Yes, we have already done that. This is a common requirement to block a user from switching between apps. It is simple you will find it in the sample apps. 

4. Android 4.4 (Kitkat) support?

Currently no plans. We have to wait for a chip vendor to come with the support first (GPU drivers, kernel, etc.)

5. What USB devices are supported?

This depends on the kernel configuration. USB mass storage, mouse, keyboard, webcam, USB to serial, USB to LPT should work out of the box with the default configuration. If you find out that something is not enabled by default, just change the configuration and recompile kernel.

6. How is the touch calibration done?

Software for touch calibration is included. 

7. 3G/LTE support?

Currently out of scope. Networking is supported only via WiFi or Ethernet. We recommend to use WiFi tethering  from another phone if you really need to be connected via a cell network. It should be possible to use 3G USB stick, but currently, this has not been tested.

8. Camera support?

Currently out of scope. You will need to use a USB webcam. At this moment Microsoft LifeCam HD-6000 rendering into Android SurfaceView has been successfully tested, see the sample apps. But it should work with others too. It all depends on the webcam support in the Linux kernel and V4L.

9. Opensource hardware?

The question of open-sourcing PCB layout has not been resolved in our heads yet. We will reconsider the subject based on the success of this campaign. Possibly yes, we will see...



Who We Are

We are a small start-up company GENERAL BYTES s.r.o. based in the Czech Republic with professionals having more than 20 years of software and hardware experience and one big dream.

Dimensions:



AKAREL7 - 175mm x 115mm x 45mm

AKAREL22 - 500mm x 325mm x 45mm

What else comes with the package:



External Power supply 12V (2A).

Metal box and mounting plates
Paper with login information to the software portal (Git,wiki, bugtracker, forum etc)



AKAREL Software Specification
With the AKAREL kit everyone gains GIT repository access to the following:


Uboot source code 
Linux kernel source (3.4.39)
Finetuned Android OS sources (4.2.2)
Arduino firmware sources 
Arduino tools (i.e. avrdude) compiled for android.
Example applications sources
More software:

Download access to virtual machine image with pre-installed tools enabling you to start modifying the code right away.
Scripts that compile entire thing (uboot, kernel, android, arduino)
Our philosophy is that everything should work out of the box and that includes the software stack.
We want you to concentrate on writing an application not on spending time to make the basic things work. We have done it for you already. And if you want to dive deeper and modify the Linux kernel or Android OS...Why not? You have all the sources available for you to change and compile.
In case you want to modify the kernel or Android OS faster we have something for you.
In order to save you from the hell of installing all the toolchain (correct version of gcc, libs, headers, automake, make, java, you name it) we have prepared a Ubuntu virtual machine for you which may be downloaded and which has all this toolchain preinstalled so that you can start recompiling your complete stack within a few minutes.


Package Contains


Photo - AKAREL7









Photo - AKAREL22













FAQ


1. How do i put my Arduino software/firmware on the chip?
There are 3 ways:


You can use standard ICSP header which is present on the board using Arduino IDE.
Over the micro USB cable from Arduino IDE. Just replace avrdude executable on your computer with our script (part of the software package) that facilitates adb commands.
You can use our sample android application that uploads hex files  using avrdude.



2. AKAREL7's price seems to be high for me, why is that?

We are trying our best to push the price as low as possible. But until we have some solid volumes it is hard. 
Most of the development kits are cheap because they don't contain expensive stuff like displays, touchscreens, audio amplifiers
Also the price is partially high due to the touchscreen we use. But believe us our projected capacitive touch is very durable and it is industrial grade. We didn't want to use a cheap Chinese touch that would stop working with the first scratch. 

3. Can I completely hide the Android System and Navigation Bars?



Yes, we have already done that. This is a common requirement to block a user from switching between apps. It is simple you will find it in the sample apps. 

4. Android 4.4 (Kitkat) support?
Currently no plans. We have to wait for a chip vendor to come with the support first (GPU drivers, kernel, etc.)
5. What USB devices are supported?
This depends on the kernel configuration. USB mass storage, mouse, keyboard, webcam, USB to serial, USB to LPT should work out of the box with the default configuration. If you find out that something is not enabled by default, just change the configuration and recompile kernel.

6. How is the touch calibration done?
Software for touch calibration is included. 


7. 3G/LTE support?
Currently out of scope. Networking is supported only via WiFi or Ethernet. We recommend to use WiFi tethering  from another phone if you really need to be connected via a cell network. It should be possible to use 3G USB stick, but currently, this has not been tested.
8. Camera support?
Currently out of scope. You will need to use a USB webcam. At this moment Microsoft LifeCam HD-6000 rendering into Android SurfaceView has been successfully tested, see the sample apps. But it should work with others too. It all depends on the webcam support in the Linux kernel and V4L.


9. Opensource hardware?
The question of open-sourcing PCB layout has not been resolved in our heads yet. We will reconsider the subject based on the success of this campaign. Possibly yes, we will see...






Who We Are
We are a small start-up company GENERAL BYTES s.r.o. based in the Czech Republic with professionals having more than 20 years of software and hardware experience and one big dream.

story:
Introducing Ja!YouRoam 

 

Ja!YouRoam is an innovative and simple solution for travelers and for people that do not have access to the internet. It allows you to be connected to the fast moving world and keep up to date with the latest news, weather, and other local information – all without data roaming or wifi.

We have recently completed a local version (Android) for Korea and have seen steady growth of users. We have been pleased with the positive feedback, and this has encouraged us to develop an iOS version for the Korean market, which is currently taking place.

The following pictures show screenshots of some of the information provided by the Korean version.  The information can be viewed on any smart device, ie. smartphone or tablet.

 

Key Features

 

 

Reason for innovation

Although many people in the developed world have access to the internet (through cable, wifi or data roaming services), about one third of the world's adult population still have no access to the internet at all. Although, this could be due to the lack of access to PCs or smart devices, there are many areas in the world where the internet is just not available even if you had access to PCs and smart devices (so called "dead zones").

XINESS' latest and patented technology overcomes the lack of internet infrastructure issue by using existing telecommunication infrastructures to provide information to anyone who has a smart device, anywhere, and at anytime. It therefore enables a more connected world.  

In addition, we believe that our technology provides a win-win situation for global telecommunication providers and their customers as it opens up a whole new world of information connectivity. 

 

Development timeline

Why we need funding

 

We need your help so that we can convert our existing version into an English version for the global community (both Android and iOS platforms). In addition, we would like to further enhance the services to include additional technologies such as:
- Internet-free map service, so that you will always know where you are and never be lost
- Cloud based chatting system, so that you can receive any type of social network service contents such as Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, and Tumblr

In addition, part of the funding will be used to find local partners to further enhance the contents delivered to you.

Please help us to help you and others for a better connected world. 

 

Perks

 

 

* Please note that the estimated delivery date for all physical items (excluding the coupon) is April 2017. The coupon will be delivered electronically (either via email or SMS) and is expected to be delivered in late 2017.

 

XINESS' Journey

 

2004-2009, SKT NATE Air Operation and DCMF Application - Development

Apr. 2005, Samsung Electronics MAM Pilot CDS - Development

Oct. 2005, SK MNGP, SKT Melon mBrower - Development

2006-2012, SKT Melon WAP Service -Development and Operation

2007-2011, SK Telecom Movie Coloring ASP System - Development and Operation Service

Jul. 2007, SK Total META Management System - Development

2008-2010, SKT Character SMS Service System - Development and Operation

Sep. 2009, Korea Broadcasting System KBSi Internet Radio - Contents Hub Development

2010-2012, SK C&C PEMS Platform & Acceleration System - Development and Operation

Jun. 2010, SK Broadcasting IPTV Pop-Up Notice - System Development

Jun. 2010, Hanhwa Insurance Application Production and Server System - Development

2011-2012, SKT Movie Coloring MRBT - Maintenance and Operation

Jan. 2011, Ro&Entertainment  MelOn 2.0 Next Generation - Platform Development

Jun. 2011, LG Telecom LG World (App Store) - Reorganization and Development

2012-2014, SKT OneID Customer Center/Certification - Portal System Development

Apr. 2012, Amore Pacific Mobile Office - Development

May 2012, Incross PAS 1, 2 Generation - Development

May 2012, Professional Travel Planning Service GATE7 - Development and Launch

Apr. 2013, SKT T-MAP Handle Service - System Development

Sep. 2014, Samsung Electronics Paper Garden Service - Payment System Development

Jun. 2015, SONY PS4 Game “Ender of Fire” - Development and Launch (North America, Europe, Asia)

Feb. 2016, SONY PS4 Game “Dreamals" - Development and Launch (North America, Europe, Asia)

Jun. 2016, SONY PS4 Game “Dreamals: Dream Quest” - Development and Launch (North America, Europe, Asia)

 

XINESS' Partners

 

We are proud to work with the following partners:

 

Co-Development of smart contents

 

We have also co-developed smart contents with the following global partners:

 

Special thanks to..

 

Andy Ko, August Kim, Junghoon Seo, Saffy Choi, Jungmin Kim, Guentae Ahn, Soonwon Hong, Soojung Lim, Jisoo Kim, Joonho Jung and Thomas Lee - the amazing Ja!YouRoam team. 

 

FAQ

 

Q. Will the service be available in every country?
A. Yes. Once the English version is developed and launched, you will be able to receive your selected information in any country that you travel to.  We intend to expand our services and offer non-English versions with further Indiegogo campaigns following the launch of the English version.

Q. What information is available?
A. Basically, any information that you require can be supported. However, due to our development timeframe, the information initially available will include the latest news, sports news, weather, currency exchange rates, stock market information, local travel information, and emergency contact details. We will continue to expand the type of information available through contacts with local partners. However, if there's a certain information that you require and is not available, let us know so we can deliver it to you.

Q. What is the cost to use this service?
A. We anticipate that the cost to use this service will be free for domestic use, and US$2.00 per day for overseas use, which is significantly less than current data roaming costs. The app itself will be free to download.

Q. How safe is the passport storage feature?
A. Your passport information is encrypted and saved within your smartphone, and not on a server which ensures that the information will never be stolen. Furthermore, you can only decode the passport information using the app with your selected password, which means it is fully secure even if you accidentally lose your smartphone.

Q. When is the coupon valid till?
A. Your coupon is valid for the period stated (1 week, 1 month, etc) beginning on the first day that you activate the service.

Q. I have a one week coupon. What happens if I use it for four days only?
A. Unfortunately, your coupon will expire at the end of the stated period once you activate the service and there is no refund. Therefore, it is highly recommended that you begin to use the service when it is certain that you can use it for the whole period. 

Q. Is the coupon transferable to another person?
A. Yes. Just let us know so that we can alter the coupon details. Please note that it is not transferable once the service has been activated.

Q. What happens if I change my mobile number?
A. Ja!YouRoam sends the information to mobile phones based on your mobile number. Therefore, if you change your mobile number, let us know so that we can redirect the information to your new number.

Q. We are a service provider and would like to send some information to our clients travelling overseas in so called 'dead zones'. Can we use this service?
A. Certainly. We will be introducing a white label corporate platform so businesses and governments can send information to clients anytime and anywhere. Under this deal, customers will be waived the usual daily fees. 

 

Contact

 

For any question related to the Ja!YouRoam Indiegogo campaign, you can contact

jrsupport@xiness.com

story:
What is SonicRobo

SonicRobo is an easy assembly robot for young kids aged 8 or above, no electronics experience or soldering need.

Advantages:

1) Each motors associated with coded wheels.  The Controller can count how many turn to make accurate angle turning.   Coded wheels already install on motor with wires.  User just need to install the motors to the base and connect the wires.

2) Come with Motor driver stand with rainbow jumper wires connected.  Motor driver can be easy installed at the bottom of the robot with 2 screws.   Jumper wires are easy install just next to controller board. 

3) Easy instruction and simplified circuit layout provided.   All wires are clearly labeled with easy jumper plug.  Kids just need to follow pictures to plug in. 

4) Debugging mode installed:  Arduino nano controller came with debugging mode which provides user to check each components working status, from switches to motors. 

5) We provide supporting forum for installation and further development supporting.


It equipped with Arduino Nano controller, Ultra Sonic sensor turning head ( with fun looking ears ), front touch switch, 2 front wheels drive with optic discs to count wheels moving distance.   What the kids need is just a screw driver and a piece of mind.  By following simple assembly hardware assembly direction ( NO SOLDERING NEED), put in just a few jumper wires, batteries and it will be done in minutes.

All Arduino controller boards will come with pre-programmed with our code.  But the kids can modify and upload their own version.   ( Source code will be available for download from our website for all supporters )

With Bluetooth version, it can also be controlled by our Android phone and iPhone App.  All the source code of  Arduino and App will be provided on our website. 

Who are we

We are engineers, designer and teacher.  From experience on teaching young kids on electronics and making creative projects, we know many kids like robots.  But all robot kits in the market are either too expensive or need lot electronics background before the hardware be understood and assembly by the kids.  They need to design a circuit, design components placement, assigns ports and even need to solder log of wires to make it work.  Those robot kits are not for young kids, they are only for young adult with engineering background.


Kids can learn through making their own robot

Therefore, we analysis and understand from the kid's point of view, what is fund, what is easy understanding, what are the basic components and steps to build a robot.   What you can give your kids are not only the robot, but the fun and successful feeling after they complete assembly a robot on their own. 

Thanks for the 3D printer technology, we are able to design and print out all the stands and parts to let the robot be easy assembly and look nice. 




Development flow


Easy installation kit.

An Easy instruction menu, Arduino Nano board and all accessories screws will be included.   All wires are color and stick label clearly and most of them are direct plug next to the controller board with minimum jumper wires. 

 Arduino nano board will be programmed with our demo code and come with USB cable.  User can modify the source code and re-program it easily. 


For lego fans

This kits set include 3 pieces lego brick adapters.  You can design and decorate your own outlook with lego bricks.


More extension

A) A Bluetooth & Audio combined module:  coming out on December, 2014.  It will be fully compatible with  this system and easy plug-and-play.  User can download any wave file through bluetooth directly and store in this module, play directly onboard, speaker included. 
B) Micro SonicRobo clip :  can be installed in front of this robot, user control it through bluetooth. 

 RGB LED dimmer Rainbow color effect on red, green, blue, white, yellow, cyan and magenta. 

We need your supporting:

We definitely need your supporting to bring this products for the public at a reasonable price. 

All the SonicRobo kit will include at least one Arduino sample program.  We are working on more samples program for reference and they will be public for download from our website after this project successfully launch.   Phone App will also be available around December, 2014 for download. 

Perks Detail 
$5 You name will be on our Supporter page at http://SonicRobo.com
Thank you for your supporting!


$12 3D printed  : 1 Sonic Sensor + 1 Bunny or 1 mouse sonic sensor
header / stand in your color choice
( White, Red, Blue, Green or Yellow ).  ( not include ultra Sonic sensor )
You name will be on our Supporter page at http://SonicRobo.com
$12 One Bluetooth module suitable for this SonicRobo and for all Arduino or other controller application.
( delivery by the end of November, 2014 )
You name will be on our Supporter page at http://SonicRobo.com
$16 Sonic Robo T-shirt ( delivery by the end of November )
You name will be on our Supporter page at http://SonicRobo.com
$60 SonicRobo Early bird special
( delivery by the end of October)
One set of SonicRobo with Arduino Nano controller board, select white bunny ears or mouse ear sonic sensor header + one full set of jumper wires.
You name will be on our Supporter page at http://SonicRobo.com
$65 One set of SonicRobo with Arduino Nano controller board and
with Bluetooth module, select white bunny ears or mouse ear sonic sensor header + one full set of jumper wires.
( delivery at the end of October). 
You name will be on our Supporter page at http://SonicRobo.com
$70 One set of SonicRobo with Arduino Nano controller board,
select white bunny ears or mouse ear sonic sensor header + one full set of jumper wires.
( delivery by the end of November, 2014 ) 
You name will be on our Supporter page at http://SonicRobo.com
$75 One set of SonicRobo with Arduino Nano controller board with
Bluetooth BLE  module, select white bunny ears or mouse ear sonic sensor header + one full set of jumper wires.
( delivery by end of November, 2014 )
You name will be on our Supporter page at http://SonicRobo.com
$670  Good choice for school or team project.
10  set SonicRobo with Arduino Nano controller board,
 select white bunny ears or mouse ear sonic sensor header + 10 full set of jumper wires.
( delivery by the end of November, 2014 ) 
You name will be on our Supporter page at http://SonicRobo.com
$720  Good choice for school or team project.
10  set Bluetooth SonicRobo with Arduino Nano controller board, select white bunny ears or mouse ear sonic sensor header + 10 full set of jumper wires.
( delivery by the end of November, 2014 )
You name will be on our Supporter page at http://SonicRobo.com


    Risks & Challenges

1) Need a well Packaging for shipping.

2) Develop better iPhone App and more Android App for the bluetooth control.

3) Develop more add on :- mini robot arm, audio module, easy plug-in for this robot. 


    .

  sensor header + 10 full set of jumper wires.
    ( delivery by the end of November, 2014 )
    You name will be on our Supporter page at http://SonicRobo.com





 Risks & Challenges
 1) Need a well Packaging for shipping.
2) Develop better iPhone App and more Android App for the bluetooth control.
3) Develop more add on :- mini robot arm, audio module, easy plug-in for this robot. 


  

.

story:
The Video Above is our Design in 2012, and for now, We make sure it's the time to show you some thing much cooler.


What is Shieldon Kit?



Shieldon Kit is a magic “toolbox” which can be used as a USB HUB and a screen with HDMI. When you want to show things on your computer to others, Shieldon Kit can offer a convenient and private way. Just connect it with your computer and set it up, it would become your second monitor. And it is an all-in-one kit, with 3 USB ports, it would make your Raspberry Pi, Beagle Bone, even Chrome Box into All-in-one computer. 　


　　

Shieldon Kit has two kinds of screen resolution: 1280*800 and 800*400.

1280*800 enables it to display 720P HD videos, and 800*400 is enough to display Fluent (260P) and Standard (320P) videos.

What could HDMI Port used for?

Shieldon Kit could work with tons of devices which has HDMI Port. 

X-BOX or PS: New Toy with games 

Make Your Game Console more portable.

 

With Digital SLR cameras: Big Choice of Photos

Make your photo more perfect.


DIY Mini  All-in-one Computer


The First Prototype

We made our prototype with 3D Printer and then polish and paint it.  The final product (if the project could get enough money to carry on) must be cooler than this.



Also, due to we want to design the electronics more stable, then we keep the flat cable outside now.

Here is the working photo when the Shieldon Kit connect with the mac book as mirror monitor.


( Actually, the even though the Screen above is 800*480, but it actually much clear than the photo, the result is effected by the camera.)

Here is the video we made at 2012, and the screen of the video is actually 800*480 Pixels. Have a look.


And anything needs a USB HUB You can plug in your keyboard, mouse, development boards or other kits at the same time without pulling out again and again.


 

Timetable for Project S.O.

It usually takes a couple of weeks after a campaign finishes for the Indiegogo funds to come through.

Once they do, we will go ahead with:

1,  Made the Plastic injection mold, and made a cool plastic case and the metal parts.

2, Meanwhile, we would also finish the design of the driver board and make it as the most stable version than ever.

3, Assembling the Shieldon Kit.

4, After test, then Shipping.


Time-line

So a rough idea of the timetable is as follows...

 July 2014  

Indiegogo campaign finish and if the goal is reached, we start working.

the estimate shipping time is the early of 2015, due to the Christmas, but we would try to push it as early as possible. 

So, for now, the estimate shipping date is 

February 2015 —— Kitting and shipping

story:
A Glitter USB Cable Designed For Cool and Fashionable Experience

Universal Serial Bus

This term is the most familiar for all gadget users. For an iPhone, Android, laptop or other PC 
connectivity, this is a hot pluggable cable in daily trends. We developed the new innovative  glittering USB cable to make your workplaces cool and comfortable. 

Product at a glance

The new glittering USB cable we are offering mesmerized your work space with the sparking visuals and advanced functioning. They offer a great compatibility with IOS and Android devices.

Different glittering colors 

Like Red, Blue, Green, Pink and Yellow enhance the look and quality of the cable. The best thing with the lighting cables is that they look cool and fashionable and leave loveable impressions in the eyes of users.

Auto Power Off

When you are in a heavy work just plugged your phone with this charger, be free to work, it will automatically off the power when charge full and saves from reverse charge.

 Auto Wake Up

If you are in a car and want to charge, just put this cable into port and you will find that, the flowing light get auto wake up call and charging starts hassle free.

Auto-Sleep

When charging stops, the flowing light automatically turns off to save power. It shows quick to glitter when device is out of charge and glitter slows down when full of charge.

 

 

Fast Charging

Here the colorful glittering cables have some special attributions for your need:It supports quick charge facility (QC 2.0) and amp type 3.0 which is helpful for charging while traveling and in outings.

Advanced glittering cables such as Micro or Type C/8P  cables make the design smart and much demanding.

 

New improved EL technology sensors for precise detection of leaks and prevent losses at the exact points.

Stretch proof and elastic material,so don't worry if you turn or twist,it will get automatically get restored without cutting.

Green product and environment friendly at different places,exactly causes no damage to the user and place.

Durability is super with a well designed and comfortable TPE material.Comprehensive projection of external stress on internal material makes it damage proof.

The brand quality approved by MFI certification process,which makes it demand among the users to have best in the market.

Manufactured with Anti rusting material,metal plate via nickel plating process.It helps in keeping cable safe in all seasons.The two end injection molding reinforcement design.

Cost & Competitive advantages

The glittering USB cable which glitters with its colorful lights for your IOS  device,iPhone or Android,sends apart all other choices away and proved to be the best option for the household,official and individual use.

Product Gallery

 

Make Glitter a Hit with Family & Friends

story:
Version Italiano >>>

Hi Indiegogo! We are a group of passionate designers from Singapore and Italy.

Our approach towards this design is to simply bring about more convenience to the lives of the people around us. Thus, we present to you, Fold MeTM.

Why is this product necessary?

We realized that there are some common problems for many of us

  • Spending copious amount of time searching for objects in our bags?
  • Thumb drives and keys hidden in nooks and crannies, and are often lost?
  • Trouble finding our phones as they are buried under a pile of documents?
  • Always on-the-go yet a need to clear the table before leaving?
  • A missing 'home' for these essential items is long overdue!

Hence, we decided to design Fold MeTM.

 

Fold MeTM is a portable utility case designed for young adults. With Fold MeTM, house your essential items and carry them wherever you go.  

Fold meTM exudes style and undeniable fashion. It is foldable in multiple configurations, adapting to your various needs and situations.  

Configuration of Fold meTM

Compact and carefully thought out dimensions do not intrude into your daily activities, and portrays a quiet yet assuring presence. 

Fold MeTM also acts as a dock for you to view and access all your items quickly and easily, all within a small footprint.

The Aesthetics

Waterproof Teflon-coated canvas and genuine calf leather are used.

Dimensions (half-folded): 157mm (breadth) x 212mm (length) x 30mm (thickness) 

Net/gross weight: 187/291g

Colours available: Biege, Blue, Red and Dark Grey (NEW!)

 

Why Fund Us?

We believe that there is potential in the market for Fold MeTM. We are confident that we can achieve the goal set and deliver the perks. However, we have limited capital and thus need your help to fund us in the first run of production. With your help, we can turn this into a reality. Your contribution is essential in helping us with the relevant start-up costs and manufacturing for our first batch of production.

Our long term goal is to create a presence for Fold MeTM in the market and subsequently extend our product range. We will be able to provide more variations in terms of colour and other inner configurations to suit different tastes and demography.

We are sincere, help us make this a possibility. 

Meeting Challenges Ahead

Product

We have done due research to ensure that we deliver the best quality product. We have iterated through numerous prototypes and went through lengthy product refinements. Currently, we are at the final refinement stage. We are ready to deliver the best product experience to you.

Manufacturing 

We have consulted a leading local bag manufacturing company and have established a strong working relationship with them. They have understood our position and intent. The stage has been set, we are robustly prepared and eager to move forward.

 

Planned Product Schedule

Apr 2013: Final product refinement

May 2013: Finalize manufacturing faculty

Jun 2013: Begin assembly of first batch

Jul 2013: To ship out the first batch and begin assembly of the second batch

Aug 2013: Ship out second batch

*This schedule is only conditional upon your support!

 

Please support us and take our Indiegogo campaign to the next stage.

You can do so by spreading this message among your family and friends. You can also do so by using the Indiegogo sharing tool. Thank you for spending time reading through our project!

Share it on Facebook

Your help will be greatly appreciated! Thank you!

*Specifications subject to change without prior notice.

 

Q&A

1. What are the shipping charges?

The prices quoted exclude shipping charges. All prices are based on FOB Singapore. We will be shipping via Singapore Post. Do note that we are looking at Standard Regular Mail - Letters/Printed Papers/Small Packets (AIR).

Additional fee of $1.77 USD will be charged for registered mail. Box will be provided. Do note that the gross weight is 291g and the charges for different countries are different.

2. Will the shipping fee be cheaper if i were to purchase more than one?

Yes it will cost less. The charges will go by weight. There will be a one time charge of $1.77 USD for registered mail.

 

3. Can I choose other colours apart from the existing range of options?

It is possible if there is sufficient demand for that colour.

If you have any enquiries, do email us at foldmeorganiser@gmail.com. We will get back to you within 3 working days.

 

Version Italiano

Ciao Indiegogo! Siamo un gruppo di designer provenienti da Singapore e dall’Italia.

In nostro approccio verso il design è semplicemente quello di facilitare la quotidianità delle persone intorno a noi. Per questo vi prestiamo Fold MeTM.

Perchè il nostro prodotto è utile?

Abbiamo compreso che ci sono problemi ricorrenti per molti di noi

  • Impiegare molto tempo alla ricerca dei nostri oggetti bella borsa?
  • Thumb drives e keys che spesso si nascondono e perdono  nei piccoli angoli o fessure?
  • Difficolta' a trovare il cellulare sempre nascosto da mille cose
  • Tutte le volte prima di partire dover riordinare la scrivania da tutti gli oggetti?
  • Tutti questi oggetti necessitano di una “casa” appropriata!

Per questo é nato Fold MeTM.

 

Fold MeTM e' custodia portatile pensata per giovani adulti. Con Fold MeTM, organizza l'essenziale e portalo sempre dove vuoi.

Fold MeTM è un prodotto ricco di design e di stile. Pieghevole in configurazioni multiple, si adatta alle vostre esigenze e a tutte le situazioni.

Configurazioni di Fold meTM

Compatto e attentemente studiato, grazie alla sue dimensioni è estremamemente facile nell’accesso e nell’utilizzo.

 

Fold MeTM funge anche da base grazie alla quale puoi visualizzare e accedere ai tuoi oggetti in modo rapido e semplice, sempre con il minimo ingombro.

L'Estetica

Il prodotto è realizzato grazie ad una Tela impermabile in Teflon con inserti in vera pelle di vitello.

Dimensioni (piegato a metà): 157mm (larghezza) x 212 millimetri (lunghezza) x 30 mm (spessore) 

Peso netto / lordo: 187/291g

Colori disponibili: Biege, blu, rosso e grigio scuro (NOVITA'!)

Perchè sostenere il nostro progetto?

Noi crediamo che Fold MeTM abbia grandi potenzilità sul mercato. Siamo fiduciosi di raggiungere l'obiettivo e pote fornire ai nostri sostenitori il miglior prodotto possibile. Tuttavia, abbiamo capitali limitati e pertanto necessitiamo del vostro aiuto per finanziare la prima esecuzione della produzione. Con il vostro aiuto, potremmo essere in grado di trasformare questo in realtà. Il vostro contributo è essenziale per aiutarci con i relativi costi di alla produzione.

 

Il nostro obiettivo a lungo termine è quello di creare una presenza per Fold MeTM sul mercato e successivamente ampliare la nostra gamma di prodotti. Questo ci permetterebbe di fornire maggiori variazioni in termini di colore e altre configurazioni interne per soddisfare diversi gusti ed esigenze.

Aiutateci a rendere vera questo una possibilità.

Le sfide che ci attendono 

Prodotto

Abbiamo condotto una lunga ricerca di mercato per potervi fornire un prodotto di grande qualità. Perseguito poi grazie alla sperimentazione di numerosi prototipi e attraverso lunghi affinamenti del prodotto. Ora siamo pronti a offrirvi la migliore esperienza e il miglior servizio grazie a Fold MeTM.

Produzione

Abbiamo consultato una società locale leader nella produzione di borse e abbiamo stabilito un forte rapporto di collaborazione con loro. Con loro abbiamo impostato l’intento della nostra fabbricazione e la volontà di continuare con il nostro lavoro per perseguire l’obbiettivo designato.

 

Piano di previsione produzione

Apr 2013: Affinare del prodotto finale

Maggio 2013: Completare la fabbricazione

Giugno 2013: Inizio assemblaggio della prima serie

Luglio 2013: Spedire la prima serie e iniziare il montaggio della seconda

Agosto 2013:Spedire la seconda produzione

*Questo programma potra essere conseguito solo a seconda del vostro sostegno!

 

Vi preghiamo si sostenerci  e portare così la nostra campagna IndieGoGo alla fase successiva.

Potete farlo diffondendo questo messaggio tra i vostri amici e parenti. Indiegogo offer anche la possibilità di farlo utilizzando lo strumento di condivisione.
Vi ringraziamo di aver  per aver prestato attenzione al nostro progetto.

Condividi su on Facebook

Il vostro aiuto sarà molto apprezzato! Grazie!

*Le modifiche specifiche non sono soggette a necessario preavviso.

 

Q&A

1. Quali sono le spese di spedizione?

I prezzi indicati non includono le spese di spedizione. Tutti i prezzi sono basati su FOB Singapore (gratis all'interno di Singapore). La spedione verrò effettuata tramite  Singapore Post. Ciò comporta una standard Regular Mail - Lettere / fogli stampati / pacchetti di piccole dimensioni (AIR).

Il supplemento di $ 1,77 USD verrà addebitato per posta raccomandata e varia a seconda del paese di destinazione.

2. Può la tassa di trasporto diventare più conveniente se dovessi acquistare più di uno?

Sì, costerà meno. Le spese andranno in base al peso. Ci sarà comunque uno standard di $ 1,77 USD per posta raccomandata.

3. Posso scegliere altri colori oltre l'attuale gamma disponibile?

E 'possibile se esiste una domanda sufficiente per quel colore.

Se avete domande, contattateci all'indirizzo e-amil foldmeorganiser@gmail.com. Ci metteremo in contatto con voi entro 3 giorni lavorativi.

Return To Top (Ritorna all'inizio)
