1. Quali sono le spese di spedizione?
I prezzi indicati non includono le spese di spedizione. Tutti i prezzi sono basati su FOB Singapore (gratis all'interno di Singapore). La spedione verrò effettuata tramite  Singapore Post. Ciò comporta una standard Regular Mail - Lettere / fogli stampati / pacchetti di piccole dimensioni (AIR).
Il supplemento di $ 1,77 USD verrà addebitato per posta raccomandata e varia a seconda del paese di destinazione.
2. Può la tassa di trasporto diventare più conveniente se dovessi acquistare più di uno?
Sì, costerà meno. Le spese andranno in base al peso. Ci sarà comunque uno standard di $ 1,77 USD per posta raccomandata.
3. Posso scegliere altri colori oltre l'attuale gamma disponibile?
E 'possibile se esiste una domanda sufficiente per quel colore.
Se avete domande, contattateci all'indirizzo e-amil foldmeorganiser@gmail.com. Ci metteremo in contatto con voi entro 3 giorni lavorativi.
Return To Top (Ritorna all'inizio)

story:
WORKS WITH: iPhones, Androids, Windows Phones, iPods, iPads, Android Tablets, Nooks, etc.

WHAT IS IT?

EDGE><EDGE attaches to any tablet or notebook computer and holds any smart phone, iPod, or other handheld device in the perfect position, which of course is Edge to Edge. Whether it's an iPhone, Android, or Windows phone, it makes obvious sense when you see it in operation, yet EDGE><EDGE essentially disappears when not in use. (Level I = solid color aluminum insert on the back. Level II = CUSTOM GRAPHIC aluminum insert on the back).

 

 

HOW DOES IT WORK?

EDGE><EDGE is spring loaded and utilizes rubber pads and special gripping ridges that in combination hold any size smart phone with virtually any case very securely. It holds so well you can typically leave your phone attached to your Tablet or Notebook as you move around in your world!

EDGE><EDGE perfectly positions your phone for keeping it both accessible and plugged into your Notebook USB port so it's always fully charged when you need to hit the road or when you're on a plane.

 

 

XBOX SmartGlass, launching alongside Windows 8 on Oct 26, 2012, allows users to view content on multiple devices, and to control or enhance that experience. Along with Windows 8 support, SmartGlass apps will be available soon for iOS and Android, according to Microsoft. To really take full advantage of this new technology, you're definitely going to want one or more EDGE><EDGE devices (One or two each for your laptop and tablet...left side/right side)!

There are also programs like iDisplay, ScreenSlider and others available for iPhones and Androids that allow you to use your smartphone as an extended 2nd screen for your computer or tablet. Clearly the technology is moving rapidly toward the EDGE><EDGE scenario as a next leap forward technologically.

Joining these devices makes it easier for your eyes and fingers to access these separate...but inter-related...windows to your world of data.

The first time you rotate your tablet and see both screens re-orient in unison, you know your world just got better!

 

CUSTOMIZE YOUR EDGE><EDGE

 

Level I Customization

Choose from a Black or White core device and one of 3 colors for the Aluminum plate (Shown here on a black prototype):

 

 

Level II Customization

You can add ANY graphic look to the die-cut aluminum plate as the ultimate level of customization. You upload your graphic, per our specs, keeping in mind there's a left-hand or right-hand choice to be made, and the fact that the finger-pull notch needs to be considered in regards to your graphic. The quality is amazing! There is a good price break for buying 10 or more, ideal for your company logo. Here are some sample ideas:

 

 

HOW DOES IT ATTACH?

After testing many different options, 1/16" thick high performing double-sided foam tape was selected for attachment. Four small squares of the tape hold the device securely and also provide for surfaces (See illustration below) that may not be completely flat. Any thin piece of plastic can be used to slice through the foam to remove EDGE><EDGE if desired.

 

An after-market option (NOT INCLUDED) I've found that also works very well are 3M Command Strips (Medium size) for hanging windows (Shown in video below). They come in (Click following links to view) black or white, let you attach/detach EDGE><EDGE as needed, and pull-tabs make it very easy to completely remove the strips without residue. The strips work like Velcro, only better. It takes two of the Command Strips (two on the back of EDGE><EDGE & two on the device it's attaching to), which are approx. 2.75" x 0.75", running perpendicular to the length of EDGE><EDGE. I investigated including Command Strips with EDGE><EDGE, but they're proprietary & our manufacturer could not source them, though I recommend them if you desire to have EDGE><EDGE be easily removable. I considered trying to purchase them & add them post-manufacturing, but that just drives the cost up further & not everyone would benefit from them, so I'm opting to leave it to the end user to buy them if desired. It's cheaper & they're everywhere (Home Depot, Menard's, Office stores, etc). Their only drawback is they add some thickness (The foam tape provided with EDGE><EDGE is 1/16", the Command Strip is 3/16").

CLICK HERE TO SEE VIDEO OF ATTACHING USING COMMAND STRIPS

 

CUSTOM GRAPHICS REQUIREMENTS

Please submit your custom graphic in .tif, .jpg, or .eps.

If logos are being provided in vector format we can accept them in .eps format (please make sure to convert all the text to outlines/curves) & submit the logo with a 5” x 2.525” rectangle around it.

Graphic should be 5” x 2.525” x  at 600 dpi. This artwork size includes a 1/16” bleed all around which will not print on the Plate. Plate size is 2.4” x 4.875”

For ideal results the image must be 1515 pixels high x 3000 pixels wide at 600 dpi. We can go as low as 300 dpi  with acceptable results which is 788 pixels high x 1500 pixels wide.

If images are not to the above standards we will crop them to our discretion and will print them at the resolution you provide.

Keep in mind when choosing an image that there is a finger notch on the side of the plate that will be cut from your image, and the fact that the device/notch can be left-handed or right-handed.

 

CAN I GET ONE IN TIME FOR CHRISTMAS?

Unfortunately, we can't send you an EDGE><EDGE to be given as a Christmas present for 2012. However, the next best thing is something I've received or given several times over the years from family members,  a GIFT NOTICE! It's not a redeemable Gift Certificate, but a card you print or email them that lets them know that you're giving them one of the very first EDGE><EDGE devices, and you will deliver it to them as soon as you receive it (Approx. April 2013). I know I'd be glad to get one!! I created a sample below & will make it downloadable, or you can make your own.

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

I have 20 yrs of extensive experience as a leader in I.T., involving countless projects totaling many millions of dollars, establishing a proven track record of accomplishing and usually exceeding the goal. I also have several inventions currently at various stages of development. I have close relationships with highly qualified Engineers, Designers, highly qualified Business & Financial Advisors, and have worked through the Design and Development process with a major State University on several of my inventions. Through the Engineering Firm I work with, manufacturing is lined up and ready to begin the tooling process as soon as funding is received through IndieGoGo. I'm working with a well known and highly capable Custom Engraving company here in West Michigan that will create the amazingly crisp and clear custom aluminum inserts and optional custom graphics and engraving offered in this project. These teams of experienced and highly qualified professionals are ready to begin fulfilling orders for EDGE><EDGE. All we need is your participation and support!

story:
A smart bluetooth time-lapse device that control your DSLR camera through your iPhone and Android phone! And much more ways waiting for you to play and explore! Our homepage

Jump to: Why Get REMO? | App | FAQs 

REMO

REMO is a device that plugs into your camera and allows you to take timelapses. This kind of device is called intervalometer. REMO is powered by bluetooth low energy, which means you can remote control your camera in your iPhone and Android phones, meanwhile REMO is also a lost and found tracker preventing you losing your phone, camera or something valuable. It is simple and easy to use.

iPhone app have been designed and coded for REMO (we will submit to apple store recently). Android app is under development now (we would prefer to use the crowd funding to hire someone professional to develop the app). Once connect REMO with the app, you can program the settings and upload your settings to the REMO, let REMO doing the work. But first you should plug your REMO into camera trigger port through trigger cable.(Supported camera)

About battery life, REMO can work for 3-4 month with one battery, emitting commands for more than 10 thousand times. You can use REMO to take photos over a long time span.



Why REMO?

  • 100 feet wireless remote shutter
  • Time-lapse photograph, Bulb
  • Remote control your mobile phones' camera through REMO's button
  • Never lose your smartphones and cameras, cause of the lost and find function of the REMO (attached to your valuables)
  • With trigger cable the REMO is stable, reliable than IR powered intervalometers
  • Not just for time-lapse: Stop motion, group shots......

1. Just use your iPhone and Android smart phone to control your DSLR camera within 100 feet distance.


Cameras connect REMO with trigger cable, which is much more reliable than IR. Then REMO will connect your iPhone or Android with bluetooth.


2. Time-lapse photograph, Bulb.

A time-lapse is a collection of photos taken over a long period of time then compiled together to create a video that you can see in a new way which you cannot normally see.  Check vimeo videos to know more.

Some time-lapse video examples (all come from vimeo time-lapse video.): 

3. Remote control your mobile device's camera through REMO button.

  • Press the button of REMO: control your smartphone to take photo whether  start or stop a video recording
  • You can take a selfie by using the button on REMO and its app on your phone

4. Never lose your smartphone and camera.

  • Just like trackr, we provide REMO the same ability to let you mobile phone Finding your REMO
  • Finding your iPhone: press the button on REMO to ring your phone, so you can find you phone on certain range
  • Record the last position: If you lose your REMO, the app will record the last position of your belongings

Not just for time-lapse

  • Photos for self and group shots
  • Stop motion (like this)
  • Much more... (We can add more feature on our App.  App can do many things)
For example, you can take several photos by REMO trigger camera in several seconds interval and assemble all the photos into one photo on your computer.
Take a look at our website for much more tricks to play with REMO.

How REMO Got Here

1.Timeline:

We are very excited that after working on this project for several months we have finished our prototype model which is ready to manufacture. However, manufacturing the product is not cheap. Now we are here sincerely asking for your support. The money raised here will go to the following:
  • REMO unit manufacturing cost and cables
  • Shipping
  • Android app development (submit to Google Play before shipping REMO)

2.The App

The REMO app is under development. The iOS version is on in-house beta test now. In a few weeks, we will submit to Apple Store. And Android version will be developed by professional developer we hired and submit to Google Play before shipping REMO. The app is compatible with Android devices newer than 4.3 version with bluetooth low energy supported, and iOS devices with bluetooth low energy supported.

Technical Specifications

FAQ

What phones does it work with?

Works with iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPhone 5S, iOS with bluetooth low energy, Android v4.3. REMO does not work on windows phones or blackberry currently.

Are the batteries replaceable?

Yes. REMO runs on a replaceable CR2032 3V battery. Each battery lasts 3-4 months for normal use. Every REMO shipped will come with 2 batteries.

Does REMO ship internationally?

Yes. REMO is available for shipment internationally.

Do you have a guaranteed warranty?

Yes. Every REMO comes with a 1 year guaranteed warranty. If your REMO is ascertained to be faulty, we will replace it for you at no cost.

story:
Be first and get one for a free!
First 5 contributors will get second Booster for a FREE!

If you'll buy Booster Black Edition $59 you will get second Booster for free! Limited only for first 5 contributors.



Booster

My story

The history of developing Booster is closely related to my smartphone. When I was traveling and I wanted to listen to music, connect to the Internet or even if I tried to use the GPS, my battery always got discharged very fast. So I started thinking how to increase the operating time of my phone. Of course, there were a lot of power banks or solar chargers in the market, that´s true. BUT. Each of them needs a recharging cable. As I am a forgetful man, that was absolutely nothing for me. Then I got the idea of making something similar to a watchband, but with a charging cable integrated to one of the bands.


Render from 3D model

 

In-built charging cable detailed view (patented)

The final prototypes of PCBA

 

Design

Booster is the first wrist solar charger, which can be also used as a power bank.
It can help you everywhere and every time you need to charge or boost you smartphone's battery.


Booster is not only a wrist solar charger or a fashion accessory, but primarily your personal rescuer in sudden situations when the battery in your smartphone is almost discharged and you have to make an important call, check the web or use the GPS urgently.


Booster is really the first one wrist solar charger, You can't find a similar product in any market around the world!



3D model black Booster

3D model pink Booster

Materials


Booster is made from harmless materials. The shell is made of zinc alloy with the surface plating "Black Nickel". This gives the impression of a really robust and strong case. Actually it is also good for the electronics inside, because it´s perfectly protected.

The shell is made of zinc alloy, thickness of walls 1.5mm

Bottom is made of stainless stell with 2mm thickness.

Bands are made from 100% silicone, this material is pleasant to touch.

Booster impact

Booster will give you the feeling of independence on the electricity and also a piece of certainty.

All of us can hardly imagine the life without a smartphone. Nevertheless, frequent using of the smartphone consumes the capacity of its battery.

Try to imagine a situation when your smartphone is completely discharged and you have no possibility to recharge it. I'm sure almost every owner of a smartphone knows this situation really well.

Now, the same situation, but try to imagine that this time you have Booster!

Try to answer yourself, can Booster help you to make an important call, send a text message or check anything on the website?

I'm convinced that Booster can help!
You will feel independent and free with having Booster.


Booster can be constantly worn on your wrist and due to in-built charge cable will be ready to charge you phone anytime and without any extra accessory!


Using Booster you can even decrease the emission of carbon dioxide due to high
You can also decrease emissions of carbon dioxide due to high effiency solar panel. Although the solar panel is not large, even a small one can help with eliminating the ecological footprint and keeping the Earth a nice place for living for the next generations.



How to use

Booster is designed to be worn on a wrist, it means that the only thing you have to do is to wear it. Booster recharges itself using a normal everyday lighting exposure. Or when you don't want to wait for charging it via sun rays you can also use a micro USB input on the side and recharge the internal battery from your PC, standart charger with micro usb connector.

Led diode next to micro USB input has double colour RED / BLUE.

Colours mean:

  •  RED - in-built battery is fully charged

  • BLUE - charging of in-built battery in progress

We can also provide a solution for those with other charging connector than micro USB.


Following list of included connectors:


  • Iphone 4 connector - micro USB
  • Nokia diam. 2mm - micro USB
  • Nokia diam. 3.5mm - micro USB
  • Samsung - micro USB
  • Mini USB - micro USB


Packaging box

At this time is in progress, I will update about box between 21.10 - 25.10.2013

For special product is needed special box

Specification

  • Solar panel - polycrystal 5.5V, 45mAh
  • Battery - Li-On 3.7V, 900mAh (nominal)
  • PCBA - Lead free
  • Weight - 125g
  • Dimension - 38x55x17.5mm

Booster doesn’t produce to atmosphere any gram of CO2 when is used under sun shine.
Total time for charging internal battery from external source is about 30minutes-2hours, depends on current from external charger.
Charging time for solar energy is about 30hour under sun-light to charge internal battery for full capacity or when is used for 3hours can increase stand-by mode of your phone up to 2days or 15minutes of call.

Why we need your support

I have spent lot of time designing, meeting suppliers discussing the details and prices. I did it al lafter my official job work time. Simultaneously I had to change my job, because the development and making of samples were expensive. I payed in total  +5000$ only for supplier´s payment.


At this time is everythink ready for mass production and assembly. I have agreed contracts with supplier. The assembly line and team are ready.

To tell the truth, more money is needed for starting the mass production. So that’s why I would like to ask you for support. In order to bring a product with no competitors into a market I need You!

Only together we can create something bigger!

Other Ways, You Can Help

If you can't contribute, you can still help me to reach my goal!

  • Spread the word out and make some awareness about this campaign.

  • Use the Indiegogo share tools

Challenges


Booster was established as a pilot project of my life dream "Producing a unique product for final customer". Simultaneously it was tested if I can create product which doesn't has competitors in the market.


I hope that this is the only one product and more than one product with my signature will appear in the market in the near future.

Rewards

Booster plans and Timeline


After finishing the campaign on Indiegogo.com, 2 months for production and assembling will be needed.


Then we start sending Booster to contributors!

Bands are made from 100% silicone, this material is pleasant to touch.



Booster impact
Booster will give you the feeling of independence on the electricity and also a piece of certainty.
All of us can hardly imagine the life without a smartphone. Nevertheless, frequent using of the smartphone consumes the capacity of its battery.
Try to imagine a situation when your smartphone is completely discharged and you have no possibility to recharge it. I'm sure almost every owner of a smartphone knows this situation really well. 
Now, the same situation, but try to imagine that this time you have Booster!
Try to answer yourself, can Booster help you to make an important call, send a text message or check anything on the website?
I'm convinced that Booster can help!You will feel independent and free with having Booster. 


Booster can be constantly worn on your wrist and due to in-built charge cable will be ready to charge you phone anytime and without any extra accessory!
Using Booster you can even decrease the emission of carbon dioxide due to high You can also decrease emissions of carbon dioxide due to high effiency solar panel. Although the solar panel is not large, even a small one can help with eliminating the ecological footprint and keeping the Earth a nice place for living for the next generations.

How to use
Booster is designed to be worn on a wrist, it means that the only thing you have to do is to wear it. Booster recharges itself using a normal everyday lighting exposure. Or when you don't want to wait for charging it via sun rays you can also use a micro USB input on the side and recharge the internal battery from your PC, standart charger with micro usb connector.

Led diode next to micro USB input has double colour RED / BLUE.


Colours mean:
 RED - in-built battery is fully charged


BLUE - charging of in-built battery in progress

We can also provide a solution for those with other charging connector than micro USB.


Following list of included connectors:
Iphone 4 connector - micro
     USB 
Nokia diam. 2mm - micro USB
Nokia diam. 3.5mm - micro
     USB
Samsung - micro USB
Mini USB - micro USB

Packaging box
At this time is in progress, I will update about box between 21.10 -
25.10.2013

For special product is needed special box


Specification

Solar panel - polycrystal 5.5V, 45mAh

Battery - Li-On 3.7V, 900mAh (nominal)

PCBA - Lead free

Weight - 125g

Dimension - 38x55x17.5mm
Booster doesn’t produce to atmosphere any gram of CO2 when is used under sun shine.Total time for charging internal battery from external source is about 30minutes-2hours, depends on current from external charger.Charging time for solar energy is about 30hour under sun-light to charge internal battery for full capacity or when is used for 3hours can increase stand-by mode of your phone up to 2days or 15minutes of call.


Why we need your support
I have spent lot of time designing, meeting suppliers discussing the details and prices. I did it al lafter my official job work time. Simultaneously I had to change my job, because the development and making of samples were expensive. I payed in total  +5000$ only for supplier´s payment.

At this time is everythink ready for mass production and assembly. I have agreed
contracts with supplier. The assembly line and team are ready.


To tell the truth, more money is needed for starting the mass production. So that’s why I would like to ask you for support. In order to bring a product with no competitors into a market I need You!
Only together we can create something bigger!
Other Ways, You Can Help
If you can't contribute, you can still help me to reach my goal!

Spread the word out and make some awareness about this campaign.


Use the Indiegogo share tools


Challenges
Booster was established as a pilot project of my life dream "Producing a unique product for final customer". Simultaneously it was tested if I can create product which doesn't has competitors in the market.I hope that this is the only one product and more than one product with my signature will appear in the market in the near future. 
Rewards

Booster plans and Timeline

After finishing the campaign on Indiegogo.com, 2 months for production and assembling will be needed.

Then we start sending Booster to contributors!

story:
Important notice:  this is a fixed funding campaign. If we will not reach our goal, WE WILL REFUND anyone who has ordered iHearty and will want his/her money back. 

Versione italiana


iHearty is a smart cover that listens for any signals around you and communicates with your smartphone.

Every day we spend a lot of time with our smartphone in our hands. iHearty through this continuous contact acquires useful information about our health. 

A dedicated set of sensors makes iHearty also able to monitor the conditions of your ambient.


iHearty is an elegantly designed universal case suitable with most of the smartphones.
iHearty uses a set of body sensors and ambient sensors to measure and analyze:

  • Heart rate
  • Skin temperature
  • Oxygen saturation
  • Humidity 
  • Pressure
  • Temperature
  • UV index

iHearty is a slim case equipped with powerful embedded sensors on the metallic plate to the back.  



iHearty is a Bluetooth enabled device able to give a real feedback about your status. 

iHearty gives the ability to carry an accurate physiological monitor anywhere, without additional devices.
One of the advantages of iHearty is that it allows everyone to make baseline measurements at any time, building a database that could allow for improved detection of disease states. 



ECG: AF detection
Heart related diseases kill more and more people every year. The cost to detect and treat cardiovascular disease is too high. Monitoring and assessing the health of the heart for every cardiac cycle is of important and essential.
iHearty could be used to detect atrial fibrillation (AF), which is the most common form of cardiac arrhythmia. AF is often asymptomatic and undiagnosed and is responsible for around a third of all strokes.
An estimated 2.66 million people will have atrial fibrillation in 2010. As many as 12 million people will have the condition by 2050.


SpO2: monitoring level of oxygen in respiratory disease

iHearty monitors the level of oxygen in the subject's blood and alerts if oxygen levels drop below safe levels, allowing rapid intervention. iHearty detects changes that could indicate early signs of hypoxemia, or less-than-safe levels of oxygen in the blood. This is very important for patients with respiratory or cardiac problems, especially chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), or for diagnosis of some sleep disorders such as apnea and hypopnea.

 

Skin Temperature

Skin temperature is an effective indicator for objectively evaluating human sensations, because it is controlled by sympathetic nerve activity which reflects the course of information processing in the brain.
The temperature of our hands is connected to our stress level: when we are stressed, we tend to have cold hands. Changes in hand temperature are a reflection of blood flow - a measure of the stress response.
iHearty uses temperature sensor to detect ovulation for the best chance of getting pregnant. 








•  Dimensions: about 95mm x 55mm x 10mm    

•  Lithium long lasting battery + usb cable to recharge

•  Communication: Bluetooth Low Energy (4.0)

•  Body sensors:

  -  ECG wave: single lead

  -  Skin temperature: IR contactless sensor from - 40°C to 125 °C +/- 0.5 °C

  -  Pulse oxymeter (oxygen saturation plus heartbeat): from 70% SPO2 to 100%          SPO2 +/-2% SPO2; from 20 BPM to  250 BPM +/- 3 BPM

•  Ambient sensors:

  -  Relative humidity from 0 to 100% +/-2%

  -  Atmosferic pressure from 260 hPa to 1260 hPa

  -  Temperature from - 40 °C to 150 °C +/- 0.3 °C

  -  UV index from 1 to 11+ (WHO scale)

iHearty is controlled from a free app that can help you to improve the quality of your life monitoring important vital signs and the quality of your ambient conditions.



Thanks to an universal attachment plate it can be adhered to an existing case on your mobile device or to the device itself.


We designed iHearty to be right- and left-hand friendly...

...and to match it with your personality choosing your favorite color.


NOTE: iHearty is still under development, so minor design changes are possible.

iHearty is still under development, but once complete it could be used to detect potentially dangerous health conditions and warn you, your family, your friends or your physician.

As a research tool, the product will not pose any risk to users and can be used to collect, store and display all your information, but without making specific disease diagnosis.

iHearty app will be open source.We'll have an open API so developers will be able to use iHearty to create apps for iOS, Android, and other devices that support Bluetooth Low Energy (4.0).


For the future, we are planning to get all the necessary certifications to make iHearty a medical device and your contributions are very important and necessary to help us into reaching this significant goal.


We need your help to finalize the design, order the first production batch of the sensors and complete the mobile application.
We already have first prototypes of the device ready.

The money will be used to finalize production tools, order components for the first production batch, and further development and testing of the app for both iOS and Android platforms.


We are very excited about this project and hope you are too. We appreciate your support and please share iHearty with your friends too!


The amount of funding we require to achieve the final milestones is $125,000. 

We hope you will find it in your heart to help us deliver this long sought after, valuable and useful technology.


Ettore Giordano. Master degree in Industrial Design at Politecnico di Milano. After foreign working experiences in Spain, Brazil, China and Turkey, he is now fixed in Milan to work in his own studio.  Essential component of his work is the ability to cross several disciplines, from more architectural traditional ones to those which relate more to our times such as semiotics, cultural criticism and environmental responsibilities  www.ettoregiordano.com

Caterina Salito. CEO/Co-Founder of Biocubica srl, PhD in Biomedical Engineering at Politecnico di Milano University.

Dario Bovio. CTO/Co-Founder of Biocubica srl, Master Degree in Biomedical Engineering at Politecnico di Milano University.

Barbara Uva. CTO/Co-Founder of Biocubica srl, PhD in Biomedical Engineering at Politecnico di Milano University.


Biocubica is an innovative startup which provides innovative solutions, consulting services and support for the development of embedded systems in the field of biomedical technology www.biocubica.it


How Will You Ship?

When the campaign closes, we will send you an email with a link to a system that will help you manage your perk and input your shipping information.

What Kind Of Warranty Will You Offer For iHearty?

We offer one year replacement for any damages to internal parts or batteries, and all you need to pay for is shipping.

How Do I Get The App?

iHearty works with the companion iHearty app, which is compatible with iOS 7.0 or later and Android. iHearty app will be available for free at the app store.

Battery & Charging

iHearty  is equipped with a long lasting lithium battery (about 20 hours) but we are still working on perfecting our charging solution.

How Is iHearty Different From The Other Cover?

iHearty is more than a simple cover, iHearty is something special. It was designed to have an open protocol of communication so you can build your own app. 

iHearty with its elegant design is able to monitor the status of illines yours and of the environment around you. It is the first case able to acquire physiological signal of significant importance for your physician. We look forward to the innovations and optimizations that come from an open API platform.

story:
Apple announced a new "Home" app and service that allows an iPhone or iPad to control smart appliances, lights and locks around the home. "We’ve come up with HomeKit to allow secure pairing so that only your iPhone can unlock your garage door,” said Craig Federighi, Apple's software chief on stage at WWDC 2 Jun 2014.

Bluegic is working on a series products for home automation which is not only supported by Apple and Android phones now, but will surely move towards Apple's new "Home Kit" app standard.




Bluegic @ Press


How it works: Simply pledge for a Smart Home Product to get your personal tracking URL, then press the share buttons or copy your unique URL below the main video at the top of the page. Spread the word about Smart Home Product with your friends and around the web and you will get the credit! Get creative... Facebook, Twitter, Google, Reddit, Stumble Upon, BuzzFeed and blogs can help greatly! 

For example: Pledge for any Bluetooth Smart Home product (e.g.  Bluetooth Plug at $59), then refer 6 people to pledge and we will credit you for $10 for each of them, making your Smart Home Product FREE. Upon pledging, we will email you details on how to track your progress.



Product Series


Bluetooth Wall Socket



Product Overview

Bluetooth Bulb Converter

There are many smart bulbs on the market but their color scheme may not always be agreeable with homeowners. By using Bluegic’s bulb converter, homeowners can connect any existing bulb they like and still enjoy all of the smart features.


Bluetooth Plug

These products are not required to install and don't depends on a router, bypassing security and range hassles. The device can be taken anywhere and simply plug it in to get it working.


Bluetooth Wall Switch / Light Switch

It’s designed to replace the traditional light switches and wall plugs in any home. We provides a cool look and feel with color options of black or white to match any color and voltage options of 110v (Suitable for 90v-130v) or 220v (Suitable for 190v-250v).


Bluetooth Invisible Controller

It's believed in foreseeable future, there won't be any more "buttons" (switches) at your home. By using our Bluetooth Invisible Controller, you can not only remove the buttons at your home, but also save the wiring cost when you reconstructing your home.


Product Features

Timer

You can set a timer to turn on / off your lights at a specific time.


Smart Automation

When you get home, your smartphone will automatically send a signal to turn your lights on because the Bluetooth tells your house you just got home. Why do we call this "Smart Automation"? Because your lights won't go when you walk around your home or go to bed. It’s smart enough to know when you leave and when you return; not just dumbly turning lights on if you go from room to room.


Away Detection

When you enter a room the lights will go on. When you leave that room room the lights will turn off automatically. Our Bluetooth products are smart enough to determine short range and long range location and act accordingly.


Password Protection

We allow you to setup a password for your products. Anyone at your home with a Bluetooth Smart device can control the lights, but not your neighbours.


Control the Device

Step 1: Install the application

Scan the suitable QR code below by your device or Search "Bluegic" in App Store / Google Play store


After you found the App, please install it in your device.

*Please Click Here to see if your device is listed in Bluetooth Smart Ready Products.

IOS 7.0+
Android 4.3+

Step 2: Open the app and enjoy! (No Router & No setup)


Specifications

Bluetooth Version

We use Bluetooth 4.0 (also sometimes referred to as Bluetooth Low Energy or BLE) as the core processor of our products.

Compatible Devices

We support all Smart Ready products with our application installed. Please Click Here to get the growing list.

iOS Support

We support iOS 7.0 or above versions. Also, we have separate applications with different resolution for iPhone and iPad.

Android Support

We support Android 4.3 or above versions. It's the first Android version with Bluetooth Smart support which has just been released on Aug 2013.

Distance

Based on our test in open area, the practical range is over 50 m. Normally, you can turn on / off your device in living room while on your own bed.

Response Time

The response time of Bluetooth connection is 20 ms. This means, after you click the button on your smart phone, the device will response nearly immediately.

Frequency

The frequency range is 2.4 GHz. The 2.4 GHz band is available worldwide and the regulations are mostly compatible between the different authorities.

Standby Current

The standby current of the Bluetooth module is 0.4 uA. It's extremely low power requirements which a button cell can operate for "months or years".

Status Tracking

Our App is available to track your device's status at real time. If someone else updates the device status, it will reflect also on your phone.

Max No. of Devices

There is no limitation on the no. of devices to be added on your smart phone. Our App allows you to group the devices and control all at one click.


Certifications

We are in the process of obtaining certifications for all of our markets: US, Europe, Australia, New Zealand and Asia Pacific. We will send you updates as they come.


Compatible to iOS Home Kit

We are waiting Apple to release the development kit (API) for the new application and working towards the Apple standard so that you can control everything by one App. However, even it's not ready in iOS Home Kit, you can still use our Apple / Android app to control the devices.


THE PERKS

Simply type the total amount manually when you get any perk to enjoy the offer!



ABOUT US

We are The Member Company of Incu-Tech Programme, HKSTPC which specialize in integrating the Bluetooth 4.0 (also sometimes referred to Bluetooth low energy / BLE) in remote control and automation to lighting, appliance and home control applications of all types. Our Bluetooth Smart product series is unique in market which enables smart home appliances (Switches, Lighting, and more) control wirelessly via your smartphone or tablet.


FAQs

- Is the product support 230V?

For 220V standard product, it supports range from 190-250V.

For 110V standard product, it supports range from 90-130V.


- Are these dimmable switches?

Dimmable will be definitely an optional product of our next version release.

As you may probably know, to ensure the bulbs’ life, it’s normally to use Relay to connect non-dimmable lights (Neon Tube, CFL, etc) and use SCR to connect dimmable lights (LED, Bulb, etc). That’s why you can see the switches for dimmable and non-dimmable are in two different products in the market.

We understand most similar products here claims they support both but if your practical use is to control your lights at home (90% of lights at home is non-dimmable in research), you are not recommended to connect the CFL / Neon Tube to dimmable stage.

It’s because we focus on practical usage, instead of building some fancy features like color change, dimmable etc, we promote simple and practical solution which suitable for common home.


- What devices can i connect besides lights?

You can connect to whatever devices you need as long as it’s under the power range (10A) e.g. curtain, garage door, etc. Our App contains interface for on / off function, but also open / close.


- Can I connect it to my Air Conditioner switch which draws 15 amps of current?

The maximum current for this product is 10A now. Although it’s rarely the touch button supports large power consumption electronic devices, we’ll take your comment and study if it will be an optional feature for our next generation of this product.


- What are the functions of the other switches on a 2/3/4 button switch?

2/3/4 buttons can control 2/3/4 groups of lights individually. You buy one device, and you can control maximum 4 groups of lights!


- Will there be Windows Phone Support?

Currently we support Android and iOS. We'll definitely consider adding windows OS in future.

ABOUT US
We are The Member Company of Incu-Tech Programme, HKSTPC which specialize in integrating the Bluetooth 4.0 (also sometimes referred to Bluetooth low energy / BLE) in remote control and automation to lighting, appliance and home control applications of all types. Our Bluetooth Smart product series is unique in market which enables smart home appliances (Switches, Lighting, and more) control wirelessly via your smartphone or tablet.
FAQs- Is the product support 230V?For 220V standard product, it supports range from 190-250V.For 110V standard product, it supports range from 90-130V.- Are these dimmable switches?Dimmable will be definitely an optional product of our next version release.As you may probably know, to ensure the bulbs’ life, it’s normally to use Relay to connect non-dimmable lights (Neon Tube, CFL, etc) and use SCR to connect dimmable lights (LED, Bulb, etc). That’s why you can see the switches for dimmable and non-dimmable are in two different products in the market.We understand most similar products here claims they support both but if your practical use is to control your lights at home (90% of lights at home is non-dimmable in research), you are not recommended to connect the CFL / Neon Tube to dimmable stage.It’s because we focus on practical usage, instead of building some fancy features like color change, dimmable etc, we promote simple and practical solution which suitable for common home.- What devices can i connect besides lights?You can connect to whatever devices you need as long as it’s under the power range (10A) e.g. curtain, garage door, etc. Our App contains interface for on / off function, but also open / close.- Can I connect it to my Air Conditioner switch which draws 15 amps of current?The maximum current for this product is 10A now. Although it’s rarely the touch button supports large power consumption electronic devices, we’ll take your comment and study if it will be an optional feature for our next generation of this product.- What are the functions of the other switches on a 2/3/4 button switch?2/3/4 buttons can control 2/3/4 groups of lights individually. You buy one device, and you can control maximum 4 groups of lights!- Will there be Windows Phone Support?Currently we support Android and iOS. We'll definitely consider adding windows OS in future.

story:
Sep 17: Locky will make the most of iOS 8 and Mac OS Yosemite.
Sep 11: Apple Watch will be supported by Locky :)

Locky. The Story.


In the last few months, we were looking for a convenient and elegant solution to protect our Mac when going out for lunch, or just grabbing a coffee at work.

We were tired of worrying about leaving documents wide open and visible to anyone, on our Mac's screens!

The result is Locky: the most convenient solution to lock your Mac using your iPhone and Apple Watch*, with a spark of fun and magic features.

Besides just conveniently locking your Mac, Locky will propose additional fun and magic features, thanks to your contribution: learn more below!

> Updates:
* Check this out, Locky is on TechFaster.com !
* Apple Watch, important note: depending on what the SDK allows, Apple Watch might have limitations compared to the iPhone version of Locky


Locky. Your magic wand.

Locky will transform your iPhone and Apple Watch into a magic wand to lock your Mac when you walk away, and more:

    1. Locky locks your Mac if you walk away with your iPhone or Apple Watch*

      2. Our secret sauce       to make it work seamless: in our prototype, we're making the most of your iPhone's (and Apple Watch* !) sensors and the brand new Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to detect motion and your distance from your Mac.

      3. Are you a oneSafe user? In that case, you will enjoy neat features in future versions of oneSafe (automatic lock of oneSafe, and 2-factor authentication)

      4. And more, such as:
        • unlock (not automatically!) your Mac with your iPhone or Apple Watch*
        • see your Mac's desktop background instantly updated on your iPhone (and possibly Apple Watch*: being studied!)
        • play with the distance thresholds
        • instantly detect intruders from your iPhone and Apple Watch*
          Note: learn more below, in the Technology & geek stuff section :)

          Apple Watch, important note: depending on what the SDK allows, Apple Watch might have limitations compared to the iPhone version of Locky

          And use your Mac's password encrypted in your iPhone or Apple Watch* to unlock your Mac (not automatically):




          The team

          Locky is being handcrafted by the team behind oneSafe, a world-leading password manager that is redefining what a password manager on a mobile device should be. Learn more below (About Us section).


          Timeline

          • Prototype with our secret algorithm - Today
          • Beta version of the App on iOS and Mac - November 2014
          • First version of the App on iOS and Mac - December 2014
          • Improved version with extra security features - February 2015



          Technology & geek stuff :)


          • Locky is leveraging the brand new Bluetooth version, aka Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), to save your iPhone's and Apple Watch's battery !
          • Locky will make the most of all iPhone's and Apple Watch's sensors - combined with BLE. We're one step closer to having a great secret sauce to make Locky magical.
          • You want to unlock your Mac too with Locky? You can optionally activate this feature. When you walk up to your Mac, you can unlock your Mac by using your Mac's password encrypted in your iPhone (and possibly Apple Watch).
          • Locky will work with all new Macs (2011 or newer), the iPhone 6, 5S, 5C, 5 and 4S, and probably Apple Watch (being studied).


          Use of funds

          The first 35,000 USD will give us enough money to complete Locky v1.0 and v2.0 on iOS and Mac.

          Below are some of our goals:

          • Refinement of the App's behavior incl. the algorithms using the iPhone's sensors + Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE)
          • Work on the Apple Watch's version of Locky
          • Refinement of the Apps' security in terms of back-end + new features such as the detection of intrusions attempts, or smart features for lock/unlock
          • Improving animations and cool goodies
          If the raised funds exceed 55,000 USD, we will develop the Windows 7+8 version. Above 65,000 USD, we will develop the Android version too !

          Perks for backers

          $2 - Locky Fan Club

          We are grateful for your support ! We'll add your name to our list of Indiegogo backers in the Lunabee offices. We'll keep you updated on all future developments of Locky.

          $4 - First & Free

          Locky Fan Club membership + you will be notified the day the App is on the Stores to get it free (instead of $4.99), before everyone else.

          $10 - First, Free & in the Locky App Credits!

          Locky Fan Club membership + App first & free + and you will have your photo, firstname and lastname in the App credits! If iOS8 allows it, you will have access to the beta too!

          $29 - The "Get Locky" T-Shirt

          Locky Fan Club membership + App first & free + in the App credits + one of the "Get Locky" limited edition T-Shirt (3 versions available below) with a bunch of Locky and oneSafe stickers.
          +$10 for international shipping for the T-Shirt.

          $39 - oneSafe OFFERED

          * Early Bird special, first 100 !

          Locky Fan Club membership + App first & free + in the App credits + 1 T-Shirt + get oneSafe iOS and Mac, a part of the team's DNA!
          +$10 for international shipping of the T-Shirt.

          $49 - In Tartiflette We Trust. Oh Yeah.

          * Early Bird special, first 60 !

          Locky Fan Club membership + App first & free + in the App credits + 1 T-Shirt + you're invited to a great dinner in Chambéry (French Alps) to eat a home-made "tartiflette" with the team, with white wine. Oh yeah.

          (note: travel is at your own charge :) + no international shipping of the T-Shirt - get it at the dinner!)

          $119 - VIP 

          * Early Bird special, first 50 !

          Get everything above + all our past and future iOS products created by Lunabee Pte. Ltd. And our eternal gratitude !

          $2,990 - More than a VIP. A Lunaguy.

          * Early Bird special, first 50 !

          Get everything above + you can come to our office during one week, and spend your time with the guys at Lunabee. If you are interested in geek stuff, you will have a 3-day iOS training provided by our experts here. Including a culinary grand slam: tartiflette, raclette, croziflette and fondue (will you survive?).

          Here are the "Get Locky" limited edition T-Shirts:


          About Us: Lunabee

          Our apps, including Locky, are produced by Lunabee Pte Ltd. The Lunabee team is based in France (Chambéry, French Alps) and in Singapore.

          Our multicultural team of developers is based in France. There they focus on programming; on coming up with the finer details that make an app work well and look great. Plus, they have an eye on the future, looking ahead to new features and technologies that they can integrate into existing apps and coming up with innovative concepts for brand new ones.

          They're a bit crazy too :) ...

          Our marketing and communications team is based in Singapore. From that global hub, the team communicates with the entire world, receiving feedback from the users of Lunabee’s apps and responding to questions and requests.

          The goal of both our teams, in Singapore and France, is to focus on the users’ experience; to make the experience of using Lunabee’s apps the best it possibly can be!

story:
DIMBODY. 

Unleash your fantasy. 


DIMBODY is a 3d scanner, a digitalizer that allows you to take a physical object, and turn it into a digital 3D model on your computer.

DIMBODY is based on a triangulation between a laser plane  and a CMOS monochromatic sensor, it acquires point coordinates of an object (point cloud). The point cloud is then transformed in a 3d surface by the software and saved as a STL file. Subsequently you can print it in your 3d printer, or scale, then transform, or modify it in a CAD software.

Thanks to the rotating turret DIMBODY accuracy is outstanding and  thanks to its rotating platform the scanning phase is totally automated. 

If you are a maker, you really need to have a DIMBODY to unleash your fantasy and avoid to losing time in 3d cad drawings. 


Technical Specifications

  • 5 Mpixel monocromatic CMOS sensor
  • red line laser 
  • max object size: 300 x 300 x 300mm (12x12x12 inches)
  • scanning time: 24 min at ULTRA resolution ( 10'000'000 points), 14 min at SUPER resolution (3'000'000 points), 8 min at NORMAL (1'000'000 points)
  • accuracy. +-0.1mm (ULTRA), +-0.2(SUPER) +- 0.4 (NORMAL)
  • USB2 


Open Source

All software, hardware and electronics components developed by us will be released as open source. Control electronic cards are based on arduino-compatible microcontroller. You can use arduino ide to modify , or to develop a completely new one. 

DIMBODY believes in open source software and hardware developing. We are working on a arduino-compatible electronics, which design will be released and free.  At the end of this campaign clients could buy even only single parts, (like this arduino based control card) 

At the same way control software will be released as open source, so you or the community can modify it as you like.

Communication control between DIMBODY ad pc will be published and every one can utilize personal software to manage point clouds and mesh generation 



Why a rotating turret lead to a better mesh for complex models?

The rotating turret is the core value of DIMBODY. 

Without a rotating turret, if you try to scan a body like this one:

you will find that some parts like proboscis or ears will intercept the laser plane and it prevent the laser to correctly touch hidden areas. So you will have no points in that areas, and some holes in the resulting mesh.

But DIMBODY is smart, and can see things from different point of view. <

Scanning process consist of two different phases.  

in the first phase platform turns at a 10°, 15°, 20° or 30° steps, and then the turret start to take a complete scanning (100 to 400 frames), and the process is repeated until the complete rotation of the object (360°)

When all the the frames are acquired we have a lot more information than all other competitors using fixed lasers.    

"why the rubicon 3d scanner only $199 (i believe without camera) cost and yours more then $500" ?

Is not so easy to make comparison with a scanner that is not actually in production. But from what I can understand, Rubicon 3d includes 2 fixed lasers ad a rotating platform. I'm not able to understand how they synchronize platform rotation to camera frame grabbing. We use an industrial 5M monochromatic camera,   similar to: http://www.oemcameras.com/dmm-72buc02-ml.htm, a laser equipped with a first grade lens and a custom electronics to synchronize rotation of platform, turret rotation, and camera.

this lead us to hi quality scan, with an accuracy down to 0.1mm, and 15 milion points in a single model.

"What happens if the campaign is unsuccessful?"

You will be 100% refunded  (by Indiegogo)

"If the campaign is unsuccessful (I hope it is not), would it still be possible to purchase a Dimbody kit?

no. production will not be started.




What We Need 

to fully industrialize DIMBODY we need founding in order to:

  • Buy moldings - We need 5 big moldings for the frame, platform and the turret, 3 small moldings for rotating system. Principal parts will be realized in Nylon (PA+GF30) other in POM. 
  • Industrialize Electronic hardware. We need 3 different electronics cards. 

  1. An usb to a PC/MAC interface (It has to power the laser, move and control the turret and platform rotation, synchronize movement and the image acquisition of the monochromatic CMOS sensor)   
  2. A controller card for the stepper motors
  3. An USB camera card 
  • Software:

Base algorithms are ready and tested, we are in the phase of encapsulating it in an easy to use interface. 


So, where are we now?

The platform and the industrial design are complete, we are currently doing tests on the hardware and the first production samples are ready to be launched . 

Now, we need your help to finish development, buy new tooling, moulds, and expand our manufacturing capabilities.



Your contribution

We have put a lot of time, funds and efforts into our project but like many things in life not everything can be completed in just a few days. You and your contribution will enable us to reach our goal. You will be a part of a world first in enabling us to complete production of the more accurate 3d scanner/ digitalizer for makers ever realized!


People at Dimbody:

 Alessandro Grossi: CEO,  mechanical engineer, Ph.D in product design, EMBA at Bologna University (Italy). In the last 15 years he designed and developed different products (membrane pumps, chairs, home appliances, pressure devices, etc.) for many clients. Some examples are in his personal site:  www.metaingegneria.com Almost every day he uses rapid prototyping tools to show and test projects for his clients. He has decided to utilize all of his experience in developing an high accuracy 3d scanner for small objects with the makers people in mind, enthusiasts fell in love with 3d printing. Our Deus ex machina at DIMBODY. 

 

Carmen Olei: Marketing manager, he's from Detroit, Michigan. He has a lot of experience in the US market. He's our link to the market.

Marica Soattin: HR, Software usability. Ph.D in Biotech, EMBA at Bologna University (Italy).  She knows how to design easy to use interface.

story:
The song of birds opening the morning,  fresh start of a day, 
For your dreams and hopes, Emotional Project.

"HOLO LIVE"

This idea was started very naturally in a way the emotions comes to us in our life.




HOLO LIVE SPEC

deck - aluminum
glass - half mirror
size - 16cm X 10cm X 1cm


HOLO LIVE has done everything including hologram implementation, creating contents, designing product, to create the best UX for the users. You could feel the scent of the woods by white birch and feel even more emotions by watching holograms with warm lights.

story:
Let's be honest, our mobile phones are causing us social disconnection, aren't they? Have you ever experienced going out with friends or family, and yet feel lonely, as though no one was listening? We have. Heck, we all are guilty of having skipped real social activities just to spend time online. Spending virtual time with your friends on the couch? Does that sound ridiculous to you?

For a fact, we aren't going to allow anyone take our phones away, not even for a second. So, we thought, why not embrace the rise of mobile technology to create behavior that brings back or perhaps, create even more real interactions among us? So let us help you get off your couch and have some real interactions today! Sounds impossible? Keep reading!


Daredevil is a free iPhone app dedicated in bringing back the once popular "Truth or Dare" game, but this time, to a whole new level. 

We will be the first social platform that stands out from the others, one that promises the enhancement of real connection in your lives through unique fun filled activities with anyone around you.

Earn your bragging rights through completing dares. Plus, you now have an additional  awesome topic of discussion ongoing with your friends! Guess what? We will even reward you for completing these activities based on how creative and interestingly you've done it.

Join Our World

Getting started has never been simpler, easier and faster when all it takes is one tap to connect to the world of Daredevils. Tap on the search button and you will be instantly brought to a lobby with other Daredevils.

Accept Your Undertaking

One unique task will be issued to all Daredevils. Brainstorm and cooperate with friends around you to post the most interesting and creative photo or video. Videos posted will have a limit of 10 seconds, so keep it short and sweet.

Prove Yourself

Each Daredevil's video will be verified by one another, as well as the rest of the community who will be able to watch the videos too. Based on a voting system, the four Daredevils will be ranked according to their videos, and rewards will be distributed according to ranks. 

Share Your Deeds

Accumulate recognition and perhaps popularity for your efforts by sharing your video. Don't just share it online, show it to your friends personally and impress them! This step is completely up to you.


Never Get The Same Dare Twice
We have created an algorithm that ensures a unique and interesting task every time you make a search.

Tag Team

Want to meet new people? No problem! Our location based tagging allows you to find people nearby for a tag teamed dare. Seriously, what better way is there to forge new friendships than with a dare together?

Avatars

Customize your personal Daredevil character in your own exclusive style with in-game credits earned as rewards for completing tasks.

Character Profiling

Rake in points as you complete more dares. Show the world how much of a Daredevil you are!

We aim to launch the iOS app by the end of the campaign, and get it to you, our beta testers, to use the app and let us know what works, and what doesn't. We plan to beta test till early January and officially launch by end January! We have begun development of the iOS app and our team is hard at work to get the app into the hands of our backers as soon as possible!


Your importance to us

We recognize that we are going to need a large dedicated community in order for Daredevil to successfully take off. Having every one of you backers in our Daredevil community would be the greatest thing we can ask for, and every feedback we receive from you is important. Help us spread the word of Daredevil, and create a world that embraces mobile technology for fun-filled social activities.
Every single cent of of your backings will be used in the development and constant improvement of the app to keep every Daredevil interested and connected, and ensuring that it is able to reach out in the market. We will organize launch events, and contact the press as well as tech companies to make Daredevil a world renowned app with a large number of users.
Ultimately, the app is a platform for a community of Daredevils (yes, you!), and our aim for this crowdfunding campaign is to make this community come alive. 


We here at Daredevil know that there are always risks involved in every campaign. We believe our biggest challenges to be getting a critical number of people using Daredevil as we believe that if there are more users, the dares will get more interesting and allow for a good user experience. 

We recognize this challenge and have already been actively promoting Daredevil. We would like to call on your help too, to help us achieve a community of Daredevils! As our core team is made up of developers and designers, we will not be relying on a third party to create the app, thus ensuring that you, our backers, get the best user experience while using our app.

Why iOS before Android and Windows?
Our team is currently more experienced in iOS app development and look to create the best possible experience for you. Fret not, we look forward to welcoming all Android and Windows phone users on board our community, and will release these versions really soon. We will keep you updated!

Can I still donate if I am not an iOS user?

We would definitely love to have you in the Daredevil community regardless of whether you donated or not. That being said, any donation would most certainly be of immense help us to release the Android version earlier. Besides, who wouldn't want a cool Daredevil T-shirt or exclusive bottle opener?

Will there be a free version of Daredevil available?

Daredevil WILL be a FREE app throughout. Our vision lies in creating the best possible experience for all users, and in building a fun filled community of Daredevils.

I can't get my payment to work in Paypal, what should I do?

Email the Indiegogo Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any issues.

I contributed to a perk but I forgot to add the extra amount for shipping. How can I increase the amount?

No problem! If you'd like to add funds for shipping, you can make another contribution and select "No Perk, Just a Contribution."

Any other questions?

We believe in getting person when answering any queries that you have. So, throw us any questions you have either in the comment section or at admin@daredevil.io and we will answer you as soon as we can. We are looking forward to hearing from you!


Nikhil, CEO - I'm an iOS developer with experience working in various startups and developing multiple apps. I am in charge of making Daredevil's iOS app and take pride in crafting a seamless experience for users!
Siaw Young, CTO - I'm a fullstack developer and have worked on many web apps in various companies. I am in charge of working on the backend and API support for the iOS app, and will make sure that your data will always be there!
Bryan, COO - I’m a product designer with experience in several industrial design firms. I am primarily in charge of the UI and graphic design for the Daredevil app, as well as ensuring an overall consistency in user experience.
Kenneth, CMO -  I'm a business developer who has experience in the marketing industry. I'll be the one who extensively promotes Daredevil and ensures that there will always be new Daredevils joining our wonderful community!

Do support us by sharing this campaign with your friends!
story_txt:
Let's be honest, our mobile phones are causing us social disconnection, aren't they? Have you ever experienced going out with friends or family, and yet feel lonely, as though no one was listening? We have. Heck, we all are guilty of having skipped real social activities just to spend time online. Spending virtual time with your friends on the couch? Does that sound ridiculous to you?


For a fact, we aren't going to allow anyone take our phones away, not even for a second. So, we thought, why not embrace the rise of mobile technology to create behavior that brings back or perhaps, create even more real interactions among us? So let us help you get off your couch and have some real interactions today! Sounds impossible? Keep reading!








Daredevil is a free iPhone app dedicated in bringing back the once popular "Truth or Dare" game, but this time, to a whole new level. 





We will be the first social platform that stands out from the others, one that promises the enhancement of real connection in your lives through unique fun filled activities with anyone around you.


Earn your bragging rights through completing dares. Plus, you now have an additional  awesome topic of discussion ongoing with your friends! Guess what? We will even reward you for completing these activities based on how creative and interestingly you've done it.






Join Our World

Getting started has never been simpler, easier and faster when all it takes is one tap to connect to the world of Daredevils. Tap on the search button and you will be instantly brought to a lobby with other Daredevils.

Accept Your Undertaking
One unique task will be issued to all Daredevils. Brainstorm and cooperate with friends around you to post the most interesting and creative photo or video. Videos posted will have a limit of 10 seconds, so keep it short and sweet.

Prove Yourself
Each Daredevil's video will be verified by one another, as well as the rest of the community who will be able to watch the videos too. Based on a voting system, the four Daredevils will be ranked according to their videos, and rewards will be distributed according to ranks. 


Share Your Deeds
Accumulate recognition and perhaps popularity for your efforts by sharing your video. Don't just share it online, show it to your friends personally and impress them! This step is completely up to you.




Never Get The Same Dare Twice




We have created an algorithm that ensures a unique and interesting task every time you make a search.


Tag Team
Want to meet new people? No problem! Our location based tagging allows you to find people nearby for a tag teamed dare. Seriously, what better way is there to forge new friendships than with a dare together?

Avatars
Customize your personal Daredevil character in your own exclusive style with in-game credits earned as rewards for completing tasks.

Character Profiling
Rake in points as you complete more dares. Show the world how much of a Daredevil you are!

We recognize this challenge and have already been actively promoting Daredevil. We would like to call on your help too, to help us achieve a community of Daredevils! As our core team is made up of developers and designers, we will not be relying on a third party to create the app, thus ensuring that you, our backers, get the best user experience while using our app.

Our team is currently more experienced in iOS app development and look to create the best possible experience for you. Fret not, we look forward to welcoming all Android and Windows phone users on board our community, and will release these versions really soon. We will keep you updated!

That being said, any donation would most certainly be of immense help us to release the Android version earlier. Besides, who wouldn't want a cool Daredevil T-shirt or exclusive bottle opener?

story:
What's RocketBolt, anyway?

Hi there! We're a group of guys with extremely varied backgrounds. We've published novels, performed in Carnegie Hall, and dabbled in the ukulele. (Not at Carnegie Hall.) We've had award-winning careers in acting, music, and web design. And now we're bringing you RocketBolt. RocketBolt is a startup in Durham, NC, and we're passionate about what we're doing.

And what's that? Well, just about every business has a website, right? But business owners are finding that getting people TO their website is a full-time job in itself. Let's say you own a restaurant. You didn't open your restaurant to run a website; you opened your restaurant because you want people to eat your tasty food. And who can say if a visitor to your website will ever become a visitor to your restaurant? It's all so confusing, and it's not what you should be spending your time on.

Enter RocketBolt! In less than five minutes, you can install a tool that converts more of your site's traffic into paying customers for your business. That's...that's it, really. It's that simple!

What We Need & What You Get

We've tested RocketBolt. We know it works. But we need your help getting it out there!

We're asking for $10,000. This money would go immediately to customer acquisition and marketing. Business cards cost money. Going to conventions costs money. Flyers people will immediately throw away costs money. Bail costs money. (Just kidding, Mom!)

Moral of the story: Things cost money. But we've figured out how to get value out of where we put that money (read: we're cheap) so this relatively small amount will go a really long way.

The Impact

We're a startup. That means...well, it means a lot of things. One thing it means is that we're 100% committed to making this work. Believe in us. Believe in what we're doing. We won't let you down.

Other Ways You Can Help

Hey, times are tough all over. If you love us (and really, why wouldn't you?) but can't contribute anything, we totally understand. But if you've got a sec, you can still do us a world of good.

  • Get the word out! Make some noise! You've got a Facebook page, and you're probably on Twitter as well. Tell the world about RocketBolt, and about this campaign!

That's about it. But before we go, here's a picture of a really, really determined baby:

He's ready to pitch in! How about you?
