story:
FAQ

We received a lot of questions, so we summed them up in an FAQ section for you:

What is Cube?

Cube is a modular charger that serves as powerbank and docking station, as well. Its three modules can be used individually or separately.

Is Cube only suitable for phones?

No. Cube can be used for any smart gadget, from phones to tablets, e-readers, portable music players and so on.

What types of devices can Cube support?

Due to its interchangeable tips (Micro-USB, Lightning and USB-C), Cube can support iOS, Android, Blackberry and Windows Mobile devices. Some of the brands we support are: Samsung, Apple, Lenovo, Huawei, Oppo, Xiaomi, Nokia, Microsoft, Sony, HTC, Lumia, Gigaset, One Plus, Nexus & many others.

Will the modules be available independently, too?

Yes, as soon as Cube will be retailed online, you can purchase the base cube, the powerbank or the docking station independently.

Will Cube be available worldwide?

Yes, Cube is available for Indiegogo backers anywhere in the worlds. After the official launch, we will make sure that it reaches as many countries as possible through our wide range of distributors.

Where will Cube be sent from?

In order to have a very efficient distribution and make sure that Cube reaches our backers as quickly as possible, we have already set up two distribution centers; thus, North American backers will receive their parcels from our US center, while EU & rest of the world backers will receive them from Munich, Germany.

Will Cube be sent through a postal service?

Because we want to make sure that everyone receives it in time, we have chosen to work with couriers like UPS & similar, not postal services.

How much does shipping cost?

For all our Indiegogo backers, shipping is completely FREE, anywhere in the world.

Is Cube certified in my country?

Cube is both CE and FCC certified.

I can't get my payment to work in PayPal, what should I do?

Email the Indiegogo Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any issues.

What if I have other questions?

If you have any other queries that were not covered here, you can always use the comment section of our project or find us on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/4smarts/), Twitter (@4smarts_com) or Instagram (@4smarts_accessories). We always reply!


Our team of engineers, developers and designers has worked relentlessly to make sure that the Cube is a very solid product. Even tough we are confident that we have done all in our power to mitigate any risk, we know that all projects bear a certain amount of uncertainty. We have developed a sustainable product and business model with an impressive distribution sastem for all our backers here on Indiegogo. However, should any problems arise, you will be the fist to learn about them. Who knows, you might even be able to help us.



Thank you for your support,

The 4smarts team
story_txt:
We all rely on technology to make our lives easier, but sometimes our gadgets' maintenance takes up more of our time & attention than we bargained for. If you own more than one smart device, you are already familiar with messy, entangled cables that get easily lost.


The Cube was born out of the need to de-clutter our living and work spaces and offers you unparalleled flexibility in doing so. 4smarts has the pleasure to present you an all-in-one solution -- the charging system that combines the advantages of a wall charger, a docking station and a power bank.






The 4smarts Cube includes three main components; they can be used spearately or all togehter at the same time. The docking station can be plugged into either the wall charger or the power bank. This way, you can use the docking station even when you are on the move and charging will never be a problem again!



The powerbank can easily be charged by placing it on top of the wall charger. Its connection pins use state-of-the-art technology, so plugging it in is always accurate and charging - incredibly fast. All that you need to do now is throw away those annoying cables.




The 4smarts Cube embodies all the superlatives of device charging: high charging speed and an excellent electrical efficiency that makes it environment-friendly. Compared to a standard home charger, Cube has a charging output increased by 2000mAh. 


Its intelligent control system helps you save power or make the most of it when you really need it: its 4.2A output will be regulated if you use the Cube for more than 1 device at a time; when used for a single device, it will get maximum power and remarkably fast charging.


It's not only stylish, with a minimalist, urban design, but also very practical. This plug-and-play modular system allows you to charge all your devices in your home or office, on the go, without any cables and it can also be used as a docking station.












* Interchangeable tips: Micro-USB, lightning and USB-C connection
* Compatible with Android, Apple, Blackberry and Windows devices
* Distribution: US pledgers will receive their parcels via courier from our US distribution  center; for the rest of the world, the parcels will be shipped from Munich, Germany



We are so close to the finish line and to making Cube available for people everywhere. The money we are asking will go primarily into tooling and fixtures for serial production. Since everything from suppliers to distributors has already been covered, this is the last piece of the puzzle.



Our synergetic team is experienced and adventurous at the same time. We love to thrill of developing something sophisticated and useful for everyone. "Nothing is impossible" is the motto that drives our creative endeavors. Whenever a new challenge appears, we all say "bring it on!". With this mind, we teamed up and started working on the Cube.





 
 





FAQ
We received a lot of questions, so we summed them up in an FAQ section for you:
What is Cube?
Cube is a modular charger that serves as powerbank and docking station, as well. Its three modules can be used individually or separately.
Is Cube only suitable for phones?
No. Cube can be used for any smart gadget, from phones to tablets, e-readers, portable music players and so on.
What types of devices can Cube support?
Due to its interchangeable tips (Micro-USB, Lightning and USB-C), Cube can support iOS, Android, Blackberry and Windows Mobile devices. Some of the brands we support are: Samsung, Apple, Lenovo, Huawei, Oppo, Xiaomi, Nokia, Microsoft, Sony, HTC, Lumia, Gigaset, One Plus, Nexus & many others.
Will the modules be available independently, too?
Yes, as soon as Cube will be retailed online, you can purchase the base cube, the powerbank or the docking station independently.
Will Cube be available worldwide?
Yes, Cube is available for Indiegogo backers anywhere in the worlds. After the official launch, we will make sure that it reaches as many countries as possible through our wide range of distributors.
Where will Cube be sent from?
In order to have a very efficient distribution and make sure that Cube reaches our backers as quickly as possible, we have already set up two distribution centers; thus, North American backers will receive their parcels from our US center, while EU & rest of the world backers will receive them from Munich, Germany.
Will Cube be sent through a postal service?
Because we want to make sure that everyone receives it in time, we have chosen to work with couriers like UPS & similar, not postal services.
How much does shipping cost?
For all our Indiegogo backers, shipping is completely FREE, anywhere in the world.
Is Cube certified in my country?
Cube is both CE and FCC certified.
I can't get my payment to work in PayPal, what should I do?
Email the Indiegogo Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any issues.
What if I have other questions?
If you have any other queries that were not covered here, you can always use the comment section of our project or find us on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/4smarts/), Twitter (@4smarts_com) or Instagram (@4smarts_accessories). We always reply!

Risks and challenges

Our team of engineers, developers and designers has worked relentlessly to make sure that the Cube is a very solid product. Even tough we are confident that we have done all in our power to mitigate any risk, we know that all projects bear a certain amount of uncertainty. We have developed a sustainable product and business model with an impressive distribution sastem for all our backers here on Indiegogo. However, should any problems arise, you will be the fist to learn about them. Who knows, you might even be able to help us.
Thank you for your support,
The 4smarts team

story:
The Team


Hello from Ludovico and Francesco!

We are two Italian students, passionate about new technologies and watches.

Ludovico and Francesco are the creators of Adappt.

As soon as the Apple Watch was presented, we fell in love with its design and functionality.

However, we soon realized that it had a limitation: the watchbands. Apple decided to offer only six different watchbands, and at a very expensive price! 

This is why we created Adappt.


Adappt

Adappt is a small adapter, that will let you use your Apple Watch with any standard watchband. On one side it will feature Apple’s proprietary plug, on the other one the classic plug used by any watch in the world. 

Along with Adappt, we also offer a combination of adapter and watchband. You can get high quality rubber, leather or stainless steel bands in a wide variety of colors.

Designed in Italy.


Versions

Adappt will be available in two sizes; one for the 38mm, supporting 22mm watchbands, and one for the 42mm Apple Watch, which can mount bands up to 24mm.

We are working very hard to manufacture Adappt with high quality materials, to make Adappt look just like it’s part of your Apple Watch.

Adappt will be available in plastic, anodized aluminium, stainless and gold plated steel. Each version will come in two colors, just like the Apple Watch.

Thanks to high quality materials, Adappt will match perfectly your Apple Watch. Our aluminum is anodized through an electro-chemical process that creates a porous surface, then coated with a dye, to look and feel exactly like the Sport edition versions, Silver and Space Grey Aluminum. 

Thanks to Adappt, the Sport is not limited to sports anymore. Match it with a classic band and you will be able to use your Apple Watch Sport in any occasion.

For the Stainless Steel version, we will use an alloy of stainless steel with the best strength/corrosion resistance ratio, we will then polish it to give it a clean mirror look, just like the Apple Watch’s Stainless Steel, and a darker elegant color, for the Space Black Stainless Steel, or we will plate it with yellow or rose gold for the Gold version. 


Status of the project & next steps

We are almost ready to begin production. Our team managed to build accurate 3D models of the Apple Watch, to then produce the design of Adappt. We found reliable manufacturers for each material, that will help us deliver a well finished product.

The current models are really precise, although some modifications will be needed, as we don’t know the exact dimensions yet, but most of the work is already done!

We have also printed some 3D prototypes. Please note this are just prototypes made with raw plastic, and they don't have the closure mechanism, that will be implemented in the final version.


Packaging solutions

We are still working on the possible packaging solutions. At the moment we have decided to include in every Adappt a basic packaging solution which is flat, ecological and shipping-friendly. But if you wish a more sophisticated packaging, we offer that option as well, you can select the "Premium packaging" perk.

Anyways we will share both solutions with you very soon!


Risks & Challenges

There are always risks that can delay the process of delivering Adappt to you. We think you should know exactly what some of these are. 

Production: When making a new product, it’s possible to encounter obstacles in the technical aspect of the process. In case this happens, we will do anything we can to overcome them, and enhance the quality of the product. 

Supply: Adappt is made of different components, and each one of them comes from a different supplier. If only one of these suppliers has a long leadtime, there can be a delay for the entire production. 

Shipping: There is always a risk of the product getting stuck in customs, either when we are receiving the products from the factory or shipping them to you. We are prepared for this, and hopefully there won’t be any delays.


Why you should contribute

We are offering Adappt at a launch price to all of our contributors, to let everybody make Apple’s most personal device even more personal.

We are really excited about this, and we hope you are too. Now we need your help to bring Adappt to life.

As a supporter you will get your Adappt at a very special price! So please consider backing our project, and share it with your friends.

*Reminder: if we don't reach our goal you will be automatically get a refund.


Other ways you can help

If you like our project but you can't contribute, please consider sharing it using the share buttons under the video with your friends and family. This will help us a lot to spread the word!


Perks

By contributing to our campaign, you can pre-order Adappt. Adappt is available in different materials and colors to closely match your Apple Watch.

Adappt Plastic - $9
Made of plastic, it's the most economic Adappt. But that doesn't mean cheap. It's made of durable, nice-looking rubber and matches your Apple Watch Sport finish.

Adappt Aluminum - $29
If you want the Sport edition, this is the right Adappt for you. Every piece is built of strong, durable aluminum, then finished with an ionization treatment that gives it the right look and feel.

Adappt Stainless Steel - $39
Specifically developed for Apple Watch. Crafted from a single piece on steel, then finished with details to guarantee full compatibility with your steel Apple Watch.

Adappt Gold - $290
Our luxury proposal for your gold Apple Watch. Adappt Gold is strong like steel, that build its core, and beautiful like gold, which surrounds it all.

Adappt Edition - $3450
It's our limited edition. Only five Adappt Edition are available. They are built in Milan, in Italy, capital of vogue and lux, in 18-karat yellow or rose gold.
Every Adappt Edition spots an engraved number, from one to five, which makes it unique all over the world.

Watchbands

We're happy to announce our band and bracelets selection for Apple Watch.
These bands are made with quality materials and compatible with Adappt, so choice your favorite one and... have fun!
Rubber bands

Maximum length of rubber bands is 205mm.


Leather bands

Maximum length of leather bands is 170mm.

Metal bands

Maximum length of metal bracelets and milanese loop is 175mm.


Final products might slightly differ from pictures depending on availability and on your demand.

Who wrote about us

Questions

If you have any question or concern, please shoot us an email at info@adappt.watch and we will answer as soon as possible!
story_txt:
The Team




 Hello from Ludovico and Francesco!

We are two Italian students, passionate about new technologies and watches. 
		
	
	
		




Ludovico and Francesco are the creators of Adappt.


As soon as the Apple Watch was presented, we fell in love with its design and functionality.
However, we soon realized that it had a limitation: the watchbands. Apple decided to offer only six different watchbands, and at a very expensive price! 
This is why we created Adappt.




Adappt
Adappt is a small adapter, that will let you use your Apple Watch with any standard watchband. On one side it will feature Apple’s proprietary plug, on the other one the classic plug used by any watch in the world. 
Along with Adappt, we also offer a combination of adapter and watchband. You can get high quality rubber, leather or stainless steel bands in a wide variety of colors.




Designed in Italy.
   Versions
Adappt will be available in two sizes; one for the 38mm, supporting 22mm watchbands, and one for the 42mm Apple Watch, which can mount bands up to 24mm.

 
We are working very hard to manufacture Adappt with high quality materials, to make Adappt look just like it’s part of your Apple Watch.
Adappt will be available in plastic, anodized aluminium, stainless and gold plated steel. Each version will come in two colors, just like the Apple Watch.


Thanks to high quality materials, Adappt will match perfectly your Apple Watch. Our aluminum is anodized through an electro-chemical process that creates a porous surface, then coated with a dye, to look and feel exactly like the Sport edition versions, Silver and Space Grey Aluminum. 
Thanks to Adappt, the Sport is not limited to sports anymore. Match it with a classic band and you will be able to use your Apple Watch Sport in any occasion.


For the Stainless Steel version, we will use an alloy of stainless steel with the best strength/corrosion resistance ratio, we will then polish it to give it a clean mirror look, just like the Apple Watch’s Stainless Steel, and a darker elegant color, for the Space Black Stainless Steel, or we will plate it with yellow or rose gold for the Gold version. 








Status of the project & next steps




 We are almost ready to begin production. Our team managed to build accurate 3D models of the Apple Watch, to then produce the design of Adappt. We found reliable manufacturers for each material, that will help us deliver a well finished product.
The current models are really precise, although some modifications will be needed, as we don’t know the exact dimensions yet, but most of the work is already done!


We have also printed some 3D prototypes. Please note this are just prototypes made with raw plastic, and they don't have the closure mechanism, that will be implemented in the final version.




  
Packaging solutions
We are still working on the possible packaging solutions. At the moment we have decided to include in every Adappt a basic packaging solution which is flat, ecological and shipping-friendly. But if you wish a more sophisticated packaging, we offer that option as well, you can select the "Premium packaging" perk.
Anyways we will share both solutions with you very soon!

  Risks & Challenges There are always risks that can delay the process of delivering Adappt to you. We think you should know exactly what some of these are. 
Production: When making a new product, it’s possible to encounter obstacles in the technical aspect of the process. In case this happens, we will do anything we can to overcome them, and enhance the quality of the product. 
Supply: Adappt is made of different components, and each one of them comes from a different supplier. If only one of these suppliers has a long leadtime, there can be a delay for the entire production. 
Shipping: There is always a risk of the product getting stuck in customs, either when we are receiving the products from the factory or shipping them to you. We are prepared for this, and hopefully there won’t be any delays.

We are offering Adappt at a launch price to all of our contributors, to let everybody make Apple’s most personal device even more personal.

We are really excited about this, and we hope you are too. Now we need your help to bring Adappt to life.
As a supporter you will get your Adappt at a very special price! So please consider backing our project, and share it with your friends.
*Reminder: if we don't reach our goal you will be automatically get a refund.

story:
** UPDATE: Users have reported problems posting and asking questions in the Comments page. Please email me at sunny@prontodenim.com with your questions and I will post the Q&A here for all to see

Get intimate with the FLIP3D

During our campaign, we will be making videos to get you intimate with the FLIP3D case. You can watch them here:

• Evolution of the View Master: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H9X4PLQj4Xs
• A light-hearted 7 minute introduction video jam-packed with FLIP3D details and back story: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FSkhZEcD8R0
• SHORT Version of the Intro Video for those on the go: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KsDLP0SevVo

Introducing FLIP3D

The FLIP3D is an iPhone case that brings 3D content to your favourite smart phone. Viewing 3D content is super easy, simply FLIP the case over and you've got yourself instant 3D glasses.

With this accessory, we aim to bring about a 3D revolution on your iPhone. Apart from allowing you to view the thousands of 3D videos already available on YouTube, we want to inspire users to take their iPhone usage to the next level.

Available for iPhone 4 & 5.

RRP is $39.99. Indiegogo contributors get it for cheaper!

The 3D Revolution

The next level in iPhone photography and messaging. The Flip3D will be released alongside a 3D Social Photography app that allows users to create and share 3D pictures and messages with each other.

This special app will teach users how to take 3D photos with easy to understand step by step instructions.

On top of that, it is also a powerful photo editor. Users can take their existing 2D photos and add 3D elements to them. Floating text, animated stickers and a bevel/extrude tool will allow you to make beautiful 3D postcards out of any picture in your camera roll.

It's like a 3D Instagram but better.

A second app also comes at launch: 3D Channel. This app compiles all 3D content on the internet into one easy to find place plus a dedicated channel to highlight the best 3D photos and content made by users.

3D Channel App: Free
3D Social Photo App: $1.99

Me, Myself and 3D

In order to help you truly understand how I got into this relationship with 3D, let me give you a little background story.

Hi folks. My name is Sunny Sachdev and I'm the creator of the FLIP 3D.

It's funny - I have to admit that I used to dismiss 3D as just a shallow gimmick. But all that changed one day when I stumbled across my old View Master reels.

I picked it up again and starting viewing a scenic reel of some National Park. The images on there blew me away. What the 3D photographers achieved with these reels had inspired me.

I was hooked! I went on a 3D bender - collecting vintage View Masters and reels, day and night looking on eBay for my next fix. I suddenly found myself immersed in 3D photography, learning the principles and taking every opportunity to experiment. 

You know how when you're somewhere beautiful and no matter how much you try to capture it on a camera, it never does it justice? (No I'm not a bad photographer) 

With 3D photography, I captured it. That's when I knew that 3D could be something amazing.

Experimental as anything

I wanted 3D on my smart phone to take with me everywhere. And to my surprise there were already a handful of iPhone 3D viewers already on the market.

After some trial (and error) I found that half of them were bulky add-ons that were very impractical to carry around and the other half that boasted glasses-free options sacrificed quality and offered extremely limited viewing angles.

I had to make my own!

A Modern View Master

When I set out to design this product, the goal was to make 3D super accessible and easy - viewing 3D content a natural part of life. No need for extra peripherals or special displays.

Just you and 3D, in bed together and loving it.

Your Contribution

PORTION #1 $38,000

Most of the money from our campaign goes towards App development. We expect the App design, coding and server side work to cost us about $38k at the minimum. 

There are two apps. Main app - the 3D Social Photography app is very comprehensive (hence very expensive) - it's features includes the following:
• 3D Photo tutorial (teaching you 3D photography in a fun videogame style)
• 3D Camera (combines 2 photos (stereo pairs) into a side-by-side 3d image)
• 3D Postcard maker (adds 3D elements to 2D photos creating a side-by-side 3d image)
• FLIP3D online profile for each user. Post, private message and follow other users and their 3D work
• Server side features + competitions

2nd App is the 3D Channel. We aim to be provide extra content apart from what's already available on the internet - constantly creating our own 3D content in conjunction with other studios. 

So we need to pay
• App coder
• GUI Designer
• Server rental and maintainence
• Web portal designer and coder
• Service management team

PORTION #2 $2000

This portion will be added to my own out-of-pocket investment in the manufacturing of the Flip3D.

The costs are mainly in mold production, product manufacturing, packaging and distribution costs. We do not have a mold made yet - the samples seen here are done using a 3D printer (a very bad 3D printer - you can see some imperfections on one of the lens..impossible to find a good printer here in Thailand!)

STRETCH GOALS - we will start working on other popular phone models and an android app.

A WHOLE NEW WORLD

My main goal with Flip3d is to bring 3D to the mainstream and allow the masses to create and consume 3D content with extreme ease. Hence it's a case, it stays with you 24/7. And it looks cool too. At least I think so :)

I've been getting enquiries regarding the high budget. Here's why: what we are trying to do here is to create a new 3D culture in the mainstream. I don't just want to release a case - just a piece of plastic with lens on it. I want to release a new subculture - the case coupled with the App I'm creating makes the iPhone a super powerful tool.

What I'm creating is basically Instagram 3D COMPREHENSIVE edition. I will teach
the masses how to take 3D photos with a fun interactive game then when you're
ready, you can create and upload 3D photos. Post them to your wall and follow
other 3D photographers.

ALL IN ONE APP. We need to create exceptional user interface along with a team
to create, maintain and improve upon it. Basically making 3D photography
virtually NATIVE to the iPhone.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us spread the word and share this page by posting any of these links below on your Facebook profile, twitter and other social networks you're on:

• www.indiegogo.com/flip3d
• Evolution of the View Master: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H9X4PLQj4Xs
• A light-hearted 7 minute introduction video jam-packed with FLIP3D details and back story: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FSkhZEcD8R0
• SHORT Version of the Intro Video for those on the go: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KsDLP0SevVo

We appreciate your support!

Reward Pics


Please see in Gallery also!

We aim to be provide extra content apart from what's already available on the internet - constantly creating our own 3D content in conjunction with other studios. So we need to pay• App coder• GUI Designer• Server rental and maintainence• Web portal designer and coder• Service management teamPORTION #2 $2000This portion will be added to my own out-of-pocket investment in the manufacturing of the Flip3D.The costs are mainly in mold production, product manufacturing, packaging and distribution costs. story:
Most of us love to read or watch movies on our iPads or tablets while relaxing on the sofa or lying in bed. Unfortunately, this often leads to sore arms, neck strain and eye strain.

If you use your tablet in bed for long periods of time, then we have the perfect solution for you- a new, unique tablet holder that comes with it cushion / pillow.

Introducing the Holder Cushion:


Use it in bed, on the sofa, and everywhere else you like!

What It Is

The Holder Cushion is designed to hold your iPad, tablet or your smart phone securely, while being attached to a cushion with a sturdy base plate. The flexible goose neck arm allows great range of movement, so you can adjust your tablet to the perfect viewing position.

It’s a must for anyone who loves to read their iPads, tablets or similar devices in bed or lying down, for any length of time!

According to several surveys, more than 60% of tablet users use their iPads or tablets in bed every night- for reading, watching videos, checking the news, etc.

By using a well-designed tablet holder like this, you can use your tablet for hours comfortably and prevent any eye, neck or back-strain problems.

Enjoy keeping your hands free while reading the tablet, and adjust the tablet to the most comfortable position. No more sore arms while holding your tablet aloft!

How It Works

The cushion/pillow tablet holder is ergonomically designed with a strong but flexible rod that is attached to a base plate at the back of a cushion. This allows the user maximum flexibility to place their tablet at a suitable angle and distance, which is most convenient for them while lying in bed or on the sofa.

The flexible goose neck is one of the longest in available models: nearly 38 inches, which offers a large range of adjustable area for your comfort


The tablet holder is designed to be universally compatible and can accommodate any tablet. The adjustable holder arms can be made to fit most iPads and tablet sizes securely, without any risk of your tablet slipping or falling. You can even use it with your smartphones.

A simple yet innovative solution for tablet users, designed for the comfort and convenience of users. With the increasing number of uses for a tablet in our lives today, this cool and helpful device can make your tablet even more fun to use.

So lie back, and enjoy playing games, watching movies and reading books on your tablet comfortably!

Features

·  Sturdy construction: Built with a high quality flexible rod that connects the tablet holder to the base of the cushion. The goose neck arm is very strong and robust, to prevent any sagging.

·  Flexibility: Allows for a 360 degrees adjustment for any position. You can adjust the tablet holder to any suitable angle or position.

·  Easy to setup and use: Light weight, well-designed and totally mobile. Comes pre-assembled, and requires minimal setup.

·  Use it anywhere you want: Attaches easily to cushions or pillows of any size or style. You can even place it on a desk or kitchen counter, if you like.

·  Universally compatible: The tablet holder is designed to be universally compatible with any brand or size of tablet. Compatible with Apple iPad 1,2,3,4, iPad Mini, Samsung Galaxy Tab, Galaxy Note, Microsoft Surface, Kindle Fire series, Nexus, and any other tablet of similar dimensions.

·  Secure tablet position: The holder with adjustable arms can keep your valuable tablet firmly and securely in place, without any risk of slipping or falling down.

·  Avoid health issues: Designed to provide you maximum comfort and ease of use. Read your tablet comfortably in any position. No more sore arms, neck strain and eye strain!

·  Hands-free: Enjoy having your hands free while you read your tablet. The ABC will holder your tablet afloat at a comfortable angle for typing, reading, playing games, etc.

·  Stylish design: Designed to look good in any décor or setting. Use it on the sofa, in the bed or anywhere you want. Cool, revolutionary and stylish. Comes in a choice of black, white and silver color.

The crowdfunding campaign

We have designed the Holder Cushion to be effective and robust, using considerable talent, labor, and resources to put it together. In order to make this device available to tablet users as soon as possible we require crowdfunding support to cover the initial production costs, materials sourcing, skilled labor, and marketing and promotional activities.

We have already designed, developed and perfected the Holder Cushion. We intend for this to be a high quality and attractive device that you can use anywhere for a long time. We have laid the initial groundwork for a successful product, and now we just need to take it to the next stage and make it available for all.

Our hope is to raise $40,000 through the Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign to cover the initial project costs, until the project can successfully sustain itself. With your support, we hope to have this cool tablet holder available by June 2015.


Other ways you can help

Any support and assistance would be appreciated in getting this product off the ground. Spreading the word about the benefits of this device would be very helpful.

Please do share this with your friends and family, and help us to get this cool, stylish and convenient device into the hands of every tablet user.

We believe that our creations will definitely have a positive impact in the world, whether big or small.

Our constant focus is on trying to solve problems, and come up with creative solutions for many of life’s little (and large) problems. Our latest creation is this Holder Cushion, which is designed to make it easier for you to use your tablet or ipad while lying in bed or on the sofa. For the large market size of tablet users, it will offer a cool and stylish way to use their tablet.

FAQ

·  Which devices is the tablet holder compatible with?

The tablet holder can accommodate any ipad or tablet in the current market. With the adjustable holder arms, you can change the size of the holder to fit any device securely.

·  How and where can I use it?

You can use the tablet holder while you are on a sofa, bed, chair, and anywhere you are planning on using the tablet. The base of the holder also can slide underneath any cushion or pillow seperately. The heavier base will keep the pillow in place, while the flexible arm with the tablet can move around securely.

(If the base plate can be safely placed on a flat surface, then there are many more ways to use this device) You can use it on your desk, by placing the base plate on the desk surface, and adjusting the holder to a suitable reading position. You can place it on the kitchen counter, and look at it while you work. And you can find many more possible ways to use this!

·  Is the tablet holder heavy?

The tablet holder device is compact and lightweight. It is made with tough plastic and aluminum (or steel), and designed to be sturdy yet light.

·  Can I move the holder to any position? How far can I extend the arm?

The flexible arm can be moved up and down, and to the side until it is at a comfortable viewing position for you. It can be extended from the pillow. Thus you will have enough room to move the holder in front of you or to the side.

·  Is there any assembly required for the tablet holder?

The tablet holder will be mostly pre-assembled when we ship it, and you will only have to insert the flexible tube into the base plate and the holder arms, using the connectors provided in the kit. The simple set-up instructions will be provided with the kit.

Thank you for your support!

We appreciate all of your support and assistance in getting this project off the ground! We thank everyone for their contribution, assistance and/or moral support for this project. Please let others know about this project, and share with Facebook, Twitter, etc.

THIS IS A FIXED FUNDING CAMPAIGN; THAT MEANS,

this campaign will only receive funds if at least the GOAL is raised by its deadline. Otherwise all "money" for the perks from the backers come, WILL BE REFUNDED FULLY without any fees or costs.

We would also love to hear from you with any feedback or suggestions. Please drop us a message at: ggvnmail@gmail.com

several surveys, more than 60% of tablet users use their iPads or tablets in
bed every night- for reading, watching videos, checking the news, etc. By using
a well-designed tablet holder like this, you can use your tablet for hours
comfortably and prevent any eye, neck or back-strain problems. 
Enjoy keeping your
hands free while reading the tablet, and adjust the tablet to the most
comfortable position. No more sore arms while holding your tablet aloft!How It Works
The
cushion/pillow tablet holder is ergonomically designed with a strong but flexible
rod that is attached to a base plate at the back of a cushion. This
allows the user maximum flexibility to place their tablet at a suitable angle
and distance, which is most convenient for them while lying in bed or on the
sofa.
The flexible
goose neck is one of the longest in available models: nearly 38 inches, which offers
a large range of adjustable area for your comfortThe tablet
holder is designed to be universally compatible and can accommodate any tablet.
The adjustable holder arms can be made to fit most iPads and tablet sizes
securely, without any risk of your tablet slipping or falling. You can even use
it with your smartphones.A simple yet
innovative solution for tablet users, designed for the comfort and convenience
of users. With the increasing number of uses for a tablet in our lives today, this
cool and helpful device can make your tablet even more fun to use.
So lie back,
and enjoy playing games, watching movies and reading books on your tablet
comfortably!Features
· 
Sturdy construction: Built with a high quality flexible rod that
connects the tablet holder to the base of the cushion. The goose neck arm is
very strong and robust, to prevent any sagging.
· 
Flexibility: Allows for a 360 degrees adjustment for any
position. You can adjust the tablet holder to any suitable angle or position.
· 
Easy to setup and use: Light weight, well-designed and totally
mobile. Comes pre-assembled, and requires minimal setup. 
· 
Use it anywhere you want: Attaches easily to cushions or pillows of
any size or style. You can even place it on a desk or kitchen counter, if you
like.
· 
Universally compatible: The tablet holder is designed to be
universally compatible with any brand or size of tablet. Compatible
with Apple iPad 1,2,3,4, iPad Mini, Samsung Galaxy Tab, Galaxy Note, Microsoft
Surface, Kindle Fire series, Nexus, and any other tablet of similar dimensions.
· 
Secure tablet position: The holder with adjustable arms can keep
your valuable tablet firmly and securely in place, without any risk of slipping
or falling down.
· 
Avoid health issues: Designed to provide you maximum comfort and
ease of use. Read your tablet comfortably in any position. No more sore arms, neck
strain and eye strain!
· 
Hands-free: Enjoy having your hands free while you read
your tablet. The ABC will holder your tablet afloat at a comfortable angle for
typing, reading, playing games, etc. 
· 
Stylish design: Designed to look good in any décor or
setting. Use it on the sofa, in the bed or anywhere you want. Cool,
revolutionary and stylish. Comes in a choice of black, white and silver color.The
crowdfunding campaign
We have
designed the Holder Cushion to be effective and robust, using considerable
talent, labor, and resources to put it together. In order to make this device
available to tablet users as soon as possible we require crowdfunding support
to cover the initial production costs, materials sourcing, skilled labor, and
marketing and promotional activities. 
We have already designed,
developed and perfected the Holder Cushion. We intend for this to be
a high quality and attractive device that you can use anywhere for a long time.
We have laid the initial groundwork for a successful product, and now we just
need to take it to the next stage and make it available for all.
Our hope is to raise $40,000 through the Indiegogo
crowdfunding campaign to cover the initial project costs, until the project can
successfully sustain itself. With your support, we hope to have this cool
tablet holder available by June 2015. Other ways you can help
Any support and
assistance would be appreciated in getting this product off the ground. Spreading
the word about the benefits of this device would be very helpful. 
Please do share
this with your friends and family, and help us to get this cool, stylish and
convenient device into the hands of every tablet user.
We believe that our
creations will definitely have a positive impact in the world, whether big or
small. 
Our constant focus is on trying to solve problems, and
come up with creative solutions for many of life’s little (and large) problems.
Our latest creation is this Holder Cushion, which is designed to make it easier for you to use your
tablet or ipad while lying in bed or on the sofa. For the large market size of tablet users, it
will offer a cool and stylish way to use their tablet. 

FAQ
· 
Which devices is
the tablet holder compatible with?
The tablet holder can accommodate any ipad or tablet in the current market.
With the adjustable holder arms, you can change the size of the holder to fit
any device securely.
· 
How and where can I use it?
You can use the tablet holder while you are on a sofa, bed, chair, and
anywhere you are planning on using the tablet. The base of the holder also can slide
underneath any cushion or pillow seperately. The heavier base will keep the pillow in
place, while the flexible arm with the tablet can move around securely. 
(If the base plate
can be safely placed on a flat surface, then there are many more ways to use
this device) You can use it on your desk, by placing the base plate on
the desk surface, and adjusting the holder to a suitable reading position. You
can place it on the kitchen counter, and look at it while you work. And you can
find many more possible ways to use this!
· 
Is the tablet holder heavy? 
The tablet holder device is compact and lightweight. It is made with
tough plastic and aluminum (or steel), and designed to be sturdy yet light. 
· 
Can I move the
holder to any position? How far can I extend the arm?
The flexible arm can be moved up and down, and to the side until it is
at a comfortable viewing position for you. It can be extended from the pillow. Thus you will have enough room to move the holder in front of you
or to the side.
· 
Is there any
assembly required for the tablet holder?
The tablet holder will be mostly pre-assembled when we ship it, and you
will only have to insert the flexible tube into the base plate and the holder
arms, using the connectors provided in the kit. The simple set-up instructions
will be provided with the kit.Thank you for your support!
We appreciate
all of your support and assistance in getting this project off the ground! We
thank everyone for their contribution, assistance and/or moral support for this
project. Please let others know about this project, and share with Facebook,
Twitter, etc.THIS IS A FIXED FUNDING CAMPAIGN; THAT MEANS, 
this campaign will only receive funds if at least the GOAL is
 raised by its deadline. Otherwise all "money" for the perks from the 
backers come, WILL BE REFUNDED FULLY without any fees or costs.We would also
love to hear from you with any feedback or suggestions. Please drop us a
message at: ggvnmail@gmail.com

story:
Over the past year, TUDIA has crafted multiple styles of phone cases and accessories for the Essential PH-1 Phone.

While we had not planned to design additional cases for the Essential PH-1, we listened to the requests of phone owners and discovered there were many people still looking for the perfect bumper case. 

By combining the talents of our design team and with the insights of actual PH-1 phone owners, we were able to come up with a minimal bumper case design that allows the back of the phone to be exposed and shown off, while still keeping the corner's of the phone safe.

This case we have created together is perhaps the best case to compliment the minimal design of the Essential Phone.

Funding

In designing any case, there’s a lot of initial investment costs. On top of the costs of production and  manufacturing alone, there's a whole team of designers, engineers, and staff that have to be paid. We have to be careful in which projects we decide to undertake because in order to recoup our investment costs we need to sell thousands of cases. For us to break even on producing this case, we need fans to show their support and help us raise USD $8,000. This project is a "fixed goal" campaign, meaning this project will only proceed so long as our funding goal is met.

Now is the time for you (the Essential Phone Fans!) to make this case a reality. With your support, we hope to make the case we have created together into something real.

story:
Why 4U ?

Our ambition with this project is to make a start to get rid of still the many chargers that people have in their homes.

While having and using many portable devices all still come with separate chargers. Highly inconvenient and a lot of hassle to easily find and plug the right charger.

Most of these popular devices though can be charged with a simple USB cable. So why are we still using seperate adapters at all if all you really need is a simple USB cable ?

Wouldn't it be nice to have no chargers lying around in your home ?

We designed 4U, the USB Power Socket. 4 USB high current USB charging ports designed into a wall socket. 

Simply remove a standard wall socket and replace it with the USB Power Socket is pretty much all you need to do.

And as from then plug USB cables (that are being supplied with the devices anyway) directly into our USB wall socket. 

No separate chargers needed any longer.

USB powered wireless headphones, smartphones up to the latest tablets. Anything that can be charged with a USB cable is suitable for charging via the 4U USB Power Socket. Not 1 or 2, but up 4 devices can be charged at the same time.

 

Our ambition

Our first goal is to get 4U implemented in as many homes as possible.

But.....imagine our sockets would be installed in hotels, offices, airports, restaurants or even in furniture (yes, that's possible as well) etc ? The only thing you would have to take is your USB cables. No more plastic bag of chargers to take on a travel, holiday etc.

Not even having mentioned the enormous number of chargers that no longer need to be manufactured which certainly helps in finally saving a lot of e-waste.  

Would be fantastic, isn’t it ?

Join us on our mission to get rid of seperate chargers.

We'll start in Europe. 4U, the USB Power Socket will be designed in such a way that it will fit as single square unit and in most existing European dual socket boxes (a bit smaller than the drawing below to integrate it into existing designs) as below.

In addition we'll design a distinguishing round face plate with cable organizers, if you want really something else.

So, if you support us you'll get a 4U USB Power Socket to replace an existing EU wall socket and 3 different face plates. A square face plate and a round face plate with cable organizers to replace a single wall socket and another face plate to integrate it into a dual socket.

Below you can see our prototype. We will continue to upgrade and finally 4U will be supplied in a nice finishing. We'll update our gallery to keep you informed !!

Not living in continental Europe ? If we manage to get funding done for the EU version you probably will see us again soon after this campaign with other socket equivalents.

How to achieve our goals

To make the European version of the 4U USB Power Socket happen, we need $70.000.

With this amount we can finalize the working prototype of 4U, the USB Power Socket. 

The $70.000 are needed for following:

  • $20.000 to finalize designs and moulding

  • $15.000 for certifications

  • $35.000 for production set up and the first production run

The planning

If you join our mission and we succeed in realizing the funding goal we will try to get 4U, the USB Power Socket with you March 2014. Planning looks as follows:

  • End July 2013: End of funding
  • August - September 2013: Finalize designs and moulding concept
  • September 2013 - January 2014: Getting certification
  • January 2014 - March 2014: Production & delivery

Of course we try to supply faster. Experience has shown though that is necessary to reserve quite some time for the important certifications.

Check out the campaign page regularly. Whenever possible we'll post new information.

About us

The 4U USB Power Socket project is conducted and handled by the team of ON Solutions Ltd, a company specialized in bringing multi charging solutions to the market.

The company holds business enthousiasts who are experienced with product & new technology introductions.

story:
Lets Bring SelfPic Pro to the retail market! Be the first to get it via Indiegogo!

_______________________________________________________________________


Wirelessly control the camera on your iPhone and iPad! Take your self-portraits to the next level. Just POINT, and CLICK to capture.

The Problem: 

Are you tired of taking self-photos from an arm's length and cropping half of your face out by accident?

Q: Are you tired of the stigma and poor results from taking a selfy in the mirror?
Q: Are you looking for an alternative to setting the timer and running to make it into a group photo?
Q: Are you looking for a way to capture great candid memories?

If you answered YES to any of these questions then you probably need SelfPic Pro.




The Solution: 

SelfPic Pro is a wireless remote trigger that allows you to activate the shutter release on your iPhone and iPad camera without any installation or special software.

It can even work through a layer of clothing, so you can keep it in your pocket and capture the perfect photo!

How it Works:

SelfPic Pro is made up of 2 parts: the Transmitter and the Receiver. While pointed at the Receiver, the Transmitter emits an Infrared signal at the push of a button. The Receiver connects to your iPhone or iPad through the audio head-phone jack. You can aim the Transmitter at the back or front of the Receiver. No Special software or installation required.

Photo:  Using the standard Camera App, when the Receiver is signaled by the Transmitter, a photo is taken.

Video:  If the Camera App is in Video mode, the press of the Transmitter button will both START and STOP the recording function, allowing you to capture video remotely.


Technical: Technically speaking, the SelfPic Pro utilizes the same control that the typical Apple headphone volume control uses. Just as you can press the Volume+ button on the side of your iPhone to trip the shutter of your camera, the Volume+ button on your stock Apple headphones does the same. Within the mobile device, the receiver inserted into the head-phone jack of the iPhone or iPad acts the exact same way, with the addition of a wireless transmitter. Its simple integration for a very powerful line of Apple products. We really have Apple to thank for that availability.

The infrared transmitter technology is not some cold-war secret. It's the same as is used for your TV remote. The power-source is a 3V CR2032 lithium battery that comes with the unit, and is replaceable.

Features:

  • Maximum Range of 6 meters.
  • Portable size
  • Compact design
  • Accessory lanyard with audio-jack plug and circle clip
  • Replaceable battery (included)
  • No Installation Required
  • No special software required



Compatibility:

SelfPic Pro is universally compatible with all generations of iPhone and iPad.

Possible Uses:

  • Self Portraits
  • Group shots
  • Pet Photos
  • Candid Photos
  • Self-shot Casting Videos
  • Video Blogging


Funding and Delivery:

By backing this project, you are essentially pre-ordering the SelfPic Pro. Once the project has been successfully backed, the pledges will be used to cover the costs of tooling and materials to execute a successful mass production. Any extra capital raised will also be put towards the possibility of developing a smaller PCB which would in-turn make the Receiver smaller for potential future models of the SelfPic Pro. Based on estimates, by the manufacturer in Dongguan, China, products will be all ready to ship within 4 weeks after successful completion of the project! Thank you so much for all the interest and support. The project would not be possible without you!

Production and Fulfillment:

Our partners in production: A Chinese electronic factory in Dongguan, China has been enlisted to carry out the production aspects of this project. Initial contact with them came about through existing business contacts also from manufacturing of customized electronic goods. They are responsible for transforming the concept into a functional reality. Close collaboration between the creators and the production partner has resulted in a joint effort that is turning out a fun and functional product hopefully at the lowest price possible.

Why it's possible: Full-quality units are already a reality, but a large first mass production run is required to bring the retail costs down as low as possible in order to make SelfPic Pro available to the retail market in the the future and also to make the initial splash into the market a substantial one. The creators of SelfPic Pro are experienced carrying through projects from conceptualization to execution, but your support is needed to make SelfPic Pro available to everyone. Electronic manufacturing is left to the experts on this one; the manufacturing partner. We just need your support financially to take SelfPic Pro to the next step. We also appreciate your shameless plugs on your blogs, forum pages, and gadget review sites. We thank you in advance!

Our production has progressed as follows and has all been attained in during 2013:

CURRENT STAGE: #7

1. Concept Development - Creators wished to create a trigger for Apple products. Solve the problem of poorly-taken self-portraits.
2. Evaluate technical function and technology- IR transmission vs. bluetooth and power source as collaboratively decided upon by owners and manufacturer.
3. Body Design - Carried out by manufacturer: primarily functional body design to accommodate the PCB in the receiver, and fitment of the transmitter into the receiver for portability.
4. Prototyping - produce functional units for testing (carried out by our partner manufacturer in mainland China), QC carried out in collaboration between creators and manufacturing partner.
5. Revision and Improvements - improve fitment via mold revision, battery placement, minimize costs, improve range, etc.
6. Prepared for Full-Quality Production Final approval provided by creators.
7. Launch Indiegogo project - First order required at manufacturing partner's minimum qty to secure lowest production costs.
8. Mass production - carried out by manufacturing partner after deposit..
9. Receive goods at SelfPic Pro location and re-distribute - done by mail to backers who donated at the various reward levels.
10. Provide an online purchasing portal - to give everyone access to SelfPic Pro products.

Our Story:

The creators of this projects are experienced models who have traveled the world spending much time in front of the camera. Always needing to take new updated "snap shots" and "casting videos" for potential bookings from remote locations, too many hours were spent running back and forth to the camera, working on framing the shot and pressing the shutter button on a timer. Such activity gave rise to SelfPic Pro. The perfect solution... no matter the reason you need to control you camera remotely. Combining their experience with self-shot photos, the creators mixed in their ingenuity and production know-how to come up with a fun product that is highly functional and quite useful. Having championed some great start-up concepts in the past, Taber Maier and Pierce Fabian hope to continue to bring fun and useful products to everyone...this time through Indiegogo.

An existing relationship between the creators and the manufacturing partner has created quite the partnership for this project based on mutual respect underlined by legal agreement. The true value in the product, in our opinion, is captured by the functionality and the real-life problem that SelfPic Pro offers a solution to. Creative, out-of-the-box thinking within the parameters of technological possibilities is what this project is all about. Remote controls have existed for years for all sorts of products including consumer cameras, but never one specifically for the iPhone and iPad; the most used camera in the world!


This Apple IPhone video perfectly showcases the place that a product like SelfPic Pro has in the marketplace.

Challenges: 

-From what we know about manufacturing over-seas, production delays are a very real possibility, and so are mis-shipments and flawed product. By funding this project we hope to minimize errors on the mass produced future retail units.

-Delays in shipping domestically and internationally are always a factor....like when Apple launches a new product and FedEx's efforts elsewhere come to a standstill.

-Starting new overseas manufacturing with a factory always takes some time to get rolling since they too work harder for loyal customers, so we hope that with this project we can develop a long-lasting relationship with our current manufacturer and ensure delivery times and prices stay within reasonable limits.


The Team:

TABER MAIER: With a professional athletic career under his belt, and a current deep involvement in the Fitness and Personal Health and Wellness sector, Taber's successes extend into entrepreneurial concepts and start-ups. His background stems from having studying Sport Psychology, but his extensive travel experience as an international models makes him an expert on being in front of the camera.  Taber's previous involvements in start-ups in the travel and tourism industry have given him the exposure to exciting new opportunities and approaches to entrepreneurial concepts that have now brought him to start SelfPic Pro.

PIERCE FABIAN:  Pierce, also brandishing a career as an international model, currently operates a manufacturing company that specializes in electronic gifts, and tech premiums that are purchased worldwide as branded promotional products.  With long standing roots in product development and manufacturing, Pierce's entrepreneurial prowess keeps him working on new and exciting concepts all the time.  As a member of ASI (Advertising Specialties Institute), PPAI (Promotional Products Associate International), and PSI (Promotional Product Service Institute), Pierce lives and breathes fun and functional electronics.

Together, IndieGoGoers Taber Maier and Pierce Fabian are very familiar with being on both sides of the camera, so if anyone knows the benefits of a wireless remote trigger for their iPhone and iPad camera, they do.  Self-shot casting videos and snap-shots were the primary instances of reference for this project, but the applications and scenarios where SelfPic Pro can be used are limitless...

 lowest price possible.Why it's possible: Full-quality units are already a reality, but a large first mass production run is required to bring the retail costs down as low as possible in order to make SelfPic Pro available to the retail market in the the future and also to make the initial splash into the market a substantial one. The creators of
 SelfPic Pro are experienced carrying through projects from conceptualization to execution, but your support is needed to make SelfPic Pro available to everyone. Electronic manufacturing is left to 
the experts on this one; the manufacturing partner. We just need your support financially to take SelfPic Pro to the next step. We also appreciate your shameless plugs on your blogs, forum pages, and gadget review sites. We thank you in advance!Our production has progressed as follows and has all been attained in during 2013:CURRENT STAGE: #71. Concept Development - Creators wished to create a trigger for Apple products. Solve the problem of poorly-taken self-portraits.2. Evaluate technical function and technology- IR transmission vs. bluetooth and power source as collaboratively decided upon by owners and manufacturer.3. Body Design
 - Carried out by manufacturer: primarily functional body design to 
accommodate the PCB in the receiver, and fitment of the transmitter into
 the receiver for portability.4. Prototyping
 - produce functional units for testing (carried out by our partner 
manufacturer in mainland China), QC carried out in collaboration between
 creators and manufacturing partner.5. Revision and Improvements
 - improve fitment via mold revision, battery placement, minimize costs, improve range, etc.6. Prepared for Full-Quality Production Final approval provided by creators.7. Launch Indiegogo project - First order required at manufacturing partner's minimum qty to secure lowest production costs.8. Mass production - carried out by manufacturing partner after deposit..9. Receive goods at SelfPic Pro location and re-distribute - done by mail to backers who donated at the various reward levels.10. Provide an online purchasing portal - to give everyone access to SelfPic Pro products.
Our Story:
The
 creators of this projects are experienced models who have traveled the 
world spending much time in front of the camera. Always needing to take 
new updated "snap shots" and "casting videos" for potential bookings 
from remote locations, too many hours were spent running back and forth 
to the camera, working on framing the shot and pressing the shutter 
button on a timer. Such activity gave rise to SelfPic Pro. The perfect 
solution... no matter the reason you need to control you camera 
remotely. Combining their experience with self-shot photos, the creators
 mixed in their ingenuity and production know-how to come up with a fun 
product that is highly functional and quite useful. Having championed 
some great start-up concepts in the past, Taber Maier and Pierce Fabian 
hope to continue to bring fun and useful products to everyone...this 
time through Indiegogo.An existing relationship between the creators and the 
manufacturing partner has created quite the partnership for this project
 based on mutual respect underlined by legal agreement. The true value 
in the product, in our opinion, is captured by the functionality and the
 real-life problem that SelfPic Pro offers a solution to. Creative, 
out-of-the-box thinking within the parameters of technological possibilities is what this project is all about. Remote controls have 
existed for years for all sorts of products including consumer cameras, 
but never one specifically for the iPhone and iPad; the most used camera
 in the world!

This Apple IPhone video perfectly showcases the place that a product like SelfPic Pro has in the marketplace.


Challenges: 

-From what we know about manufacturing over-seas, production 
delays are a very real possibility, and so are mis-shipments and flawed 
product. By funding this project we hope to minimize errors on the mass 
produced future retail units.
-Delays in shipping domestically and internationally are always a 
factor....like when Apple launches a new product and FedEx's efforts 
elsewhere come to a standstill.
-Starting new overseas manufacturing with a factory always takes some
 time to get rolling since they too work harder for loyal customers, so 
we hope that with this project we can develop a long-lasting 
relationship with our current manufacturer and ensure delivery times and
 prices stay within reasonable limits.

The Team:



TABER MAIER: With a professional athletic career under his belt, and a current deep involvement in the Fitness and Personal Health and Wellness sector, Taber's successes extend into entrepreneurial concepts and start-ups. His background stems from having studying Sport Psychology, but his extensive travel experience as an international models makes him an expert on being in front of the camera.  Taber's previous involvements in start-ups in the travel and tourism industry have given him the exposure to exciting new opportunities and approaches to entrepreneurial concepts that have now brought him to start SelfPic Pro.
PIERCE FABIAN:  Pierce, also brandishing a career as an international model, currently operates a manufacturing company that specializes in electronic gifts, and tech premiums that are purchased worldwide as branded promotional products.  With long standing roots in product development and manufacturing, Pierce's entrepreneurial prowess keeps him working on new and exciting concepts all the time.  As a member of ASI (Advertising Specialties Institute), PPAI (Promotional Products Associate International), and PSI (Promotional Product Service Institute), Pierce lives and breathes fun and functional electronics.Together, IndieGoGoers Taber Maier and Pierce Fabian are very familiar with being on both sides of the camera, so if anyone knows the benefits of a wireless remote trigger for their iPhone and iPad camera, they do.  Self-shot casting videos and snap-shots were the primary instances of reference for this project, but the applications and scenarios where SelfPic Pro can be used are limitless...

story:
Intro

Hey everyone, my name is Chris Bell and I would like to finish up work on my handheld, portable GameCube. I began working on this project last summer, and have since learned an *indescribable* amount of information about circuitry, electricity, computer hardware, etc. I went from knowing nothing about what I was doing to being able to finish a working prototype of a handheld. Using my new comprehension, I would like to re-imagine the design of my handheld and create a clean, sleek portable GameCube this summer. Be sure to check out my other videos in the Gallery section!

What do I need the money for?

Case

  • I made the current case for my portable by thermoforming clear acrylic plastic in my oven using a hand carved, unsymmetrical wooden mold. Not the most professional way to make a case. For my final product, I am interested in 3D printing a smaller and sleeker case as well as buttons using an online printing locator/service such as makexyz.com. I expect the final dimensions of my case to be around 18cm(w) x 9cm(h) x 3.5cm(d). Dimensions of my prototype are approx. 20cm(w) x 9cm(h) x 7cm(d). The large width of my portable will be due to the 5" diagonal screen I plan to reuse from my prototype. I am experienced with the 3D modeling tool Blender; however for this project I am designing the case using Google SketchUp. I expect to complete the model and print by the end of the month.

Hardware

  • Thankfully, I have already completed the most tedious part of the creation process by significantly reducing the size of the GameCube's motherboard and relocating/rewiring essential GameCube functionality. I would still like to minimize space inside the handheld by swapping a few of my perfboard circuits with homemade etched PCB's. I plan to add a couple of other circuits to improve the functionality of my handheld, including support for headphone jack switching, low battery indication, and automated power supply swapping while using an Atmel microcontroller. Speaking of batteries; I want to add rechargeable li-ion's to my portable! Lastly, I will significantly reduce the depth of my portable by removing the Wii disk drive and replacing it with an SD loading mechanism.
 

Hmm...alright. But what's with the large goal?

I am the only person working on this project. I'm a student, and I've often spent days during the past year working on the prototype for 12 or more hours straight. Because I am producing a single portable, I cannot offer much variety in terms of rewards. I want to make sure enough people choose the photobook reward so that I don't throw myself into the situation where I spend a lot time in college designing/ordering photobooks for only a few people. Simply put, I want to balance the effort/reward ratio.

Pictures!!

GameCube game ready to load after successfully loading Metroid Prime.
 

This is what my reduced size motherboard looks like. Preparing to apply thermal paste and mount heatsink.

After soldering and mounting a Wii disk drive, this is what I ended up with. The disk drive conceals most of the wires from earlier pics.

This is how I had the bottom half of my case setup up back in February. A single fan with voltage regulators, motherboard, heatsink, and disk drive relocations.

 

When will I finish?

Ideally, I will finish before I head off to college late August. My project will be prone to unanticipated problems which may delay when I finish. I have carefully considered my rewards so that even if I utterly fail/destroy my hardware while working on my project, I will at the very least be able to deliver them on time.

Will I sell it?

Probably not :). I want to have fun with this.
