story:
Do you have your smartphone on you at all times? Do you keep it on your desk while you’re at work, or are you glued to it when you’re on a date or at home? Never want to go without it? We got it—we feel the same way!

Never do? Don't worry, this is normal... But why? Well, it’s been scientifically proven that because the act itself is transparent and not specifically deliberate, it is harder to follow through. Another scientific study has proven that simply having our smartphone in sight, even if it is inactive, affects our cognitive resources and depletes our brain, which leads to stress and fatigue.

Our work with sociologists has given us a chance to better understand our smartphone habits and behaviors, leading us to ponder how we can change our everyday smartphone use.

The Yuman.Case is a smartphone capsule to free you from the distractions of your smartphone and helps you fully focus on the present moment. Learn to enjoy quality time with family and friends or boost your productivity. Just slip your smartphone into the Yuman.Case without having to touch or turn off any settings.

The Yuman.Case is here to help you choose your moments of digital connection and will guide you as you form new smartphone habits through your own small selected breaks.

 

 

 

 

 

Thanks to Yuman.x, choose with just a simple gesture when to prioritize your digital or in-person connections. Take back control of your time and live how you want in your augmented present.

The Yuman.Case has been designed to give you a break when you need it most. Place it on your desk when you’re at work, or make use of it at home to spend time with your loved ones. Thanks to the Yuman.Case, you can now preserve those little moments of human connection you so cherish:

 

 

 

 

 

While smartphones do have “airplane” and “do not disturb” modes, and turning them off is another option, we have to ask ourselves how often this actually happens. In fact, in-depth sociological research on smartphone usage behavior has demonstrated that an object must have a tangible, visible solution in order to be implemented. The Yuman.Case goes beyond the functions of airplane or do not disturb mode by illustrating in one simple gesture a break from your digital world. 

Cannot go without your phone? Don’t worry! The Yuman.Case is not about cutting you off completely from your digital world. It is simply here to help you find a different way to connect.

Thanks to the Yuman.Case, you can explicitly demonstrate your full-on attention with a simple gesture and form new healthy habits! 

 

How often do you check your phone while talking with your friends or playing with your kids? 

Take advantage of the priceless gift of time when you need it most by gently masking outside distraction without any digital interruption. Use the Yuman.Case at home to ensure some quality time alone or with family and friends. The Yuman.Case is here to show others you care.

 

Working in a room without a phone increases your productivity by 26%.

With the Yuman.Case, block out distractions for the time you need. Fewer distractions mean heightened attention and preserved focus, so you’re always living in the present. 

Carry the Yuman.Case to work to concentrate on a task, stay focused in a meeting, or demonstrate your consideration for a client.

 

Stress, sleep disturbance, depression, FOMO: heavy phone use can have many effects on our morale and our brain. Using your smartphone heavily prevents the mind (and body) from resting and regenerating.

But it is not your fault! Never-ending notifications from our phones constantly stimulate our minds and have created natural reflexes in users.

Connect a different way with the Yuman.Case. Rest your body and mind for a moment and lower your stress level!

 

Communication tools’ forever presence has upset the boundaries between our personal and professional life. This creates psychosocial risks of overwork. It’s no secret that smartphones can strongly infringe on your right to disconnect and well-being. Unfortunately, our current day and age of remote work isn’t helping, either.

Slide your smartphone into the Yuman.Case when you get home or finish work to enjoy time for you.

 

 

Bluetooth, GSM, 3G, 4G, or even 5G: beyond its ability to contain electromagnetic fields, the impenetrable Yuman.Case secures anything from going in or out and is guaranteed to protect your data.

 

 

 

Got the biggest smartphone ever? Don't worry! We've got you covered! The Yuman.Case is compatible with every single smartphone on the market, even those equipped with a case.  

The maximum dimensions for a phone are: 179x97x21mm

 

 

 

 

 

Expertly fashioned with natural oak and aluminum alloy, it blends natural and high-tech materials for a capsule that is sleek, modern, and durable.

The unique opening mechanism created by the Yuman.x team is characterized by its sophisticated and high-tech design.

Simply close the Yuman.Case lid and a flexible honeycomb foam specially developed by our team gently secures your phone and keeps it in place. Guaranteed protection no matter what. After two years of development, the perfect mix between design, pleasure, and technology has been achieved.

 

* Measures in millimeters

The maximum dimensions for a phone are: 179x97x21mm

 

If we reach our initial goal of €5K, we’ll be able to produce the first range of the Yuman.Case. If we pass this goal and reach €30K, we’ll be able to produce another range of the Yuman.Case in dark grey.

 

 

 

The Yuman.Case is a resistant and refined patented smartphone capsule with double protection. With this campaign, you’ll get the Yuman.Case at its lowest price, up to 40% off its retail price. A limited numbered edition for the first one-hundred units of the Yuman.Case is also offered. 

For this limited series you will receive an email at the end of the campaign. According to the date and time of your pre-order you will have more or less choice of the number you want.

Delivery is planned for January 2021.

 

 

 

 

Our eco-friendly packaging has been fashioned to perfectly protect your Yuman.Case.

Made from recyclable cardboard, it is easy to spot on shelves and features the product through its simple green design.

This sustainable box can even be reused for any return and is self-sufficient to transport your Yuman.Case!

To be eco-responsible we don't stop at materials! We want quality, durable products that you will keep for a long time even when you change smartphones.

 

 

Development of the Yuman.Case is at its final stage and currently under various tests and certifications before full stamp of approval. 

 

 

 

 

It takes the best to build a smartphone capsule like the Yuman.Case. Our team is made up of some of the brightest minds in industrial design, sociological research, and product development. Sixty women and men have come together to create the Yuman.x brand and design the Yuman.Case, a high-tech durable product for all.

 

 

The National Center for Scientific Research (CNRS) is one of the most renowned research institutions around the globe. Yuman.x has joined up with CNRS at the University of Bordeaux to guarantee the structural excellence of the Yuman.Case interior.

German institution TÜV (Technical Inspection Association) is a global leader in independent inspection services. TÜV awards product certification following rigorous inspection based on strict criteria to protect the environment and human health. The Yuman.Case will be submitted to real-life test protocols to guarantee electromagnetic compatibility.

 

 

 

 

 

Vous gardez votre smartphone tout le temps avec vous ? Sur votre bureau pendant que vous travaillez, en rendez-vous, chez vous ? Vous ne voulez pas vous passer de votre smartphone ? Ça tombe bien, nous aussi !

Vous ne le faites jamais ? Ne vous inquiétez pas, c’est normal… Pourquoi ? Car c’est une limite d’usage : vous n’y pensez pas car le mode avion est "transparent" donc plus difficilement mis en oeuvre. Une autre étude scientifique a prouvé que le simple fait d'avoir notre smartphone dans notre champs de vision, même s'il est inactif, affecte nos ressources cognitives et épuise notre cerveau, ce qui conduit au stress et à la fatigue.

Notre travail avec les sociologues nous a donné une chance de mieux comprendre nos habitudes et nos comportements en matière de smartphones, nous amenant à réfléchir à la manière dont nous pouvons changer notre utilisation quotidienne des smartphones.

La Yuman.Case est une capsule pour smartphone pour vous libérer des distractions de votre smartphone et vous aide à vous concentrer pleinement sur le moment présent. Apprenez à passer du temps de qualité avec votre famille et vos amis ou augmentez votre productivité. Glissez simplement votre smartphone dans la Yuman.Case sans avoir à toucher ou à changer vos paramètres.

La Yuman.Case est là pour vous aider à choisir vos moments de connexion numérique et vous aidera à créer de nouvelles habitudes à travers des micro-déconnexions.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Grâce à Yuman.x, choisissez d'un simple geste quand prioriser vos connexions numériques ou humaines. Reprenez le contrôle de votre temps et vivez comme vous le souhaitez dans votre présent augmenté.

La Yuman.Case a été conçu pour vous offrir une pause lorsque vous en avez le plus besoin. Placez-la sur votre bureau lorsque vous êtes au travail ou utilisez-la à la maison pour passer du temps avec vos proches. Grâce à la Yuman.Case, vous pouvez désormais conserver ces petits moments de connexions humaines que vous chérissez tant :

 

 

 

Oui vous avez déjà la possibilité d’éteindre votre smartphone ou le mettre en mode avion mais… Combien de fois le faites-vous chaque jour ?... En effet, une recherche sociologique approfondie sur les comportements d'utilisation des smartphones a démontré qu'une habitude doit être tangible et visible pour être mise en œuvre. La Yuman.Case va au-delà des modes « avion » et « ne pas déranger » en illustrant d'un simple geste une rupture avec votre monde numérique.

Vous ne pouvez pas vous passer de votre téléphone? Ne vous inquiétez pas! La Yuman.Case ne consiste pas à vous couper complètement de votre monde numérique. Il est simplement là pour vous aider à trouver une autre façon de vous connecter.

Grâce à la Yuman.Case, vous pouvez montrer ainsi toute l’attention portée à ceux avec qui vous êtes, et faciliter de nouvelles habitudes pour profiter du meilleur des connexions humaines et digitales.

 

À quelle fréquence vérifiez-vous votre téléphone tout en parlant avec vos amis ou en jouant avec vos enfants?

Profitez du cadeau inestimable du temps lorsque vous en avez le plus besoin en masquant les distractions extérieures sans rupture numérique. Utilisez la Yuman.Case à la maison pour passer du bon temps seul ou avec votre famille et vos amis. La Yuman.Case est aussi là pour montrer aux autres votre attention.

 

 

Travailler dans une pièce sans téléphone augmente votre productivité de 26%.

Avec la Yuman.Case, bloquez les distractions pendant le temps dont vous avez besoin. Moins de distractions signifie une attention accrue et une concentration préservée, vous vivez donc toujours dans le présent.

Utilisez la Yuman.Case pour travailler pour vous concentrer sur une tâche, rester concentré durant une réunion ou démontrer votre considération pour un client.

 

Stress, troubles du sommeil, FOMO : une utilisation intensive du téléphone peut avoir de nombreux effets sur notre cerveau. L'utilisation du smartphone empêche fortement l'esprit (et le corps) de se reposer et de se régénérer.

Mais ce n'est pas de votre faute ! Les notifications sans fin de notre téléphone stimulent constamment notre esprit et ont créé des réflexes naturels chez les utilisateurs.

Connectez-vous différemment avec la Yuman.Case. Reposez votre corps et votre esprit pendant un moment et réduisez votre niveau de stress!

L'utilisation permanente des outils de communication a bouleversé les frontières entre notre vie personnelle et professionnelle, créant de plus en plus de risque de surmenage. Et malheureusement, la période actuelle et le télétravail n'arrange en rien la situation.

Glissez votre smartphone dans la Yuman.Case lorsque vous en ressentez le besoin permet de rééquilibrer la balance et de relâcher la pression le temps d'un instant !

 

 

Bluetooth, GSM, 3G, 4G ou même 5G: au-delà de sa capacité à contenir des champs électromagnétiques, l'impénétrable Yuman.Case sécurise tout ce qui entre et sort et garanti la protection de vos données personnelles.

 

 

 

Vous avez le plus grand smartphone sur le marché ? Ne vous inquiétez pas ! Nous avons ce qu'il vous faut ! La Yuman.Case est compatible avec tous les smartphones du marché, même ceux équipés d'une coque. 

Les dimensions maximales pour un téléphone sont: 179x97x21mm

 

 

 

Conçu avec expertise en chêne naturel et alliage d'aluminium, il mélange des matériaux naturels et de haute technologie pour une capsule élégante, moderne et durable.

Le mécanisme d'ouverture unique et breveté créé par l'équipe Yuman.x se caractérise par son design sophistiqué et high-tech.

 

 

Fermez simplement le couvercle Yuman.Case et une mousse flexible en nid d'abeille spécialement développée par notre équipe sécurise votre téléphone et le maintient en place. Une protection garantie quoi qu'il arrive. Après deux ans de développement, le mélange parfait entre design, plaisir et technologie a été atteint.

 

*Mesures en millimètres

Les dimensions maximales pour accueillir un téléphone sont: 179x97x21mm

Si nous atteignons notre objectif initial de 5 000 €, nous serons en mesure de produire la première gamme de Yuman.Case. Si nous atteignons ensuite les 30 000 €, nous pourrons produire une autre couleur de la Yuman.Case : gris foncé.

 

 

Le Yuman.Case est une capsule pour smartphone brevetée résistante et sophistiquée avec double protection. Grâce à cette campagne, vous pourrez pré-commander la Yuman.Case au meilleur prix, jusqu'à 40% de réduction sur son prix de vente. Une édition numérotée limitée pour les cent premières unités de la Yuman.Case est également proposée.

Pour cette série limitée, vous recevrez un e-mail à la fin de la campagne. Selon la date et l'heure de votre précommande vous aurez plus ou moins le choix du numéro que vous souhaitez.

La livraison est prévue pour janvier 2021.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Notre emballage écologique a été conçu pour protéger parfaitement votre Yuman.Case.

Fabriqué à partir de carton recyclable, il est facile à repérer dans les rayons et présente le produit grâce à son design écologique simple.

Cette boîte durable peut même être réutilisée pour tout retour et est autosuffisante pour transporter votre Yuman.Case.

Pour être éco-responsable, nous ne nous arrêtons pas aux matériaux ! Nous voulons des produits de qualité et durables que vous conserverez longtemps même lorsque vous changerez de smartphone.

 

Le développement de la Yuman.Case est à sa phase finale et est actuellement soumis à divers tests et certifications avant l'approbation complète.

 

 

Il faut le meilleur pour construire une capsule pour smartphone comme la Yuman.Case. Notre équipe est composée de certains des esprits les plus brillants du design industriel, de la recherche sociologique et du développement de produits. Soixante femmes et hommes se sont réunis pour créer la marque Yuman.x et concevoir la Yuman.Case, un produit de haute technologie durable pour tous.

 

Le Centre National de la Recherche Scientifique (CNRS) est l'une des institutions de recherche les plus réputées au monde. Yuman.x s'est associé au CNRS de l'Université de Bordeaux pour garantir l'excellence structurelle de l'intérieur de la Yuman.Case.

L'institution allemande TÜV (Technical Inspection Association) est un leader mondial des services d'inspection indépendants. Le TÜV attribue la certification des produits après une inspection rigoureuse basée sur des critères stricts pour protéger l'environnement et la santé humaine. Le Yuman.Case sera soumis à des protocoles de test réels pour garantir une compatibilité électromagnétique minimale de 95%. *

* Des tests sont prévus dès que les conditions sanitaires le permettront.

Si nous atteignons ensuite les 30 000 €, nous pourrons produire une autre couleur de la Yuman.Case : gris foncé.  Le Yuman.Case est une capsule pour smartphone brevetée résistante et sophistiquée avec double protection. Grâce à cette campagne, vous pourrez pré-commander la Yuman.Case au meilleur prix, jusqu'à 40% de réduction sur son prix de vente. Une édition numérotée limitée pour les cent premières unités de la Yuman.Case est également proposée.Pour cette série limitée, vous recevrez un e-mail à la fin de la campagne. Selon la date et l'heure de votre précommande vous aurez plus ou moins le choix du numéro que vous souhaitez.La livraison est prévue pour janvier 2021.        Notre emballage écologique a été conçu pour protéger parfaitement votre Yuman.Case.Fabriqué à partir de carton recyclable, il est facile à repérer dans les rayons et présente le produit grâce à son design écologique simple.Cette boîte durable peut même être réutilisée pour tout retour et est autosuffisante pour transporter votre Yuman.Case.Pour être éco-responsable, nous ne nous arrêtons pas aux matériaux ! Nous voulons des produits de qualité et durables que vous conserverez longtemps même lorsque vous changerez de smartphone. Le développement de la Yuman.Case est à sa phase finale et est actuellement soumis à divers tests et certifications avant l'approbation complète.  Il faut le meilleur pour construire une capsule pour smartphone comme la Yuman.Case. Notre équipe est composée de certains des esprits les plus brillants du design industriel, de la recherche sociologique et du développement de produits. Soixante femmes et hommes se sont réunis pour créer la marque Yuman.x et concevoir la Yuman.Case, un produit de haute technologie durable pour tous. Le Centre National de la Recherche Scientifique (CNRS) est l'une des institutions de recherche les plus réputées au monde. Yuman.x s'est associé au CNRS de l'Université de Bordeaux pour garantir l'excellence structurelle de l'intérieur de la Yuman.Case.L'institution allemande TÜV (Technical Inspection Association) est un leader mondial des services d'inspection indépendants. Le TÜV attribue la certification des produits après une inspection rigoureuse basée sur des critères stricts pour protéger l'environnement et la santé humaine. Le Yuman.Case sera soumis à des protocoles de test réels pour garantir une compatibilité électromagnétique minimale de 95%. ** Des tests sont prévus dès que les conditions sanitaires le permettront.

story:
LET'S GET STARTED!!!

We are a group of passionate Tertiary Student aspiring to venture into the realm of technopreneurship. Mercy came about when we all had low battery power on our smartphone and 0% on our power bank, we thought to ourselves, “It would be nice if we had an emergency power bank, that is always with us, at all time.”

 

That is why we were inspired to create a revolutionary product, introducing our first ever product called Mercy.

 

INTRODUCING MERCY

Mercy is designed to be the world’s smallest power bank and to be there when your phone needs it the most. Our revolutionary product, create a safety net for you when your phone is at low battery and your power bank is out of juice.

 

Since Mercy is small, compact and for emergency use only.. Mercy can be kept anywhere as a keychain or inside your medical box!

 

NO POWER! NO SPACE! NO PROBLEM!!!

 

Join NiceDice!

We need your help as a contributor to fund this project to make it as big as we possibly can. By funding this project, it will deeply help us in moving this project forward. The funds from this campaign will be going to:

  • Improving on the current design: The current design of our Mercy project is only a proof of concert. We are currently in the works of improving the design of the product so that it is small enough to be the size of your keychain. The more money we raise, the more design we create, the better the design can cater to you. It's just math :D
  • Moving it into production: In every new hardware invented, going into production is an important step. If we raise enough funds, we are able to find the best-situated manufacturer that will help bring Mercy to you as fast as possible. Because emergency awaits your phone and Mercy wants to be there for you.

Who are we?

We are a team of 4 from Ngee Ann Polytechnic.

Aw Jeng Kit

Co-Founder & Lead Advisor

My goal is to develop technologies that will aid humans even in the simplest of problems. Mankind have only scratched the surface of technology and my end goal is that would like to fully utilize its capabilities to solve current lifestyle issues or annoyance.

Lau Jun Xiang

Co-Founders & Technical Lead

My vision is focused around convenience. I feel that no matter what is being created, convenience is going to be one of the key factor as to whether or not the public will accept it. Therefore I aim to develop products focus on its convenience with affecting its functionality.  

Lubianto Kho

Co-Founder & Design Engineer Lead

My focus revolves around hardware, I help others by making their ideas become a reality. I accomplish it by first getting the actual solution in words and I develop the circuitry and algorithm in my head and turn it into reality.

Tan Guan Long Dion

Co-Founder & Analyst

My passion lies in the smallest details of things. My focus is to analyze every small details and look for loopholes or weak points in everything. My reason for doing so is because I believe that every detail is equally important.

 

FAQ

Is it a replacement for my power bank?

  • No, Mercy is not designed to be a replacement to your power bank, but an extension to it.

Can I charge it?

  • No, however, you can replace the battery instead!

What if the goal is not met?

  • Fret not! We will still work with on our project, and funds will be return if the goal is not met.

Is this the final design of Mercy?

  • This isn't Mercy final design, we are currently in the work of a cooler and seamless design. We wish to come out with multiple designs just for you, but we need funds from you.

 

Thank You :D

story:
SO WHAT'S THIS ALL ABOUT?

THE APP STORES:

With over 1 million Apps on the iOS and the Google Play App Stores it is increasingly difficult for App Developers to get their Apps discovered and downloaded. The cost to acquire a loyal user, or one that opens an app three times, grew from USD$1.30 in 2012 to USD$1.62* in 2013. *http://tcrn.ch/1l78gc5

WHAT WE DO:

The goal of the Pied Piper Entertainment Free Draw App is to help App Developers get their Apps discovered and downloaded. Each time a Smartphone or Tablet user downloads an App this triggers a payment to Pied Piper Entertainment from that App Developer. For each $100 we receive from App Developers, we add $75 to the Cash Prize Jackpot on a real-time basis. In a traditional Lottery the Jackpot increases as more Consumers buy Lottery tickets. However, in this case the Jackpot increases as more Apps are downloaded by Smartphone and Tablet users globally.

HOW TO PLAY:

First, Smartphone and Tablet users need to Register within the Pied Piper Entertainment Free Draw App. For each entry you are required to select 5 Numbers and 2 Bonus Numbers before watching a 15 second App Advert to enter your Numbers into the Competition. After you have watched the App Advert you will be given the opportunity to download the App being advertised. You do not have to download the App being advertised to enter your Numbers into the Competition. To increase your chances of winning a Cash Prize you can enter the Competition as many times as you want. Just like in a Lottery the Smartphone and Tablet users who select Winning Numbers share the Cash Prize Jackpot at the end of the Competition. Of course, because this Competition is free to enter it is called a Free Draw.

CASH PRIZE JACKPOTS:

For each Smartphone or Tablet user who downloads an App after watching a 15 second App Advert this adds 75% of USD1.62* to the Free Draw Cash Prize Jackpot *http://tcrn.ch/1l78gc5

  • If 100,000 people download an App, Cash Prize reaches: $121,500 / £73,900

  • If 1 million people download an App, Cash Prize reaches: $1,215,000 / £739,000

  • If 10 million people download an App, Cash Prize reaches: $12,150,000 / £7,390,000

  • If 100 million people download an App, Cash Prize reaches: $121,500,000 / £73,877,000

Global Smartphone Market passed the 1 Billion mark in 2012 and will total 1.75 Billion in 2014: http://bit.ly/LjwToI

story:
Station d'accueil élégante, stable, performante et ... 

  1. Adaptée à tous les  appareils Apple MEME avec coque de protection !

  2. Proposée en connecteurs 30 pins ou Lightning 

  3. D'une stabilité incroyable grâce à ses patins adhérants

 

Elegant, steady and efficient dock which:
  1. Suits every Ios device, even held in case, bumper or protective shell
  2. Is available in 30 pins or Lightning connectors model
  3. Is incredibly steady thanks to its sticky and replaceable stamp

 

 

 

 Passionné de la première heure des produits Apple pour leur qualité et leur simplicité d'utilisation,  j'apprécie le design et le coté pratique des stations d'accueil.

Utilisateur quotidien de mon Iphone, mais aussi de l'Ipod et de l'Ipad, les coques de protection sont vite devenues indispensables....Mais la plupart des stations d'accueil ne permettent pas la connexion avec coque ! 

 Un peu perfectionniste, je souhaitais donc :

Pouvoir recharger et synchroniser mes appareils Apple en station d'accueil, sans devoir, au préalable, ôter les coques de protection.

Améliorer la stabilité de l'appareil une fois positionné sur le dock, pour un meilleur confort d'utilisation

Anticiper les nouveautés Apple dotées d'un connecteur 30 pins bien-sûr mais aussi lightning

 

Ce Dock est le premier produit E-fficient, j'espère qu'il correspondra à vos besoins et qu'il vous donnera envie de soutenir ce lancement.

Les 2 versions (30 pins et Lightning) sont proposées à la pré-commande, n'hesitez pas à partager ces infos au plus grand nombre. 

 

 

 I’ve ever been passionate by Apple products: especially due to their high quality and efficiency. I appreciate the design and ergonomics of docks.

As a daily user of Iphone, Ipod and Ipad, I inevitably came to use protective shells… But most of the docks are unusable unless you remove the device from its case.

Said to be a perfectionist, my goal was:

 

To be able to recharge and synchronize my Apple devices on docking stations without having to remove them from their case before.

Improve the stability for a better comfort of use

Anticipate Apple’s novelties with 30 pins connector, as well as the new Lightning.

 

This dock is the first E-fficient’s product. I sincerely hope that it will meet your needs and then, entices you to support its launch.

Both versions (30 pins and Lightning) are proposed for pre-order. Do not hesitate to share and spread widely this information.

 

 

Le budget à financer est exclusivement destiné aux matières premières et à la fabrication des moules nécessaires à l'industrialisation. 

 

The financial plan is exclusively intended to finance the raw materials as well as manufacturing the molds needed to lead to industrialization.

 

 

 

 

 

* frais de port inclus toute destination

* Shipping included any destination

story:
Overview

 

  • World’s classiest webcam cover 
  • Handcrafted from 100% Italian leather
  • Install in 2 seconds 
  • Won’t damage your screen or leave a residue

 

It costs just $1 to hack into your webcam

It’s alarmingly cheap and easy to hack into your webcam. Almost like a dystopian scene out of a Black Mirror episode, hackers are sneaking into people’s computers and taking their privacy hostage. This nightmare turned into a reality for Miss Teen USA Cassidy Wolf when a hacker took nude photos of her and threatened to release them online. 

 

It's even gotten to the point where the FBI recommends you cover up your webcam when not in use.

 

But why HoneyDot? Ask Kim.

Modern day laptops are a marvel of engineering, every inch meticulously designed to be both functional and beautiful. Sure, there are plenty of options to cover up your webcam. But putting a torn up piece of duct tape on it is like putting a bumper sticker on a Bentley -- you just shouldn’t.

 

 

Handcrafted from 100% Italian leather, HoneyDots protect your privacy in style. 

Each individual HoneyDot is meticulously crafted by hand from imported Italian leather, ensuring consistent quality.

 

Which would you rather have out in public?

 

 

Biomimicry: Technology Inspired by Nature

Putting a piece of duct tape on your thousand dollar laptop isn't just embarrassing, it also damages your screen. Instead of using sticky adhesives that leave a residue, HoneyDots are attached to your camera with microsuction tape.

Microsuction tape is covered in thousands of microscopic holes that allow it to adhere to any smooth, flat surface the same way a gecko does. It can be infinitely reused -- simply wipe with a damp cloth when it gets dirty!

 

Microsuction tape results in a remarkably strong bond while remaining easily adjustable and reusable.

 

HoneyDot Never Gets in the Way

At 8mm wide and less than 1mm thick, you'll hardly even notice that HoneyDot is there.

 

Just peel and stick!

 

We've tested HoneyDots on countless devices -- the microsuction tape will work on most types of devices as long as the surface is smooth, flat, and clean! Usually, this means the camera and it's surrounding areas are glossy and unrecessed.

Timeline

 

Risks and Challenges

As with any product, manufacturing HoneyDots comes with a unique set of challenges. We pride ourselves on quality and since each individual piece is crafted by hand, production may take longer than expected.

However, we are taking the necessary steps to ensure all our backers will receive their HoneyDots on time -- production has already begun and will we do our best to communicate any issues that arise.

story:
"Pretty as a picture ... get charged up without a tangles mess." - Macworld

 

"... a perfect traveling gadget bag." - Nerd Moment

 

"Модель Twisted Logic TekTuk представляет собой очень интересный чехол для iPad." - Mapitom

 

Convenient bedside storage and charging for all of your mini idevices and accessories

That mangled mess of cables, earphones, remotes, your mini tablet computer and cell phone in the "moat" around your bed will be a thing of the past; with the patent-pending TekTuk mini. ⬇

Plenty of storage space

Cell phone pocket - This pocket will accommodate any cell phone on the market up to 3 1/4" wide and 1" thick.
Tablet computer pocket - You can fit any mini tablet, netbook, or mini laptop up to 8 1/2" wide and 1 1/4" thick in this pocket.
Accessory pocket - Easily store your power and charging cords, earplugs, iPod, mice, remotes, etc. in this spacious 4 1/4" wide, 3 1/2" tall zippered pocket.
Magazine and document pocket - While you are en route to your next bed; store your book or boarding pass in the elastic document pocket. ⬇

The exterior dimensions of the TekTuk mini are 7"x10"; or, this much smaller than the TekTuk: ⬇

Convenient cord management and charging

No more fumbling for charging cords - When you need one, just grab it from the elastic cord management loop and plug in your device. ⬇

Stylish Perfection

After 8 months of designing and trying out 3 prototypes, we've come up with a product that will look great hanging from your bed, and make you look great carrying it. ⬇

Where will all of the raised funds go?

Your investment dollars will help us with:

  • Manufacturing minimums
  • Shipping
  • Packaging
  • Marketing
  • Booth space at trade shows

 

About the TekTuk mini

How did the idea for the TekTuk mini come about?  Like most inventions, the idea for the TekTuk mini (and the TekTuk before it) came from a problem that needed to be solved.  Like most people; I have a "moat" around my bed which is filled with magazines, remotes, charging cords, and personal electronics.  One morning, my early rising girlfriend came back by the bed to say goodbye before she went to work.  She accidentally stepped on my iPad and broke the screen.  It wasn't her fault; I shouldn't keep it on the floor.  But, out of this tragedy came the idea for the TekTuk mini.

TekTuk mini is born!  During the next 8 months, the TekTuk mini went through the following steps; from sketches, to primitive prototype, to functional prototype, to the final pre-production prototype:

During this journey, I created the TekTuk for regular sized tablet computers; raised the money for mass production through Indiegogo; found a trustworthy manufacturer in China; and went to the factory to oversee production and shipping.  

Now that the TekTuk is available to the masses; it is time to take the next step in bedside idevice management with the TekTuk mini for mini tablets, cell phones, accessories, and cord management!

 

Vote on the Final Stitching Color!

The above pictures show the TekTuk mini with green and blue stitching (#3 and #6); but we want you to decide what color stitching you want the final product to have!



What color stitching should the TekTuk mini have?
Yellow
Teal
Green
Gold
White
Blue
Other
Please Specify:
make free polls

This is not the first product we have designed and produced. In 2001; we patented and mass produced a storage steel upright cap that was tested in warehouses and proved to save thousands of dollars in damages from product snagging and tearing. Last year; we successfully raised the funds (through Indiegogo) to mass produce, market, and ship the TekTuk - for regular sized tablet computers. Given our past experience in designing and implementing new products, we are confident that will have no problem bringing the TekTuk mini to the eager masses.

This is a Fixed Funding Campaign!  If we do not reach our goal; your donation WILL be refunded!

Your investment dollars will help us with:

Manufacturing minimums
Shipping
Packaging
Marketing
Booth space at trade shows
 
About the TekTuk mini
How did the idea for the TekTuk mini come about?  Like most inventions, the idea for the TekTuk mini (and the TekTuk before it) came from a problem that needed to be solved.  Like most people; I have a "moat" around my bed which is filled with magazines, remotes, charging cords, and personal electronics.  One morning, my early rising girlfriend came back by the bed to say goodbye before she went to work.  She accidentally stepped on my iPad and broke the screen.  It wasn't her fault; I shouldn't keep it on the floor.  But, out of this tragedy came the idea for the TekTuk mini.
TekTuk mini is born!  During the next 8 months, the TekTuk mini went through the following steps; from sketches, to primitive prototype, to functional prototype, to the final pre-production prototype:

During this journey, I created the TekTuk for regular sized tablet computers; raised the money for mass production through Indiegogo; found a trustworthy manufacturer in China; and went to the factory to oversee production and shipping.  
Now that the TekTuk is available to the masses; it is time to take the next step in bedside idevice management with the TekTuk mini for mini tablets, cell phones, accessories, and cord management!
 
Vote on the Final Stitching Color!
The above pictures show the TekTuk mini with green and blue stitching (#3 and #6); but we want you to decide what color stitching you want the final product to have!






What color stitching should the TekTuk mini have?



Yellow
Teal
Green
Gold
White
Blue
Other

Please Specify: 






make free polls



This is not the first product we have designed and produced. In 2001; we patented and mass produced a storage steel upright cap that was tested in warehouses and proved to save thousands of dollars in damages from product snagging and tearing. Last year; we successfully raised the funds (through Indiegogo) to mass produce, market, and ship the TekTuk - for regular sized tablet computers. Given our past experience in designing and implementing new products, we are confident that will have no problem bringing the TekTuk mini to the eager masses.
This is a Fixed Funding Campaign!  If we do not reach our goal; your donation WILL be refunded!

story:
Who is DimasTech Cooling?

DimasTech Cooling is a new brand dedicated entirely to Custom Case, Tech Station, Water Station, Water Cooling and Custom Phase Change Systems.
we're a spin off Division from DimasTech, the pioneer company that firstly in 2007 started making Metal and Solid Tech Station for Overclocking and Enthusiasts, since the inception DimasTech (the original company) have been growing in varius fields, from Industrial to medical devices, that is why we decided to go back on track and create a spin off Division totally related to Custom Case and Cooling Devices for IT.
Our products have been featured in several Reviews website and today are the most common and well known Tech Station / Bench Tables in the overclocking community worldwide.
DimasTech Cooling is continuously bringing to the market new products and new approach, always taking care of Customer Experience / Customer Feedback and Quality of Products.
we're proud to say that our products are 100% Made in Italy and we strongly collaborate with our local suppliers to keep production alive in this country.



What is AMC (Advance Modular Case)?

in short, AMC is the acronym of Advanced Modular Case and today is the first project worldwide able to bring in the market a custom complete case solution for every user need.


The developing stage have been taking around a year and the key points that guided us in the path have been:

  • Total Customization of Dimensions (64 total combinations of Dimensions)
  • Total Customization of Colors (10 colors available for internal and external)
  • User Friendly Approach
  • Total Tool Free Istallation and Mounting of parts
  • Huge WaterCooling capabilities
  • Huge Modding capabilities
  • first class materials
  • simple and effective ways to swap parts and even to get a number of accessories for the product.

The AMC Project aim is to bring High Quality Case in every home/office/industry where the aesthetics and the care of details is important, we'd like to start considering the PC Case as like a Forniture over than just a simple metal/plastic box for your pc parts.


If we think that a PC Case can be considered as a forniture, we can't simply offer 2 colors options and 3 models covering the mass market request, we'd like to offer a Limited Edition product for every single customer, able to enter in every single space where it will go and integrate in perfectly with the other forniture.

AMC Project Features:

  • Total Aluminum Costruction - Manufactured in the ITALY
  • 4 Different Motherboard Trays, from Mini-ITX to HPTX / Server Boards
  • Optimized for low Airflow and Silence Computing
  • 4 Width: 220 , 290 , 330, 460
  • 4 Height: 910, 720 , 530 , 400
  • 4 Depth: 750 , 650 , 550 , 460
  • Huge Space for Watercooling or Storage Devices
  • Simple and Effective Cable Management
  • lot of accessories in developing for improve your case usability
  • customizable side acrylic windows
  • fast removing sides
  • ThumbScrew and Thumbnuts for add or remove parts from the Case
  • Customizable Push Buttons ( 6 colors)
  • Customizable back light color for the Front Laser Cut Logo
  • High Quality Paint Job ( powder coating)
  • USb3.0, e-sata and audio in/out





Combinations:

Someone might say, how many combinations this project will be able to complete?

yes, 6400 combinations, and we're not considering the 6 different model of push buttons and the fact that actually we're offering Powder Coating Finish, with your help and support we will be able soon to offer Satin or Mirror Finish, anodized in several colors.

The project is still open for suggestions, we had some feedback for wood sides or carbon fiber sides, but it's up to you giving a direction to this project, only with your support we can really understand what you like.

The model Featured in Renders is the AMC-001, behind this code there's a story...but the one means a lot for us, so it's simple and direct...







Why Aluminum?

We decided to use aluminum becouse by far it is the best and cost effective solution to keep very low weight and good strength of parts, all of the external chassis is made with 2 mm thick aluminum, no matter if it is the little model 400x220x460 mm or the biggest one 460x910x750mm case, we're using always the same module design and this will be our policy also for future improvement of this product, as we'd like to be totaly related to quality, we can't start thinking about how to save some money by reducing the thickness or by changing our unique design.




What We Need & What You Get:

DimasTech Cooling products are already well known in the niche market of Tech Stations and overclocking communities, our aim is to collect more and more interest about this project in order to reach interested customer and receiving feedbacks for the next stages of the developing/ pre-series and Production.

Our company grown couse of the customers feedbacks and this will be the path to follow for all of our next products development, by supporting this project you're directly supporting the born of a new niche market.

As early adopters, your contributions could help us to understand what models will be the most liked and what features we can still implement before production. Your investment will go into final developing stages, pre-series samples, advertising through media channels, instructions manuals creation, studying of new materials combinations and material finish ( satin/mirrored surface) and anodizing, carbon fiber side panels and other interesting implementations that can really make even a lot more customizable product.



The Impact

By supporting DimasTech Cooling AMC Project, you are helping the creation of a new niche market, dedicated to take care about the customer request of customization, and on the other side, by expanding our network of reseller or assembler worldwide you're also helping people finding new job.

Your Contribution will also help our company to setup a new business model based on the Distributed work, a totaly new approach for distribution channel, not based only on the product but most of all on the customer feedback and on the people that listen the "customer feedback".


DimasTech Cooling, is part of DimasTech, we're a small company, based in Italy, working on many projects in different fields, from Computer Cooling to Electronics Cooling and even Trading of niche market items.

Our team of 6 people have been able to bring DimasTech products worldwide, since 2013 we have also a USA warehouse in Miami (FL), all what we do is taking care of our customers and most of our products and our success come from a strong customer feedback, for example, the Mini V1.0, our topseller tech station is an idea of an Xtremesystems.org forum user, we've been listening to the idea and we proceed with the product developing.

we'd like to have our community of supporters growing, as you know, more brains together are difficult to match, but good ideas are always appreciated and out trackrecord demostrate it.


Other Ways You Can Help

DimasTech Cooling is not a startup, we're part of a group of PC Enthusiast, with a strong market orientation, we like to cover all the market dark sides, places where big industry can't act their big role, couse they have soo much bigger cost for even making a single small part of an item.

what we're looking for is to have your sincere feedback on what we've been doing until today, the design is still open for some major modification and we're sure that with your help we can still improve it.

even if you're not helping us financially, we'd like to be able on say "thank you" by sharing our Project, our pics, our video on your socials, we're sure that there's much more people interested in this Project, not only the PC Enthusiast or the PC Gamers.

as a company DimasTech Cooling is also looking for partners, people that want to spread the word, distributors able to follow our business model couse we know it can grow worldwide, but we can't do this by our own...

story:
Hi Everyone,

Welcome to our funding page! We have a great idea but we need your help to turn it into a real product. (Patent Pending)

If you're anything like us you most probably found yourself so many times traveling, anywhere outside home, at friend house, at the airport etc without your Iphone cable. How many times you were looking for your cable? How many times you had to run between rooms and take out the cable from the wall? How many times you had to fight over a cable? The one thing we always have on us is our phones. The one thing we always seem to be looking for is a USB cable to charge our Iphone or play with Data. Some of our friends carry USB Cable in their bags but there are times when you don't always have your bag with you or don’t hand with bag at all.

After consuming a few hours at the airport digging for my Cable we came up with a solution. Why not attach a Cable to an iPhone case...? Brilliant!

We've spent a considerable amount of time designing, prototyping and testing our ideas to create the best unique product which we've called the CaseCable.

 

The CaseCable USB Unique Cables:

Different cables colors are available: Black, White, pink, Red, purple, grey and Turquoise. We will collect the colors preferences once the project is funded and based on that we will determine the final colors

  

Cables details:

* Flat USB

* 4 MM Wide

* 9.5 in long

** Case made out of Hard plastic

CaseCable is the Only Slim IPhone case with Unique USB Cable attached on the back of the case. The cable will be always with you. The pins on the back arew holding the cable so you will never drop it.

 

 

Where we can use the USB Cables:

1. While driving we can charge our Iphone with the USB Cable.

2. Using our laptop for Data or charging.

3. Using our Desktop for Data or charging.

 

CaseCable Vs. Existing products:

1. The only one with the Cable attached.

2. Always have the option to charge your battery or play with Data where ever you 
    are.

3. NEVER forget your Cable at Home.

4. Slim Case and Slim Cable built in.

 

Progress:

So we have made the working prototype and finalized the design.

 

 

Now we need your help and support to move on to production.

After the launch which will end after 50 days we plan to start manufacturing on October 2012 and deliver by the end of the year - Yes just for Christmas time.

Production Schedule

We will take all possible measures to get the CaseCable completed as soon as possible.  We have already set up an overseas manufacturing partner to fulfill the plastic injection molding process of the CaseCable.  All we are looking for now is your support to see this project through.  If all goes according to plan we hope to follow this general timetable:

 

Thank you, thank you.

Please share with any friends that like well-made products and have iPhones

 

 

** CaseCable is Patent pending

Apple & iPhone & 30 pins connector are registered trademarks of Apple, Inc and are not affiliated in any way with our product.

 

Special Thanks to:

Clara D. - Photographer

Christopher & Jonathan Tarpy - 3D CAD

Carlo - Rendering & Animation

Jonathan Duani - Video Editing

story:
Short Summary

Hi there! I'm Tayy, and I'm current a full time cosmetology student, working almost full time while in school, and I'm an avid artist. I never ask anyone for anything, especially money as I feel terrible, however; my car needs almost $600 worth of repairs. The money I had saved for my laptop is going to that now ):

What We Need & What You Get

I'm looking to get a MacBook in the 600-900 range. I need it for my art, marketing, and school amongst other things. 

That is where the money will go entirely. 

Perks?

$10- Cosplay ears/horn/etc. custom requests considered. Not just related to MLP! Including a handwritten note (:

$20 - a drawing of choice- on 8 x 11 in paper. Colored or not. OR a clay figure. Examples: an OC, your favorite character from any show, an animal, etc. Including a handwritten note (:

$50 - a digital drawing of choice- on TABLET. Plus ears/horn of your choice or clay figure.  Including a handwritten note (:

$100 - all of the above or a request of something custom/special!

The Impact

I've been needing this for over a year now! I almost had it until my car started to have problems. This will really help me with my future as well as simply something personal for me. Thank you in advance to anyone who helps <3 It means so much!

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this on social media!

Tell your friends!

story:
Summary

We believe future home entertainment will require higher bandwidth, better audio/video quality, and more elegant design. Therefore, we are on the journey of creating the world's most reliable cable accessories with a better industrial design in mind.

With PS5 and X-Box X launching later this year, the demand for reliably transferring 8K data is increasing, and we are building two types of cables with active optical technology to meet the demand. The cables are 5 meters long, with HDMI or USB Type-C connectors, seamlessly transferring 8K data.

Introducing Jure 5H (HDMI-to-HDMI, 5M) and Jure 5C (USB-C to USB-C, 5M):

 

Who we are

 

Design

HDMI cable 2D drawing:

USB-C cable 2D drawing:

 

Technology

 

Where we are

We finished prototyping builds already, and the cables are ready for mass production. The funding raised by the campaign will be used for mass production raw material order, logistics, and shipping.

Here is a video of the cable testing - do you love the beat?

 

Risks & Challenges

Risks include logistics, travel restrictions, and material availability, which may cause shipping delay. But as the world is opening up slowly, the risk is getting lower.

story:
Overview – What’s Giayee Mini PC

Giayee Mini PC is an easy to setup and use Mini Desktop PC, which is powered by Quad core Cortex-A17 1.8G processor. It supports Dual OS (Android & Ubuntu OS). It's not only a Computer, but also a Home Media Center, Gaming Box, Portable Linux Workstation, Skype & Video Conference tool etc.

Giayee Mini PC features a Quad Core Cortex-A17 CPU , Mali-T76 3D GPU , 2G of RAM, up to 32G of storage, VGA and HDMI output, 2.4G & 5G dual band Wi-Fi, 4 USB ports.

Giayee Mini PC supports 4K Ultra HD, huge 3D games and is suitable for various occasions, to meet a variety of needs. It is also designed to run the XBMC media center app (soon to be known as Kodi),  which supports most common audio, video, and image formats, playlists, audio visualizations, slideshows, weather forecasts reporting, and third-party plugins.

Key Features

1. Quad Core Cortex-A17 CPU

Giayee Mini PC is equipped with RK3288 Quad Core Cortex-A17 CPU, which is called King of Performance, King of Ultra HD and King of Game. The Cortex-A17 processor offers over 60% performance uplift over the Cortex-A9 processor, the current leader in mid-range mobile market. So Giayee Mini PC with such a powerful CPU will provide you with Excellent speed, more compatibility and energy.  

                  The first SoC based on Quad-core Cortex-A17 in the world

2. Mali-T76 3D GPU

Giayee Mini PC’s Mali-T76 3D GPU is the latest powerful graphics processor. H.265 hardware decoder supports MPEG-2, MPEG-4, AVS, VC-1, VP8, MVC with up to 1080p@60fps and supports multi-format video decoder with up to 4Kx2K. It can be regarded as the leader in current Smart TV word. It’s not difficult to support smoothly high-resolution (3840x2160) display and mainstream game.

3. Android & Ubuntu Dual OS

Giayee Mini PC’s dual OS makes it available to carry out a variety of tasks such as web surfing, photo editing, emailing, social networking and much more. 

Running Android, there are over a million apps and games readily available. You can also watch high quality TV programs and movies from around the world. 

Giayee Mini PC also supports Ubuntu 12.04.5 LTS (Precise Pangolin) official version of the system, but uses a more friendly Unity welcome interface and a vastly improved and enhanced Ubuntu Software Center, which makes massive software installation easier and more user-friendly and fully functional.

 4. Flexible Placement

There are three different placement ways. You have the flexibility to select the appropriate placement according to your needs.

* If you like, you can just flat it on the desk.

* You can also add a base to place vertically, which looks more beautiful.

* To save space, you can hang it in the back of the monitor.

What can you do with Giayee Mini PC?

Android Home Computer

If you have a spare monitor, keyboard and mouse, then it’s time to set up a new computer. What’s more, compared with the traditional host, it will save a lot of space. And you do not need to worry about performance issues. The MINI PC that boasts a Quad core Cortex-A17 Soc is much more powerful than you can imagine.

Mobile Linux Workstation

Giayee Mini PC is an external device, can configured for use in the home or office as a compact computer. It’s able to run any of a number of Linux distributions and are best suited as for running media server, back-up services,file sharing and remote access functions .

You can run your office software, work on documents and even develop an application on the Ubuntu OS. It’s small and easy to carry, you can catch up on unfinished work anywhere and anytime, no need to stay at the office late. 

Android Gaming Console with Millions Apps on Google Play

Connect the device with your TV or Monitor, pair with a wireless gamepad (such as race Wise Free Wireless Game Controller), and then enjoy your game! With a quad core Cortex-A17 CPU and 3D GPU, you can even play huge 3D games on it, like "Clash of Clans" and so on.

Home Theater and Multimedia Center

Giayee Mini PC supports 4K Ultra HD; just connect a wireless remote control and you can enjoy online video (like Netflix, YouTube,, Google Play and many more), listen to online radio or smoothly browse local and cloud photos on your big-screen TV from your sofa.

Video Chat & Conference Call

Connect a web camera to easily access your Skype, Google+, Hangouts or ooVoo account and start a video chat with your friends, family, or colleagues. No matter how far away they may be, you can easily get in touch with them on your big screen TV in real time. You can even have a video conference at home. Take advantage of the versatility of this MINI PC and feel the convenience it brings to your personal and work life.

Where are we now?

With a solid metal case offering flexible placement choices and rich I/O interfaces, we chose one of our existing designs for the shell. Besides, schematics are completed in July 2014, PCBs are fully designed.

Currently, Android && Ubuntu dual OS firmware’s basic function has been basically achieved. Now our test engineers are doing systematical testing and development engineers are working to improve the stability and performance.

The first prototypes have begun to roll out.We have built a real product (as shown in demo videos) that works . Here is the PCBA Board:


Why we need funding

We have finished the first prototypes. Moving forward to the next stage of manufacturing requires a lot of funds for raw materials & components purchasing once mass production starts.

We all know that the bulk purchase can reduce the unit price, and thus reduce costs, improve product competitiveness. In return, backers can get the product at a lower price. This is a win-win cooperation. With your help we can make this a reality and light up the lives of millions. 

Besides, your funding will also assist with the firmware enhancing and other unavoidable costs. What’s more importantly, you will get a cost-effective MINI PC for your day-to-day usage, makes your active life much easier!

Specification

Rewards

Overview
– What’s Giayee Mini PC
Giayee Mini PC is an easy to setup and use Mini
Desktop PC, which is powered by Quad core Cortex-A17 1.8G processor. It
supports Dual OS (Android & Ubuntu OS). It's not only a Computer, but also
a Home Media Center, Gaming Box, Portable Linux Workstation, Skype & Video
Conference tool etc.Giayee Mini PC features a Quad Core Cortex-A17 CPU
, Mali-T76 3D GPU , 2G of RAM, up to 32G of storage, VGA and HDMI output, 2.4G
& 5G dual band Wi-Fi, 4 USB ports.Giayee Mini PC supports 4K Ultra HD, huge 3D
games and is suitable for various occasions, to meet a variety of needs.
It is also designed to run the XBMC media center app (soon to be known as
Kodi),  which supports most common audio, video, and image formats,
playlists, audio visualizations, slideshows, weather forecasts reporting, and
third-party plugins.Key
Features
1. Quad Core Cortex-A17 CPU
Giayee Mini PC is equipped with RK3288 Quad Core
Cortex-A17 CPU, which is called King of Performance, King of Ultra HD and King of Game. The Cortex-A17 processor offers over 60%
performance uplift over the Cortex-A9 processor, the current leader in
mid-range mobile market. So Giayee Mini PC with such a powerful CPU will provide you
with Excellent speed, more compatibility and energy.                    The first SoC based on Quad-core Cortex-A17 in
the world
2. Mali-T76 3D GPU
Giayee Mini PC’s Mali-T76 3D GPU is the latest
powerful graphics processor. H.265 hardware decoder supports MPEG-2, MPEG-4,
AVS, VC-1, VP8, MVC with up to 1080p@60fps and supports multi-format video
decoder with up to 4Kx2K. It can be regarded as the leader in current Smart TV
word. It’s not difficult to support smoothly high-resolution (3840x2160)
display and mainstream game.3. Android & Ubuntu Dual OS
Giayee Mini PC’s dual OS makes it available to
carry out a variety of tasks such as web surfing, photo editing, emailing,
social networking and much more. 
Running Android, there are over a million
apps and games readily available. You can also watch high quality TV programs
and movies from around the world. 
Giayee Mini PC also supports Ubuntu 12.04.5 LTS (Precise Pangolin)
official version of the system, but uses a more friendly Unity welcome
interface and a vastly improved and enhanced Ubuntu Software Center, which
makes massive software installation easier and more user-friendly and fully
functional.
 4. Flexible Placement
There are three different placement ways.
You have the flexibility to select the appropriate placement according to your
needs.
* If you like, you can just flat it on the
desk.
* You can also add a base to place
vertically, which looks more beautiful.
* To save space, you can hang it in the
back of the monitor.What

story:
Please note that our IndieGoGo campaign is with "Fixed Funding".
It means we only use your money if our goal is reached, in the other case you get your money back. 


The Neckset Story

We recognize the increasing frequency that we use our smart phones. We must hold it if we want to browse the internet, watch a movie, have a video call or even for filming.

In light of this increase we spent countless number of hours trying to find a solution to simplify smartphone handling. 

We set a goal to develop a test holder (console) that is light, flexible and can be easily re-positioned. No other existing camera and phone holder has the flexibility and the simplicity as our test console, Neckset. 


You can find several camera arm stabilizers consoles with vests or with hip placement. These are usually heavy, expensive and not very flexible. 

In light of this, we wanted to create an easier, more flexible, multi-functional device.

It was a big challenge!

During our development phase we tried every conceivable possibility. The inspired came to us when we thought of Bob Dylan‘s harmonica holder. It was then we realized that we wanted a comfortable neck strap.

We added a flexible arm stabilizer to the neck strap that could be adjusted to the necessary distance and can easily be repositioned.

Our expectation was to have the neck strap equally flexible as the adjustable arm in order to meet the different requirement of each individual person.

While modeling the strap we realized that the best results were by using an aluminum core with a soft casing. The aluminum core permits the neck strap to firmly fastened and at the same time permitting easy adjustment with a comfortable wear.

Once again a challenge presented its self when we wanted to connect the Flexiarm to the neck strap.

The best solution proved to be a strong hub with a fine cast form that our inventers manages to create.

The next step was straight forward, leading to designing a stabilizing console holder adjustable for all phone sizes.

Our console plane was first created using a 3D printer.

It has been our primary goal during planning all the way through production to create a device affordable and satisfactory for everyone (to satisfy everyone’s needs). 

Our design had to meet the highest standard with the strict requirement of being economically affordable.

One of the greatest virtues of our device is that it has a low cost compared to unique number of functions it provides.

We are proud that we were able to produce the results we wanted and reached our goal.

Neckset as a novelty can easily compete with products from any larger Cooperation with its indisputable elegance and usefulness. 


What is Neckset used for? How does it work?

Neckset works as a third arm. It does not tier and it will hold your phone at the required distance and position.

You can browse the internet, watch movies and have video calls with comfort. Neckset adds a new dimension to movie watching. No one else has offered a product like this that can provide us with a comfortable long term solution for viewing films on your smart phone.

With Neckset be prepared to creat new movies of your own. With our device visual entertainment can be viewed in high quality for a longer period of time.

Using Neckset is simple!

  • Grab Neckset and adjust the flexible neck strap to desired size!
  • Adjust the Flexarm!
  • Strap the  Neckset on to your neck!
  • Open the holder and insert your phone!

You are now ready to use Neckset.


Prizes for Start Up Donation:



About Us


Balazs Soltesz-Nagy, co-founder, concept

Has been working as a developer and programmer; he is a geek of innovation and technology. As he always looks out for new trends and solutions, he has been interested in the world of smart phones for a long time. The issue of how our lives can be made easier is central to his interest and research: this is how Neckset was developed and born.


Zoltan Borsi, co-founder

Balazs and him have worked together on previous projects. All their success was due to their mutual trust and followed by qualitative results. Thus, it was evident that Zoltan and Balazs would develop Neckset together. Their efficiency speaks for itself.



Szabolcs Papp, co-founder

Szabolcs was the last to join our group: a lover of gadgets, mobiles and technology. Ever since mobiles have been around, Szabolcs has followed their technological development and wished to contribute one day. He has proved himself in the leadership of several big companies, therefore his experience is crucial for us, as well.

The London-based Neckset Ltd. was founded in order to help the development, production and marketing of Neckset.

Risks & Challenges

While the Neckset prototype functions fully, we still have a lot to do to achieve the most comfortable Neckset which is light and of quality at the same time. 
Neckset is to be produced in a way that it would be no problem using it for several hours every day. To do so, the very best materials need to be used to get the perfect static design. Thus, we need more testing and more work at design to get the best quality. We know that our innovation will make Neckset-users satisfied and more comfortable in their everyday lives.

Other Ways You Can Help

In order for our project to succeed, many people need to know about Neckset.

Please like pages of Neckset, share them with your friends, and let everybody know of something that makes life easier.


Timing

If Neckset is successful as a project, our group will be ready for production by the end of this year and the first pieces will be delivered in 2015 May. In 2015 May all our donors will be given their own Neckset and a tablet converter. During the start of production we also will start negotiating with wholesalers and by 2015 fall everybody will hopefully be able to buy their own Neckset.


FAQ

Which age group is Neckset for? 
Neckset is for all age groups as it can be adjusted to any body size.

Where can one buy Neckset?
As for now, Neckset is only available on Indiegogo.

How can it be cleaned?
Neckset can be kept clean with wet, soft wipes. Do not use chemicals.

How can I adjust the collar?
The collar may be adjusted to the desired size manually.

Can I set the position of my device?
Yes, with the help of the flexible arm, your device can be positioned any way you prefer. By setting the arm vertically, you can even watch movies comfortably.

Can broken parts be changed?
Yes, all parts can be separately changed at any time.

Can my device fall out of Neckset?
Neckset holds your device tight; any phone from the regular 3,5” to the bigger 6” size can be used.

Can I turn my phone in Neckset from vertical to horizontal (or vica versa)?
Yes, the universal holder can be positioned in both ways.

Can I plug a tablet converter to my Neckset?
Yes, all collars are convertible.

Do I need a screw to attach the arm?
No, it is attached with a snap.
