story:
To start, we thank you all for stopping by and checking out our Indiegogo page.

We have spent countless days and nights engineering this amazing Wireless Bluetooth Bamboo Keyboard. A rewarding, albeit difficult process, from designing the products by hand, to creating CAD drawings, to prototyping the design via plastic, to altering prototypes in various materials, to a finished product consisted of beautiful wood. And now, today, we achieved our project’s primary objective -- provide you with the highest quality wood keyboard on the market at an affordable price!

There are a few wood keyboards on the market today, and we know that. However, the issue is that some are made of replica wood, are way over-priced, and to be candid; the quality is pathetic. When it comes to our keyboards though, we are happy to say we did not have to sacrifice quality and functionality for style and brand inflation. We believe we have come up with a game-changer in the world keyboards!

Nobody wants a fake wood keyboard, bulky and thick keyboards, or just a flat out ugly keyboard accompanying their computer, tablet, or phone...so just take a moment to let the 'patheticness' of the wood keyboards that are currently on the market today waft over you.......

PHEW!! Now that the pain is over you can rejoice in our premium 100% natural and environmentally friendly wood keyboard. We decided to start from square one and get rid of every thought in our head about existing wood keyboards.

Here is the breakdown on how we got to where we are today....and of course it all starts with..........

....followed by the notorious "chicken-scratch" sketches...

....onto 2-D drawings...technical drawings...and 3-D models...

....finally to the production of the samples...

Everything...check below and see for yourself!

  • 100% Natural Bamboo
  • Environmentally Friendly
  • Wireless (Bluetooth)
  • Usable with any Bluetooth-friendly device
  • Plastic-based keys to leave them easy flowing and functional
  • Command and FN function keys
  • Various "Apple-friendly" keys
  • Charger cable included (lasts about three months on one charge)
  • Elevated design
  • Lightweight (1.25 lb...493 g)
  • Compact (11.49 in x 4.92 in...29.2cm x 12.5 cm)
  • Letters/symbols are laser-engraved
  • Slim

Of course we use natural wood...

The Bluetooth transmitter...

The lowdown on how this all works...

Here is the details on how to pair the keyboard with your device...

1.  Go to your device's settings.

2.  Turn the keyboard on by pressing the on/off switch located on the back of the keyboard (a blue light will flash briefly to indicate the keyboard is turned on).

3.  Go to the Bluetooth settings of your device.

4.  If the Bluetooth is turned off, tap the button to turn it on, and Bluetooth will begin searching for devices.

5.  Next, hold down the pairing button on the back of the keyboard until the blue light starts flashing.  When the "Wireless Keyboard" appears, tap on it, enter the code on the keyboard when prompted, and then press enter.

6.  You have successfully paired the keyboard with your device and it is ready to be used!

7.  When you are finished using the keyboard press the on/off switch on the back of the keyboard.

Now it's time for some HD photos of the keyboard. The sleek, stylish, revolutionary, and lightweight design of the keyboard makes our keyboard the best in the world. You will not be disappointed with this natural keyboard...heck it even smells good too! 

WOW!!!  We are starting our rewards off with the keyboard at over 50% off! We have definitely put together some great rewards for you at a discounted price from which they will retail at. All orders placed within the U.S. will receive free shipping! FYI, the shipping method for U.S. Residents will be 2-3 Day Priority Mail. We will happily shipWORLDWIDE, but if you live outside the U.S. the additional shipping price is noted in the pledge you choose, and for International orders the shipping will be First-Class International and the shipping time for global orders depends on where you live. Finally, no matter which level you pledge at you will be deemed an "Honorary Mention" on our original backers section of our website (www.thewoodshop.co) and if you pledge at least $5 we will send you a handwritten letter signed by us!

Before we get into the details I want to share with you a bit about myself and the team that helped make this all possible. My name is Chase and I am the founder and creator of The Woodshop at age 17. My brother Chris, who is 19, is majoring in product/industrial design. We have taught and learned from each other (with some help from the his college courses of course) how to work various CAD programs which has enabled us to design the best wooden keyboard in the world. Not to mention we are not rookies in the world of design and business. We owned and operated a clothing company that sold products in all 50 states and over 20 countries globally. Everything we have done could not have been accomplished without the help and support of our parents.

We are doing this because....it is our passion! We have recently become obsessed with wood products and with our newly acquired CAD skills....hence my new design for wooden keyboards. Throughout this process we have acquired one of the most durable woods in the world, bamboo. Each keyboard is different from any other because no two trees are alike. Furthermore, our keyboard is meant to last a lifetime. Each keyboard is created with the environment in mind, and designed to be as eloquent as the materials it is made out of. Finally, our strong love for nature is instilled in each and every keyboard.

Three words….WE NEED YOU! Hopefully you know that this project on Indiegogo will work as an all or nothing funding platform. This means that if we do not completely reach our full funding goal we get nothing. You are the key that unlocks The Woodshop to the world. Without your help everything we have been working on will have simply gone to waste.

Once again….WE NEED YOU! It would be so helpful if you could simply like and share our Facebook page, follow and tweet at us, send texts and emails to your friends, and anything else you can do to help us get the word out.

Check us out on (yes click on the icons and it will take you there):

The money raised from this project will go towards producing the first Woodshop keyboard. This means that we will be paying for the raw materials, first production run of keyboards, shipping, and packaging.

If you have read this far then hopefully this means you actually want our keyboard, and you need to help us make sure that we fully reach our goal so you can get the keyboards as soon as possible. The good news is over the past few months we have developed great relationships with our manufacturers and we are confident that we can have all the orders fulfilled within 50 days after the campaign has concluded. If for some reason there is any delay in the production you will be notified immediately.

I want to take a moment to recognize the people that helped make this film possible. We filmed the video in Raleigh, NC. Zach Smith was the head videographer, produce, and film editor. Special thanks to Carson Tickle and Hunter Davis who were there every step of the way throughout the process of filming and editing.

Ultimately, you are the reason The Woodshop is striving towards becoming a reality, and we consider you part of the family. We hope you continue to grow with us into the future. Whether it is $1 or $3000, every little bit helps and we would love it if you could spare a few bucks to help us chase our dream. Nothing could be accomplished without you, and for that we thank you.

-Chase//Founder & CEO

Risks and challenges 

Of course the primary challenge when creating and mass ordering a new product of this sophistication is the manufacturing. However, we have found a credible, established, and certified group of suppliers to produce our keyboard. All aspects of production have been set in stone and are ready to be mass produced....we just need the funds!

We communicate with our suppliers first-hand to ensure that everything runs smoothly. Also, all of our quality control tests are done in-house so we know each and every keyboard is of the highest quality.

Like every project, it is challenging to pinpoint an exact date and timeline for when the watches will arrive on your doorstep. This is where our great relationships with our suppliers come in to play! We are confident that we can finish all orders within 50 days after the campaign has concluded. If for some reason there is any sort of delay in the production process you all will be the first to know.

Hopefully you can tell we have spent loads of time to make sure that everything will run smoothly after the project has ended (if our project is successful of course). Once again thanks for stopping by our page and spread the word!!!

story:
Press Coverage:

_______________________________________________________________________________

 Says: "This looks helpful"  - @phandroid

 

Says: "...it’s definitely worth taking a look at..."       

 Says: "...ideal on-the-go solution for your additional storage needs" 

__________________________________________________________________________

MicroSD to Micro USB Adapter

What if you could add more storage to any Android device with a tiny adapter?

Introducting MicroSD to Micro USB adapter. This indiegogo project aims to receive funding for the creation of a tiny adapter -- the worlds first of it's kind so you no longer have to worry about running out of space for your favourite videos, music or photos. All we need is your support to help fund the creation of this adapter.

Add additional storage to that newly announced Samsung Nexus 10, and LG Nexus 4 devices.

The adapter is so small it can happily sit with your keys as a keyring; store the whole of your favourite TV series, music collection and more in the palm of your hands.

Support the project and be the first to receive the adapter. If the project doesn't get funded, your receive a full refund, nothing to lose.

The MicroSD to Micro USB Adapter works with “rooted” Android devices, Linux Mass Storage Class Drivers, Windows® Vista™, Windows® XP, ME and OSX, USB 2.0 support and the smallest package in the market.

The Adapter is based on a fast 8051 microprocessor, High-speed USB 2.0 compatible transfer rates and a Secure Digital (SD) Controller capable of high-performance throughput > 35MB/s with new Hi-Speed formats.

Plug-and-Play Installation with No Software Required* (Android devices require root access)
The adapter features easy plug-and-play installation--no additional drivers or software are required*. Simply insert your microSD card into the memory card reader and plug the reader into your device’s MicroUSB port to begin transferring files.

USB 2.0 for High-Speed File Transfer

Fully compatible with USB 2.0, the reader transfers files quickly and efficiently. Even bulky files like HD video will transfer within minutes.

Compact, Ergonomic Design
Featuring a compact, pocket-sized design, smallest package in the market yet, the Adapter lets you transfer photos to and from your microSD card wherever you go. Transfer via the MicroUSB reader for your computer or mobile device.

Why do we need an adapter?

The European Commission approved a policy requiring all mobile phones to adopt the standard Micro USB charging and communication connector beginning in January 2011, Up until now all the adapter you can find in the market are MicroSD to USB so that you can transfer your MicroSD card information to your USB enabled computer or device.

However those devices like the Galaxy Nexus or the Nexus 7, Nexus 4, Nexus 10 that lack the native MicroSD slot are left in the dark, A MicroSD to Micro USB adapter would allow any device with a MIcro USB port (OTG) to expand its internal memory capacity by allowing you to swap external memory cards (MicroSD).

The small package would allow the user to leave the adapter plugged to the device without interfering with its useage or form factor.

$12 Holiday Sponsor:

  • Stay Up-to-Date on all things related to this project and the adapter's first availability
  • 1x MicroSD card Holder that can hold up to 10 standard Micro SD memory cards and one standard “Micro SD to SD card adapter” THANK YOU!

(Add $5 for International Shipping)

$16 "Early Bird Special" (Only 50)

  • Your Name on the Website as SILVER Sponsor
  • 1x MicroSD to MicroUSB Adapter 
  • 1x MicroSD Card Holder that can hold up to 10 standard Micro SD memory cards and one standard “Micro SD to SD card adapter” 
  • Guaranteed to be the first shipment of Productions units.

(Free shipping within the US, add $10 for International shipping)

$22 Silver Sponsor:

  • Your Name on the Website as a SILVER Sponsor.
  • 1x MicroSD to MicroUSB Adapter
  • 1x MicroSD card Holder that can hold up to 10 standard Micro SD memory cards and one standard “Micro SD to SD card adapter”

(Free shipping within the US, add $10 for International shipping) <--- Perk description on the right panel is wrong

$32 Gold Sponsor + MicroSD Adapter + MicroSD card

  • Your Name on the Website as a GOLD sponsor
  • 1x MicroSD to MicroUSB Adapter
  • 1x MicroSD card Holder
  • 8GB MicroSD Card

(Free shipping within the US, add $10 for International shipping)

$58 Platinum Sponsor

  • Your Name on the Website as PLATINUM Sponsor.
  • 2x MicroSD to MicroUSB Adapter (His and Her)
  • 2x MicroSD card Holder that can hold up to 10 standard Micro SD memory cards and one standard “Micro SD to SD card adapter”

(Free shipping within the US, add $15 for International shipping)

$69 3-Pack Gold Sponsor

  • 3x MicroSD to Micro USB Adapters 
  • 1x MicroSD Card Holder
  • Your Name on the website as Gold Sponsor

(Add $12 to International Shipping)

$99 BETA TESTERS NEEDED!!!!!

Join our Beta tester program for just $99, you will receive as many Prototypes as we build (as soon as we get them), for you to keep and test with as many devices as you would like.

You will also receive a final production unit, and your name would be display on the website as a main contributor and part of the development team. 

You will get access to an exclusive development forum where you can discuss anything related to the device, propose changes and improvements. 

Get the chance to influence the design and the final outcome of the project. We need your support to make this project happen

  • 1x Prototype unit for you to test (and provide feedback) right away.
  • 1x Production unit once they are ready.
  • 1x MicroSD Card Holder (Support up to 10 MicroSD Cards)

***NOTE: delivery date below is aprox for the Prototype unit, your Production unit will ship when ready (aprox. Mar 2013) More Details >

Features Of the MicroSD Holder:

  • A positive locking feature by way of a moving independent tab for each Micro SD card that is an integral part of the single molded piece.

  • Each sleeve has the forward right retaining tab offset to the left such that the Micro SD cards can only be fully inserted with the electrical contacts facing down and fully protected.

  • Sized and shape of a credit card allowing it to easily be carried.

  • Hole for keychain.
MicroSD Holder - Holds up to 10 MicroSD plus a Full size SD adapter

WIN a FREE Nexus 7 - To the person with more referrals

We will be sending a Brand new Nexus 7 to the contributor with more referral if the project is successfully funded. Just use the custom link provided on the “share” section (right bellow the video) and we can track all your referral. At the end the person with most referral will receive a Nexus 7. More Details >

___________________________________________________________________________

Current Project status:

Proof of concept, design and build - Done
Preliminary research to find smallest and least expensive parts sourceable in lower quantities - Done 
Alpha Prototype Hardware Design - Done (Schematics captured)
Alpha Prototype PCB layout - Done 
Alpha Prototype PCB manufactured - Done
Alpha Prototype Tested - Done

Mechanical Stress testing, Device compatibility, over temperature performance. - In Progress   

Project goals and TO-DOs:

* Enclosure casing design (3D modeling)

* Stereolithography (SLA) Prototype Manufacturing

* Stereolithography (SLA) Prototype Stress test

* Final Production PCB Layout

* FCC and CE Certification 

* Final Enclosure casing Molding manufacturing

* Production Enclosure casing Manufacturing

* First production Units BOM Sourcing

* First production Units PCB Manufacturing

* First Production Units Assembly and Testing

* Rewards Shipment

FCC and CE Certifications:

All electronics products sold in the United States are required by the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) to obtain an FCC mark showing that the product complies with the following standards:
- Emissions (the effect on other electronic devices of energy radiated from the product)
- Immunity (the product's response to other electronic devices)
We are required to comply with FCC part 15 Class B.
A Class B device is a product marketed for residential or home use. Class B requirements tend to be stricter than Class A requirements.

How do we plan to use the funds?

Your pledges will go towards building our initial goal of 1500 units, paying for the plastic injection mold tooling, the casing itself, test fixtures, agency approvals and rewards extras. 

If we reach our goal, we will be able to source the Bill of Materials and PCB on larger quantities, which will allow us to keep the price down. 

Project Schedule

Manufacturing Plan: (*On Working days)
Alpha Prototype PCB fabrication . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Completed
Alpha Prototype PCB assembly . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Completed

Indiegogo Funding . . . . . . . . . . . .. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  30 Days (+14 days Paypal Holding Funds)

Pre-Production Prototype PCB Layout. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  8 Days
Pre-Production Prototype PCB Manufacturing . . . . . . . . . . .10 Days
Pre-Production Prototype Assembly. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 10 Days
FCC & CE Federal Certification  . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  . . . 10 Days
Mold Tooling Design . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .. . . . .  10 days
Prototype Mechanical and Electrical testing . . . .. . . .. . . . .  5 Days
Molding tool manufacturing . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  15 Days
Production PCB Layout . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .    5 Days
Production PCB Manufacturing . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  . . . . . . 15 days
Production Units Assembly. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  10 Days
Production Units Testing. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 8 Days
Packaging & shipping . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .. . . . . 3 Days


Estimated Delivery of Rewards (Completed tested and packaged Production Units):
March 2013 (**please make sure to check the “Risks and Challenges sections for more details)

A MS project file is Available for backer if interested, with details on the project plans and schedule.

FAQs

1. Would it be possible to mount the usb connector below the circuit board so it sticks out as little as possible? I think most people would prefer a slightly thicker adapter than a long one. Or so that it's going at a right-angle rather than the standard usb pen-sticking-out-ready-to-be-broken design.

Not really possible, the connector is edge mounted (it have 3 pings on the bottom of the board, and 4 on the top), this is again for mechanical support, there is not way to mount the socket on the same plane as the connector, (however i can move most of the hardware bellow the socket, so the connector can be closer to the socket, I think I can cut 0.2 inches more)

2. In the final design would it be possible to add a hole in edge of the adapter to attach it as a keyring?

Yes, I was planning on adding a small hole on the corner for a keyring placement

3. It would be good if the connection part could be retracted inside the device, like some usb pen drives in order to protect the connection, or alternatively design a protective cap.

Retractable designs are very complex, and actually add size to the device when it is "open" not to mentioned complexity to the molding. I rather stay away from it for right now. However a protective cap for the plug is planned, but not as part of the initial Rewards/Perks fulfillment.

4. Where do I add money for international shipping?

When you select a contribution level, you're prompted to enter in the total contribution amount just below.  This is for people that want international shipping, or if you want to toss a few extra bucks our way just to be nice.

Keep in Touch:

If you have any question, or comment please send us a message or visit our website and leave us a comment. If you are a contributor and would like to have any details about the project, please just ask, we will share detailed shceduale, plans, drawings and anything you may be interested on, we cannot do it without your support. 

Twitter: @MicroSD2MicroUS 

Blog: www.MicroSDtoMicroUSB.com

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES: 

Still to test: 
* Power Consumption (we need to make sure that the adapter doesn't affect the host device on any way) 
* Device compatibility (some devices may required additional software) 
* Mechanical implementation Issues (which can force the design to have a large Enclosure) 
* Durability 
* Unforeseen Manufacturing delays

Manufacturing will be by contract manufacturer; ultimately, we'll be looking for turnkey services. Initially we'll be using assembly services only, and we'll be programming and testing the boards ourselves.

Keep in mind that two national Holidays are in between now and the completion of the project (Thanksgiving and Winter Holiday breaks), this could directly affect our manufacturing schedule and delay rewards shipments.

In the future, fulfillment will be handled by distributors. For the initial run, we’ll do this ourselves in order to deliver with no delay. This could be challenging if we get a very good response to this project and the pre-orders exceeds our expectations and plans.
story_txt:
Press Coverage:
_______________________________________________________________________________
 Says: "This looks helpful"  - @phandroid
 
Says: "...it’s definitely worth taking a look at..."       
 Says: "...ideal on-the-go solution for your additional storage needs" 
__________________________________________________________________________
MicroSD to Micro USB Adapter
What if you could add more storage to any Android device with a tiny adapter?
Introducting MicroSD to Micro USB adapter. This indiegogo project aims to receive funding for the creation of a tiny adapter -- the worlds first of it's kind so you no longer have to worry about running out of space for your favourite videos, music or photos. All we need is your support to help fund the creation of this adapter.
Add additional storage to that newly announced Samsung Nexus 10, and LG Nexus 4 devices.

The adapter is so small it can happily sit with your keys as a keyring; store the whole of your favourite TV series, music collection and more in the palm of your hands.
Support the project and be the first to receive the adapter. If the project doesn't get funded, your receive a full refund, nothing to lose.
The MicroSD to Micro USB Adapter works with “rooted” Android devices, Linux Mass Storage Class Drivers, Windows® Vista™, Windows® XP, ME and OSX, USB 2.0 support and the smallest package in the market.
The Adapter is based on a fast 8051 microprocessor, High-speed USB 2.0 compatible transfer rates and a Secure Digital (SD) Controller capable of high-performance throughput > 35MB/s with new Hi-Speed formats.
Plug-and-Play Installation with No Software Required* (Android devices require root access)The adapter features easy plug-and-play installation--no additional drivers or software are required*. Simply insert your microSD card into the memory card reader and plug the reader into your device’s MicroUSB port to begin transferring files.

USB 2.0 for High-Speed File Transfer
Fully compatible with USB 2.0, the reader transfers files quickly and efficiently. Even bulky files like HD video will transfer within minutes.
Compact, Ergonomic DesignFeaturing a compact, pocket-sized design, smallest package in the market yet, the Adapter lets you transfer photos to and from your microSD card wherever you go. Transfer via the MicroUSB reader for your computer or mobile device.
Why do we need an adapter?
The European Commission approved a policy requiring all mobile phones to adopt the standard Micro USB charging and communication connector beginning in January 2011, Up until now all the adapter you can find in the market are MicroSD to USB so that you can transfer your MicroSD card information to your USB enabled computer or device.
However those devices like the Galaxy Nexus or the Nexus 7, Nexus 4, Nexus 10 that lack the native MicroSD slot are left in the dark, A MicroSD to Micro USB adapter would allow any device with a MIcro USB port (OTG) to expand its internal memory capacity by allowing you to swap external memory cards (MicroSD).
The small package would allow the user to leave the adapter plugged to the device without interfering with its useage or form factor.

$12 Holiday Sponsor:

Stay Up-to-Date on all things related to this project and the adapter's first availability
1x MicroSD card Holder that can hold up to 10 standard Micro SD memory cards and one standard “Micro SD to SD card adapter” THANK YOU!
(Add $5 for International Shipping)
$16 "Early Bird Special" (Only 50)

Your Name on the Website as SILVER Sponsor
1x MicroSD to MicroUSB Adapter 
1x MicroSD Card Holder that can hold up to 10 standard Micro SD memory cards and one standard “Micro SD to SD card adapter” 
Guaranteed to be the first shipment of Productions units.
(Free shipping within the US, add $10 for International shipping)
$22 Silver Sponsor:

Your Name on the Website as a SILVER Sponsor.
1x MicroSD to MicroUSB Adapter
1x MicroSD card Holder that can hold up to 10 standard Micro SD memory cards and one standard “Micro SD to SD card adapter”
(Free shipping within the US, add $10 for International shipping) <--- Perk description on the right panel is wrong
$32 Gold Sponsor + MicroSD Adapter + MicroSD card

Your Name on the Website as a GOLD sponsor
1x MicroSD to MicroUSB Adapter
1x MicroSD card Holder
8GB MicroSD Card
(Free shipping within the US, add $10 for International shipping)
$58 Platinum Sponsor

2x MicroSD to MicroUSB Adapter (His and Her)
2x MicroSD card Holder that can hold up to 10 standard Micro SD memory cards and one standard “Micro SD to SD card adapter”

3x MicroSD to Micro USB Adapters

$99 BETA TESTERS NEEDED!!!!!

Join our Beta tester program for just $99, you will receive as many Prototypes as we build (as soon as we get them), for you to keep and test with as many devices as you would like.


You will also receive a final production unit, and your name would be display on the website as a main contributor and part of the development team. 


You will get access to an exclusive development forum where you can discuss anything related to the device, propose changes and improvements. 


Get the chance to influence the design and the final outcome of the project. We need your support to make this project happen


1x Prototype unit for you to test (and provide feedback) right away.
1x Production unit once they are ready.
1x MicroSD Card Holder (Support up to 10 MicroSD Cards)
***NOTE: delivery date below is aprox for the Prototype unit, your Production unit will ship when ready (aprox. Mar 2013) More Details >
Features Of the MicroSD Holder:


A positive locking feature by way of a moving independent tab for each Micro SD card that is an integral part of the single molded piece.


Each sleeve has the forward right retaining tab offset to the left such that the Micro SD cards can only be fully inserted with the electrical contacts facing down and fully protected.


Sized and shape of a credit card allowing it to easily be carried.

Hole for keychain.

MicroSD Holder - Holds up to 10 MicroSD plus a Full size SD adapter

WIN a FREE Nexus 7 - To the person with more referrals
We will be sending a Brand new Nexus 7 to the contributor with more referral if the project is successfully funded. Just use the custom link provided on the “share” section (right bellow the video) and we can track all your referral. At the end the person with most referral will receive a Nexus 7. More Details >
___________________________________________________________________________
Current Project status:
Proof of concept, design and build - DonePreliminary research to find smallest and least expensive parts sourceable in lower quantities - Done Alpha Prototype Hardware Design - Done (Schematics captured)Alpha Prototype PCB layout - Done Alpha Prototype PCB manufactured - DoneAlpha Prototype Tested - Done
Mechanical Stress testing, Device compatibility, over temperature performance. - In Progress   
Project goals and TO-DOs:
* Enclosure casing design (3D modeling)
* Stereolithography (SLA) Prototype Manufacturing
* Stereolithography (SLA) Prototype Stress test
* Final Production PCB Layout
* FCC and CE Certification 
* Final Enclosure casing Molding manufacturing
* Production Enclosure casing Manufacturing
* First production Units BOM Sourcing
* First production Units PCB Manufacturing
* First Production Units Assembly and Testing
* Rewards Shipment
FCC and CE Certifications:
All electronics products sold in the United States are required by the
Federal Communications Commission (FCC) to obtain an FCC mark showing that the product complies with the following standards:
- Emissions (the effect on other electronic devices of energy radiated
from the product)
- Immunity (the product's response to other electronic devices)     
We are required to comply with FCC part 15 Class B. 
A Class B device is a product marketed for residential or home use.
Class B requirements tend to be stricter than Class A requirements.
How do we plan to use the funds?
Your pledges will go towards building our initial goal of 1500 units, paying for the plastic injection mold tooling, the casing itself, test fixtures, agency approvals and rewards extras. 
If we reach our goal, we will be able to source the Bill of Materials and PCB on larger quantities, which will allow us to keep the price down. 
Project Schedule
Manufacturing Plan: (*On Working days)Alpha Prototype PCB fabrication . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . CompletedAlpha Prototype PCB assembly . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . CompletedIndiegogo Funding . . . . . . . . . . . .. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  30 Days (+14 days Paypal Holding Funds)Pre-Production Prototype PCB Layout. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  8 DaysPre-Production Prototype PCB Manufacturing . . . . . . . . . . .10 DaysPre-Production Prototype Assembly. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 10 DaysFCC & CE Federal Certification  . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  . . . 10 DaysMold Tooling Design . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .. . . . .  10 daysPrototype Mechanical and Electrical testing . . . .. . . .. . . . .  5 DaysMolding tool manufacturing . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  15 DaysProduction PCB Layout . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .    5 DaysProduction PCB Manufacturing . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  . . . . . . 15 daysProduction Units Assembly. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  10 DaysProduction Units Testing. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 8 DaysPackaging & shipping . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .. . . . . 3 Days
Estimated Delivery of Rewards (Completed tested and packaged Production Units):March 2013 (**please make sure to check the “Risks and Challenges sections for more details)A MS project file is Available for backer if interested, with details on the project plans and schedule.
FAQs
1. Would it be possible to mount the usb connector below the circuit board so it sticks out as little as possible? I think most people would prefer a slightly thicker adapter than a long one. Or so that it's going at a right-angle rather than the standard usb pen-sticking-out-ready-to-be-broken design.
Not really possible, the connector is edge mounted (it have 3 pings on the bottom of the board, and 4 on the top), this is again for mechanical support, there is not way to mount the socket on the same plane as the connector, (however i can move most of the hardware bellow the socket, so the connector can be closer to the socket, I think I can cut 0.2 inches more)
2. In the final design would it be possible to add a hole in edge of the adapter to attach it as a keyring?
Yes, I was planning on adding a small hole on the corner for a keyring placement3. It would be good if the connection part could be retracted inside the device, like some usb pen drives in order to protect the connection, or alternatively design a protective cap.
Retractable designs are very complex, and actually add size to the device when it is "open" not to mentioned complexity to the molding. I rather stay away from it for right now. However a protective cap for the plug is planned, but not as part of the initial Rewards/Perks fulfillment.
4. Where do I add money for international shipping?
When you select a contribution level, you're prompted to enter in the total contribution amount just below.  This is for people that want international shipping, or if you want to toss a few extra bucks our way just to be nice.
Keep in Touch:
If you have any question, or comment please send us a message or visit our website and leave us a comment. If you are a contributor and would like to have any details about the project, please just ask, we will share detailed shceduale, plans, drawings and anything you may be interested on, we cannot do it without your support. 
Twitter: @MicroSD2MicroUS 
Blog: www.MicroSDtoMicroUSB.com
 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES: 
Still to test: * Power Consumption (we need to make sure that the adapter doesn't affect the host device on any way) * Device compatibility (some devices may required additional software) * Mechanical implementation Issues (which can force the design to have a large Enclosure) * Durability * Unforeseen Manufacturing delays
Manufacturing will be by contract manufacturer; ultimately, we'll be looking for turnkey services. Initially we'll be using assembly services only, and we'll be programming and testing the boards ourselves.
Keep in mind that two national Holidays are in between now and the completion of the project (Thanksgiving and Winter Holiday breaks), this could directly affect our manufacturing schedule and delay rewards shipments.
In the future, fulfillment will be handled by distributors. For the initial run, we’ll do this ourselves in order to deliver with no delay. This could be challenging if we get a very good response to this project and the pre-orders exceeds our expectations and plans.

story:
“Sit back, relax, and type in comfort with this ergonomic split keyboard. Just don't nod off’’, CNET

“World’s First Integrated Ergonomic PC Chair- uChair launched in 2013 CES”, China Central Television (CCTV-1)

“Amazing Technologies and Futuristic Projects Presented at CES 2013, the recipe for a full day’s work (or gaming)”,Technology Personalized

“Allowing you to sit back comfortably and lets you work along with a relaxing seating experience’’, Mycoolbin.com

Experience Integrated Ergonomics with uChair: Relaxable, Comfortable and Healthy

uChair™ will help PC users release the strain on the neck, shoulder and body, and offer a more relaxable, comfortable and healthier position with five patented innovations:

Integrated Ergonomic Design—Providing systematic protection from head to foot with backrest, seat cushion and foot rest devices, which enables users to realize the true ergonomic benefits. uChair will help you fully relax in a 125-135 degree reclined position, which, according to latest ergonomic research, is the best-recommended position to evenly distribute pressure on the vertebrate. Users can also adjust the position of the  backrest to suit their best needs, along with the adjustable seat cushion, neck rest cushion and lumbar support. The special designed pressure release slots will also improve the release of concentrated pressure on the vertebrate. 

Split Keyboard in the Armrests—To help users relax their shoulders and neck when they need to type, we split the keyboard in the armrests. Yes, it requires a little practice, but it is definately a worthwhile effort. There is a mouse area on the right armrest (keyboards for left handed users are available at  their request), with four USB ports and an earphone/microphone port available. 

Foot-Control Mouse—Offering users a pair of foot switches working as any key or key combination of keyboard and mouse, to encourage more exercises of the lower body. Users still need to use a regular mouse to control the direction. Recent research by health experts indicates: Sitting is the new smoking, and we would like to encourage users to exercise their legs and feet more during their operations of computers. For gamers who spend more than 5-6 hours a day, we highly recommend this feature to help them do more exercises  while increasing the enjoyment with the additional operating control devices. 

Universal Bracket—Helping users to adjust the monitor to the most suitable position and protect their eyesight effectively. An LCD monitor up to 29” is supported, and most laptops in market as well as iPad 3-4 could be equipped easily with special supporters. iMac users please select the pledge indicating support iMac. Multiple monitors are not supported at the current stage. 

Embedded Cable Management-- Embedded design provides neat, clear and fashionable cable management. No more messy cables here and there.

World’s First Cloth-Size-Based PC Chair: the best possible fit to your body curve  

Compare to the traditional One-Size-Fit-All’s chair production, uChair applies an innovative cloth-size-based design allowing users to select their own uChair size for a best possible fit. Users could select their custom uChair based on sizes they understand easily, namely the clothing sizes. The chair backrest, seat cushion, neck rest and skelton are especially sized to fit different user’s body curves and provide a better comfort and support. 

Indiegogo backers, please provide the gender and size preference information according the following:

 

Specifications of uChair

uChair in package:181cm*82cm*90cm;

uChair in use:210cm(Max)*82cm*110cm(Max).

Net Weight:70KG

Materials of uChair:

Why do we need your support?

We have done a lot of work in the last three years, including R&D in Integrated Ergonomics, patents and brand application, prototyping, assessing manufacturers and suppliers, etc. Now we come to Indiegogo to ask your support to realize the World’s First Integrated Ergonomic PC chair, also the First Cloth-Size-Based ergonomic chair.

Because of the patented innovation, uChair is a complex system that allows users to adjust the backrest, neck rest, seat cushion, armrests,  bracket and foot rest to the position they want, which means special adjustment mechanic parts have to been designed and molded for manufacture.

Cloth-Size-Based design & production will help user to find a comfy chair to best fit their body curve on a mass production scale. At the same time, it also means an initial investment for at least 16 different sets of mold for backrest, seat cushion, arm rest and parts of the skeleton has to be made. Is that worthy to do it? The answer is definitely YES. Providing a better users’ experiences is not only our mission, but also more valuable comparing to the increase on the molding expenses.

Therefore, initial production volume for uChair is very crucial. With supporters’ size preference, we could make a better production plan. With your funding, we can start molding and tooling and get the uChair into production phase. Our goal is to get as many supporters as we can to make uChair come to reality.

Prototypes

We currently have three prototypes, one is for our industrial design(shown as follows) and  one for mechanic design and verification. The last one is as shown in video, which is made of steel, aluminum alloy, plastic, sponge foam, leather and textile, with the laptop supporter on it. It also delivers the full uChair functionality and experience, with the adjustable function of backrest, neck rest, seat cushion, armrests, bracket, and foot rest. Split keyboard and foot-control mouse are also fully functional.

Software to Foot-control mouse

Users can customize the foot control mouse with any key or key combination of the keyboard and/or mouse button by easy configuration in the application software, which is developed by our supplier and ready for download from our website:www.uChair.cn/english/Download.

Design

The design of the manufactured product would vary slightly from the prototype: uChair Basic and Superior would be made of Nylon Mesh used for office chair, and uChair Limited Edition would be made of leather in classic green. There would be two magic stickers on the backrest for the neck rest adjustment. The skeleton of the current prototype is made of aluminum alloy and the manufactured product would be made of steel and Injection Molded Plastic. And, of course, the laptop in the video and picture is not included in the award.

Team

Thanks to the clustered manufacturing capabilities of Suzhou in China, we are able to work closely with our manufacturers to take an advantage of the flexible production capabilities at an affordable cost to provide cloth-size-based uChair products.

We have also been working very productively with our parts and components suppliers in China, to speed up our production process.

Ditang (Beijing) Design made an exceptional industrial design with comfy, healthy and fashionable concept in mind. uChair Technologies and Ditang Design had set up jointly an Integrated Ergnomic Engineering Center in Beijing for collabarating of the industrial design and test of the Integrated Ergonomics.

Production Plan

Phase 1:  Manufacturing Engineering Preparation- Scheduled completion Sep 2013

Phase 2:  Molding and Tooling - Scheduled completion Oct 2013

Phase 3:  Pre-production and Products Certification - Scheduled completion Nov 2013

Phase 4:  Formal Production - Scheduled start Dec 2013

Phase 5:  Shipping - Scheduled start Jan 2014

Shenzhen PC Sensors would supply the kernel components of foot-control mouse, who is in the market for more than 5 years. Suzhou Qilang acts as bracket part supplier, whose products has been exported to many countries. Suzhou Chuangtou is our OEM manufacturer, who is also the producer of the prototype in the video and would be responsible for the total manufacturing, assembling and packaging.

Perks

Color Options of uChair:

uChair Polo-Shirt: Purple, as shown in our video.

iPad Supporter:

Traditional Keyboard Tray:

Special Thanks 

IBM Global Entrepreneur Program, Cnet, China Central Television, Cheku Coffee，Timothy Hornyak ,Alex Serban, Su Di.

Thank you to all Integrated Ergonomics enthusiasts for your time, support, and dedication.

And kindly please help us to share this campaign on Facebook and brag about it to your friends!

 

Risks and challenges

Within the last 3 years, we have encountered and resolved many difficulties in our R&D and prototyping process. The cloth-size-based design & production approach is one of the major challenges we met during our R&D. For our first prototype, which is designed and made according to my cloth size, i.e., XXL, we found smaller sized product testers did not feel very comfortable because their body curve was not fully supported by the backrest and seat cushion. Their hands had to extend uncomfortably because of the position of split keyboard in the armrests. We had spent more than 6 months and finally found the solution at the inspiration of the garments industry practice.

uChair is not a simple piece of furniture, since the adjustment mechanism is much more complicated compared to a regular ergonomic chair. With our last prototype in the video, we have already completed the verification of the mechanic design and ready to proceed to the production phase.

Another challenge for us to successfully deliver the uChair is that we also need to find the qualified suppliers for the components and parts, such as, foot-control mouse, split keyboard and bracket. The quality control would be a major risk to ensure users’ experiences to uChair. We have been working with the suppliers for more than two years. They have been in the industry for more than 5 years and are very experienced in the quality control and U.S. standards. We are very confident to their capabilities on components and parts' manufacturing, delivery, and quality assurance.

For international shipping and customs clearance, one of our team members has been in the international trade business to U.S. for more than 17 years. So we will be well prepared to make the international shipping from China to U.S.or other destination, and find qualified transportation company to deliver uChair directly to your door.

Last but not least, we also need to pass the CCC and FCC certification, required by U.S. and China regulation for exported & imported IT product. We have made a thorough checking list during our designing process and make sure our suppliers are experienced in the relevant requirement. The major risk would be the time consuming process of the certification. We have anticipated enough time and will work on it paralleling to pre-production manufacturing phase.

FAQ

1.What will be the price of the uChair after our Indiegogo campaign?

The price of the uChair BASIC after our Indiegogo campaign will be at $699 and uChair Supeior at $769. Our Indiegogo backers receive a significant discount and get their orders fulfilled before any retail orders, so get on board now.

2.How much will domestic shipping in U.S. cost?

Depending on how far you live from either the West or East Coast, domestic shipping in U.S. costs will be in the $120-$180 range for doorstep delivery of the uChair.

We are trying our best to get a competitive deal with shipping company and save cost for our backers.

The shipping cost will be confirmed and billed to you when we are ready for manufacturing and have collected your delivery preference. No need to add shipping fees to your perk amount.

3.How much will domestic shipping in China costs?

Domestic shipping in China costs would be in the $10-20 range for doorstep delivery of the uChair.

The shipping cost will be confirmed and billed to you when we are ready for manufacturing and have collected your delivery preference. No need to add shipping fees to your perk amount.

4.How much will international shipping cost?

If you are buying an uChair internationally, you must take shipping costs and VAT into consideration. International shipping is complicated, and can be costly depending on where you live. We do not want to exclude any continents, and will do our best to make this work with international distribution centers and pick-up locations. You need to verify and add your country’s import duties and VAT, if applicable.

International shipping costs will be confirmed and billed to you when we are ready for manufacturing and have collected your delivery preference. No need to add shipping fees to your perk amount. Below are current estimates of shipping costs for various countries (excludes import duties and VAT).

North America:

Canada: $150-$200

Mexico: $350-$450

Europe:

England, Germany: $150-$200

Western Europe: $200-$300 (Belgium, Netherlands, Ireland, Scotland, France, e.a.)

Southern Europe: $250-$300 (Spain, Portugal, Italy, Greece)

Scandinavia: $300-$400 (Sweden, Norway, Finland, Denmark)

Austria: $300-$350

Switzerland: $350-$400

Eastern Europe: $350-$400 (Poland, Slovenia, Czech Republic, Slovakia)

Baltic States: $350-$400 (Lithuania, Latvia, Estonia)

Balkan / ex-Soviet: $350-$450 (Croatia, Bosnia, Ukraine, e.a.)

Turkey: $350-$450

Asia:

South East Asia: $125-$175 (Singapore, Malaysia)

Japan: $200-$300

S. Korea: $250-$350

Other:

Australia: $200-$250 

New Zealand: $200-$300

South Africa: $650-$700

Egypt: $700-$800

Middle East: $600-$750

In case your country is not listed above, please contact us, so that we can work together to determine the optimal shipping strategy and cost.

4.How are shipping priorities determined?

Orders are fulfilled on a first-come, first-serve basis. Be sure to order early to avoid waiting times beyond the announced shipping date.

5.How do I order uChair at my own clothing size?

Currently, we have a U.S. clothing size chart for you choose, you need to tell us the following information:

Gender, upper clothing size, lower clothing size.

Have a question about the uChair? Discuss uChair at Crowdfundingforum.com! 

For more information, please contact at:liufeng@uChair.cn

Users can customize the foot control mouse with any key or key combination of the keyboard and/or mouse button by easy configuration in the application software, which is developed by our supplier and ready for download from our website:www.uChair.cn/english/Download.

Design
The design of the manufactured product would vary slightly from the prototype: uChair Basic and Superior would be made of Nylon Mesh used for office chair, and uChair Limited Edition would be made of leather in classic green. There would be two magic stickers on the backrest for the neck rest adjustment. The skeleton of the current prototype is made of aluminum alloy and the manufactured product would be made of steel and Injection Molded Plastic. And, of course, the laptop in the video and picture is not included in the award.
Team
Thanks to the clustered manufacturing capabilities of Suzhou in China, we are able to work closely with our manufacturers to take an advantage of the flexible production capabilities at an affordable cost to provide cloth-size-based uChair products.
We have also been working very productively with our parts and components suppliers in China, to speed up our production process.
Ditang (Beijing) Design made an exceptional industrial design with comfy, healthy and fashionable concept in mind. uChair Technologies and Ditang Design had set up jointly an Integrated Ergnomic Engineering Center in Beijing for collabarating of the industrial design and test of the Integrated Ergonomics.
Production Plan
Phase 1:  Manufacturing Engineering Preparation- Scheduled completion Sep 2013
Phase 2:  Molding and Tooling - Scheduled completion Oct 2013
Phase 3:  Pre-production and Products Certification - Scheduled completion Nov 2013
Phase 4:  Formal Production - Scheduled start Dec 2013
Phase 5:  Shipping - Scheduled start Jan 2014
Shenzhen PC Sensors would supply the kernel components of foot-control mouse, who is in the market for more than 5 years. Suzhou Qilang acts as bracket part supplier, whose products has been exported to many countries. Suzhou Chuangtou is our OEM manufacturer, who is also the producer of the prototype in the video and would be responsible for the total manufacturing, assembling and packaging.
Perks
Color Options of uChair:

uChair Polo-Shirt: Purple, as shown in our video.
iPad Supporter:

Traditional Keyboard Tray:

Special Thanks 
IBM Global Entrepreneur Program, Cnet, China Central Television, Cheku Coffee，Timothy Hornyak ,Alex Serban, Su Di.
Thank you to all Integrated Ergonomics enthusiasts for your time, support, and dedication.
And kindly please help us to share this campaign on Facebook and brag about it to your friends!
 


Risks and challenges
Within the last 3 years, we have encountered and resolved many difficulties in our R&D and prototyping process. The cloth-size-based design & production approach is one of the major challenges we met during our R&D. For our first prototype, which is designed and made according to my cloth size, i.e., XXL, we found smaller sized product testers did not feel very comfortable because their body curve was not fully supported by the backrest and seat cushion. Their hands had to extend uncomfortably because of the position of split keyboard in the armrests. We had spent more than 6 months and finally found the solution at the inspiration of the garments industry practice.
uChair is not a simple piece of furniture, since the adjustment mechanism is much more complicated compared to a regular ergonomic chair. With our last prototype in the video, we have already completed the verification of the mechanic design and ready to proceed to the production phase.
Another challenge for us to successfully deliver the uChair is that we also need to find the qualified suppliers for the components and parts, such as, foot-control mouse, split keyboard and bracket. The quality control would be a major risk to ensure users’ experiences to uChair. We have been working with the suppliers for more than two years. They have been in the industry for more than 5 years and are very experienced in the quality control and U.S. standards. We are very confident to their capabilities on components and parts' manufacturing, delivery, and quality assurance.
For international shipping and customs clearance, one of our team members has been in the international trade business to U.S. for more than 17 years. So we will be well prepared to make the international shipping from China to U.S.or other destination, and find qualified transportation company to deliver uChair directly to your door.
Last but not least, we also need to pass the CCC and FCC certification, required by U.S. and China regulation for exported & imported IT product. We have made a thorough checking list during our designing process and make sure our suppliers are experienced in the relevant requirement. The major risk would be the time consuming process of the certification. We have anticipated enough time and will work on it paralleling to pre-production manufacturing phase.
FAQ
1.What will be the price of the uChair after our Indiegogo campaign?
The price of the uChair BASIC after our Indiegogo campaign will be at $699 and uChair Supeior at $769. Our Indiegogo backers receive a significant discount and get their orders fulfilled before any retail orders, so get on board now.
2.How much will domestic shipping in U.S. cost?
Depending on how far you live from either the West or East Coast, domestic shipping in U.S. costs will be in the $120-$180 range for doorstep delivery of the uChair.
We are trying our best to get a competitive deal with shipping company and save cost for our backers.
The shipping cost will be confirmed and billed to you when we are ready for manufacturing and have collected your delivery preference. No need to add shipping fees to your perk amount.
3.How much will domestic shipping in China costs?
Domestic shipping in China costs would be in the $10-20 range for doorstep delivery of the uChair.
The shipping cost will be confirmed and billed to you when we are ready for manufacturing and have collected your delivery preference. No need to add shipping fees to your perk amount.
4.How much will international shipping cost?
If you are buying an uChair internationally, you must take shipping costs and VAT into consideration. International shipping is complicated, and can be costly depending on where you live. We do not want to exclude any continents, and will do our best to make this work with international distribution centers and pick-up locations. You need to verify and add your country’s import duties and VAT, if applicable.
International shipping costs will be confirmed and billed to you when we are ready for manufacturing and have collected your delivery preference. No need to add shipping fees to your perk amount. Below are current estimates of shipping costs for various countries (excludes import duties and VAT).
North America:
Canada: $150-$200
Mexico: $350-$450
Europe:
England, Germany: $150-$200
Western Europe: $200-$300 (Belgium, Netherlands, Ireland, Scotland, France, e.a.)
Southern Europe: $250-$300 (Spain, Portugal, Italy, Greece)
Scandinavia: $300-$400 (Sweden, Norway, Finland, Denmark)
Austria: $300-$350
Switzerland: $350-$400
Eastern Europe: $350-$400 (Poland, Slovenia, Czech Republic, Slovakia)
Baltic States: $350-$400 (Lithuania, Latvia, Estonia)
Balkan / ex-Soviet: $350-$450 (Croatia, Bosnia, Ukraine, e.a.)
Turkey: $350-$450
Asia:
South East Asia: $125-$175 (Singapore, Malaysia)
Japan: $200-$300
S. Korea: $250-$350
Other:
Australia: $200-$250 
New Zealand: $200-$300
South Africa: $650-$700
Egypt: $700-$800
Middle East: $600-$750
In case your country is not listed above, please contact us, so that we can work together to determine the optimal shipping strategy and cost.
4.How are shipping priorities determined?
Orders are fulfilled on a first-come, first-serve basis. Be sure to order early to avoid waiting times beyond the announced shipping date.
5.How do I order uChair at my own clothing size?
Currently, we have a U.S. clothing size chart for you choose, you need to tell us the following information:
Gender, upper clothing size, lower clothing size.
Have a question about the uChair? Discuss uChair at Crowdfundingforum.com! 
For more information, please contact at:liufeng@uChair.cn

story:
When designing AlphaTank, we wanted to maintain a slim design while also creating a battery pack with industry-leading capacity. We designed AlphaTank to utilize a unique 8-cell stacked lithium-Ion battery. This compact design gives it an industry-leading 30,000mAh charge capacity while still remaining slim and portable. 

AlphaTank finally allows you to keep all your essential devices charged on-the-go. With its incredibly large 30,000mAh capacity and multiple USB output types (USB-A, USB-C), Alphatank has the power to charge all your devices, from your MacBook to your DSLR camera. AlphaTank is so powerful in fact, it can keep your iPhone XS charged for over a week! 

Although AlphaTank rarely needs to be recharged due to its incredibly large capacity, we designed the recharge process to be as convenient as possible. We gave AlphaTank three unique input ports, so you can use any phone charger available (USB-C, Micro USB, Lightning) to recharge.

Keep your MacBook charged on-the-go thanks to Alpha-Tank's PD USB-C input/output port. AlphaTank has the power to keep a MacBook Pro 15" charged for over 9 hours! That's more than enough time to keep you productive or entertained while you're traveling.

We equipped AlphaTank with two USB-A output ports and one PD fast-charging USB-C port, so you can keep three devices charged at once.

AlphaTank utilizes the all-new QC3.0 charging protocol allowing for step-less multi-voltage charging for multiple devices. Connect 3 unique devices, and AlphaTanks smart chip with QC3.0 will recognize each individual device, supplying it with the perfect voltage and current for an optimal charging state.

We designed AlphaTank to be fully compatible with two-way PD fast-charging. AlphaTank can fast charge any compatible phone in as little as an hour! But that's not all. AlphaTank can also be fast-charged through its USB-C input/output port from empty to full in under two hours!

For added convenience, we included a non-intrusive, bright LED display at the top of AlphaTank. This minimalistic display only shows essential charging information. With just the touch of a button, see percent charge remaining, Voltage, and Amperage.

Finally, when designing Alphatank, we focused on giving it a slim and portable design. With its smooth and flat design, AplhaTank slips effortlessly into any backpack or briefcase, making it the perfect choice for travel. 

We aimed to keep the reward options simple. Pick from our 1,2, 5, or 10 pack options to save anywhere between 40% and 48% off future retail prices! You can't go wrong!

Once completely funded, we will begin the manufacturing process. We are currently aiming to start early shipments sometime early November 2019.

story:
LightBox is a device smaller than a box of matches which allows you to control the LED lights - both single and multi-colour – wirelessly.

The LightBox is so small that one can easily mount it in an old lamp, under ceiling or bed and change the interior creating a special atmosphere using creative lighting - such as the popular LED strips - .

This is a LightBox prototype:

After downloading the free app, your phone or tablet turns into a handy wireless remote control. Besides that, it can control an unlimited number of BleBox devices.

and this is our app:


Where we are now?

We have designed the LightBox, made multiple prototypes, tested it and even sold a few dozens of devices to our friends and acquaintances. But now we want to start full production and make the product affordable for everybody as we believe that you’ll love it as well.

Who we are?

Patryk Arlamowski – 26 years old geek involved in the home automation devices for more than 8 years. A bit more than a year ago he gave up a job as a head of one of the most innovative R&D departments in Europe and started a new start-up focusing on wireless technologies. In his free time he’s a crazy scuba diver and horse rider. Just a month ago he received the polish “Invention of the Year” award for smart wheelchair for disabled people.


Kamila Rudnicka –  student of IT & Telecommunications, in her free time she is a constructor of multiple electronic devices prototypes. She loves animals and high heels. One of her dreams is to become an owner of a motorbike. Definitely a sport one.




What you can do with a LightBox?

Let's imagine that the light can change as you wish. Let’s imagine that you can put as many independent sources of light in your place – no matter it is a single room, big villa, car, office or even a stable (yes, we love horses!). And let’s imagine that there are no limits in your creativity. Just use our LightBox device and cheap led strips (or other 12V led light sources) from the nearest electro shop. And liberate your creativity! Take a look, what we did with our LightBox devices…


What we need and what you'll get?

We’re young entrepreneurs. I heard somewhere that European Union helps people like us to get successful. But you know what? It’s bullshit. We have never received any help from EU - not even a broken penny. They love to support big companies like IBM, Minolta, Scania or similar. Everything what we were doing to get to this point we were doing with our hard earned money.

But now to start the production and to deliver the product to you we need your help. If you decide to support our campaign and to bring the LightBox to live, you’ll receive not only a cool product which we believe you’ll love but also an amazing opportunity to see a growth of a new BleBox family. Stop! You’ll ask, what’s a BleBox?

Where we’re going?

LightBox is the first of the smart, wireless devices called “BleBox” that we want to develop in the near future. So it’s extremely important for us to make it as good as possible. Because if it fails, everything will collapse.

Once it becomes successful, it’ll be the beginning of the BleBox family. Now, we have designed three next devices that’ll be compatible with LightBox. Follow us!

A bit more technical details

Still curious about LightBox?

How else you can help us?

There is another great way you can help us, even if you don’t want to get your own LightBox. Could you help us to make a bit of noise about our campaign?

Share it on Facebook and Twiter. It’ll take a few seconds for you and maybe those will be the most important few seconds for our success?

Discover more...

Visit our website to discover more.

Lightbox - iPhone and Android RGB LED Controller

story:
TimberPost, a Qi enabled wooden charging platform.

Bored with current Qi charging docks and mats, over utilizing the same plastic designs, we set out to create something new and something incredible. We created the TImberPost. Each TimberPost is constructed with warm, natural, and beautiful wood. A smartphone dock that you are proud to present, and makes your life easier through intelligent and innovative design. The TImberPost is handcrafted in the United States. We have spared no expense and have only used the finest materials, no plastic, stamped metal, or particle board. We are changing the manufacturing status quo from unskilled labor utilizing cheap and mass produced materials, to skilled craftsmen in the USA using only the best raw stock available.


Why Use Wireless Charging in the TimberPost?

Wireless charging means no more broken charging ports, no fumbling for a power chord, and not having to worry about aligning your phone on the dock. Simply place your device on the charger and it will begin charging automatically. By utilizing wireless charging in the TimberPost we have maximized the number of phones and tablets that are compatible. Wider compatibility means you do not need to purchase a new charging solution every time you upgrade your device.

TimberPost Features and Specifications:

TimberPost Features and Specifications:

Simply place your Qi enabled device on the TimberPost to begin charge. There are no cables or connectors to worry about. Say goodbye to tangled cords and bent or damaged ports. Wireless charging also means no more fumbling for your cable in the dark, just place your phone on the dock and it will begin charging. You will find yourself charging your phone more often when you can just rest your phone on the TimberPost and pick it up again when you need it.

Smart Charging:

The TimberPost intelligently charges your device. By monitoring, and communicating with your phone the TimberPost protects your phones battery by reducing or turning off the electrical current.

Easy Screen Access:

Charging your smartphone or tablet with the TimberPost does not mean you cannot use. Because your screen is visible while docked, you have easy access to all of your text messages, emails, or currently playing music. On Android 4.2 or above you can automatically configure your phone or tablet to display your alarm clock, the weather, and even your photos.

Real Wood Construction:

Every TimberPost features real oak or alder. These woods were chosen for their resiliency and beautiful grain patterns. Beautiful woods finishes and striking design means forgetting about hiding your electronics, it’s time that electronics fit your home.

How Does the TimberPost work?

Each TImberPost houses a Qi standard charging transmitter. The raw oak or alder stock is milled to allow for the Qi transmitter to transmit to power your smartphone or tablet. By utilizing induction charging the TimberPost can charge your device through a case and without the need to plug your phone or tablet in.

 TimberPost Production, Handcrafted In the USA:

By pledging for the TimberPost you are supporting U.S manufacturing. The TimberPost defies traditional manufacturing by creating a premium, handcrafted, and unique products. Typical manufacturing utilizes plastic or metal because they are economical choices and suited for production by unskilled labor.  

Each TimberPost begins as oak or alder wood. Our trained staff in Denver Colorado then carefully selects only the finest wood stock to become a TimberPost The wood is then planed, and trimmed by our experienced carpenters to our specifications. The wood is then milled to our exacting specifications. Following milling we apply a premium, furniture grade finish that will last. These finishes feature a semi-glossy finish that looks incredible. Finally, we fit our carefully chosen wireless charging module and seal the TimberPost.

Compatibility: 

The TimberPost is compatible with Qi integrated phones such as the Galaxy S4, Galaxy S5, Nexus 5, and many others. In addition, with the use of adaptors you can use your existing iPhone 5 and 5s.

We have been developing prototypes and working through a variety of designs and iterations to create the current TimberPost.

 We have established relationships with Qi charging manufacturers certified by the WPC and tested a variety of chipsets to determine the optimal charging solution. We have also tested many different woods and finish option to create the best looking and most resilient docking solution on the market.  

Each TimberPost is handcrafted in Denver Colorado. We control all aspects of the wood construction in-house. This ensures that each TimberPost delivered will meet our exacting standards.

Indiegogo Funds and Future Development:

Indiegogo funding will go towards the Qi charging chipsets, premium quality lumber, and tooling to increase production capacity.

Our team has created a design that we are truly proud to share with the Indiegogo community. We are now finalizing production techniques to enable us to create enough TimberPosts for everyone interested. Once the campaign ends the team is ready to immediately proceed with the final steps to create our first production run of TimberPosts.

Our staff is experienced in high volume fulfillment and we are confident that once we reach funding we will be able to fulfill all of the rewards according to production timeline.

We control all aspects of the wood construction in-house. This ensures that each TimberPost delivered will meet our exacting standards.Indiegogo Funds and Future Development:Indiegogo funding will go towards the Qi charging chipsets, premium quality lumber, and tooling to increase production capacity.

Our team has created a design that we are truly proud to share with the Indiegogo community. We are now finalizing production techniques to enable us to create enough TimberPosts for everyone interested. Once the campaign ends the team is ready to immediately proceed with the final steps to create our first production run of TimberPosts.Our staff is experienced in high volume fulfillment and we are confident that once we reach funding we will be able to fulfill all of the rewards according to production timeline.

story:
Follow our projects at NerdCreationLab.com

After this campain ends you can find out more information and see our other projects at NerdCreationLab.com.

Summary

This project was inspired in part by my late grandfather who was an electrical engineer.  I acquired a number of EE items from him including a bunch of wire wrap tools and sockets.  This lead me to realize how useful the "dying" art of wire wrap can be.  To this end I wanted to make an educational kit to help people learn how to wire wrap.  This is more than just a kit, it is a whole educational program.  There will be skill badges, wire wrap comics, and kits.  I am also planing several instructional videos and online tutorials.

If you don't know what wire wrap is there is a decent overview here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wire_wrap

 

Why ANOTHER Arduino clone?

After much thought about what kind of kit to make I settled on an Arduino clone because the design is fairly simple yet very versatile.  The design is very barebones, with no USB and no advanced power management or 3.3v supply.  The goal of this kit is to be educational and decorative first, and to be a Arduino clone second.

 

What We Need & What You Get

The money raised is to leverage volume buys and insure that prices are low enough to enable a wide range of people to learn from these materials.

The rewards are:

  • Skill badge - 1.7" diameter round embroidered patch

  • Comic - 20 page "Wire Wrap is Still Useful and Soldering is Easy" comic book

  • Basic kit - PCB, Components, Standoffs, and Acrylic base plate

  • Deluxe Kit - Basic Kit + wire wrap tool

  • Super Deluxe Kit - Deluxe Kit + Comic and Badge

  • Super Deluxe Kit with FTDI - Super Deluxe Kit + FTDI adapter

  • Advertiser special - Super Deluxe Kit + a 2.9in x 2.9in inside front cover ad in the comic

  • Hackerspace specials

 

The Impact

This project helps preserve a dying skill and teach people new skills.  It is more than just a kit, it is also an educational experience and a beautiful completed project.  It is a great conversation starter and gives you a certain nerd cred to have made a wire wrap kit.

This is my second major project, the first was the InkShield.  This is also the beginning of a more substantial effort with nerdy projects as I am launching a new site called NerdCreationLab.com which will have more educational kits in the near future.  It will also have many resources for Makers, Hackers, and Nerds of all kinds.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute yourself, please help spread the word to other people.  There are easy to use sharing tools built right in to Indiegogo at the top of the page (under the top picture).
story_txt:
Follow our projects at NerdCreationLab.com
After this campain ends you can find out more information and see our other projects at NerdCreationLab.com.
Summary
This project was inspired in part by my late grandfather who was an electrical engineer.  I acquired a number of EE items from him including a bunch of wire wrap tools and sockets.  This lead me to realize how useful the "dying" art of wire wrap can be.  To this end I wanted to make an educational kit to help people learn how to wire wrap.  This is more than just a kit, it is a whole educational program.  There will be skill badges, wire wrap comics, and kits.  I am also planing several instructional videos and online tutorials.
If you don't know what wire wrap is there is a decent overview here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wire_wrap
 
Why ANOTHER Arduino clone?
After much thought about what kind of kit to make I settled on an Arduino clone because the design is fairly simple yet very versatile.  The design is very barebones, with no USB and no advanced power management or 3.3v supply.  The goal of this kit is to be educational and decorative first, and to be a Arduino clone second.
 
What We Need & What You Get
The money raised is to leverage volume buys and insure that prices are low enough to enable a wide range of people to learn from these materials.
The rewards are:


Skill badge - 1.7" diameter round embroidered patch


Comic - 20 page "Wire Wrap is Still Useful and Soldering is Easy" comic book


Basic kit - PCB, Components, Standoffs, and Acrylic base plate


Deluxe Kit - Basic Kit + wire wrap tool


Super Deluxe Kit - Deluxe Kit + Comic and Badge


Super Deluxe Kit with FTDI - Super Deluxe Kit + FTDI adapter


Advertiser special - Super Deluxe Kit + a 2.9in x 2.9in inside front cover ad in the comic


Hackerspace specials

 
The Impact
This project helps preserve a dying skill and teach people new skills.  It is more than just a kit, it is also an educational experience and a beautiful completed project.  It is a great conversation starter and gives you a certain nerd cred to have made a wire wrap kit.
This is my second major project, the first was the InkShield.  This is also the beginning of a more substantial effort with nerdy projects as I am launching a new site called NerdCreationLab.com which will have more educational kits in the near future.  It will also have many resources for Makers, Hackers, and Nerds of all kinds.
 
Other Ways You Can Help

story:
Short Summary

On January 16, 2013 the governor of New York signed the Safe Act into law, effectively banning the purchasing of AR-15s in New York.

The FUAC AR-15 80% Lower Kit, allows you to build an AR-15 legally in NY, without going through an FFL.  An 80% lower is an AR-15 lower that is unfinished, as such it can be shipped directly to the consumer for them to complete.  We chose to go with polymer because it is fairly easy to properly complete one of our lowers with only a few common tools such as a power drill.  The kit includes a FUAC 80% Polymer Lower, the lower jig for manufacturing, a mag lock, and some threadlocker.  

By shipping direct to the consumer you can rest assured you won't end up on any of the dear governor's confiscation lists  safety registrations.

Build your FUAC AR-15 80% lower yourself and legally build a new AR-15.  Or put your FUAC 80% lower onto an AR-15 upper you already have for a NY legal AR-15 that you can legally take to the range.

Did I mention it's going to say FUAC on the lower?  

Here's a computer rendering of the FUAC Lower with the included Jig:


Also due to the design you can legally put a collapsible stock on it.  Also you can run a flash hider or muzzle brake on your upper when it's attached to a completed FUAC lower.

This campaign ends on January 16, 2014, a year to the day that the dear leader governor of NY signed away part of the 2nd Amendment rights of New Yorkers.

Let's send him a message, January 16 won't just be the day that he tried to steal our rights, it will also the day we brought the AR-15 back to NY...the day we put FUAC on hundreds of AR-15s.

We won't have a chance to boot the governor out of office until late 2014 until them let's put FUAC 80% Lowers onto as many NEW AR-15's as we can.

You want to build a new AR-15 for your brother, your son, your cousin, your nephew.  Give him a FUAC lower and he can build a new AR-15 legally.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We're working with some of the best parts manufacturers in the industry...all we need now is your help to get the FUAC lower off the ground.
  • The funding is going directly to manufacturing and purchasing the elements of the FUAC AR-15 Lower Kit.  The FUAC 80% lowers, the lower jigs, the mag locks, and the threadlocker.  
  • Additionally the funding will go toward purchasing the perks such as lawn signs, AR-15 schematic posters, stickers, etc.  

  • We have a wide variety of perks for you ranging from stickers to Las Vegas firearms training adventures...and the perks wouldn't be complete without a full automatic shooting outing in Pennsylvania.

Your donation will make a difference

Every dollar counts and helps us get one step closer to flooding New York State with more FUAC lowers than andy can yell about...each one with the reminder FU AC.

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell your friends, tell your neighbors, tell anyone that supports the Second Amendment...especially if they live in New York.  Any help in getting the word out is appreciated.

You can post a link on your facebook, blogs, message boards...it would be a huge help.
