story:
We are all incredibly attached to our smartphones and never like to feel “out of the loop”. However, day to day activities such as work, sport and travel mean that we can’t have our eyes on the screen 100% of the time. We all suffer from a form of FOMO (fear of missing out) when it comes to missed calls, messages and alerts and not being able to check our phone can cause us to be distracted and lose concentration. We are here to solve this problem and bring you a whole new way of keeping connected.

The Telltale Scoop is a revolutionary piece of wearable technology that will ensure you won’t miss important activity on your smartphone.  Suitable for all ages, the thin and lightweight wristband uses subtle vibration and LED indicators to notify you of activity on your phone when it’s out of sight.

  • Scoop is on you wherever you are. Notifications will no longer go unnoticed, even when your phone is out of reach.
  • You can quickly check for missed notifications with a glance, searching for your phone to check for content is now a thing of the past.
  • If you are unable to attend to an alert right away, discrete LEDs will remind you about the missed notifications on your phone.
  • With customized alert settings you will know what type of notification has been received and from which contact, allowing you to decide if you should react to the notification.
  • More than just phone calls and messages, Scoop will notify you about push notifications from Facebook, Twitter, alarms, reminders, calendar events and more.

Once synced with the app (Android and iOS), the Telltale Scoop will vibrate and LED lights glow to let you know when your smartphone is receiving incoming calls, messages or alerts.

Bluetooth connectivity allows for seamless pairing with the smartphone app where you can completely personalize your Scoop experience.

  • Personalize each type of notification (for calls, messages or alerts) with custom vibration patterns, LED colors and ability to turn LEDs on/off.
  • Important contacts can be assigned unique settings for vibration pattern and/or LED indicator color which makes it possible to identify an incoming notification as from a particular contact. 
  • Do Not Disturb mode limits vibration duration to a short burst and only provides notifications from important contacts so at inconvenient times you will only receive notifications that are important to you.

The app will also receive push notifications when the Scoop is out of proximity as well as when the battery is running low.

  • Various distinct vibration pattern options
  • 3 multi-color LED indicators
  • A USB connector hidden within the clasp for charging and software updates
  • Long battery life
  • Android and iOS compatibility
  • Water resistant

The app provides the ability to personalize the tri-colored LED lights so that you can tell the level of urgency of the notification in just a glance. For example you can set them to glow red for important contacts.


Irrespective of age or lifestyle the Scoop is useful for a wide range of situations including:

  • Around the home: when a notification is received and the phone was left in another room. (e.g. watching TV, cooking, gardening).
  • Not wanting to be disturbed: when it would interrupt and be rude to check you phone and/or the phone is on silent and easy to miss a notification.(e.g. a business meeting, cinema, in school).
  • In a social situation: where it is easy to miss an alert or forget to check your phone. (e.g. noisy active events – coffee shop, bar, music festival, parties, sporting event, theater).

The Scoop will ensure you don’t miss out on anything your phone needs to tell you.

The Telltale Scoop contains a slim rechargeable lithium polymer battery, Bluetooth chip, vibration motor, LED indicators and USB connector for charging the device. It is made from a flexible, water resistant TPU plastic that is comfortable and flexible to wear without irritation.

Once we have successfully launched our initial black and white designs, we intend to add additional colors to our Scoop range, plus research additional features and updates.


Scoop comes in S, M and L in both the black and white and you will have the opportunity to choose your size band just prior to manufacture.

The battery management system includes a rechargeable lithium polymer battery which has a battery life of 5 days depending on how many calls and texts you receive each day. 

The Telltale Scoop has a USB connector hidden in the wrist band. To recharge, simply attach this to any USB port and charging will begin.

Scoop will work with Android and iOS smartphones.

Via your smartphone’s Bluetooth connection.

The band is approx 15mm (0.59") at its widest point, with a height of 8.2mm (0.32").


The Bluetooth chip has a range of up to 10m in optimal conditions.

The product is manufactured using injection moulding and insert overmoulding. The clasps and electronics housing will be injection moulded from a blend of ABS and PMMA to provide strength and impact resistance as well as a high level of surface finish. The flexible bands will be a TPU material that is directly moulded onto the rigid mouldings. The TPU is a flexible plastic material that provides durability and toughness as well as environmental weatherability.

The electronics consists of a PCB containing a Bluetooth low energy microprocessor module, 3 LEDs, a vibration motor and battery management system. The microprocessor ties in all blocks of the unit and will inform the LEDs and Vibration motor when to become active based on communication with the external application.

No just the Scoop app which will be available from the iTunes app store and the Android Play store.

We are aiming for June 2014.

Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/telltalescoop?fref=ts

Follow our Twitter feed at https://twitter.com/telltalescoop

Check out our website www.telltalescoop.com

Email info@telltalescoop.com to be added to our subscriber list

To make our dream a reality, we need to fund tooling and mechanics, develop the smartphone app compatible with Android and iOS as well as various social media applications plus manufacture the Scoop with high quality materials to bring you the best product possible.

During the process we’ll test the materials and the Scoop according to the highest standards regarding consumer safety and regulations. We’ll acquire all necessary licensing that is mandatory for incorporating the revolutionary technologies that power the Telltale Scoop. Last but not least, we will ship out all rewards ensuring fast and on-time delivery so you get our product first!

story:
Wellscale is the world’s first portable smart scale for nutritional purposes. In addition to the weight, it gives you the calories and nutritional values of your food.


Like us on Facebook & follow us onTwitter !

Download the press kit here.

Look who's talking about Wellscale!

What we solved?

Calculate the nutritional facts of the food we eat is difficult and often inaccurate, this makes diets and food controls hard to follow by a lot of people. With Wellscale, this can be done quickly and easily, with the aditional advantage of receiving feedback in real time about what you are eating.


Wellscale has a Bluetooth 4.0 chip which allows the communication with an Android or iOS smartphone. You can put any food you like on the scale and see the exact nutritional information for the amount entered.

But you can go even further. You can add and track the contents of entire meals, saving them in your history, setup alerts for certain nutrient limits in a plate or even export the data to share with your doctor, nutritionist or personal trainer.


Portable

We all know the healthiest place to eat is at our home. The problem is in the course of our daily lives, we might not be able to cook there all our meals. Therefore people who like or need to watch what they eat, need a way to measure the calories and nutrients of their food, when they are out.

Wellscale weights only about 70 grams and has a diameter of 83mm which makes it easy to carry, even in your pocket.


Goals with Advisor

Our App has simple and powerfull features that can change your nutrition in the first day of use.

We created the advisor, so you can have a feedback in real time about what you are eating. This advisor can warn you in two ways:

  • When you have enough calories or sugar in the current meal, and therefore need to take part of the items out, in order to archive your goal.

  • When you don’t have enough calories or other macro-nutrients to achieve the goal you set for a particular meal.


New foods?

The Wellscale food database is based on the USDA database, and is built in the application, with over 8000 foods, allowing you to track your meals everywere you go.

But in todays world, there is the need to be prepared, therefore we created a functionality, which allows you to add new foods to the database. This way, not even the strangest foods will prevent you from checking your health.

Users of the Wellscale application can also favorite their foods. This way it will be easier and faster than ever, to build the content of your meals.




Profile

The Wellscale application allows you to create your own profile. In this tab you are able to insert information about your health, like for example weight, glycemic level and blood pressure. This information is stored and displayed in graphs, allowing for an easy consultation in the future.



Smartphone Aplication

Wellscale connects by Bluetooth 4.0 to your iPhone or Android device. Setting up Wellscale App is as easy as downloading the app onto your phone.

Compatibility:

  • iPhone 4S running iOS 7 and above.

  • Android devices running OS 4.3 and above.

Hardware Specs

Wellscale specs:

  • Weight of the scale: 70 grams

  • Dimensions: 83mm (diameter) x 20mm (height)

  • Load weight: 2 kg / 4 pounds

  • Battery type:  lithium-ion rechargeable

  • Micro USB connection for charging

  • Battery life: 120 Meals (estimative 5min per meal)

  • Connectivity:

    • IPHONE 4S and above

    • ANDROID 4.3 and above



Rewards

Stretch Goals



Why do we need you?

We are software developers and we know a lot about what there is to know about making digital products, but as we've learned over the past few months: building hardware is costly. We've done as much work as possible and spend all of our salaries on making the prototypes, but to get to the next stage of production we'll need molds, components and factory time. Here're some of the specific things your funds will go towards.

  • Electronics assembly - Part of your funding will go to the components and their correct assembly on a circuit board. This circuit board is the brain of Wellscale

  • Injection Molds - With your help, we will be able to manufacture the molds required to produce the body of Wellscale

  • App development - Honestly, most of your funds won't go here, but we need some coffe to give you both IOS and Android app.

  • Shipping and packaging - Getting your new Wellscale to you, wherever you are


Our vision for the future


Risks and challenges

As with all crowdfunding campaigns there are inherent risks and challenges. Launching a product is not an easy task, therefore it's important to know where we are now in bringing Wellscale to market.


As of the launch of our campaign we have:

  • A fully working protype and the manufractring contracts for the PCB assembly and molds. A big part of the money will go here.
  • The app that will accompany the Wellscale, although it's still in beta. We will continue testing it, in order to work out all the bugs and make the app usage easy and intuitive.


Given that the hardware and software are in the final stages of development and provided we reach our fundraising goal, the risks and challenges that we were able to access are the following:

  • The application shown in the videos and pictures are still in beta version. It is possible that some features  or designs will be changed in the final version.
  • Similarly, the scale shown in the video and pictures (in our blog), are pre-production 3D-Printed prototypes. The final look and details of the scale, could change slightly, but only if a change would be beneficial.
  • In the hardware manufacturing, it's possible that there could be delays in the production. The factors that could contribute to this is for example component shortages or problems with the factory.  
  • We must also be aware that problems can arise during the transportation of the final product. This is highly unlikely, and we ensure a replacement, but it needs to be mentioned nevertheless.


Finally, THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

It took quite some time and hard work to have a working protype of the application and Wellscale, but we're really glad we are finally at this stage.

We also took the opportunity this time to thank everyone who helped us and encouraged during the development phase, and especially you, for visiting our project and contribute to advancing it farther.


The Demand for Accurate Nutrition (History)

Freire developed WellScale out of personal need when his his grandmother was diagnosed with diabetes, and her dietary restrictions seemed vague and complicated. Diabetes is a difficult balancing act, and one food item, like a banana, can differ greatly from another banana in amounts of sugar and other nutrients. He knew there was a demand for more precise measurements, both for people who diet for health reasons, and for people trying to gain or lose weight. WellScale offers that solution it a portable package, so users can be confident that they have all the information about what they eat no matter where they eat it.

We've done as much work as possible and spend all of our salaries on making the prototypes, but to get to the next stage of production we'll need molds, components and factory time. Here're some of the specific things your funds will go towards.
Electronics assembly - Part of your funding will go to the components and their correct assembly on a circuit board. This circuit board is the brain of Wellscale
Injection Molds - With your help, we will be able to manufacture the molds required to produce the body of Wellscale
App development - Honestly, most of your funds won't go here, but we need some coffe to give you both IOS and Android app.
Shipping and packaging - Getting your new Wellscale to you, wherever you are
Our vision for the futureRisks and challengesAs with all crowdfunding campaigns there are inherent risks and challenges. Launching a product is not an easy task, therefore it's important to know where we are now in bringing Wellscale to market.As of the launch of our campaign we have:
A fully working protype and the manufractring contracts for the PCB assembly and molds. A big part of the money will go here.
The app that will accompany the Wellscale, although it's still in beta. We will continue testing it, in order to work out all the bugs and make the app usage easy and intuitive.
Given that the hardware and software are in the final stages of development and provided we reach our fundraising goal, the risks and challenges that we were able to access are the following:
The application shown in the videos and pictures are still in beta version. It is possible that some features  or designs will be changed in the final version.

Similarly, the scale shown in the video and pictures (in our blog), are pre-production 3D-Printed prototypes. The final look and details of the scale, could change slightly, but only if a change would be beneficial.

In the hardware manufacturing, it's possible that there could be delays in the production. The factors that could contribute to this is for example component shortages or problems with the factory.  
We must also be aware that problems can arise during the transportation of the final product. This is highly unlikely, and we ensure a replacement, but it needs to be mentioned nevertheless.
Finally, THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!It took quite some time and hard work to have a working protype of the application and Wellscale, but we're really glad we are finally at this stage.We also took the opportunity this time to thank everyone who helped us and encouraged during the development phase, and especially you, for visiting our project and contribute to advancing it farther.The Demand for Accurate Nutrition (History)Freire developed WellScale out of personal need when his his grandmother was diagnosed with diabetes, and her dietary restrictions seemed vague and complicated. Diabetes is a difficult balancing act, and one food item, like a banana, can differ greatly from another banana in amounts of sugar and other nutrients. He knew there was a demand for more precise measurements, both for people who diet for health reasons, and for people trying to gain or lose weight. WellScale offers that solution it a portable package, so users can be confident that they have all the information about what they eat no matter where they eat it.

story:
Hi Plicopá's friends, help supporting us as you have done so far... Stay tuned here www.plicopa.com 

We'll keep you updated, because the adventure has just begun...

_______________________________________________

For the crowdfunding campaing, Plicopá will be available for:

for another types of tablets send us your suggestion, e-mail: gustavo@plicopa.com


"Green e senza trascurare l’estetica, è il filo che ha guidato Carla e Gustavo e che apre la strada al nuovo design del futuro, fatto di idee intelligenti e di materiali eco-compatibili." 

"Green but still careful to aesthetics: this is the principle that inspired Carla and Gustavo and gives way to future design, made of clever ideas and eco-friendly materials." May, 06th

"Un'idea geniale e totalmente indie, Plicopá, la cover per iPad più versatile sul mercato."
"A brilliant idea and totally indie, Plicopá, the cover for the iPad more versatile on the market." April, 24rd, 2013


"Plicopá, la cover per iPad bella, intelligente e sostenibile" [Gadgetland | TOP100 | 5th position]
"Plicopá, the beautiful iPad cover, intelligent and sustainable" April, 23rd, 2013

Language: Italiano | Portugues

FAQ: English | Italiano

Hello there! 

We’re so happy you’re visiting our Indiegogo webpage!

This is our great opportunity to get you to know a new friend for your iPad.

It’s called...

Plicopá is both a case and a support, entirely made of light cardboard. 

 

We say it’s a friend, because it protects your iPad from any collision and supports it in a stable and handy way whenever you read, write, chat…and so on. 

Plicopá is very easy, efficient and eco-friendly.

 

Despite other cases, Plicopá never hides your iPad’s design, instead it emphasizes it. While in use,  your iPad’s perfectly visible in all its beauty, whereas when you put it away, a beautiful totally personalized cover safeguards it. 

Plicopá has bloomed from a very simple and functional design idea, where research for less polluting materials goes hand in hand with attention for aesthetics. Both during the production phase and in the disposal one, Plicopá is 100% recycable.

Though sustainability is not the only reason to chose Plicopá. The cover graphic is its strong point: in this first phase we have included 60 illustrations made by artists and designers, among which you can chose your favorite one. But it’s just the beginning. If you support our project,  we’ll give many others the opportunity to create a unique artwork for Plicopá.

 

Plicopá’s artwork can be even more personalized: thanks to our new app. PlicopAPP allows you to create your own favorite illustration and get it right at home.

 

Here’s what we need your help for.

On-demand production and on-line tools development are very expensive. Besides, to start our project we need to produce a special corrugated cardboard, much more efficient than the standard one. We also need to create e-commerce, in order to allow many other artists to deliver new artworks for the cover and get them also to earn some money from their creativity. Finally we would like to develop the PlicopAPP and to make it available for free.

 

Starting from 24 Euro special perk (limited for 290 Early-adopters) you will pre-order Plicopá and turn our project into reality.

 

How did the project start?

It’s an idea by Gustavo Arguello.

“The idea of Plicopá started in june 2012 when I bought my iPad and decided to create a cardboard case. As I go crazy about paper-techniques and origami, I studied a way to turn a simple case into something more, as I needed to support my device while reading, writing, chatting and so on. That’s how I developed the first prototypes and within a few months I reached thed final model."

 

Then, together with Carla, I decide to make a step forward and to plan everything in a more efficient and eco-friendly way. Carla is an expert of packaging and materials, therefore we searched for suppliers and more sustainable materials solutions.

 

At this point we shared the idea with some or our most beloved friends, who supported us from the start and contributed to the project by creating beautiful illustrations”.

 

Do you like it? Thanks to your donation, you’ll help to subsidize the project and you will also bring home to your iPad a new great friend.

 

For further info, leave a comment or visit: www.plicopa.com

________________________________________________________________________

Carla Martins e Gustavo Arguello are two brazilian designers that strive to create a design both socially useful and eco-friendly.

 

Plicopá is the result of the passionate work by Gustavo and Carla, who have lived in Milan for the past 6 years.

Here’s what Gustavo thinks of his project: “I put all my thoughts and heart into this project and I hope you’ll enjoy it just as much as I did while creating it”.

 

And here’s what Carla Martins thinks: “I found a right opportunity to test the knowledge I've achieved to develop a project in a sustainable-design thinking”.

 

FAQ

1-How do I make a donation?
It's as easy as Plicopá! Just click the "contribute now" pink button. Then insert the amount you’d like to donate (click Don't display my name on the campaign page if you want to be anonymous) and choose your reward or pre-order a Plicopá (perks). If your live outside Europe, please add the international shipping fee. Finally you’ll just have to follow the PayPal checkout process. 

2- How do I pay for it?
You can simply use Payal, but if you don't have a PayPal account, you can also use your credit card. Take care of going through all of the PayPal checkout process in order to complete your donation. (click Continue without login at paypal)

3- Can I just use my credit card without logging to PayPal?
Yes, you don't need to register as a PayPal user, you can simply use your credit card on PayPal.

4-After the donation, when will my card be charged?
Your card will be charged just in case Plicopá reaches its goal before till May, 9th. If we do not succeed, don't worry you won’t be ever charged! In facts donations are just pledges till the successful ending of a campaign.

5-Will I be updated about the result of the campaign?
If you click on FOLLOW heart button, underneath our video, you will receive an email with the updates throughout the campaign. If you are a contributor, automatically at the expiration date you will receive an email to inform you if Plicopá is successfully funded. 

6- What happens if the project won't reach the funding raise? 
If Plicopá doesn’t  succeed all donations will be cancelled. You won't have to pay for anything, and Plicopá will must try again differently. 

7- Is the cardboard case designed to be temporary, or is it designed to last? 
We chose a special cardboard, which is not standard on market. To be resistant we need a longer fiber and "F wave" thickness which provides a durability for at least 6 months. (We have being used everyday the prototype on the last 8 months! ) Of course, it will depend on the use you make of it. To remain 100% recyclable just like paper, it won't be water repellent.

8-What does Plicopá mean?
We wanted to create a friendly name with a Italian and Portuguese mix of words. PLICO is a Latin word that means TO FOLD, in italian is also a "sealed envelope with important letters" and OPÁ is a Portuguese interjection of surprise, astonishment or admiration.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ciao! 

Siamo felici che tu sia sulla nostra pagina di Indiegogo!

Questa è per noi una grande occasione per mostrarti un nuovo amico per il tuo iPad.

Si chiama ...

Plicopá è una custodia, che fa anche da supporto, fatta interamente di cartone, sottile e leggero.

L’abbiamo definito amico dell’iPad, perché lo protegge dagli urti e lo sostiene in ogni situazione in modo stabile e comodo quando devi leggere, scrivere, parlare...ecc.

Plicopá è molto semplice, funzionale ed eco-friendly.

A differenza dalle altre custodie Plicopá non nasconde il design del tuo iPad, anzi lo mette in mostra. Quando lo usi, l’iPad si vede in tutto la sua bellezza, mentre quando lo metti via, viene protetto da una splendida custodia dalla grafica totalmente personalizzabile.

 

Plicopá nasce da un’idea di design semplice e funzionale, dove la ricerca di materiali meno inquinanti e l’attenzione all’estetica vanno di pari passo. Sia in fase di produzione che di smaltimento, Plicopá è riciclabile al 100%.

 

Ma l’eco-sostenibilità non è l’unico motivo per scegliere Plicopá. La grafica della cover è il suo punto di forza: in questa prima fase abbiamo inserito oltre 60 illustrazioni fatte da artisti e designer, tra le quali puoi scegliere quella che preferisci. Ma è solo l’inizio. Se sostieni il progetto, daremo a tanti altri l’opportunità di creare una grafica unica per Plicopá.

La grafica di Plicopá può essere ancora più personale: grazie alla nostra app. Con PlicopAPP potrai creare la cover esattamente come piace a te e riceverla direttamente a casa.

Ecco perché abbiamo bisogno del tuo aiuto.

La produzione on-demand e lo sviluppo degli strumenti on line sono costosi. In più, per avviare il progetto abbiamo bisogno di produrre un cartone ondulato speciale, che è molto più funzionale rispetto a ciò che offre il mercato. Poi ci sono il sito di e-commerce, che permetterà a tanti artisti diversi di disegnare grafiche nuove e di guadagnare sulle proprie creazioni. Infine, vorremmo sviluppare la PlicopAPP e metterla gratuitamente a disposizione.

dal 24 euro potrai pre-ordinare il tuo Plicopá (ricompensa speciale per i primi 290) e trasformare così il nostro progetto in realtà. 

Com’è nato il progetto?

È un’idea di Gustavo Arguello.

“L’idea di Plicopá è nata nel giugno del 2012 quando ho comprato il mio iPad e ho deciso di fare una custodia in cartone. Siccome sono un appassionato di cartotecnica e origami, ho studiato un modo per trasformare quella semplice custodia in qualcosa di più, dato che mi serviva anche sostenerlo per leggere, scrivere, parlare su Skype...ecc. È così che ho sviluppato i primi prototipi e nel giro di pochi mesi sono arrivato al modello finale.

 

Poi, insieme a Carla, ho deciso di andare oltre e cercare di progettare tutto in un modo più efficiente ed eco-friendly. Carla è un’esperta di packaging e materiali, così abbiamo cercato fornitori e materiali più ecosostenibili.

 

A questo punto abbiamo condiviso l’idea con alcuni dei nostri amici più cari, che non solo ci hanno sostenuto sin dall’inizio, ma hanno dato un grande contributo realizzando meravigliosi lavori di illustrazione e grafica per le cover.”

 

Ti piace? Con il tuo contributo aiuti a finanziare il progetto e, in più, ti porti a casa un GRANDE nuovo amico per il tuo iPad.

 

Per ulteriori informazioni lascia un commento o visita: www.plicopa.com.

______________________________________

Carla Martins e Gustavo Arguello sono due designer brasiliani che 

interpretano il design come qualcosa di utile alla società, ma con una forte attenzione all’ecosostenibilità. 

 

Plicopá è il frutto del lavoro appassionato di Gustavo e Carla, due designer brasiliani che vivono a Milano da 6 anni. 

Ecco cosa pensa Gustavo del suo progetto: “Ho messo un sacco di pensiero e cuore in questo progetto, e mi auguro che tu possa apprezzarlo tanto quanto io mi sono divertito a farlo”. 

Ecco cosa pensa Carla Martins: “Questo progetto mi ha dato una buona opportunità per mettere alla prova le mie competenze per sviluppare un progetto con l’idea di design sostenibile”.

 

FAQ

1-Come si fa una donazione?
È facile come Plicopá! Clicca sul tasto rosa: “contribute now”. Poi inserisci la cifra che vorresti donare (clicca "Non mostrare il mio nome sulla pagina della campagna, se vuoi rimanere anonimo) e scegli una ricompensa o il pre-ordine di Plicopá. Se non vivi in Europa, per favore aggiungi la quota relativa alla spedizione internazionale. Infine segui le istruzioni di PayPal.

2-Come posso fare il versamento?
Puoi semplicemente usare PayPal, mase non hai l’account puoi utilizzare la carta di credito. Accertati di seguire tutti i passaggi di PayPal per completare la donazione.

3-Posso usare la carta di credito senza collegarimi a PayPal?
Certo, non c’è bisogni di registrarti a PayPal, puoi usare semplicemente la tua carta di credito su PayPal. 

4- Quando verrà effettuato l’addebito sulla carta?
L’addebito sulla carta verrà effettuato solo nel caso in cui Plicopá raggiunga l’obiettivo entro il 9 maggio. Se ciò non avverrà, non sarà effettuato alcun addebito! Infatti le donazioni sono delle semplici promesse di versamento finché la campagna di raccolta non si conclude con successo.

5-Vengo aggiornato sull’esito della campagna?
Se clicchi sul pulsante SEGUI, sotto il nostro video, riceverai una email con aggiornamenti durante l’intera campagna. Se sei un donatore, alla data di termine della campagna riceverai una email che ti informerà se Plicopá ha raggiunto l’obiettivo.

6-Cosa succederà se il progetto non raggiungere la raccolta fondi?
Se Plicopá non ha successo, le donazioni verranno cancellate. Non dovrai pagare alcuna quota e Plicopá dovrà riprovare a finanziarsi in altro modo.

7-Il cartone è fatto per durare a lungo?
Abbiamo scelto un tipo speciale di cartone, che non esiste sul mercato standard. Per resistere più a lungo abbiamo scelto una fibra e uno spessore ondulato che fornisce una durata di almeno sei mesi. (Il nostro prototipo lo stiamo usando tranquillamente ogni giorno da 8 mesi). Ovviamente, dipenderà anche dall’uso che ne fai. Per renderlo totalmente riciclabile come la carta, non l’abbiamo fatto resistente all’acqua. 

8-Cosa significa Plicopá?
Volevamo dare un nome familiare e amichevole mescolando parole di origine Italiana e Portoghese. PLICO è di origine latina e significa avvolgere,  così come PLICO significa busta sigillata che contiene lettere importanti e OPÁ è un intercalare portoghese di stupore e ammirazione…

9-Plicopá sará disponibili per quale modello di tablet?
Sarà per tutti iPad 1, iPad 2, iPad3, iPad4 e iPad Mini

10-Plicopá potrebbe essere amico dei altri tablets? Perché non ho un iPad. 
Plicopá potrà essere fatto a misura del tuo tablets, per questo sarà imprescindibile scegliere il modello corretto nel nostro sito non appena riceverai il CUPOM INDIEGOGO. Se non hai un iPad, ma un altro modello di Tablet, dovrà essere pazienti e aspettare un po per ricevere il tuo Plicopá. Inviaci il tuo suggerimento di Tablet, all'indirizzo e-mail: gustavo@plicopa.com.
 
11-Quando e come posso scegliere una delle 60 illustrazioni per il mio Plicopá?
Una volta finita la campagna con successo, riceverai un coupon con un numero unico che potrai utilizzarlo per scegliere la tua arte preferita. Funzione come solito e-commerce, basta scegliere l'opzione e inserirlo nel carrello. Prima di concludere l'acquisto avrai lo spazio per inserire il codice del tuo COUPON. Ecco! Il valore verrà visualizzato correttamente sottraendo l'importo donato in crowdfunding.
 
Per esempio: se hai scelto Early Adopter con una illustrazioni del catalogo, nel nostro e-commerce sceglierai l'illustrazione e lo inserirai nel carrello della spesa (mostrerà un valore normale di 29 euro). Cliccando in "finalizzare l'acquisto" avrà un spazio per l'inserimento del codice coupon. Dopodiché il tuo carrello della spesa mostrerà l'aggiornamento del valore di € 0,00. Opá! Così semplice !

 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Olá! 

Estamos muito felizes por você visitar a nossa página no Indiegogo!

Esta é nossa grande oportunidade de lhe apresentar o novo amigo do seu iPad.

Seu nome é ...

O Plicopá é tanto um suporte quanto um case, feito todo de papelão, muito fino e leve.

Nós costumamos dizer que ele è amigo porque protege o seu iPad contra colisões e funciona como suporte de uma forma estável e prática sempre que você precisar ler, escrever, bater papo… e o que mais quiser fazer.

O Plicopá é muito fácil, eficiente e eco-friendly.

Ao contrário de outros cases, o Plicopá não esconde o design do seu iPad. Pelo contrário: ele o valoriza. Quando usado, a beleza do seu iPad fica perfeitamente visível; quando você guarda, ele se transforma em uma capa linda e personalizada, que o protege.

O Plicopá nasceu de uma ideia de design muito simples e funcional, em uma pesquisa por materiais menos poluentes que caminhou lado a lado com a atenção à estética. Tanto na fase de produção quanto na hora do descarte, o Plicopá é 100% reciclável.

No entanto, a sustentabilidade não é a única razão para se escolher o Plicopá. O desenho da capa é o seu ponto forte: nesta primeira fase, incluímos 60 ilustrações criadas por artistas e designers, das quais você pode escolher sua favorita. Mas isso é só o começo. Se você apoiar o nosso projeto, nós lhe daremos muitas outras oportunidades de criar uma arte única para o seu Plicopá.

A arte do Plicopá pode ser ainda mais exclusiva: graças ao nosso app. O Plicoápp permite que você crie sua ilustração favorita e a receba em casa.

 

É para isso aqui que precisamos da sua ajuda.

Produção sob medida e ferramentas de desenvolvimento online são bastante caras. Além disso, para iniciar o nossos projeto, precisaremos produzir um papelão ondulado especial, muito mais eficiente que o comum. Nós também vamos criar um e-commerce para que outros artistas possam nos enviar suas artes para a capa e assim ganhar dinheiro por sua criatividade. Por último, nós gostaríamos de desenvolver a Plicopápp e disponibilizá-lo gratuitamente.

A partir de 24 euros – uma oferta especial (limitada para os 290 primeiros), você pré-encomenda um Plicopá e ajuda a transformar nosso projeto em realidade.

Como o projeto começou?

Foi uma ideia de Gustavo Arguello. 

“A ideia do Plicopá apareceu em junho de 2012, quando comprei meu iPad e decidi criar um case de papelão para ele que fosse simples mas suportasse em diversas situações, sem esconder a sua beleza original. Como sou apaixonado por técnicas de Origami e Cartotécnica, estudei uma maneira de transformar um simples case em algo util, já que eu precisava apoiar o meu iPad para ler, escrever, conversar e tudo mais. Foi assim que desenvolvi os primeiros protótipos e, em alguns meses, cheguei ao resultado final. 

E então, junto com a Carla, decidi dar um passo adiante e planejar tudo de uma forma mais eficiente e eco-friendly. Carla é especialista em embalagem e materiais, então nós buscamos fornecedores e soluções mais sustentáveis no que diz respeito ao material. 

Nesse momento, dividimos a idéia com alguns de nossos amigos mais próximos, que nos apoiaram desde o início e contribuíram com o projeto criando lindas ilustrações”. 

Você gostou? Com a sua doação, você ajudará a bancar o projeto e ainda levará para casa o melhor amigo do seu iPad. 

Para mais informações, deixe um comentário ou visite: www.plicopa.com

______________________________________

Carla Martins e Gustavo Arguello são dois designers brasileiros que procuram criar um design funcional e eco-friendly. 

O Plicopá é resultado do trabalho apaixonado de Gustavo e Carla, que vivem em Milão há 6 anos.  

O que Gustavo pensa do projeto: “Coloquei todo meu conhecimento e meu coração neste projeto e espero que vocês gostem dele tanto quanto eu gostei ao criá-lo”. 

E o que Carla pensa do projeto: “Encontrei nele uma grande oportunidade de testar o conhecimento que adquiri para desenvolver um projeto de design com pensamento sustentável”.

If your live outside Europe, please add the international shipping fee. Finally you’ll just have to follow the PayPal checkout process. 
2- How do I pay for it?You can simply use Payal, but if you don't have a PayPal account, you can also use your credit card. Take care of going through all of the PayPal checkout process in order to complete your donation. (click Continue without login at paypal)
3- Can I just use my credit card without logging to PayPal?Yes, you don't need to register as a PayPal user, you can simply use your credit card on PayPal.
4-After the donation, when will my card be charged?Your card will be charged just in case Plicopá reaches its goal before till May, 9th. If we do not succeed, don't worry you won’t be ever charged! In facts donations are just pledges till the successful ending of a campaign.
5-Will I be updated about the result of the campaign?If you click on FOLLOW heart button, underneath our video, you will receive an email with the updates throughout the campaign. If you are a contributor, automatically at the expiration date you will receive an email to inform you if Plicopá is successfully funded. 
6- What happens if the project won't reach the funding raise? If Plicopá doesn’t  succeed all donations will be cancelled. You won't have to pay for anything, and Plicopá will must try again differently. 
7- Is the cardboard case designed to be temporary, or is it designed to last? We chose a special cardboard, which is not standard on market. To be resistant we need a longer fiber and "F wave" thickness which provides a durability for at least 6 months. (We have being used everyday the prototype on the last 8 months! ) Of course, it will depend on the use you make of it. To remain 100% recyclable just like paper, it won't be water repellent.
8-What does Plicopá mean?We wanted to create a friendly name with a Italian and Portuguese mix of words. PLICO is a Latin word that means TO FOLD, in italian is also a "sealed envelope with important letters" and OPÁ is a Portuguese interjection of surprise, astonishment or admiration.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ciao! 
Siamo felici che tu sia sulla nostra pagina di Indiegogo!
Questa è per noi una grande occasione per mostrarti un nuovo amico per il tuo iPad.
Si chiama ...

Plicopá è una custodia, che fa anche da supporto, fatta interamente di cartone, sottile e leggero. 

L’abbiamo definito amico dell’iPad, perché lo protegge dagli urti e lo sostiene in ogni situazione in modo stabile e comodo quando devi leggere, scrivere, parlare...ecc.
Plicopá è molto semplice, funzionale ed eco-friendly.

A differenza dalle altre custodie Plicopá non nasconde il design del tuo iPad, anzi lo mette in mostra. Quando lo usi, l’iPad si vede in tutto la sua bellezza, mentre quando lo metti via, viene protetto da una splendida custodia dalla grafica totalmente personalizzabile.
 
Plicopá nasce da un’idea di design semplice e funzionale, dove la ricerca di materiali meno inquinanti e l’attenzione all’estetica vanno di pari passo. Sia in fase di produzione che di smaltimento, Plicopá è riciclabile al 100%.
 
Ma l’eco-sostenibilità non è l’unico motivo per scegliere Plicopá. La grafica della cover è il suo punto di forza: in questa prima fase abbiamo inserito oltre 60 illustrazioni fatte da artisti e designer, tra le quali puoi scegliere quella che preferisci. Ma è solo l’inizio. Se sostieni il progetto, daremo a tanti altri l’opportunità di creare una grafica unica per Plicopá.

La grafica di Plicopá può essere ancora più personale: grazie alla nostra app. Con PlicopAPP potrai creare la cover esattamente come piace a te e riceverla direttamente a casa.

Ecco perché abbiamo bisogno del tuo aiuto.
La produzione on-demand e lo sviluppo degli strumenti on line sono costosi. In più, per avviare il progetto abbiamo bisogno di produrre un cartone ondulato speciale, che è molto più funzionale rispetto a ciò che offre il mercato. Poi ci sono il sito di e-commerce, che permetterà a tanti artisti diversi di disegnare grafiche nuove e di guadagnare sulle proprie creazioni. Infine, vorremmo sviluppare la PlicopAPP e metterla gratuitamente a disposizione.

dal 24 euro potrai pre-ordinare il tuo Plicopá (ricompensa speciale per i primi 290) e trasformare così il nostro progetto in realtà. 



Com’è nato il progetto?

È un’idea di Gustavo Arguello.
“L’idea di Plicopá è nata nel giugno del 2012 quando ho comprato il mio iPad e ho deciso di fare una custodia in cartone. Siccome sono un appassionato di cartotecnica e origami, ho studiato un modo per trasformare quella semplice custodia in qualcosa di più, dato che mi serviva anche sostenerlo per leggere, scrivere, parlare su Skype...ecc. È così che ho sviluppato i primi prototipi e nel giro di pochi mesi sono arrivato al modello finale.
 
Poi, insieme a Carla, ho deciso di andare oltre e cercare di progettare tutto in un modo più efficiente ed eco-friendly. Carla è un’esperta di packaging e materiali, così abbiamo cercato fornitori e materiali più ecosostenibili.
 
A questo punto abbiamo condiviso l’idea con alcuni dei nostri amici più cari, che non solo ci hanno sostenuto sin dall’inizio, ma hanno dato un grande contributo realizzando meravigliosi lavori di illustrazione e grafica per le cover.”
 
Ti piace? Con il tuo contributo aiuti a finanziare il progetto e, in più, ti porti a casa un GRANDE nuovo amico per il tuo iPad.
 
Per ulteriori informazioni lascia un commento o visita: www.plicopa.com.

______________________________________
Carla Martins e Gustavo Arguello sono due designer brasiliani che 
interpretano il design come qualcosa di utile alla società, ma con una forte attenzione all’ecosostenibilità. 
 
Plicopá è il frutto del lavoro appassionato di Gustavo e Carla, due designer brasiliani che vivono a Milano da 6 anni. 
Ecco cosa pensa Gustavo del suo progetto: “Ho messo un sacco di pensiero e cuore in questo progetto, e mi auguro che tu possa apprezzarlo tanto quanto io mi sono divertito a farlo”. 
Ecco cosa pensa Carla Martins: “Questo progetto mi ha dato una buona opportunità per mettere alla prova le mie competenze per sviluppare un progetto con l’idea di design sostenibile”.
 

FAQ
1-Come si fa una donazione? È facile come Plicopá! Clicca sul tasto rosa: “contribute now”. Poi inserisci la cifra che vorresti donare (clicca "Non mostrare il mio nome sulla pagina della campagna, se vuoi rimanere anonimo) e scegli una ricompensa o il pre-ordine di Plicopá. Se non vivi in Europa, per favore aggiungi la quota relativa alla spedizione internazionale. Infine segui le istruzioni di PayPal.
2-Come posso fare il versamento? Puoi semplicemente usare PayPal, mase non hai l’account puoi utilizzare la carta di credito. Accertati di seguire tutti i passaggi di PayPal per completare la donazione.
3-Posso usare la carta di credito senza collegarimi a PayPal? Certo, non c’è bisogni di registrarti a PayPal, puoi usare semplicemente la tua carta di credito su PayPal. 
4- Quando verrà effettuato l’addebito sulla carta? L’addebito sulla carta verrà effettuato solo nel caso in cui Plicopá raggiunga l’obiettivo entro il 9 maggio. Se ciò non avverrà, non sarà effettuato alcun addebito! Infatti le donazioni sono delle semplici promesse di versamento finché la campagna di raccolta non si conclude con successo.
5-Vengo aggiornato sull’esito della campagna? Se clicchi sul pulsante SEGUI, sotto il nostro video, riceverai una email con aggiornamenti durante l’intera campagna. Se sei un donatore, alla data di termine della campagna riceverai una email che ti informerà se Plicopá ha raggiunto l’obiettivo.
6-Cosa succederà se il progetto non raggiungere la raccolta fondi? Se Plicopá non ha successo, le donazioni verranno cancellate. Non dovrai pagare alcuna quota e Plicopá dovrà riprovare a finanziarsi in altro modo.
7-Il cartone è fatto per durare a lungo?Abbiamo scelto un tipo speciale di cartone, che non esiste sul mercato standard. Per resistere più a lungo abbiamo scelto una fibra e uno spessore ondulato che fornisce una durata di almeno sei mesi. (Il nostro prototipo lo stiamo usando tranquillamente ogni giorno da 8 mesi). Ovviamente, dipenderà anche dall’uso che ne fai. Per renderlo totalmente riciclabile come la carta, non l’abbiamo fatto resistente all’acqua. 
8-Cosa significa Plicopá? Volevamo dare un nome familiare e amichevole mescolando parole di origine Italiana e Portoghese. PLICO è di origine latina e significa avvolgere,  così come PLICO significa busta sigillata che contiene lettere importanti e OPÁ è un intercalare portoghese di stupore e ammirazione…9-Plicopá sará disponibili per quale modello di tablet?Sarà per tutti iPad 1, iPad 2, iPad3, iPad4 e iPad Mini
10-Plicopá potrebbe essere amico dei altri tablets? Perché non ho un iPad. 
Plicopá potrà essere fatto a misura del tuo tablets, per questo sarà imprescindibile scegliere il modello corretto nel nostro sito non appena riceverai il CUPOM INDIEGOGO. Se non hai un iPad, ma un altro modello di Tablet, dovrà essere pazienti e aspettare un po per ricevere il tuo Plicopá. Inviaci il tuo suggerimento di Tablet, all'indirizzo e-mail: gustavo@plicopa.com.
 

11-Quando e come posso scegliere una delle 60 illustrazioni per il mio Plicopá?
Una volta finita la campagna con successo, riceverai un coupon con un numero unico che potrai utilizzarlo per scegliere la tua arte preferita. Funzione come solito e-commerce, basta scegliere l'opzione e inserirlo nel carrello. Prima di concludere l'acquisto avrai lo spazio per inserire il codice del tuo COUPON. Ecco! Il valore verrà visualizzato correttamente sottraendo l'importo donato in crowdfunding.
 
Per esempio: se hai scelto Early Adopter con una illustrazioni del catalogo, nel nostro e-commerce sceglierai l'illustrazione e lo inserirai nel carrello della spesa (mostrerà un valore normale di 29 euro). Cliccando in "finalizzare l'acquisto" avrà un spazio per l'inserimento del codice coupon. Dopodiché il tuo carrello della spesa mostrerà l'aggiornamento del valore di € 0,00. Opá! Così semplice !
 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Olá! 
Estamos muito felizes por você visitar a nossa página no Indiegogo!
Esta é nossa grande oportunidade de lhe apresentar o novo amigo do seu iPad.
Seu nome é ...

O Plicopá é tanto um suporte quanto um case, feito todo de papelão, muito fino e leve.

Nós costumamos dizer que ele è amigo porque protege o seu iPad contra colisões e funciona como suporte de uma forma estável e prática sempre que você precisar ler, escrever, bater papo… e o que mais quiser fazer.
O Plicopá é muito fácil, eficiente e eco-friendly.

Ao contrário de outros cases, o Plicopá não esconde o design do seu iPad. Pelo contrário: ele o valoriza. Quando usado, a beleza do seu iPad fica perfeitamente visível; quando você guarda, ele se transforma em uma capa linda e personalizada, que o protege.

O Plicopá nasceu de uma ideia de design muito simples e funcional, em uma pesquisa por materiais menos poluentes que caminhou lado a lado com a atenção à estética. Tanto na fase de produção quanto na hora do descarte, o Plicopá é 100% reciclável.
No entanto, a sustentabilidade não é a única razão para se escolher o Plicopá. O desenho da capa é o seu ponto forte: nesta primeira fase, incluímos 60 ilustrações criadas por artistas e designers, das quais você pode escolher sua favorita. Mas isso é só o começo. Se você apoiar o nosso projeto, nós lhe daremos muitas outras oportunidades de criar uma arte única para o seu Plicopá.

A arte do Plicopá pode ser ainda mais exclusiva: graças ao nosso app. O Plicoápp permite que você crie sua ilustração favorita e a receba em casa.

 
É para isso aqui que precisamos da sua ajuda.
Produção sob medida e ferramentas de desenvolvimento online são bastante caras. Além disso, para iniciar o nossos projeto, precisaremos produzir um papelão ondulado especial, muito mais eficiente que o comum. Nós também vamos criar um e-commerce para que outros artistas possam nos enviar suas artes para a capa e assim ganhar dinheiro por sua criatividade. Por último, nós gostaríamos de desenvolver a Plicopápp e disponibilizá-lo gratuitamente.

A partir de 24 euros – uma oferta especial (limitada para os 290 primeiros), você pré-encomenda um Plicopá e ajuda a transformar nosso projeto em realidade.


Como o projeto começou?
Foi uma ideia de Gustavo Arguello. 
“A ideia do Plicopá apareceu em junho de 2012, quando comprei meu iPad e decidi criar um case de papelão para ele que fosse simples mas suportasse em diversas situações, sem esconder a sua beleza original. Como sou apaixonado por técnicas de Origami e Cartotécnica, estudei uma maneira de transformar um simples case em algo util, já que eu precisava apoiar o meu iPad para ler, escrever, conversar e tudo mais. Foi assim que desenvolvi os primeiros protótipos e, em alguns meses, cheguei ao resultado final. 
E então, junto com a Carla, decidi dar um passo adiante e planejar tudo de uma forma mais eficiente e eco-friendly. Carla é especialista em embalagem e materiais, então nós buscamos fornecedores e soluções mais sustentáveis no que diz respeito ao material. 
Nesse momento, dividimos a idéia com alguns de nossos amigos mais próximos, que nos apoiaram desde o início e contribuíram com o projeto criando lindas ilustrações”. 
Você gostou? Com a sua doação, você ajudará a bancar o projeto e ainda levará para casa o melhor amigo do seu iPad. 
Para mais informações, deixe um comentário ou visite: www.plicopa.com

______________________________________
Carla Martins e Gustavo Arguello são dois designers brasileiros que procuram criar um design funcional e eco-friendly. 
O Plicopá é resultado do trabalho apaixonado de Gustavo e Carla, que vivem em Milão há 6 anos.  
O que Gustavo pensa do projeto: “Coloquei todo meu conhecimento e meu coração neste projeto e espero que vocês gostem dele tanto quanto eu gostei ao criá-lo”. 
E o que Carla pensa do projeto: “Encontrei nele uma grande oportunidade de testar o conhecimento que adquiri para desenvolver um projeto de design com pensamento sustentável”.

story:
What can you make with it?

The airplane launcher is just one of the many fun projects you can create with our Inventor's Kit. You will also learn how to make:

...and that's only the beginning!

 

What Makes Our Design Great?

Our design evolved after several iterations based on input and observations from real users.  We wanted to understand how non-technical users approached the task of learning a new skill.  We wanted to know how elements of the kit made non-technical users feel.

From our observations, we neutralized characteristics that triggered negative emotional responses, then we accentuated those that engendered a more positive response.

The results are culminated in the product below.

Looks Like a Book

Easier to access and see means it'll be used more often which translates to greater value.

 

Portable Workspace

 

Preserves Your Work

 

Messy Cables Kept Out of Sight

 

Organized Storage Compartments

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How did you come up with the idea?

Something clicked for me when I saw expressions of fear and confusion on the faces of two new interns who had just opened a well-used arduino kit.  I quickly grabbed a marker and a white board and asked the interns to describe what they were feeling.  I actually took a picture of it.  Here it is!

It was then I realized that I'd been looking at developing my new kit the wrong way.  I had been concentrating on what things should go in the box.  Instead, I should have been asking how the box and they way it is organized makes people feel when they use it.

Q: What’s in the kit?

The kit will come with the following 245 parts:

  • 1X 30cm USB cable
  • 1X Arduino-compatible microcontroller
  • 1X Acrylic developers plate
  • 1X Step-by-step project guide booklet
  • 1X USB Thumb drive (2GB) loaded with programs, software, docs, and source code
  • 1X Servo SG90 for RC toys
  • 1X Temperature sensor
  • 1X 9v AA Battery Connector
  • 1X Integrated Circuit 8-bit Shift Register
  • 1X Piezo Element (Buzzer Magnetic)
  • 2X Stackable trays 
  • 2X 6/9v DC Motor
  • 4X 4-40 3/8" machine screws
  • 8X 4-40 hex nuts
  • 1X Small screwdriver
  • 4X Transistors
  • 5X Trimmer Potentiometer with Knob
  • 10X Tactile push button switch
  • 12X 1N4004 Diode
  • 10X RGB 5mm LED light 4-pin
  • 12X Yellow 5mm LED light
  • 12X Red 5mm LED light
  • 12X Green 5mm LED light
  • 12X 400 PT Breadboard (clear plastic)
  • 20X Dupont Jumper cables 20cm (Assorted colors) male-to-male
  • 20X Dupont Jumper cables 20cm (Assorted colors) female-to-male
  • 40X Dupont Jumper cables 10cm (Assorted colors) male-to-male
  • 25X 330 Ohm Resistors
  • 25X 10K Ohm Resistors

Q: What is the recommended age group?

We suggest 10 - 110 years of age.  But if you're 112, we won't get in your way.  This is just a suggestion.  I personally have a 5-year-old daughter who loves to help me with my projects.

Q: What can I make with it?

The kit comes instructions for creating a variety of simple electronic games, a musical keyboard, and other projects.  

We plan to release 20 fun online instructional videos that will keep stretching your imagination and challenging your skills.

Q: How does it work?

The process of creating a project is simple.

  1. Place the desired electronic parts on the breadboard according to project instructions, then connect them to the microcontroller using the cables provided.
  2. Connect one end of the USB cable included to the microcontroller.
  3. Connect the other end to your computer.
  4. Using the software included, write the code telling the controller what to do and install that code on the controller.

Q: Do you need a computer to make it work?

Yes and No.  You'll need a computer to write the code and upload it to the controller.  But once you have the code installed, your controller doesn't need to be connected to your computer for power.  Use the provided battery pack to make your project function on its own.

Q: Will it work on my computer?

The software runs on most Windows, Mac, and Linux operating systems.  Check here for more information.

 

Current Status and Next Steps

Our venture is self-funded.  We have evidence of demand for our product.  We're hosting this campaign to validate demand for our product and raise the funding to cross the finish line.

What We've Achieved

  1. Defined kit contents
  2. Sourced and procured enough components to fill 100 kits
  3. Tested the setup process on multiple Windows and Mac operating systems
  4. Compiled comprehensive set of necessary device drivers.
  5. Developed our package design
  6. Designed our custom developer plate and engraving process
  7. Conducted workshops with new users
  8. Procured a graphic design for our product that appeals to the masses
  9. Produced 2 high quality instructional videos
  10. Designed, prototyped, and tested a kick ass paper airplane launched
  11. Identified supplier candidates for our packaging and components
  12. Completed the outline and some graphics content for our project manual

What's Left?

  1. Finish producing the content for the project manual that will be included in every kit.
  2. Make digital design content for the airplane launcher available to the public for free
  3. Validate quality and reliability of our supplier candidates
  4. Order the first production run of our boxes
  5. Order first run of our project manuals
  6. Manually pack the first 100 kits with our existing supplies
  7. Update our web site to provide instructional videos for starter kit projects
  8. Begin product development for our next product, Volume II.

story:
i-CeKub - what is it ?

i-CeKub was started by a Student from Switzerland Polytechnic School with an idea. Creating a convenient memory extension for mobile devices, and an easy way to share multimedia content with friends, regardless of your platform. And pack it with fun, style and extra features, like battery booster, bluetooth remote, cable.


Introducing i-CeKub 

  • Your phone's memory extension. Wireless, Pocket-sized.

Wirelessly store, share, stream movies, photos, music, and documents across your smartphones, tablets and computers, expand storage space, backup and restore.
Simultaneously connect & access data stored on up to 6 devices via Wi-Fi,

  • iOS or Android/Windows Smartphone & Tablets Flash Disk

  • 1500mAh Powerbank

  • Bluetooth Remote

  • Secured Wi-Fi

No internet connection needed, no cables or router required, works on all Wi-Fi enabled devices

i-CeKub - Store your Data

Your phone is running low on memory. Once again. Now, should you erase your cousin birthday's party pictures, your personal best tunes compilation, or this novel you have not finished?  Maybe you choose to just keep everything by using  I-CeKub, the Memory stick over WIFI. Connect to the tiny I-Cekub by one touch and your phone can now store gigas of extra videos, photos, music and files.

i-CeKub - Securely share and Entertain

Securely manage access to files from your phone. Easily be the heart of the party as your friends can connect to the i-CeKub at the same time. In a car, listen to music stored in the device, as your friends browse pictures of your vacation, or watch the latest episode of your favorite TV show.

i-CeKub - Platform friendly

Make Peace between IOS and Android

i-CeKub is the easiest device to allow Iphone and Android phone users exchange rapidly data without having to worry about system compatibility acting as a hub over WiFi. Also,  i-CeKub has 2 convenient cables that make the device autonomous should the battery be out. Don't be afraid of forgetting your cable anymore, i-CeKub has it.

Share your Internet

Transform your i-CeKub into a secured router for your circles. Allow friends to share your Internet connection with one touch.


i-CeKub - Boost your Battery

With a 1500mAh battery

i-CeKub has enough to last a day. So we worked hard to squeeze a power management board to give the capability to conveniently charge your phone as a backup battery. It will give you the extra little kick of power you need to make the last important calls of the day and solve urgent matters.

i-CeKub - Bluetooth capabilities

Bluetooth capabilities

We will integrate a Bluetooth module so that you can use it as a convenient tracker. Do not search your phone or your keys any longer. If stretched goal $400,000 is reached, we will develop an app to use it as a remote to take pictures. 


i-CeKub - Play your Musics

Wireless Music Streaming

End cord captivity included wireless headphones give you the freedom to listen to your music or videos without getting all tangled up. Lightweight and sweatproof design. Built-in microphone and rechargeable Li-ion battery, Clear bass resonance, CVC wind noise reduction, and superior sound isolation. Design for reference only.





Creating i-CeKub for you, with you.

  • 32Go to 64Go of Storage on a tiny wireless device. Like a 'Cloud in your pocket'
  • Works with all Wifi connected devices. Great way to sent files between platforms
  • Shareable with authorized friends. Secured access from multiple devices.
  • Works as a power bank.
  • Works as a Bluetooth remote.



Stretched Goal: $400,000

I-CeKub comes in black color. With the second threshold reached, we will be able to create a range of lively colors that matches your style, your personality. We will contact everyone to know what is your favorite colors. We will also work extra hard to add the remote functionality to the i-CeKub.


Stretched Goal: $600,000

For now, i-CeKub files are access through a file explorer and multimedia files are played through your own video / music player.  Once this goal reached, we will create a tailored and comprehensive all-in one application for an even better browsing experience.


Who We Are

I-CeKub was created by father and son Stephen and Boris, two individuals passionate for technology. 

Boris, as an engineering student, works everyday with technology and Stephen, as an artistic director with fashion. Together, both got the idea of tackling the phone’s three nightmares, memory, battery and system compatibility... and all at once. Soon they came up with i-CeKub, thus launching an innovative, functional and stylish way of backing, storing, sharing files. 

What We Need & What You Get

Our first objective goal represents the cost to fund the creation of a brand new circuit board designed to our needs, the molding of the casing, production, packaging and shipping of the product worldwide.

As we reach the goal, you will get a brand new i-Cekub. It is the new alternative to traditional storage solutions such as connection depend Cloud, Plug and not-always play USB sticks, or 'I cannot see you' Bluetooth. A new and simple option to send, share pictures, videos, files. Using the proven Wifi technology, i-Cekub is the missing piece that links all devices together. Your data storage and hub, all in your pocket.

Facilitating people’s life thanks to you

Yes, we are a small team,but we take pride in working hard to bring new ideas and technology to the world. Take part now and contribute in creating a new device that facilitate everyone’s life!

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge remains of course production costs and dimensions.  We are confident that our team, partly based in China , can manage a day-to-day follow up of the product development. Also, we do get great support from expert from the Polytechnic school. You will get updated frequently.

Ways You Can Help

If you cannot donate, you can still be part of the adventure. Tell your family and friends about us, introduce to potential distributors. Share our links and help us spreading the word that i-CeKub can be a reality soon! Thank you all.
story_txt:
i-CeKub - what is it ?




i-CeKub was started by a Student from Switzerland Polytechnic School with an idea. Creating a convenient memory extension for mobile devices, and an easy way to share multimedia content with friends, regardless of your platform. And pack it with fun, style and extra features, like battery booster, bluetooth remote, cable.




Introducing i-CeKub  
Your phone's memory extension. Wireless, Pocket-sized.

Wirelessly store, share, stream movies, photos, music, and documents across your smartphones, tablets and computers, expand storage space, backup and restore.Simultaneously connect & access data stored on up to 6 devices via Wi-Fi, 

iOS or Android/Windows Smartphone & Tablets Flash Disk
1500mAh Powerbank 




Bluetooth Remote

Secured Wi-Fi

No internet connection needed, no cables or router required, works on all Wi-Fi enabled devices








i-CeKub - Store your Data
 Your phone is running low on memory. Once again. Now, should you erase your cousin birthday's party pictures, your personal best tunes compilation, or this novel you have not finished?  Maybe you choose to just keep everything by using  I-CeKub, the Memory stick over WIFI. Connect to the tiny I-Cekub by one touch and your phone can now store gigas of extra videos, photos, music and files.  


i-CeKub - Securely share and Entertain
Securely manage access to files from your phone. Easily be 
the heart of the party as your friends can connect to the i-CeKub at the 
same time. In a car, listen to music stored in the device, as your 
friends browse pictures of your vacation, or watch the latest episode of
 your favorite TV show.

i-CeKub - Platform friendly

Make Peace between IOS and Android
i-CeKub is the
 easiest device to allow Iphone and Android phone users exchange rapidly
 data without having to worry about system compatibility acting as a hub over WiFi. Also,  i-CeKub 
has 2 convenient cables that make the device autonomous should the battery be out. Don't be afraid
 of forgetting your cable anymore, i-CeKub has it.



Share your Internet


Transform your i-CeKub into a secured router for your circles. Allow friends to share your Internet connection with one touch.





i-CeKub - Boost your Battery  
With a 1500mAh battery
i-CeKub has enough to last a day. So we worked hard to squeeze a power management board to give the capability to conveniently charge your phone as a backup battery. It will give you the extra little kick of power you need to make the last important calls of the day and solve urgent matters.

story:
Why Charge-card?

To solve the problems: low charging speed, weak power, short portability 

It's finally time to say goodbye to your bulky charger, now get a portable charger that is not only powerful, fast but slim, on trend with modern technology.


Credit Card Size

Charge-card is created with fashion and a more slim size in mind. The metallic finish gives it a cool, modernistic look, so people will ask you where you got that charger.


High Charging Speed

Charge-card can deliver up to 1.5~2.4 Amps of power. So what does the 1.5~2.4 Amps mean?
An apple IPhone wall charger comes with stable 1 Amps of power,  the 1.5~2.4 Amps is equivalent to the combined speed of 1.5~2.4 units of apple iPhone wall chargers, that means you‘ll save for 50%~140% waiting time.


Strong Battery Capacity

Charge-card provides 1500 mAh battery capacity to charge your smartphone.You can charge smartphones and other wearable devices as well as hundreds of USB-compatible devices


Keep It Safe

1. 7000 series aluminum alloy panel -  the material is the same with IPhone 6S case ,be capable of not flexing or vending
2. Oxidation surface - never get corrosive

3.Protective circuits - offer protection towards overcharging, overdischarging and more.


Not Only For Apple IOS Devices 

Apple Lightning or microUSB connector is available for your Charge-card, it works with all Apple iOS devices or Android smartphones. In addition, the Apple Lightning connector is certificated by Apple Inc(so called MFI certification).


All In One Design

You needn’t to carry another separate cable to shuffle around from room to room, let the Charge-card be your USB-cable, it allows you to charge a smartphone and the Charge-card’s battery at the same time.


Experiences

The Charge-card has been designed to give you storage for any and all portable carrying experiences: A good shape for business cards, at only three times the thickness of a credit card. With these key factors, the Charge-Card is able to fit in your wallet, purse, trouser, shirt pocket, phone-case, and IPad-case smoothly. 


Portable Philosophy

With custom-built components engineered to charge smart-watches and other wearable devices, it's the most portable power bank around.

Dimensions

·  Dimensions: 3.66" X 2.44"X 0.15(9.3cm X 6.2cm X 0.4cm)

·  Materials Used: Aluminum alloy, ABS plastic

·  Weight: 0.07 Lbs (32 grams)


Crafting


Initial Edition

At the first time, we were trying to make Charge-card to be made of only Aluminum alloy, but not good enough.

Updated Edition  

At the second time, brushed finishing is added which is making Charge-card more like an art.

Reward Levels


Choose Your Style

Bring it to The Market

 We are testing with various temperatures, materials, and many more to offer you the confidential quality when we deliver the product.

INVO Creative Industries is bringing technical product and fashionable design and creating consumer electronic devices for all over the world. We're also working with specialists who have produced portable power banks for the largest consumer brands out there, so we know how to bring these types of consumer devices to the market.

Please make Charge-card a reality for everyone who needs a slim Charge-card with strong battery life and fashion design. By supporting us, we will hear your voice, and we will carry out changes, stretch goals, and more with your help.

Your Contribution Will Be Used To:

• Fund mechanical tooling of the aluminum alloy panel

• Purchases for electronic-circuit and other components

• Pay for manufacturing, inland & oversea shipping costs of the first production

• Compliant testing – CE, RoHS, FCC

You will be highly appreciated to take an action to Charge-card, please share this campaign with your friends, we need your help!

Our Team


Timeline


Risks and challenges

We have so much more creative ideas to offer, including eraser-glasses , USB-cable collector , Key-chain power bank, before we can do so, please help us kickstart our business with this campaign. Every project may have obstacles but we are very confident that we will deliver finished goods with quality and in a timely manner. Some possible challenges include unforeseen manufacturing or shipping delays. With a production of this size, sometimes customs clearance delays can be an issue as well. We're experienced in resolving these challenges and have done our best to plan ahead to keep us on the production/fulfillment schedule.

Whatever happens, we promise to get my backers Charge-card as soon as possible after this campaign is off. We are confident that you will enjoy Charge-card.

FAQ

How confident is INVO team about the Jan 2016 delivery time?

The development of Charge-card requires a complicated process where multiple pathways are taken simultaneously so that efficiency within a limited period of time is maximized. The production will have several main steps, they will be: tooling for molding, PCB fabrication, component assembly, security detection and packaging. When certain steps are gating others, by approaching this product with a futuristic outlook, we will maximize the time to have all these steps under control and on the go in early 2016. 

Once the manufacturing is done, our CEO and other members of our team will be on the ground, ready to go and doing whatever it takes to deliver a product in a timely manner, we will keep you posted on the delivery time continually.

Is Charge-card available to back up data to my computer?

Yes, unlike most portable power bank in the market, Charge-card is engineered with USB-cable and Apple lighting/microUSB that can be used to transfer your data between smartphone and computer.

Can the Charge-card charge my iPhone and other Apple iOS devices?

Yes, the Charge-card with Apple Lightning connector can charge IPhone5, IPhone5C, IPhone5S, IPhone6, and IPhone6 PLUS, I Phone6S, iPhone6S Plus. It can also charge iPod Touch 5th Generation, IPad AIR, IPad AIR 2, IPad mini, IPad mini 2, I Pad Pro

Can the Charge-card charge my Android phone?

Yes, the Charge-card with microUSB connector can charge most Android phones available today such as the Samsung Galaxy Series, Motorola Droid, etc.

Is Charge-card's Apple connector went through MFI certification?

Yes, it is. The Apple Lightning connector is certificated by Apple Inc(so called MFI certification). Unlike most chargers in the market, our Charge-card will never lose connecting with your IOS devices which is updated to the newest IOS system edition. For example, your Iphone 6S is now mounted with IOS 8.0.3, our Charge-card will stay connected if your phone is updated to IOS 9.0.1.

story:
se vuoi avere informazioni in italiano sul mondo di 'SCUSONE APP' clicca qui

Ospiti alla trasmissione Caterpillar, RadioDue: ascolta


         'The Franks'

            


Hi Everybody!
Our working group is known as "The Franks".
We are three brothers who use to refer to ourselves with a unique name: 'Frank'
We have been working together in a lot of projects in different fields, from technology to commerce. Now we are proud to introduce you our latest creation/idea:
an application for android smartphones called 'SCUSONE APP'.


WHAT IS 'SCUSONE APP' ?

How many times did you find yourself without a good excuse? How many times you was not able to find the right excuse?
If you are late or simply if you don't want to meet someone, you need to be believable on the phone!
With our latest creation this kind of problems will only be a remote memory...'SCUSONE APP' will give you the chance to choose the suitable uncomfortable situation that prevent you to meet your phone interlocutor...and That's it!
With a thunderstorm rattle in the background it will be easier to  say : "I'm completely wet through! We'll see next time...sorry!"  it'll be enough to push 'thunderstorm' on 'SCUSONE APP' before dialing the number or before answering to a call so to get the appropriate sound in the background.
 
With 'SCUSONE APP' you will be projected in several different environments; your phone interlocutor will hear your voice perfectly merged with the fake background sounds..for you it will be a joke to create the perfect excuse!

With 'SCUSONE APP PRO' you will be able to record your personal background environment sounds! You'll be able to get the perfect soundtracks for your perfect personal excuses!



( 'SCUSONE APP' potential screenshot - it'll be changed to look cooler in final development )


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Your contribution is SUBSTANTIAL!!
We are ready to start in making 'SCUSONE APP' a real application, all of the skills are ready to start...We only need your help, and we need it at 100%

  your support will be used so :

     -  Designing the user interface of the application.
     -  Programming the application for the Android platform.
     -  Recording/Mixing background sounds.
     -  Supporting users for any bugs or technical problems.
     -  Website design and Website Programming
     -  Advertising and online marketing and promotion

There's no risk in supporting 'SCUSONE APP' project, infact if we won't achieve our entire goal you'll be refunded or anyway we won't receive your donations.

         For Any doubt or question, please don't hesitate to contact us at :
                                        scusoneapp@gmail.com

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A good excuse on the phone, can change your way to find easily your personal freedom from an outside world continuosly asking for your attention, for your time!
'SCUSONE APP' surely will be the perfect tool to help you to set free!

Please support us...Can't donate? Share the project with your family, friends and community!

Share it on Facebook
Tweet it on Twitter

Share on Google+

share our cartoon :  'SCUSONE APP' cartoon
take a look at  www.scusone.com

                                                    THANKS for reading!
