story:
Toycool, Multifunctional AC offers refreshing cool for your hot days.

TOYCOOL offers an integrated cooling solution, including bluetooth speaker, LED night light, charging station and mosquito repellent features in a package . Now you have a new choice for outdoor cooling. TOYCOOL is small in size and portable to carry that can be placed in a tent, a boat, a RV, on a beach, a tailgate or any other places where heat may be an issue.

 

 

                            

For the ultimate in camping comfort, TOYCOOL has everything you need for a summer camping: a portable air conditioner, a bluetooth speaker, a FM radio, a mosquito repellent, a night light, and a charging station. Don't let those dog days of summer get you stucked in the room. Get outside and pamper your families with TOYCOOL.

 

 

 

 

 

         

              

Toycool is samll in size and portable to carry that can be placed in a tent, a boat, a RV, on a beach, a tailgate or any other places where heat may be an issue.

Beat the summer heat with ToyCool In the Beach

When you are camping at the beach, connect the exhaust pipe can drain the hot air out the tent.

Stay Cool with Toycool Wherever You Want

Toycool is the best way to stay cool and beat the heat when outdoor family get togethers.

Toycool, For the ultimate summer camping！

Use Toycool In Your House

No More Hot Outside

 

                                        

 

 

                                          

 

There are two colors for you to choose with toycool.

 

 

                                          

The built-in mini compressor draws and compresses the refrigerant gas to a high pressure and temperature gas before it passes through the condenser coil. At this point in the process the air that brought in by axial blower passes through the condenser coil and take away the heat exhausted by refrigerant and turns the high pressure refrigerant into its liquid form. The high pressure liquid then passes into the evaporator coil and take away the heat of the hotter air that continuously brought in by the centrifugal blower, when its pressure drops. Then the cooled air is pushed out by the blower.

 

 

                                          

Toycool Works

 

 

 

 

Remote Controller

Use the remote to control every function of your ToyCool. Cannot be easier to get refreshing cozy like this.

 

 

Digital Panel Description

Get clear working status of your ToyCool on the lighted LCD display panel and adjust to your perference whenever you want.

 

ToyCool is a young brand with innovative product, which requires high cost and long term improvement. In order to get ToyCool mass production, reduce production cost and let more people to feel the refreshing cool in hot days, we raised our Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign. Your support means a lot to us.

 

1. What’s the cooling type of ToyCool? Do you have to add ice and water?

No, we are using R134 refrigerant, so there is no need to add ice and water.

 

2、Do you know what the capability of ToyCool in cooling temperature?

The cool air outlet area is 55-68℉ cooler than environment temperature, offering refreshing cool for you.

 

3、How to filter out hot air and condensation when used indoor?

You need the exhaust pipe to filter out hot air and the drain pipe for the condensation for indoor use.

 

4、Can the unit be plugged into a wall outlet?

Yes, the product comes with an adapter for wall outlet to charge battery and power ToyCool.

 

 

5、Can we plug it in a car?

The 24V DC power options of ToyCool makes it not easy to plug in a car with 12V DC power. You need to have an extra inverter. We do not recommend you to plug it in a car.  

 

6、What’s the maximum room fit for cooling when used indoor?

TOYCOOL is capable of cooling a 40-50 square feet room.

 

 7、How long will the power bank last when used outdoor?

The battery is capable to run for 5-8 hrs.                 

 

 8、What should I be cautious when I use it?

Remove and place it horizontally. Keep it standing for 30 mins before it works.
story_txt: Toycool, Multifunctional AC offers refreshing cool for your hot days.TOYCOOL offers an integrated cooling solution, including bluetooth speaker, LED night light, charging station and mosquito repellent features in a package . Now you have a new choice for outdoor cooling. TOYCOOL is small in size and portable to carry that can be placed in a tent, a boat, a RV, on a beach, a tailgate or any other places where heat may be an issue.                               For the ultimate in camping comfort, TOYCOOL has everything you need for a summer camping: a portable air conditioner, a bluetooth speaker, a FM radio, a mosquito repellent, a night light, and a charging station. Don't let those dog days of summer get you stucked in the room. Get outside and pamper your families with TOYCOOL.                             Toycool is samll in size and portable to carry that can be placed in a tent, a boat, a RV, on a beach, a tailgate or any other places where heat may be an issue.Beat the summer heat with ToyCool In the BeachWhen you are camping at the beach, connect the exhaust pipe can drain the hot air out the tent.Stay Cool with Toycool Wherever You WantToycool is the best way to stay cool and beat the heat when outdoor family get togethers. Toycool, For the ultimate summer camping！Use Toycool In Your HouseNo More Hot Outside                                                                                        There are two colors for you to choose with toycool.                                             The built-in mini compressor draws and compresses the refrigerant gas to a high pressure and temperature gas before it passes through the condenser coil. At this point in the process the air that brought in by axial blower passes through the condenser coil and take away the heat exhausted by refrigerant and turns the high pressure refrigerant into its liquid form. The high pressure liquid then passes into the evaporator coil and take away the heat of the hotter air that continuously brought in by the centrifugal blower, when its pressure drops. Then the cooled air is pushed out by the blower.                                            Toycool Works    Remote ControllerUse the remote to control every function of your ToyCool. Cannot be easier to get refreshing cozy like this.  Digital Panel DescriptionGet clear working status of your ToyCool on the lighted LCD display panel and adjust to your perference whenever you want. ToyCool is a young brand with innovative product, which requires high cost and long term improvement. In order to get ToyCool mass production, reduce production cost and let more people to feel the refreshing cool in hot days, we raised our Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign. Your support means a lot to us. 1. What’s the cooling type of ToyCool? Do you have to add ice and water?No, we are using R134 refrigerant, so there is no need to add ice and water. 2、Do you know what the capability of ToyCool in cooling temperature?The cool air outlet area is 55-68℉ cooler than environment temperature, offering refreshing cool for you. 3、How to filter out hot air and condensation when used indoor?You need the exhaust pipe to filter out hot air and the drain pipe for the condensation for indoor use. 4、Can the unit be plugged into a wall outlet?Yes, the product comes with an adapter for wall outlet to charge battery and power ToyCool.  5、Can we plug it in a car?The 24V DC power options of ToyCool makes it not easy to plug in a car with 12V DC power. You need to have an extra inverter. We do not recommend you to plug it in a car.   6、What’s the maximum room fit for cooling when used indoor?TOYCOOL is capable of cooling a 40-50 square feet room.  7、How long will the power bank last when used outdoor?The battery is capable to run for 5-8 hrs.                   8、What should I be cautious when I use it?Remove and place it horizontally. Keep it standing for 30 mins before it works.

story:
Overview

Interact and control the world around you! The uMotio is an open and easy to use 3D tracking and gesture controller. Plug it into your computer for a new human interface experience. Use the uMotio to control your media, your games or embed it into your latest DIY project. Not only can the uMotio sense the position of your hand (x, y and z) but it also has built in gestures.

The uMotio brings a new experience to both the regular user, gamer or hacker. Whether it be on a computer, appliances, lighting or your own projects. Using hand and finger tracking you control your world!

The uMotio works straight out of the box, no technical experience required. Have the technical experience? Don't worry, we have you covered. The uMotio is fully Arduino (tm) compatible and with our gesture library you will be integrating motion and gesture control into all your projects without any difficulty.


Note: All the photos and videos are from our working prototypes, final product may vary in size & appearance.

Features

As seen on


 What do I get ?

We have a variety of perks available depending on what you need:

uMotio White 

The uMotio White is the 3D tracker and gesture controller as seen in the pictures and used for the demo's in the video. It has a mini USB connector for connection to your computer, Raspberry Pi etc. It also has additional inputs and outputs for use with your Arduino (tm) projects.

uMotio Blue

The uMotio Blue has everything the uMotio White has and includes Bluetooth low energy with an integrated rechargeable battery to control your devices wirelessly!

Harley shield adapter 

All the additional IO on the uMotio White/Blue is available on the back of the uMotio. Due to the nature of the uMotio, it isn't practical to make it Arduino (tm) shield compatible. Should you want to use existing Arduino (tm) shields then you need the Harley Shield Adapter. It connects to your uMotio with an included ribbon cable and provides a regular Arduino (tm) shield compatible layout so that you can use your existing shields with the uMotio. There is a prototype section, push button and LED's on the shield for you to use. We added this pledge available separately should you want more than 1 shield.

Hacker Editions

The hacker editions (available with the uMotio White and Blue), contains the uMotio Arduino (tm) controller and the Harley Shield for immediate hardware hacking when you receive your kit.

How does it actually work ?

The 3d sensor technology uses transmit frequencies f in the range of 100 kHz, which reflects a wavelength of about three kilometers. With electrode geometries of typically less than twenty by twenty centimeters, this Tx wavelength is much larger in comparison. Therefore, the magnetic component is practically zero and no wave propagation takes place. The result is a quasi-static electrical near field that can be used for sensing conductive objects such as the human body.

Once a user intrudes the sensing area, the electrical field distribution becomes distorted. The field lines intercepted by the hand are shunted to ground through the conductivity of the human body itself. The proximity of the body causes a compression of the equipotential lines and shifts the receiver electrode signal levels to a lower potential which is detected by the 3D sensor technology.


Hardware Technical Specs 

The 3D tracking and gesture sensing is done using Microchip's 32-bit MGC3130 GestIC Technology. This gives the uMotio a 0 to 15cm detection range with a high resolution of up to 150 dpi.

To interface with the world around it, you will find an Atmel ATmega32U4 8-bit AVR microcontroller operating at 3.3V. On the AVR we will load an Arduino (tm) compatible bootloader so you can easily run your own applications on the uMotio.

In addition to the above mentioned features, the uMotio Blue comes packaged with an internal Li-ion rechargeable battery and a Bluetooth V4.0, Low Energy module. Allowing you to wirelessly control your devices.

Arduino Compatibility

We have created a very cool Arduino (tm) library to allow you to easily create your own programs that run on the uMotio. Get hand tracking information with just a few lines of code!


Where we are in development ?

Currently we have a few working prototypes. These prototypes have been used in the video above and the same prototypes have been used for our demos that we did at various hacker-spaces (BinarySpace/House4Hack)

We are busy with the final testing of our Arduino (tm) library while improving it as we go along. We are also building an extensive library of various code examples.


We have started testing the uMotio Blue prototype. Currently we have working hardware and are busy developing the firmware.

uMotio Real World Applications

Gaming

Your computer sees your uMotio as a game controller out of the box. Use it to play your favorite games or develop new unique games for a gesture game controller.


Media Control

Use the uMotio as a media control. Change the song with a swipe of your hand or turn the volume up/down with a simple gesture.

Kiosk

Want to create a unique kiosk for your product/advertisements? The uMotio makes for a great durable controller. Have your clients navigate brochures with simple swipe actions. Your kiosk is a lot cleaner and durable without buttons that can break. The uMotio can be embedded behind a wooden or plastic panel.

Hospital 'No Touch' Control

Have an environment where prevention of spreading germs is a big priority? With the built in gestures there are many different options available for controlling various devices. For example control the lights (including dimming) or the air conditioner from the same controller.


DIY Projects

Because of the open nature of the uMotio it is very easy to integrate it into your own DIY projects. Make a gesture controlled robot, or even create a unique 3D printer controller! There are various ways to get the tracking and gesture data from the uMotio, so even if you don't want to make new Arduino (tm) firmware, you can still get the data from a simple serial port connection. Connect it to your computer, Raspberry Pi or even your Cubie.



Open hardware and Software

Schematics, layouts and software will be released under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike license. This will be available on GitHub after the campaign ends successfully. Designs and software library will be available when finalized.

Why we need your support

We currently have working prototypes of the uMotio and we have received a lot of interest from hackers and users all over. The most cost effective way of building more uMotio's though, is to do it in bulk. Our crowd funding campaign is a way for us to gauge the interest and to get the capital to do our first production run. With your help we can turn our prototype into a great product that can bring gesture and 3D tracking into the hands of user, makers and hackers all over the world. Money funded from this campaign will be used for setup costs, certifications and the initial production run of uMotio units.

Timeline


Who are we ?


Ignatius Havemann and Tom Van den Bon. Hardware R&D Engineers by day, passionate designers/makers by night. We enjoy creating new and innovative devices and gadgets. We are hackers at heart and if we think we can build something better, then chances are we will try. With more than 20 years of combined engineering experience between us we hope to create gadgets and products that will change the way the world thinks and operates.

Risks & Challenges

The risk are relatively small since we have already done a lot of work on the uMotio and currently have fully working prototypes.

Our current employer produces a variety of products and we are directly involved in the production of thousands of units every month. We can easily handle a small production run in-house. Should the demand be much higher, have the know-how and experience to ramp this up. We have confirmed quotes and lead times for outsourced production.

FAQ

Q. What do I need to know about shipping?

A. All physical pledges include free surface mail postal shipping. Unfortunately we cannot place any guarantees on your uMotio arriving in a timely fashion. We have a courier pledge available should you want us to courier your uMotio to you.

Shipping does not include customs fees, duties and/or taxes you might incur when importing products into your country.

Q. Does the uMotio need a computer for gesture processing?

A. No, the uMotio does all gesture and tracking processing on-board. Our robot gripper demo is a good example of the uMotio in action without a computer.

Q. How sensitive is the uMotio? Will my mobile phone interfere with it?

A. The low frequencies (70 - 130 kHz) the uMotio operates on guarantees no interference will disturb the controller. Frequency hopping is also utilized for robustness. We have placed a phone on the tracking pad and while dialing it the uMotio still operated flawlessly.

Need more information ?

Should you have any questions, concerns or feedback, feel free to contact us in the comments section or at info[at]umotio.com

Thank you!

The uMotio Team

story:
Please note: Being a Canadian, I based this campaign on Canadian dollars. When Americans donate, their donation will automatically be converted. This gives Americans (as usual) an even better deal than us Canadians, as the US dollar is worth $1.03 Canadian dollars.

Saving Words is a unique, high quality devotional that combines the best of ancient wisdom with the best of modern technology. Each day you will have on your iPhone, iPod Touch or iPad, a short devotion that includes a Bible verse and a concise meditation on that verse from the great Charles Spurgeon. Outside of the Bible, Spurgeon is the most-read Christian author in human history. His reflections are solidly biblical, gospel-centered, and they will encourage, challenge and edify you. Saving Words will be a daily incursion of eternal truth, a heavenly interruption in your daily life, and a welcome reminder to take your eyes off yourself and focus more and more upon Jesus.

Best of all, Saving Words isn’t just for you. With each daily devotion, we’ve created custom graphics so that you can share a specially selected quotation with your friends via text messages or social media, to strengthen and encourage your friends and followers.

We’ve taken the features we would want in the ideal digital devotional—a combination of features we’ve found nowhere else—and put them together:

1.  Bible verses specifically selected for daily meditations.

2.  Commentary on each verse from Charles Spurgeon, updated into modern English. Spurgeon’s time-tested insights will speak to you, wherever you are.

3.  Content available for you every day for a year, on a device you're constantly holding in your hands. Timeless truth, delivered daily.

4. For those who wish to use it, push notifications will remind you every day to spend time in the Word, at the time most convenient for you.

5.  You can share the day’s Saving Words through premium graphics to encourage your family, friends and colleagues. 

HOW WILL THE FUNDS BE USED?

First of all, none of the funds from this campaign will flow to us. Even though we’ve invested several thousand dollars of work into the design process, we’re not taking any money from this campaign. Rather, $5000 will go to a spectacular (Christian) developer with a stellar record of successful apps (in the top 5 on iTunes http://portfolio.beejaymorgan.com), who has given us an incredible rate. We’re confident he will do a superb job. Another $1000 will be held in reserve for maintenance and future updates.

This is all or nothing. If we don’t reach our goal of $6000, we won’t receive any funds and won’t be able to make this app. We’re all in this together.

JOIN US AND LET’S MAKE SAVING WORDS TOGETHER. SEE THE REWARD LEVELS ON THE RIGHT AND LEARN MORE AT THE BOTTOM OF THIS PAGE.

STRETCH GOAL

$10,000 - We will make Saving Words for Android! Each app you received from your pledge can be downloaded either as an Android app or an iPhone app.

///REWARDS///

 All of Grace - http://www.amazon.com/All-Grace-Spurgeon-Collection-ebook/dp/B00AMLVM90/ref=tmm_kin_title_0?_encoding=UTF8&sr=8-2&qid=1366944188

Through the Eyes of C.H. Spurgeon - http://www.amazon.com/Through-Eyes-C-H-Spurgeon-ebook/dp/B00AMNRQL6/ref=sr_1_2?s=digital-text&ie=UTF8&qid=1376658359&sr=1-2

Charles Spurgeon sermon manuscript, heavily amended by Spurgeon (comes with Certificate of Authentication from Spurgeon's College.)

///FAQ'S///

Why isn't this for Android?

We need to start somewhere. We've decided to start with iOS. If this does well and we receive overwhelming support ($10,000), the Android version will be made.

What kind of iOS devices will this app work with?

Saving Words will work on iPod Touch Gen 3 and 4, on iPhone 3gs, 4, 4s, 5 and future versions, and on current and future iPads.

What does the "C" mean before the dollar sign?

The "C" refers Canadian. At the time of me writing this 1 USD is equal to 1.03 Canadian Dollars. So for Americans, the rewards will cost a little bit less.

Do you have a question? If so, please email me and I'll respond to you right away.

story:
How

I love timelapse photography.

Two years ago, driven by a good friend of mine i've decided to give a try on timelapse photography. I had a DSLR camera but didn’t had an intervalometer, so i assembled a small electronic circuit on top of an Arduino Uno, made some basic code  and did my first timelapse movie. The result was awful, but for some reason, i was hooked.

Since that day I have never stopped looking for ways to evolve. I studied and tried various techniques until i got better. But, as i got better i felt something was missing. Yes, you guessed it, i needed motion control to give my timelapse movies a cinematographic feel. So, i did a market research and found out that there were great timelapse motion control devices for sell, but all of them were too expensive for me. Well, the next step became clear to me, i was going to make my own 3 axis timelapse motion control system. It had to be really affordable, lightweight, built with quality materials and most importantly, offer extreme freedom in terms of 3 axis motion control. 

Now that I reached that objective i´ve decided to combine my expertise (electronics and automation engineering) with my wife´s (economics) to launch a startup company and that´s how Timeblocks was born. 

Why

Our goal is to provide a reliable, strong, versatile, open-source and really affordable timelapse motion control system. In order to achieve this objective we need to manufacture large quantities to lower the unit price. 

By supporting this project you will allow us to launch in a near future an awesome online store with products that will enable timelapse enthusiasts from all over the world to gain access to really affordable motion control systems.


Perks


We know that your money is extremely valuable for you so we made a huge effort to offer the best perks. Here they are:


  tb.shield

It´s an Arduino fully assembled compatible shield that enables you to control two dc motors (up to 2 A each), camera focus, camera shutter and any Skywatcher’s panohead  with the SynScan GOTO protocol (www.skywatcher.com) such as Acuter All in One, Virtuoso Mount and the Allview mount.





            
To learn more  - http://www.timeblocks.wordpress.com/tb-shield/

                                 http://www.timeblocks.wordpress.com/tb-shield/vb_test-new/


  tb.shield + lcd.shield

The same shield as described above plus an interface shield with a great 20x4 serial enabled LCD and 6 buttons plus an Arduino Board with our firmware uploaded. This is the ideal situation for you if you already own a motorized slider (with DC motor) or/and a Skywatcher’s panohead and are looking for a plug and play solution.

Our open-source firmware has some great features like motion ramping, bulb ramping control, the ability to program up to 5 points in space so you can add complex trajectories to your timelapse movies (my favorite feature) among other very cool stuff. If you don´t like our firmware and have programming skills you can use this perk to develop a customized solution that suits your interests or you can adapt and change our open source code. Here's an example of the firmware´s interface for the main menu:

And an example on how to set one of the five points available. Note that you are not obligated to use all the 5 points. You can disable or enable the points at any time and use as much points as you need.
You can also use this firmware to control only one DC motor and the DSLR camera (without the panohead). When you turn on the controller it will automatically detect if there is a panohead connected and the menu will adapt accordingly (if it's not connected the menus related with the yaw and pitch movements will disappear).

* To set the points of the panohead you don't have to measure angles or guess them, you just drive it  to the desired position with the buttons in the controller and the point coordinates will be automatically saved once you exit the "yaw and pitch" menu. 

Small timelapse video of a 3 axis trajectory:

                
 

Small timelapse video of a 2 axis trajectory:

                

If it has dc motors you can use tb.shield + LCD.shield to automate it. 


  tb.shield + lcd.shield + tb.slider

The same perk as above (arduino board with firmware included/panohead not included) plus an light (2,5 kg), rock solid, 1 meter length black anodized aluminum motorized slider. All the parts of the slider will be cnc machined for maximum precision and great finish. It has a small, high torque motor to enable up to 3,5 Kg of load in vertical operation and up to 6 Kg in horizontal operation. This is also a plug and play solution. 




 

FAQ`s


Does any of the perks include a panohead?

No it doesn´t. We made our controller compatible with all Skywatcher’s panohead  with the SynScan GOTO protocol because they are very affordable and their performance is great. 

More info:

 http://www.astroshop.eu/alt-azimuth-with-goto/s...

http://www.astroshop.eu/skywatcher-n-114-500-he...


Does any of the perks include a ready to use solution?

Yes, besides tb.shield all of the other perks will be shipped fully assembled and with firmware installed. 



Risks & Challenges

For the last two years we´ve dedicated ourselves to this project. We´ve developed and tested  all of these products and we gave our best to find the right suppliers and manufacturers regarding quality, reliability and price. Today, we have a solid relationship with all of them which enables us to guarantee the fulfillment of any order we make. Nevertheless, in any mass production some issues with the quality of some parts can arise, so, we will test every single one of them before shipping them to you which can cause some minor delays.



Timelapse movies made with tb.slider + tb.shield + lcd.shield


              
              
              


    Other Ways You Can Help

    We also want to point out that we understand if you think that it´s not the right time for you to support us financially. But, if you like what we are doing you still can support us by spreading the word. Please share. Thank you so much.
story_txt:
How 
I love timelapse photography.
Two years ago, driven by a good friend of mine i've decided to give a try on timelapse photography. I had a DSLR camera but didn’t had an intervalometer, so i assembled a small electronic circuit on top of an Arduino Uno, made some basic code  and did my first timelapse movie. The result was awful, but for some reason, i was hooked.
Since that day I have never stopped looking for ways to evolve. I studied and tried various techniques until i got better. But, as i got better i felt something was missing. Yes, you guessed it, i needed motion control to give my timelapse movies a cinematographic feel. So, i did a market research and found out that there were great timelapse motion control devices for sell, but all of them were too expensive for me. Well, the next step became clear to me, i was going to make my own 3 axis timelapse motion control system. It had to be really affordable, lightweight, built with quality materials and most importantly, offer extreme freedom in terms of 3 axis motion control. 
Now that I reached that objective i´ve decided to combine my expertise (electronics and automation engineering) with my wife´s (economics) to launch a startup company and that´s how Timeblocks was born. 
Why
Our goal is to provide a reliable, strong, versatile, open-source and really affordable timelapse motion control system. In order to achieve this objective we need to manufacture large quantities to lower the unit price. 
By supporting this project you will allow us to launch in a near future an awesome online store with products that will enable timelapse enthusiasts from all over the world to gain access to really affordable motion control systems.



Perks


We know that your money is extremely valuable for you so we made a huge effort to offer the best perks. Here they are:



  tb.shield
It´s an Arduino fully assembled compatible shield that enables you to control two dc motors (up to 2 A each), camera focus, camera shutter and any Skywatcher’s panohead  with the SynScan GOTO protocol (www.skywatcher.com) such as Acuter All in One, Virtuoso Mount and the Allview mount.














            




To learn more  - http://www.timeblocks.wordpress.com/tb-shield/


                                 http://www.timeblocks.wordpress.com/tb-shield/vb_test-new/


  tb.shield + lcd.shield
The same shield as described above plus an interface shield with a great 20x4 serial enabled LCD and 6 buttons plus an Arduino Board with our firmware uploaded. This is the ideal situation for you if you already own a motorized slider (with DC motor) or/and a Skywatcher’s panohead and are looking for a plug and play solution.



Our open-source firmware has some great features like motion ramping, bulb ramping control, the ability to program up to 5 points in space so you can add complex trajectories to your timelapse movies (my favorite feature) among other very cool stuff. If you don´t like our firmware and have programming skills you can use this perk to develop a customized solution that suits your interests or you can adapt and change our open source code. Here's an example of the firmware´s interface for the main menu:



And an example on how to set one of the five points available. Note that you are not obligated to use all the 5 points. You can disable or enable the points at any time and use as much points as you need.


You can also use this firmware to control only one DC motor and the DSLR camera (without the panohead). When you turn on the controller it will automatically detect if there is a panohead connected and the menu will adapt accordingly (if it's not connected the menus related with the yaw and pitch movements will disappear).



* To set the points of the panohead you don't have to measure angles or guess them, you just drive it  to the desired position with the buttons in the controller and the point coordinates will be automatically saved once you exit the "yaw and pitch" menu. 

Small timelapse video of a 3 axis trajectory:


                 


Small timelapse video of a 2 axis trajectory:

                


If it has dc motors you can use tb.shield + LCD.shield to automate it. 





  tb.shield + lcd.shield + tb.slider
The same perk as above (arduino board with firmware included/panohead not included) plus an light (2,5 kg), rock solid, 1 meter length black anodized aluminum motorized slider. All the parts of the slider will be cnc machined for maximum precision and great finish. It has a small, high torque motor to enable up to 3,5 Kg of load in vertical operation and up to 6 Kg in horizontal operation. This is also a plug and play solution. 















 

FAQ`s


Does any of the perks include a panohead?



No it doesn´t. We made our controller compatible with all Skywatcher’s panohead  with the SynScan GOTO protocol because they are very affordable and their performance is great. 
More info:
 http://www.astroshop.eu/alt-azimuth-with-goto/s...
http://www.astroshop.eu/skywatcher-n-114-500-he...


Does any of the perks include a ready to use solution?
Yes, besides tb.shield all of the other perks will be shipped fully assembled and with firmware installed. 

Risks & Challenges


For the last two years we´ve dedicated ourselves to this project. We´ve developed and tested  all of these products and we gave our best to find the right suppliers and manufacturers regarding quality, reliability and price. Today, we have a solid relationship with all of them which enables us to guarantee the fulfillment of any order we make. Nevertheless, in any mass production some issues with the quality of some parts can arise, so, we will test every single one of them before shipping them to you which can cause some minor delays.
 


Timelapse movies made with tb.slider + tb.shield + lcd.shield


              
              
              


  Other Ways You Can Help 
We also want to point out that we understand if you think that it´s not the right time for you to support us financially. But, if you like what we are doing you still can support us by spreading the word. Please share. Thank you so much.

story:
Short Summary

 

We are a small software startup company from the UK. Our team comprises of a software developer, web designer and a project manager. We firmly believe in the success of  our project as it is well thought out, original and can be very useful to people. We conducted a market research prior to commencing work on our project, and we concluded that there is no exact competitor in this particular segment of the market.

At the same time, we found that there would be a huge need  for this segment to be filled with a high quality product. As a result, we commenced working on our project eight months ago and managed to get it online pretty fast.

We are aware that this type of WEB2.0 projects need to grow as fast as possible. As we enter a new phase of our project we realize that we need financial support for our marketing campaign. We would need to have finance available to commission an advertisement campaign on Facebook, Google and Television Channels. We also have surprise prizes for our supporters!

We need funds to advertise our application to spread the word. Our marketing budget is tight, but we have a live web application which is available for everyone online. In the meantime we are developing the mobile versions of the application.

We would like to have a wide ranging marketing campaign and we are ready to spend hard to pull this advertisement idea off. We are keen on our project becoming popular and the key to that success is a well thought out advertisement campaign, besides the high quality product. time is a critical factor, and although we have a working web application with the mobile version in BETA  phase we must gather pace to recruit more fellow sport lovers. Therefore we are asking your help from the Indiegogo community.

We are determined to release the first version without any bugs. We have plans to improve the app ecosystem and to make it perform better. We believe that after this initial phase the project will be able to pay for itself. Our belief is that the users' community will grow exponentially, in line with similar startups (e.g. Facebook) as this app will fill a gap with a high quality product. If you can't help us in financial terms please help us by being part of the user community. Join our site, enjoy our services and spread the word!

Our web app is available at www.activitreat.com

story:
Let's raise the money to get John the WordPress tattoo he never knew he always wanted!

If you havent seen the awesome Ghost project on Kickstarter go check it out.

Since being involved in Ghost since John posted up the initial concept I feel that as a friend and supporter I should do this.

Have you ever wanted to be a part of John, NOW YOU CAN!

Raising the £3000 pledge to get the Ghost WordPress tattoo perk is unlikely for a single person to pledge, John knows this, if we all donate together we can raise the money to get the poor guy get the tattoo he's always wanted!

I will personaly cover the cost of the fee's included which will be deducted form the total amount and make sure to be at the tattooing and get the video posted up online.

"THE IRONIC BACKER SPECIAL: If Ghost is successfully funded, I will get a large (like, coffee cup radius) tattoo of the WordPress logo! I'll make a video of it and send it to you. Presumably you'll publish it on the internet, so all can revel in my humiliation. You'll also get everything in the Elite Developer Special. See? Even if you don't like the idea, you can still help. HATERS GONNA... BE PRODUCTIVE."

Should we not reach the goal I will make sure that 100% of the funds raised are donated to the Ghost project, should the pledge get funded before we raise the money the funds will be added to ghosts total raised.

story:
We Are  Passionate About The Environment & Consumer


Large modules are stand alone products that can be bought through 3rd party companies for around $300-$900.  These modules include a new motherboard, cpu, gpu, ram, ssd, & battery.

  • After doing extensive manufacturing research we have come to the conclusion that a fully upgrade-able laptop is not impossible to make, its just not profitable.
  • Why would a multi billion dollar company want to sell you a laptop every 10 years when they could sell you a laptop every 2 years?

What We Need & What You Get

  • We've already invested over $100,000 of our own money & 2 years of research & development into this company. We need 10k worth of pre-orders to convince investors that this is a product that people want, before we move forward with manufacturing.
  • This is the worlds first fully upgrade-able laptop and it is built on an open source platform allowing you to upgrade from whatever brands you want.

Weighs 6 Pounds

8 hour battery life (web browsing)


Compare Us To Other Popular Laptop Manufacturers:

http://www.apple.com/macbook-pro/specs-retina/


The Impact

  • Evolve computers provides a platform for consumers to escape the endless cycle of outdated technology and the financial and environmental strain that poses.
  • E-waste is a huge problem facing our world. It is extremely toxic to animals and humans and its toll is hard to reverse.
  • An estimated 1.2 million Chinese people die from air pollution annually. Most of which is due to excessive technology manufacturing and improper recycling.

  • We created the Wing Light flash diffuser, from prototyping to manufacturing and marketing. We have extensive experience with the entire process of bringing an idea to life.

Risks & Challenges

  • Right now, we have successfully made a working prototype. The prototyping process is very similar, if not exactly the same, as manufacturing because each laptop will be individually milled out. We just need funding for mass production of circuit boards and to acquire more CNC machines. 
  • We are both aware of and skilled at every step of the manufacturing process and this will help us overcome any challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, we understand. If you could please help us get the word out about our computer and our mission, that would be a huge help to us! Please like and share our youtube commercial and our Indiegogo campaign, so we can help make the world a better place, and put the power back in the hands of the consumer!
